atk-abh01a0:5_0: Karuṇā viya sattesu, paññā yassa mahesino;
atk-abh01a0:13_0: Mātaraṃ pamukhaṃ katvā, tassā paññāya tejasā;
atk-abh01a0:21_0: Yaṃ devadevo devānaṃ, desetvā nayato puna;
atk-abh01a0:24_0: Yañca sutvāna so thero, āharitvā mahītalaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:30_0: Saṅgītā anusaṅgītā, pacchāpi ca isīhi yā.
atk-abh01a0:44_0: Avikkhittā nisāmetha, dullabhā hi ayaṃ kathāti.
atk-abh01a0:46_3: “Bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti no paṭikkamanti” “abhikkantavaṇṇā”tiādīsu viya.
atk-abh01a0:46_4: Tasmā yathā samussitesu bahūsu chattesu ceva dhajesu ca yaṃ atirekappamāṇaṃ visesavaṇṇasaṇṭhānañca chattaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:46_6: yo atirekappamāṇo nānāvirāgavaṇṇavisesasampanno ca dhajo so ‘atidhajo’ti vuccati,
atk-abh01a0:46_7: yathā ca ekato sannipatitesu bahūsu rājakumāresu ceva devesu ca yo jātibhogayasaissariyādisampattīhi
atk-abh01a0:46_8: atirekataro ceva visesavantataro ca rājakumāro so ‘atirājakumāro’ti vuccati,
atk-abh01a0:46_9: yo āyuvaṇṇaissariyayasasampattiādīhi atirekataro ceva visesavantataro ca devo so ‘atidevo’ti vuccati,
atk-abh01a0:47_2: abhidhammaṃ patvā pana suttantabhājanīyaabhidhammabhājanīyapañhapucchakanayānaṃ vasena nippadesato vibhattā.
atk-abh01a0:47_10: Suttantañca patvā cattāro satipaṭṭhānā ekadeseneva vibhattā,
atk-abh01a0:47_12: abhidhammaṃ patvā pana tiṇṇampi nayānaṃ vasena nippadesatova vibhattā.
atk-abh01a0:47_22: Suttantaṃ patvā ca ñāṇaṃ ekadeseneva vibhattaṃ na nippadesena;
atk-abh01a0:47_24: Abhidhammaṃ patvā pana “ekavidhena ñāṇavatthū”tiādinā nayena mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā nippadesatova vibhattaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:47_25: Tathā ekakato paṭṭhāya anekehi nayehi kilesā.
atk-abh01a0:47_26: Suttantaṃ patvā ca bhūmantaraparicchedo ekadeseneva vibhatto,
atk-abh01a0:47_28: abhidhammaṃ pana patvā tiṇṇampi nayānaṃ vasena bhūmantaraparicchedo nippadesatova vibhatto.
atk-abh01a0:48_0: Pakaraṇaparicchedato panesa dhammasaṅgaṇīvibhaṅgadhātukathāpuggalapaññattikathāvatthuyamakapaṭṭhānānaṃ sattannaṃ pakaraṇānaṃ vasena ṭhito.
atk-abh01a0:48_4: Nanu sammāsambuddhassa parinibbānato aṭṭhārasavassādhikāni dve vassasatāni atikkamitvā moggaliputtatissattherenetaṃ ṭhapitaṃ?
atk-abh01a0:49_0: Sammāsambuddho hi sattappakaraṇāni desento kathāvatthuṃ patvā yā esā puggalavāre tāva catūsu pañhesu
atk-abh01a0:49_1: dvinnaṃ pañcakānaṃ vasena aṭṭhamukhā vādayutti taṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbakathāmaggesu asampuṇṇabhāṇavāramattāya
atk-abh01a0:49_4: Yo saccikaṭṭho paramattho tato so puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenāti.
atk-abh01a0:49_8: Yo saccikaṭṭho paramattho tato so puggalo nupalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenāti.
atk-abh01a0:49_11: Sabbattha puggalo upalabbhati sabbattha puggalo nupalabbhati,
atk-abh01a0:49_12: sabbadā puggalo upalabbhati sabbadā puggalo nupalabbhati,
atk-abh01a0:49_13: sabbesu puggalo upalabbhati sabbesu puggalo nupalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā”ti evaṃ paṭhamaṃ vādaṃ nissāya paṭhamaṃ niggahaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:49_15: aṭṭhamaṃ nissāya aṭṭhamaṃ niggahaṃ dassentena satthārā ṭhapitā.
atk-abh01a0:49_17: Taṃ panetaṃ mātikaṃ ṭhapento imaṃ disvā ṭhapesi –
atk-abh01a0:49_18: mama parinibbānato aṭṭhārasavassādhikānaṃ dvinnaṃ vassasatānaṃ matthake moggaliputtatissatthero nāma
atk-abh01a0:49_19: bhikkhu bhikkhusahassamajjhe nisinno sakavāde pañca suttasatāni paravāde pañcāti suttasahassaṃ samodhānetvā
atk-abh01a0:50_0: Moggaliputtatissattheropi idaṃ pakaraṇaṃ desento na attano ñāṇena desesi,
atk-abh01a0:50_2: Iti satthārā dinnanayena ṭhapitamātikāya desitattā sakalampetaṃ pakaraṇaṃ buddhabhāsitameva nāma jātaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:50_5: Madhupiṇḍikasuttantasmiñhi bhagavā “yatonidānaṃ bhikkhu purisaṃ papañcasaññāsaṅkhā samudācaranti,
atk-abh01a0:50_6: ettha ce natthi abhinanditabbaṃ abhivaditabbaṃ ajjhositabbaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:50_7: esevanto rāgānusayāna”nti mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ pāvisi.
atk-abh01a0:51_0: Dhammappaṭiggāhakā bhikkhū mahākaccānattheraṃ upasaṅkamitvā dasabalena ṭhapitamātikāya atthaṃ pucchiṃsu.
atk-abh01a0:51_1: Thero pucchitamattakeneva akathetvā dasabalassa apacitidassanatthaṃ “seyyathāpi āvuso puriso sāratthiko
atk-abh01a0:51_2: sāragavesī”ti sāropamaṃ āharitvā sārarukkho viya bhagavā sākhāpalāsasadisā sāvakā,
atk-abh01a0:51_4: passaṃ passati cakkhubhūto ñāṇabhūto dhammabhūto brahmabhūto vattā pavattā atthassa ninnetā amatassa
atk-abh01a0:51_5: dātā dhammassāmī tathāgato”ti satthāraṃ thometvā punappunaṃ therehi yācito satthārā ṭhapitamātikāya atthaṃ
atk-abh01a0:51_6: vibhajitvā “ākaṅkhamānā ca pana tumhe āyasmanto bhagavantaṃyeva upasaṅkamitvā etamatthaṃ paṭipuccheyyātha
atk-abh01a0:51_7: sace sabbaññutaññāṇena saddhiṃ saṃsandiyamānaṃ sameti gaṇheyyātha,
atk-abh01a0:51_8: no ce mā gaṇhitthā”ti iminā adhippāyena “yathā vo bhagavā byākaroti tathā naṃ dhāreyyāthā”ti vatvā uyyojesi.
atk-abh01a0:52_1: Satthā dukkathitaṃ kaccānenāti avatvā suvaṇṇāliṅgaṃ ussāpento viya gīvaṃ unnāmetvā supupphitasatapattasassirikaṃ
atk-abh01a0:52_2: mahāmukhaṃ pūrento brahmassaraṃ nicchāretvā sādhu sādhūti therassa sādhukāraṃ datvā “paṇḍito,
atk-abh01a0:52_9: ahampi taṃ evamevaṃ byākareyyaṃ yathā taṃ mahākaccānena byākata”nti āha.
atk-abh01a0:53_0: Evaṃ satthārā anumoditakālato paṭṭhāya ca pana sakalaṃ suttaṃ buddhabhāsitaṃ nāma jātaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:53_2: Evameva sammāsambuddho sattappakaraṇāni desento kathāvatthuṃ patvā vuttanayena mātikaṃ ṭhapesi.
atk-abh01a0:54_0: Mama parinibbānato aṭṭhārasavassādhikānaṃ dvinnaṃ vassasatānaṃ matthake moggaliputtatissatthero nāma
atk-abh01a0:54_1: bhikkhu bhikkhusahassamajjhe nisinno sakavāde pañca suttasatāni paravāde pañcāti suttasahassaṃ samodhānetvā
atk-abh01a0:55_0: Moggaliputtatissattheropi imaṃ pakaraṇaṃ desento na attano ñāṇena desesi,
atk-abh01a0:55_2: Iti satthārā dinnanayena ṭhapitamātikāya desitattā sakalampetaṃ pakaraṇaṃ buddhabhāsitameva jātaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:55_3: Evaṃ kathāvatthunāva saddhiṃ satta pakaraṇāni abhidhammo nāma.
atk-abh01a0:56_14: vipākato cattārīti ekūnanavuti cittāni cittavibhatti nāma.
atk-abh01a0:57_0: Tadanantaraṃ ekavidhena duvidhenātiādinā nayena mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā vitthārena vibhajitvā dassitā rūpavibhatti nāma.
atk-abh01a0:58_0: Tadanantaraṃ mūlato khandhato dvārato bhūmito atthato dhammato nāmato liṅgatoti evaṃ mūlādīhi nikkhipitvā desito nikkheparāsi nāma. So –
atk-abh01a0:59_0: Mūlato khandhato cāpi, dvārato cāpi bhūmito;
atk-abh01a0:60_0: Atthato dhammato cāpi, nāmato cāpi liṅgato;
atk-abh01a0:63_0: Tadanantaraṃ pana tepiṭakassa buddhavacanassa atthuddhārabhūtaṃ yāva saraṇadukā nikkhittaṃ aṭṭhakathākaṇḍaṃ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:63_1: Yato mahāpakaraṇiyā bhikkhū mahāpakaraṇe gaṇanacāraṃ asallakkhentā gaṇanacāraṃ samānenti.
atk-abh01a0:66_0: Gambhīraṃ nipuṇaṃ ṭhānaṃ, tampi buddhena desitaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:67_1: Taṃ khandhavibhaṅgo āyatanavibhaṅgo dhātuvibhaṅgo saccavibhaṅgo idriyavibhaṅgo paccayākāravibhaṅgo satipaṭṭhānavibhaṅgo
atk-abh01a0:67_2: sammappadhānavibhaṅgo iddhipādavibhaṅgo bojjhaṅgavibhaṅgo maggaṅgavibhaṅgo jhānavibhaṅgo appamaññāvibhaṅgo
atk-abh01a0:67_3: sikkhāpadavibhaṅgo paṭisambhidāvibhaṅgo ñāṇavibhaṅgo khuddakavatthuvibhaṅgo dhammahadayavibhaṅgoti aṭṭhārasavidhena
atk-abh01a0:68_3: Tato paraṃ āyatanavibhaṅgādayopi eteheva tīhi nayehi vibhattā.
atk-abh01a0:70_1: Sā “khandhapaññatti āyatanapaññatti dhātupaññatti saccapaññatti indriyapaññatti puggalapaññattī”ti chabbidhena vibhattā.
atk-abh01a0:71_1: Taṃ sakavāde pañca suttasatāni paravāde pañcāti suttasahassaṃ samodhānetvā vibhattaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:71_2: Taṃ vācanāmaggato idāni potthake likhitaṃ aggahetvā saṅgītiāropitanayena dīghanikāyappamāṇaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:72_1: Taṃ mūlayamakaṃ khandhayamakaṃ āyatanayamakaṃ dhātuyamakaṃ saccayamakaṃ saṅkhārayamakaṃ anusayayamakaṃ
atk-abh01a0:73_2: Taṃ hetupaccayo ārammaṇapaccayo adhipatipaccayo anantarapaccayo samanantarapaccayo sahajātapaccayo aññamaññapaccayo
atk-abh01a0:73_3: nissayapaccayo upanissayapaccayo purejātapaccayo pacchājātapaccayo āsevanapaccayo kammapaccayo vipākapaccayo
atk-abh01a0:73_4: āhārapaccayo indriyapaccayo jhānapaccayo maggapaccayo sampayuttapaccayo vippayuttapaccayo atthipaccayo
atk-abh01a0:74_3: saraṇā dhammā araṇā dhammāti ime sataṃ dukā.
atk-abh01a0:74_7: Tesu dvāvīsati tikā sataṃ dukāti ayaṃ āhaccabhāsitā jinavacanabhūtā sabbaññubuddhena desitā sattannaṃ pakaraṇānaṃ mātikā nāma.
atk-abh01a0:75_0: Athāpare dvācattālīsa suttantikadukā kutopabhavā kena ṭhapitā kena desitāti?
atk-abh01a0:75_4: Ime ṭhapento pana thero na sāmukkaṃsikena attano ñāṇena ṭhapesi.
atk-abh01a0:75_5: Ekuttariyaṃ pana ekanipātadukanipātasaṅgīti dasuttarasuttantehi samodhānetvā ābhidhammikattherānaṃ suttantaṃ patvā akilamatthaṃ ṭhapitā.
atk-abh01a0:75_6: Te panete ekasmiṃ nikkhepakaṇḍeyeva matthakaṃ pāpetvā vibhattā.
atk-abh01a0:76_0: Sammāsambuddhena hi anulomapaṭṭhāne dvāvīsati tike nissāya tikapaṭṭhānaṃ nāma niddiṭṭhaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:76_1: Sataṃ duke nissāya dukapaṭṭhānaṃ nāma niddiṭṭhaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:76_2: Tato paraṃ dvāvīsati tike gahetvā dukasate pakkhipitvā dukatikapaṭṭhānaṃ nāma dassitaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:76_3: Tato paraṃ dukasataṃ gahetvā dvāvīsatiyā tikesu pakkhipitvā tikadukapaṭṭhānaṃ nāma dassitaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:76_4: Tike pana tikesuyeva pakkhipitvā tikatikapaṭṭhānaṃ nāma dassitaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:76_5: Duke ca dukesuyeva pakkhipitvā dukadukapaṭṭhānaṃ nāma dassitaṃ. Evaṃ –
atk-abh01a0:81_3: Dukasataṃ dvāvīsatiyā tikesu pakkhipitvā tikadukapaṭṭhānaṃ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:81_5: Duke dukesuyeva pakkhipitvā dukadukapaṭṭhānaṃ nāmāti paccanīyepi chahi nayehi paṭṭhānaṃ niddiṭṭhaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:86_0: Tato paraṃ anulomapaccanīyepi eteneva upāyena cha nayā dassitā. Tenāha –
atk-abh01a0:91_0: Tadanantaraṃ paccanīyānulomepi eteheva chahi nayehi niddiṭṭhaṃ. Tenāha –
atk-abh01a0:96_3: paccanīyānulome cha paṭṭhānānīti idaṃ catuvīsatisamantapaṭṭhānasamodhānaṃ paṭṭhānaṃ mahāpakaraṇaṃ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:97_0: Idāni imassa abhidhammassa gambhīrabhāvavijānanatthaṃ cattāro sāgarā veditabbā –
atk-abh01a0:100_1: Svāyaṃ yasmā imesaṃ sattānaṃ uppattiyā purimā koṭi na paññāyati ettakānañhi vassasatānaṃ vā vassasahassānaṃ vā vassasatasahassānaṃ vā,
atk-abh01a0:100_2: kappasatānaṃ vā kappasahassānaṃ vā kappasatasahassānaṃ vā matthake sattā uppannā,
atk-abh01a0:100_5: asukassa buddhassa kāle uppannā tato pubbe nāhesunti vā,
atk-abh01a0:100_9: ito pubbe avijjā nāhosi atha pacchā samabhavī”ti iminā pana nayena saṃsārasāgaro anamataggova.
atk-abh01a0:101_2: Tattha udakassa āḷhakasatehi vā āḷhakasahassehi vā āḷhakasatasahassehi vā pamāṇaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-abh01a0:101_3: Atha kho asaṅkhyeyyo appameyyo mahāudakakkhandhotveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati.
atk-abh01a0:102_2: Dvepi hi tantiyo paccavekkhantānaṃ saddhāsampannānaṃ pasādabahulānaṃ ñāṇuttarānaṃ kulaputtānaṃ anantaṃ pītisomanassaṃ uppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:102_5: Vinayadharabhikkhūnañhi vinayatantiṃ paccavekkhantānaṃ dosānurūpaṃ sikkhāpadapaññāpanaṃ nāma –
atk-abh01a0:102_6: imasmiṃ dose imasmiṃ vītikkame idaṃ nāma hotīti sikkhāpadapaññāpanaṃ –
atk-abh01a0:102_9: Uttarimanussadhammapeyyālaṃ paccavekkhantānaṃ nīlapeyyālaṃ paccavekkhantānaṃ sañcarittapeyyālaṃ paccavekkhantānaṃ anantaṃ pītisomanassaṃ uppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:102_10: Ābhidhammikabhikkhūnampi khandhantaraṃ āyatanantaraṃ dhātvantaraṃ indriyantaraṃ balabojjhaṅgakammavipākantaraṃ
atk-abh01a0:102_11: rūpārūpaparicchedaṃ saṇhasukhumadhammaṃ gaganatale tārakarūpāni gaṇhanto viya rūpārūpadhamme pabbaṃ pabbaṃ
atk-abh01a0:102_12: koṭṭhāsaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ katvā vibhajanto dassesi vata no satthāti abhidhammatantiṃ paccavekkhantānaṃ anantaṃ
atk-abh01a0:103_0: Evaṃ uppattiyā panassa idaṃ vatthupi veditabbaṃ –
atk-abh01a0:103_1: mahāgatigamiyatissadattatthero kira nāma mahābodhiṃ vandissāmīti paratīraṃ gacchanto nāvāya uparitale nisinno mahāsamuddaṃ olokesi.
atk-abh01a0:103_2: Athassa tasmiṃ samaye neva paratīraṃ paññāyittha,
atk-abh01a0:103_5: So kiṃ nu kho mahāsamuddassa ūmivego balavā udāhu catuvīsatippabhede samantapaṭṭhāne nayamukhaṃ balavanti cintesi.
atk-abh01a0:103_11: samantapaṭṭhānassa pana paricchedo na paññāyatīti saṇhasukhumadhammaṃ paccavekkhantassa balavapīti uppannā.
atk-abh01a0:103_12: So pītiṃ vikkhambhetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā yathānisinnova sabbakilese khepetvā aggaphale arahatte patiṭṭhāya udānaṃ udānesi –
atk-abh01a0:109_4: ayaṃ nayasāgaro nāmāti hi aññena na sakkā jānituṃ,
atk-abh01a0:109_5: sabbaññutaññāṇeneva sakkā jānitunti sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ ñāṇasāgaro nāma.
atk-abh01a0:109_6: Imesu catūsu sāgaresu imasmiṃ ṭhāne nayasāgaro adhippeto.
atk-abh01a0:110_0: Ayampi bhagavā bodhimūle nisinno ‘imaṃ paṭivijjhitvā imaṃ vata me dhammaṃ esantassa gavesantassa kappasatasahassādhikāni
atk-abh01a0:110_2: atha me imasmiṃ pallaṅke nisinnena diyaḍḍhakilesasahassaṃ khepetvā ayaṃ dhammo paṭividdho’ti paṭividdhadhammaṃ
atk-abh01a0:110_4: Tato tamhā pallaṅkā vuṭṭhāya ‘imasmiṃ vata me pallaṅke sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭividdha’nti animisehi cakkhūhi sattāhaṃ pallaṅkaṃ olokento aṭṭhāsi.
atk-abh01a0:110_5: Tato devatānaṃ ‘ajjāpi nūna siddhatthassa kattabbakiccaṃ atthi,
atk-abh01a0:110_6: pallaṅkasmiñhi ālayaṃ na vijahatī’ti parivitakko udapādi.
atk-abh01a0:111_0: Satthā devatānaṃ vitakkaṃ ñatvā tāvadeva tāsaṃ vitakkavūpasamanatthaṃ vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ dassesi.
atk-abh01a0:111_5: Evaṃ yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ katvā pallaṅkassa ṭhitaṭṭhānassa ca antare ākāsato oruyha sattāhaṃ caṅkami.
atk-abh01a0:111_6: Imesu ca ekavīsatiyā divasesu ekadivasepi satthu sarīrato rasmiyo na nikkhantā.
atk-abh01a0:112_0: Catutthe pana sattāhe pacchimuttarāya disāya ratanaghare nisīdi –
atk-abh01a0:112_2: Sattannaṃ pana pakaraṇānaṃ sammasitaṭṭhānaṃ ratanagharanti veditabbaṃ –
atk-abh01a0:112_3: tattha dhammasaṅgaṇiṃ sammasantassāpi sarīrato rasmiyo na nikkhantā.
atk-abh01a0:112_4: Vibhaṅgappakaraṇaṃ dhātukathaṃ puggalapaññattiṃ kathāvatthuppakaraṇaṃ yamakappakaraṇaṃ sammasantassāpi sarīrato rasmiyo na nikkhantā.
atk-abh01a0:112_7: athassa catuvīsatisamantapaṭṭhānaṃ sammasantassa ekantato sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ mahāpakaraṇeyeva okāsaṃ labhi.
atk-abh01a0:112_8: Yathā hi timirapiṅgalamahāmaccho caturāsītiyojanasahassagambhīre mahāsamuddeyeva okāsaṃ labhati,
atk-abh01a0:112_9: evameva sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ ekantato mahāpakaraṇeyeva okāsaṃ labhi.
atk-abh01a0:113_0: Satthu evaṃ laddhokāsena sabbaññutaññāṇena yathāsukhaṃ saṇhasukhumadhammaṃ sammasantassa sarīrato nīlapītalohitodātamañjiṭṭhapabhassaravasena
atk-abh01a0:113_2: Kesamassūhi ceva akkhīnañca nīlaṭṭhānehi nīlarasmiyo nikkhamiṃsu,
atk-abh01a0:113_3: yāsaṃ vasena gaganatalaṃ añjanacuṇṇasamokiṇṇaṃ viya umāpupphanīluppaladalasañchannaṃ viya vītipatantamaṇitālavaṇṭaṃ
atk-abh01a0:114_0: Chavito ceva akkhīnañca pītaṭṭhānehi pītarasmiyo nikkhamiṃsu;
atk-abh01a0:114_1: yāsaṃ vasena disābhāgā suvaṇṇarasadhārābhisiñcamānā viya suvaṇṇapaṭapasāritā viya kuṅkumacuṇṇakaṇikārapupphasamparikiṇṇā viya ca virociṃsu.
atk-abh01a0:115_0: Maṃsalohitehi ceva akkhīnañca rattaṭṭhānehi lohitarasmiyo nikkhamiṃsu yāsaṃ vasena disābhāgā cīnapiṭṭhacuṇṇarañjitā
atk-abh01a0:116_0: Aṭṭhīhi ceva dantehi ca akkhīnañca setaṭṭhānehi odātarasmiyo nikkhamiṃsu;
atk-abh01a0:116_1: yāsaṃ vasena disābhāgā rajataghaṭehi āsiñcamānakhīradhārāsamparikiṇṇā viya sampasāritarajatapaṭṭavitānā viya,
atk-abh01a0:117_0: Mañjiṭṭhapabhassarā pana tamhā tamhā sarīrappadesā nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-abh01a0:117_1: Iti tā chabbaṇṇarasmiyo nikkhamitvā ghanamahāpathaviṃ gaṇhiṃsu.
atk-abh01a0:118_1: Atha mahāpathaviṃ bhinditvā heṭṭhā udakaṃ gaṇhiṃsu.
atk-abh01a0:118_2: Pathavisandhārakaṃ aṭṭhanahutādhikacatuyojanasatasahassabahalaṃ udakaṃ suvaṇṇakalasehi āsiñcamānavilīnasuvaṇṇaṃ viya ahosi.
atk-abh01a0:119_1: Te vinivijjhitvā tāvatiṃse tato yāme tato tusite tato nimmānaratī tato paranimmitavasavattī tato nava
atk-abh01a0:119_2: brahmaloke tato vehapphale tato pañca suddhāvāse vinivijjhitvā cattāro āruppe gaṇhiṃsu.
atk-abh01a0:119_3: Cattāro ca āruppe vinivijjhitvā ajaṭākāsaṃ pakkhandiṃsu.
atk-abh01a0:120_4: devatānaṃ uyyānavimānakapparukkhesu ceva sarīresu ca ābharaṇesu cāti sabbattha pabhā natthi.
atk-abh01a0:120_5: Tisahassimahāsahassilokadhātuyā ālokapharaṇasamattho mahābrahmāpi sūriyuggamane khajjopanako viya ahosi.
atk-abh01a0:120_10: Saṇhasukhumadhammaṃ pana sammasato lokanāthassa lohitaṃ pasīdi,
atk-abh01a0:120_13: Cittasamuṭṭhānā vaṇṇadhātu samantā asītihatthamatte padese niccalāva aṭṭhāsi.
atk-abh01a0:121_3: Satthā pana evaṃ sattāhaṃ manasā cintitadhammaṃ vacībhedaṃ katvā desento vassasatenapi vassasahassenapi
atk-abh01a0:121_4: vassasatasahassenapi matthakaṃ pāpetvā desetuṃ na sakkotīti na vattabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:121_5: Aparabhāgepi hi tathāgato tāvatiṃsabhavane pāricchattakamūle paṇḍukambalasilāyaṃ dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:121_6: majjhe nisinno mātaraṃ kāyasakkhiṃ katvā kusalā dhammā,
atk-abh01a0:121_8: abyākatā dhammāti dhammaṃ desento satabhāgena sahassabhāgena satasahassabhāgena dhammantarā dhammantaraṃ saṅkamitvā saṅkamitvāva desesi.
atk-abh01a0:121_9: Tayo māse nirantaraṃ pavattitadesanā vegena pavattā ākāsagaṅgā viya adhomukhaṭhapitaudakaghaṭā nikkhantaudakadhārā
atk-abh01a0:121_10: viya ca hutvā anantā aparimāṇā ahosi.
atk-abh01a0:122_0: Buddhānañhi bhattānumodanakālepi thokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā anumodentānaṃ desanā dīghamajjhimanikāyappamāṇā hoti.
atk-abh01a0:122_1: Pacchābhattaṃ pana sampattaparisāya dhammaṃ desentānaṃ desanā saṃyuttaaṅguttarikadvemahānikāyappamāṇāva hoti. Kasmā?
atk-abh01a0:122_2: Buddhānañhi bhavaṅgaparivāso lahuko dantāvaraṇaṃ suphusitaṃ mukhādānaṃ siliṭṭhaṃ jivhā mudukā saro madhuro vacanaṃ lahuparivattaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:122_3: Tasmā taṃ muhuttaṃ desitadhammopi ettako hoti.
atk-abh01a0:123_0: Ānandatthero hi bahussuto tipiṭakadharo pañcadasa gāthāsahassāni saṭṭhi padasahassāni latāpupphāni ākaḍḍhanto
atk-abh01a0:123_1: viya ṭhitapadeneva ṭhatvā gaṇhāti vā vāceti vā deseti vā.
atk-abh01a0:123_2: Ettako therassa eko uddesamaggo nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a0:123_3: Therassa hi anupadaṃ uddesaṃ dadamāno añño dātuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-abh01a0:123_6: Evaṃ adhimattasatimā adhimattagatimā adhimattadhitimā sāvako satthārā temāsaṃ iminā nīhārena desitadesanaṃ
atk-abh01a0:123_7: vassasataṃ vassasahassaṃ uggaṇhantopi matthakaṃ pāpetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-abh01a0:124_0: Evaṃ temāsaṃ nirantaraṃ desentassa pana tathāgatassa kabaḷīkārāhārappaṭibaddhaṃ upādinnakasarīraṃ kathaṃ yāpesīti?
atk-abh01a0:124_2: Buddhānañhi so so kālo suvavatthito suparicchinno supaccakkho.
atk-abh01a0:124_3: Tasmā bhagavā dhammaṃ desentova manussaloke kālaṃ oloketi.
atk-abh01a0:124_4: So bhikkhācāravelaṃ sallakkhetvā nimmitabuddhaṃ māpetvā ‘imassa cīvaraggahaṇaṃ pattaggahaṇaṃ sarakutti ākappo ca evarūpo nāma hotu,
atk-abh01a0:124_5: ettakaṃ nāma dhammaṃ desetū’ti adhiṭṭhāya pattacīvaramādāya anotattadahaṃ gacchati.
atk-abh01a0:124_7: Taṃ khāditvā anotattadahe sarīraṃ paṭijaggitvā manosilātale ṭhito surattadupaṭṭaṃ nivāsetvā cīvaraṃ pārupitvā
atk-abh01a0:124_8: cātumahārājadattiyaṃ selamayaṃ pattaṃ ādāya uttarakuruṃ gacchati.
atk-abh01a0:124_9: Tato piṇḍapātaṃ āharitvā anotattadahatīre nisinno taṃ paribhuñjitvā divāvihārāya candanavanaṃ gacchati.
atk-abh01a0:125_0: Dhammasenāpatisāriputtattheropi tattha gantvā sammāsambuddhassa vattaṃ katvā ekamantaṃ nisīdati.
atk-abh01a0:125_4: Evaṃ sammāsambuddhe nayaṃ dente paṭisambhidāppattassa aggasāvakassa velante ṭhatvā hatthaṃ pasāretvā dassitasamuddasadisaṃ nayadānaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:125_5: Therassāpi nayasatena nayasahassena nayasatasahassena bhagavatā desitadhammo upaṭṭhātiyeva.
atk-abh01a0:126_0: Satthā divāvihāraṃ nisīditvā dhammaṃ desetuṃ kāya velāya gacchatīti?
atk-abh01a0:126_1: Sāvatthivāsīnaṃ kulaputtānaṃ sampattānaṃ dhammadesanavelā nāma atthi,
atk-abh01a0:126_3: Dhammaṃ desetvā gacchantaṃ vā āgacchantaṃ vā ke jānanti ke na jānantīti?
atk-abh01a0:126_7: Sammāsambuddhassa vā nimmitabuddhassa vā rasmiādīsu nānattābhāvā.
atk-abh01a0:126_8: Ubhinnampi hi tesaṃ rasmīsu vā saresu vā vacanesu vā nānattaṃ natthi.
atk-abh01a0:127_0: Sāriputtattheropi satthārā desitaṃ desitaṃ dhammaṃ āharitvā attano saddhivihārikānaṃ pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ desesi.
atk-abh01a0:127_2: te kira kassapadasabalassa kāle khuddakavagguliyoniyaṃ nibbattā pabbhāre olambantā dvinnaṃ ābhidhammikabhikkhūnaṃ
atk-abh01a0:127_3: abhidhammaṃ sajjhāyantānaṃ sare nimittaṃ gahetvā kaṇhapakkhasukkapakkhe ajānitvāpi sare nimittaggāhamattakeneva
atk-abh01a0:127_5: Ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devaloke vasitvā tasmiṃ kāle manussaloke nibbattā yamakapāṭihāriye pasīditvā therassa santike pabbajiṃsu.
atk-abh01a0:127_6: Thero satthārā desitaṃ desitaṃ dhammaṃ āharitvā tesaṃ desesi.
atk-abh01a0:127_7: Sammāsambuddhassa abhidhammadesanāpariyosānañca tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sattappakaraṇauggahaṇañca ekappahāreneva ahosi.
atk-abh01a0:128_2: Thero hi iminā nīhārena dhammantaraṃ amakkhetvāva sukhaṃ gahetuṃ dhāretuṃ pariyāpuṇituṃ vācetuñca pahotīti gaṇanacāraṃ ṭhapesi.
atk-abh01a0:128_3: Evaṃ sante therova paṭhamataraṃ ābhidhammiko hotīti? Na hoti.
atk-abh01a0:128_5: So hi naṃ mahābodhipallaṅke nisīditvā paṭivijjhi.
atk-abh01a0:128_6: Buddho hutvā ca pana sattāhaṃ ekapallaṅkena nisinno udānaṃ udānesi –
atk-abh01a0:145_0: Sabbā te phāsukā bhaggā, gahakūṭaṃ visaṅkhataṃ;
atk-abh01a0:149_0: Ubhinnamantare pañcacattālīsa vassāni pupphadāmaṃ ganthentena viya,
atk-abh01a0:149_2: ca kathito amatappakāsano saddhammo majjhimabuddhavacanaṃ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:150_0: Taṃ sabbampi saṅgayhamānaṃ piṭakato tīṇi piṭakāni honti,
atk-abh01a0:150_4: Sabbampi hetaṃ piṭakato vinayapiṭakaṃ suttantapiṭakaṃ abhidhammapiṭakanti tippabhedameva hoti.
atk-abh01a0:150_5: Tattha ubhayāni pātimokkhāni dve vibhaṅgā dvāvīsati khandhakā soḷasa parivārāti idaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:150_12: Dhammasaṅgaṇīādīni satta pakaraṇāni abhidhammapiṭakaṃ nāma. Tattha –
atk-abh01a0:153_3: Tasmā vividhanayattā visesanayattā kāyavācānañca vinayanato ayaṃ vinayo vinayoti akkhāto.
atk-abh01a0:159_8: Suṭṭhu ca ne tāyati rakkhatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:159_10: Yathā hi tacchakānaṃ suttaṃ pamāṇaṃ hoti evametampi viññūnaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:159_11: Yathā ca suttena saṅgahitāni pupphāni na vikiriyanti na viddhaṃsiyanti evametena saṅgahitā atthā.
atk-abh01a0:163_0: Yaṃ ettha vuḍḍhimanto, salakkhaṇā pūjitā paricchinnā;
atk-abh01a0:164_0: Vuttādhikā ca dhammā, abhidhammo tena akkhāto.
atk-abh01a0:165_1: Tathā hesa “bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti,
atk-abh01a0:165_6: aññamaññasaṅkaravirahite dhamme ca vinaye cāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:166_0: Ettha ca “rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatī”tiādinā nayena vuḍḍhimantopi dhammā vuttā.
atk-abh01a0:166_1: “Rūpārammaṇaṃ vā saddārammaṇaṃ vā”tiādinā nayena ārammaṇādīhi lakkhaṇīyattā salakkhaṇāpi.
atk-abh01a0:166_10: anuttarā dhammā”tiādinā nayena adhikāpi dhammā vuttā.
atk-abh01a0:168_0: Vuttādhikā ca dhammā, abhidhammo tena akkhāto”ti.
atk-abh01a0:173_0: Idāni tena samodhānetvā tayopi vinayādayo ñeyyāti.
atk-abh01a0:173_1: Tena evaṃ duvidhatthena piṭakasaddena saha samāsaṃ katvā vinayo ca so piṭakañca pariyattibhāvato,
atk-abh01a0:173_2: tassa tassa atthassa bhājanato cāti vinayapiṭakaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:173_3: Yathāvutteneva nayena suttantañca taṃ piṭakañcāti suttantapiṭakaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:173_4: Abhidhammo ca so piṭakañcāti abhidhammapiṭakanti evamete tayopi vinayādayo ñeyyā.
atk-abh01a0:174_0: Evaṃ ñatvā ca punapi tesveva piṭakesu nānappakārakosallatthaṃ –
atk-abh01a0:178_0: Pāpuṇāti yathā bhikkhu, tampi sabbaṃ vibhāvaye.
atk-abh01a0:179_1: etāni hi tīṇi piṭakāni yathākkamaṃ āṇāvohāraparamatthadesanā,
atk-abh01a0:180_0: Ettha hi vinayapiṭakaṃ āṇārahena bhagavatā āṇābāhullato desitattā āṇādesanā;
atk-abh01a0:180_1: suttantapiṭakaṃ vohārakusalena bhagavatā vohārabāhullato desitattā vohāradesanā;
atk-abh01a0:180_2: abhidhammapiṭakaṃ paramatthakusalena bhagavatā paramatthabāhullato desitattā paramatthadesanāti vuccati.
atk-abh01a0:181_0: Tathā paṭhamaṃ ye te pacurāparādhā sattā te yathāparādhaṃ ettha sāsitāti yathāparādhasāsanaṃ;
atk-abh01a0:181_1: dutiyaṃ anekajjhāsayānusayacariyādhimuttikā sattā yathānulomaṃ ettha sāsitāti yathānulomasāsanaṃ;
atk-abh01a0:181_2: tatiyaṃ dhammapuñjamatte ‘ahaṃ mamā’ti saññino sattā yathādhammaṃ ettha sāsitāti yathādhammasāsananti vuccati.
atk-abh01a0:182_0: Tathā paṭhamaṃ ajjhācārapaṭipakkhabhūto saṃvarāsaṃvaro ettha kathitoti saṃvarāsaṃvarakathā;
atk-abh01a0:182_1: saṃvarāsaṃvaroti khuddako ceva mahanto ca saṃvarāsaṃvaro,
atk-abh01a0:182_2: kammākammaṃ viya ca phalāphalaṃ viya ca;
atk-abh01a0:182_3: dutiyaṃ dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhipaṭipakkhabhūtā diṭṭhiviniveṭhanā ettha kathitāti diṭṭhiviniveṭhanakathā;
atk-abh01a0:182_4: tatiyaṃ rāgādipaṭipakkhabhūto nāmarūpaparicchedo ettha kathitoti nāmarūpaparicchedakathāti vuccati.
atk-abh01a0:183_0: Tīsupi cetesu tisso sikkhā tīṇi pahānāni catubbidho ca gambhīrabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:183_1: Tathā hi vinayapiṭake visesena adhisīlasikkhā vuttā,
atk-abh01a0:186_3: Desanāti tassā manasā vavatthāpitāya tantiyā desanā.
atk-abh01a0:186_6: Yasmā sasādīhi viya mahāsamuddo mandabuddhīhi dukkhogāhā alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhā ca tasmā gambhīrā.
atk-abh01a0:186_7: Evaṃ ekamekasmiṃ ettha catubbidhopi gambhīrabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:187_16: Tesaṃ tesaṃ vā tattha tattha vuttadhammānaṃ paṭivijjhitabbo salakkhaṇasaṅkhāto aviparītasabhāvo.
atk-abh01a0:188_0: Idāni yasmā etesu piṭakesu yaṃ yaṃ dhammajātaṃ vā atthajātaṃ vā yā cāyaṃ yathā yathā ñāpetabbo attho
atk-abh01a0:188_1: sotūnaṃ ñāṇassa abhimukho hoti tathā tathā tadatthajotikā desanā,
atk-abh01a0:188_2: yo cettha aviparītāvabodhasaṅkhāto paṭivedho tesaṃ tesaṃ vā dhammānaṃ paṭivijjhitabbo salakkhaṇasaṅkhāto aviparītasabhāvo –
atk-abh01a0:188_7: Evampi ekamekasmiṃ ettha catubbidhopi gambhīrabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:193_0: Pāpuṇāti yathā bhikkhu, tampi sabbaṃ vibhāvayeti.
atk-abh01a0:194_0: Ettha pana tīsu piṭakesu tividho pariyattibhedo daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh01a0:195_0: Tattha yā duggahitā upārambhādihetu pariyāpuṭā ayaṃ alagaddūpamā.
atk-abh01a0:195_6: tamenaṃ bhoge vā naṅguṭṭhe vā gaṇheyya,
atk-abh01a0:195_7: tassa so alagaddo paṭiparivattitvā hatthe vā bāhāya vā aññatarasmiṃ vā aṅgapaccaṅge ḍaṃseyya,
atk-abh01a0:195_8: so tato nidānaṃ maraṇaṃ vā nigaccheyya maraṇamattaṃ vā dukkhaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:195_15: idhekacce moghapurisā dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇanti suttaṃ…pe… vedallaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:195_16: te taṃ dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇitvā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ paññāya atthaṃ na upaparikkhanti,
atk-abh01a0:195_17: tesaṃ te dhammā paññāya atthaṃ anupaparikkhataṃ na nijjhānaṃ khamanti,
atk-abh01a0:195_18: te upārambhānisaṃsā ceva dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇanti itivādappamokkhānisaṃsā ca.
atk-abh01a0:195_19: Yassa catthāya dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇanti tañcassa atthaṃ nānubhonti.
atk-abh01a0:195_20: Tesaṃ te dhammā duggahitā dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattanti.
atk-abh01a0:196_0: Yā pana suggahitā sīlakkhandhādipāripūriṃyeva ākaṅkhamānena pariyāpuṭā na upārambhādihetu,
atk-abh01a0:196_3: “tesaṃ te dhammā suggahitā dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya saṃvattanti.
atk-abh01a0:197_0: Yaṃ pana pariññātakkhandho pahīnakileso bhāvitamaggo paṭividdhākuppo sacchikatanirodho khīṇāsavo kevalaṃ
atk-abh01a0:198_0: Vinaye pana suppaṭipanno bhikkhu sīlasampadaṃ nissāya tisso vijjā pāpuṇāti,
atk-abh01a0:198_2: Sutte suppaṭipanno samādhisampadaṃ nissāya chaḷabhiññā pāpuṇāti,
atk-abh01a0:198_4: Abhidhamme suppaṭipanno paññāsampadaṃ nissāya catasso paṭisambhidā pāpuṇāti tāsañca tattheva pabhedavacanato.
atk-abh01a0:198_5: Evametesu suppaṭipanno yathākkamena imaṃ vijjāttayachaḷabhiññācatupaṭisambhidāppabhedaṃ sampattiṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-abh01a0:199_0: Vinaye pana duppaṭipanno anuññātasukhasamphassaattharaṇapāvuraṇādiphassasāmaññato paṭikkhittesu upādinnakaphassādīsu anavajjasaññī hoti.
atk-abh01a0:199_3: yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā te paṭisevato nālaṃ antarāyāyā”ti.
atk-abh01a0:199_7: puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmi”ntiādīsu adhippāyaṃ ajānanto duggahitaṃ gaṇhāti.
atk-abh01a0:199_9: “attanā duggahitena amhe ceva abbhācikkhati attānañca khanati bahuñca apuññaṃ pasavatī”ti.
atk-abh01a0:199_11: Abhidhamme duppaṭipanno dhammacintaṃ atidhāvanto acinteyyānipi cinteti,
atk-abh01a0:199_18: yāni cintento ummādassa vighātassa bhāgī assā”ti.
atk-abh01a0:199_19: Evametesu duppaṭipanno yathākkamena imaṃ dussīlabhāvamicchādiṭṭhitācittakkhepappabhedaṃ vipattiṃ pāpuṇātīti.
atk-abh01a0:201_0: Pāpuṇāti yathā bhikkhu, tampi sabbaṃ vibhāvayeti.
atk-abh01a0:202_1: Evaṃ nānappakārato piṭakāni ñatvā tesaṃ vasena sabbampetaṃ saṅgayhamānaṃ tīṇi piṭakāni honti.
atk-abh01a0:203_1: Sabbameva hetaṃ dīghanikāyo majjhimanikāyo saṃyuttanikāyo aṅguttaranikāyo khuddakanikāyoti pañcappabhedaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:206_4: aññaṃ ekanikāyampi samanupassāmi evaṃ cittaṃ yathayidaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:206_9: Evamādīni cettha sādhakāni sāsanato lokato ca.
atk-abh01a0:207_1: Majjhimappamāṇāni pañcadasavaggasaṅgahāni mūlapariyāyasuttādīni diyaḍḍhasataṃ dve ca suttāni.
atk-abh01a0:208_0: Diyaḍḍhasatasuttantā, dve ca suttāni yattha so;
atk-abh01a0:210_1: Devatāsaṃyuttādivasena ṭhitāni oghataraṇādīni satta suttasahassāni satta suttasatāni ca dvāsaṭṭhi ca suttāni.
atk-abh01a0:213_1: Ekekaaṅgātirekavasena ṭhitāni cittapariyādānādīni nava suttasahassāni pañca suttasatāni sattapaññāsañca suttāni.
atk-abh01a0:220_1: Sabbameva hidaṃ ‘suttaṃ geyyaṃ veyyākaraṇaṃ gāthā udānaṃ itivuttakaṃ jātakaṃ abbhutadhammaṃ vedalla’nti navappabhedaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:220_3: aññampi ca suttanāmakaṃ tathāgatavacanaṃ suttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:220_8: yañca aññampi aṭṭhahi aṅgehi asaṅgahitaṃ buddhavacanaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:220_10: Dhammapadaṃ theragāthā therīgāthā suttanipāte nosuttanāmikā suddhikagāthā ca gāthāti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:220_13: Apaṇṇakajātakādīni paññāsādhikāni pañca jātakasatāni jātakanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:220_16: acchariyā abbhutā dhammā ānande”tiādinayapavattā sabbepi acchariyaabbhutadhammappaṭisaṃyuttā suttantā abbhutadhammanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:222_0: Kathaṃ dhammakkhandhato caturāsīti dhammakkhandhasahassānīti? Sabbameva hidaṃ buddhavacanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:224_0: Caturāsīti sahassāni, ye me dhammā pavattino”ti. ;
atk-abh01a0:225_5: Abhidhamme ekamekaṃ tikadukabhājanaṃ ekamekañca cittavārabhājanaṃ eko dhammakkhandho.
atk-abh01a0:225_13: Tattha ekameko koṭṭhāso ekameko dhammakkhandhoti veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:226_0: Evametaṃ sabbampi buddhavacanaṃ pañcasatikasaṅgītikāle saṅgāyantena mahākassapappamukhena vasīgaṇena ayaṃ dhammo ayaṃ vinayo,
atk-abh01a0:226_10: imāni caturāsīti dhammakkhandhasahassānīti imaṃ pabhedaṃ vavatthapetvāva saṅgītaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:226_12: tīsu piṭakesu sandissamānaṃ saṅgahappabhedaṃ vavatthapetvāva sattahi māsehi saṅgītaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:227_0: Saṅgītipariyosāne cassa idaṃ mahākassapattherena dasabalassa sāsanaṃ pañcavassasahassaparimāṇakālaṃ pavattanasamatthaṃ
atk-abh01a0:227_1: katanti sañjātappamodā sādhukāraṃ viya dadamānā ayaṃ mahāpathavī udakapariyantaṃ katvā anekappakāraṃ
atk-abh01a0:228_0: Evaṃ saṅgīte panettha ayaṃ abhidhammo piṭakato abhidhammapiṭakaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:229_0: Taṃ dhārayantesu bhikkhūsu pubbe eko bhikkhu sabbasāmayikaparisāya nisīditvā abhidhammato suttaṃ āharitvā dhammaṃ kathento “rūpakkhandho abyākato,
atk-abh01a0:229_1: cattāro khandhā siyā kusalā siyā akusalā siyā abyākatā;
atk-abh01a0:229_3: dve āyatanā siyā kusalā siyā akusalā siyā abyākatā;
atk-abh01a0:229_5: dve dhātuyo siyā kusalā siyā akusalā siyā abyākatā;
atk-abh01a0:229_9: dukkhasaccaṃ siyā kusalaṃ siyā akusalaṃ siyā abyākataṃ;
atk-abh01a0:229_13: cattāri indriyāni siyā kusalā siyā abyākatā,
atk-abh01a0:229_14: cha indriyāni siyā kusalā siyā akusalā siyā abyākatā”ti dhammakathaṃ kathesi.
atk-abh01a0:230_0: Tasmiṃ ṭhāne eko bhikkhu nisinno ‘dhammakathika tvaṃ sineruṃ parikkhipanto viya dīghasuttaṃ āharasi,
atk-abh01a0:230_4: Kiṃ aññaṃ buddhabhāsitaṃ suttaṃ āharituṃ na vaṭṭatī’ti?
atk-abh01a0:230_15: tumhādise hi pabbājento vā upasampādento vā sātisāro hoti’.
atk-abh01a0:230_21: suttantaṃ vā gāthāyo vā abhidhammaṃ vā pariyāpuṇassu,
atk-abh01a0:230_23: “Suttante okāsaṃ kārāpetvā abhidhammaṃ vā vinayaṃ vā pucchati,
atk-abh01a0:230_24: abhidhamme okāsaṃ kārāpetvā suttantaṃ vā vinayaṃ vā pucchati,
atk-abh01a0:230_25: vinaye okāsaṃ kārāpetvā suttantaṃ vā abhidhammaṃ vā pucchatī”ti.
atk-abh01a0:230_26: ‘Tvaṃ pana ettakampi na jānāsī’ti ettakenapi paravādī niggahito hoti.
atk-abh01a0:231_1: Tatra hi dhammasenāpati sāriputtatthero aññamaññaṃ pucchitapañhañca vissajjanañca ārocetuṃ satthu santikaṃ
atk-abh01a0:231_11: Satthā ābhidhammikā nāma mama sāsane paribāhirāti avatvā suvaṇṇāliṅgasadisaṃ gīvaṃ unnāmetvā puṇṇacandasassirīkaṃ
atk-abh01a0:231_12: mahāmukhaṃ pūretvā brahmaghosaṃ nicchārento “sādhu sādhu sāriputtā”ti mahāmoggallānattherassa sādhukāraṃ
atk-abh01a0:231_13: datvā “yathā taṃ moggallāno ca sammā byākaramāno byākareyya,
atk-abh01a0:231_16: avasesā dhammakathaṃ kathentāpi na dhammakathikā. Kasmā?
atk-abh01a0:231_17: Te hi dhammakathaṃ kathentā kammantaraṃ vipākantaraṃ rūpārūpaparicchedaṃ dhammantaraṃ āloḷetvā kathenti.
atk-abh01a0:231_19: Tasmā ābhidhammiko bhikkhu dhammaṃ kathetu vā mā vā,
atk-abh01a0:231_22: Idaṃ sandhāya satthā sādhukāraṃ datvā ‘sukathitaṃ moggallānenā’ti āha.
atk-abh01a0:232_0: Abhidhammaṃ paṭibāhento imasmiṃ jinacakke pahāraṃ deti,
atk-abh01a0:232_5: aṭṭhārasasu bhedakaravatthūsu ekasmiṃ sandissati ukkhepanīyakammatajjanīyakammāraho hoti.
atk-abh01a0:232_6: Taṃ taṃ kammaṃ katvā uyyojetabbo ‘gaccha vighāsādo hutvā jīvissasī’ti.
atk-abh01a0:233_2: yathā anekesu suttasahassesu ‘ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharatī’tiādinā nayena nidānaṃ sajjitaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:233_5: na cetāni na buddhabhāsitānī’ti paṭikkhipitvā uttaripi evaṃ vattabbo – ‘paṇḍita,
atk-abh01a0:233_16: Yathā nāma cakkavattirañño hatthiratanaṃ vā assaratanaṃ vā thenetvā yānake yojetvā vicaraṇaṃ nāma aṭṭhānaṃ akāraṇaṃ;
atk-abh01a0:233_17: cakkaratanaṃ vā pana thenetvā palālasakaṭe olambitvā vicaraṇaṃ nāma aṭṭhānaṃ akāraṇaṃ;
atk-abh01a0:233_18: yojanappamāṇaṃ obhāsanasamatthaṃ maṇiratanaṃ vā pana kappāsapacchiyaṃ pakkhipitvā vaḷañjanaṃ nāma aṭṭhānaṃ akāraṇaṃ. Kasmā?
atk-abh01a0:233_20: evameva abhidhammo nāma na aññesaṃ visayo,
atk-abh01a0:233_26: Na hi sakkā evaṃ vutte paravādinā sahadhammikaṃ udāharaṇaṃ udāharituṃ.
atk-abh01a0:234_0: Maṇḍalārāmavāsī tissabhūtitthero pana mahābodhinidāno esa abhidhammo nāmāti dassetuṃ “yena svāhaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:234_2: vihārena paṭhamābhisambuddho viharāmi tassa padesena vihāsi”nti imaṃ padesavihārasuttantaṃ āharitvā kathesi.
atk-abh01a0:234_14: Tesu satthā mahābodhimaṇḍe pañcakkhandhe nippadesena paṭivijjhi,
atk-abh01a0:234_17: Imaṃ temāsaṃ dhammāyatane vedanāvasena dhammadhātuyañca vedanāvaseneva vihāsi.
atk-abh01a0:234_32: Evaṃ thero padesavihārasuttantavasena abhidhammassa nidānaṃ kathesi.
atk-abh01a0:235_0: Gāmavāsī sumanadevatthero pana heṭṭhālohapāsāde dhammaṃ parivattento ‘ayaṃ paravādī bāhā paggayha araññe kandanto viya,
atk-abh01a0:235_2: abhidhamme nidānassa atthibhāvampi na jānātī’ti vatvā nidānaṃ kathento evamāha –
atk-abh01a0:235_3: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā devesu viharati tāvatiṃsesu pāricchattakamūle paṇḍukambalasilāyaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:235_4: Tatra kho bhagavā devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ abhidhammakathaṃ kathesi –
atk-abh01a0:236_3: Tattha adhigamanidānaṃ dīpaṅkaradasabalato paṭṭhāya yāva mahābodhipallaṅkā veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:236_5: Evaṃ ubhayanidānasampannassa panassa abhidhammassa nidānakosallatthaṃ idaṃ tāva pañhākammaṃ veditabbaṃ –
atk-abh01a0:237_13: Ke sikkhantīti sekkhā ca puthujjanakalyāṇā ca.
atk-abh01a0:237_15: Ke dhārentīti yesaṃ vattati te dhārenti.
atk-abh01a0:238_0: Ayañhi sāriputtatthero bhaddaji sobhito piyajālī piyapālo piyadassī kosiyaputto siggavo sandeho moggaliputto
atk-abh01a0:238_1: sudatto dhammiyo dāsako soṇako revatoti evamādīhi yāva tatiyasaṅgītikālā ābhato.
atk-abh01a0:238_2: Tato uddhaṃ tesaṃyeva sissānusissehīti evaṃ tāva jambudīpatale ācariyaparamparāya ābhato.
atk-abh01a0:239_0: Tato mahindo iṭṭiyo, uttiyo sambalo tathā;
atk-abh01a0:240_0: Paṇḍito bhaddanāmo ca, ete nāgā mahāpaññā.
atk-abh01a0:242_1: Tato uddhaṃ tesaṃyeva sissānusissasaṅkhātāya ācariyaparamparāya yāvajjatanakālā ābhato.
atk-abh01a0:244_0: Evaṃ ābhatassa panassa yaṃ taṃ dīpaṅkaradasabalato paṭṭhāya yāva mahābodhipallaṅkā adhigamanidānaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:245_0: Ito kira kappasatasahassādhikānaṃ catunnaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānaṃ matthake amaravatī nāma nagaraṃ ahosi.
atk-abh01a0:245_1: Tattha sumedho nāma brāhmaṇo paṭivasati ubhato sujāto,
atk-abh01a0:245_4: yāva sattamā kulaparivaṭṭā akkhitto anupakuṭṭho jātivādena,
atk-abh01a0:245_5: abhirūpo dassanīyo pāsādiko paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgato.
atk-abh01a0:245_6: So aññaṃ kammaṃ akatvā brāhmaṇasippameva uggaṇhi.
atk-abh01a0:245_8: Athassa rāsivaḍḍhako amacco āyapotthakaṃ āharitvā suvaṇṇarajatamaṇimuttādipūrite gabbhe vivaritvā ‘ettakaṃ te kumāra mātu santakaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:245_10: ettakā ayyakapayyakānaṃ santakāti yāva sattamā kulaparivaṭṭā dhanaṃ ācikkhitvā etaṃ paṭipajjāhī’ti āha.
atk-abh01a0:245_12: ‘imaṃ dhanaṃ saṃharitvā mayhaṃ pitupitāmahādayo paralokaṃ gacchantā ekakahāpaṇampi gahetvā na gatā,
atk-abh01a0:245_13: mayā pana gahetvā gamanakāraṇaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī’ti so rañño ārocetvā nagare bheriṃ carāpetvā mahājanassa dānaṃ datvā tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbaji.
atk-abh01a0:246_0: Kappe ca satasahasse, caturo ca asaṅkhiye;
atk-abh01a0:257_0: Lakkhaṇe itihāse ca, sadhamme pāramiṃ gato.
atk-abh01a0:259_0: Dukkho punabbhavo nāma, sarīrassa ca bhedanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:264_0: Atthi hehiti so maggo, na so sakkā na hetuye;
atk-abh01a0:266_0: Yathāpi dukkhe vijjante, sukhaṃ nāmapi vijjati;
atk-abh01a0:268_0: Yathāpi uṇhe vijjante, aparaṃ vijjati sītalaṃ;
atk-abh01a0:272_0: Yathā gūthagato puriso, taḷākaṃ disvāna pūritaṃ;
atk-abh01a0:273_0: Na gavesati taṃ taḷākaṃ, na doso taḷākassa so.
atk-abh01a0:275_0: Na gavesati taṃ taḷākaṃ, na doso amatantaḷe.
atk-abh01a0:277_0: Na palāyati so puriso, na doso añjasassa so.
atk-abh01a0:279_0: Na gavesati taṃ maggaṃ, na doso sivamañjase.
atk-abh01a0:281_0: Na tikicchāpeti taṃ byādhiṃ, na doso so tikicchake.
atk-abh01a0:283_0: Na gavesati taṃ ācariyaṃ, na doso so vināyake.
atk-abh01a0:284_0: Yathāpi kuṇapaṃ puriso, kaṇṭhe baddhaṃ jigucchiya;
atk-abh01a0:291_0: Chaḍḍayitvāna gacchissaṃ, vaccaṃ katvā yathā kuṭiṃ.
atk-abh01a0:314_1: paṇṇasālā sumāpitāti imissā pāḷiyā sumedhapaṇḍitena assamapaṇṇasālācaṅkamā sahatthā māpitā viya vuttā.
atk-abh01a0:314_3: mahāsattañhi “himavantaṃ ajjhogāhetvā ajja dhammikapabbataṃ pavisissāmī”ti nikkhantaṃ disvā sakko devānamindo vissakammadevaputtaṃ āmantesi – “gaccha, tāta,
atk-abh01a0:314_4: ayaṃ sumedhapaṇḍito ‘pabbajissāmī’ti nikkhanto etassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ māpehī”ti.
atk-abh01a0:314_5: So tassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā ramaṇīyaṃ assamaṃ suguttaṃ paṇṇasālaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:314_7: Bhagavā pana tadā attano puññānubhāvena nipphannaṃ taṃ assamapadaṃ sandhāya “sāriputta tasmiṃ dhammikapabbate –
atk-abh01a0:317_1: Tattha assamo sukato mayhanti sukato mayā.
atk-abh01a0:317_2: Paṇṇasālā sumāpitāti paṇṇacchannā sālāpi me sumāpitā ahosi.
atk-abh01a0:318_9: Mudusamatale pana phāsuvihāraṃ āgamma kammaṭṭhānaṃ sampajjati.
atk-abh01a0:318_11: Caṅkamanassa anto vā majjhe vā koṭiyaṃ vā rukkhe sati pamādamāgamma caṅkamantassa nalāṭaṃ vā sīsaṃ vā paṭihaññatīti antorukkhatā dutiyo doso.
atk-abh01a0:318_12: Tiṇalatādigahanacchanne caṅkame caṅkamanto andhakāravelāyaṃ uragādike pāṇe akkamitvā vā māreti,
atk-abh01a0:318_13: tehi vā daṭṭho dukkhaṃ āpajjatīti gahanacchannatā tatiyo doso.
atk-abh01a0:318_14: Atisambādhe caṅkame vitthārato ratanike vā aḍḍharatanike vā caṅkamantassa paricchede pakkhalitvā nakhāpi
atk-abh01a0:318_17: ekaggataṃ na labhatīti ativisālatā pañcamo doso.
atk-abh01a0:318_18: Puthulato pana diyaḍḍharatanaṃ dvīsu passesu ratanamattaanucaṅkamaṃ dīghato saṭṭhihatthaṃ mudutalaṃ samavippakiṇṇavālukaṃ caṅkamaṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-abh01a0:319_3: raṭṭhaṃ pīḷetvā dhanasāraṃ vā sīsakahāpaṇādīni vā gaṇhantesu rājakulesu raṭṭhapīḷanakilesābhāvo,
atk-abh01a0:319_7: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti “yathā tasmiṃ assame vasantena sakkā honti imāni aṭṭha samaṇasukhāni vindituṃ,
atk-abh01a0:319_8: evaṃ aṭṭhaguṇasamupetaṃ taṃ assamaṃ māpesi” nti.
atk-abh01a0:320_0: Abhiññābalamāharinti pacchā tasmiṃ assame vasanto kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā abhiññānañca samāpattīnañca
atk-abh01a0:320_1: uppādanatthāya aniccato dukkhato vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā thāmappattaṃ vipassanābalaṃ āhariṃ.
atk-abh01a0:320_2: Yathā tasmiṃ vasanto taṃ balaṃ āharituṃ sakkomi,
atk-abh01a0:320_3: evaṃ taṃ assamaṃ tassa abhiññatthāya vipassanābalassa anucchavikaṃ katvā māpesinti attho.
atk-abh01a0:321_2: tadā kira kuṭileṇacaṅkamādipaṭimaṇḍitaṃ pupphūpagaphalūpagarukkhasañchannaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ madhurasalilāsayaṃ
atk-abh01a0:321_3: apagatavāḷamigabhiṃsanakasakuṇaṃ pavivekakkhamaṃ assamaṃ māpetvā alaṅkatacaṅkamassa ubhosu antesu ālambanaphalakaṃ
atk-abh01a0:321_4: saṃvidhāya nisīdanatthāya caṅkamavemajjhe samatalaṃ muggavaṇṇasilaṃ māpetvā antopaṇṇasālāyaṃ jaṭāmaṇḍalavākacīratidaṇḍakuṇḍikādike
atk-abh01a0:321_5: tāpasaparikkhāre maṇḍape pānīyaghaṭapānīyasaṅkhapānīyasarāvāni aggisālāyaṃ aṅgārakapalladāruādīnīti evaṃ
atk-abh01a0:321_7: taṃ taṃ sabbaṃ māpetvā paṇṇasālāya bhittiyaṃ “ye keci pabbajitukāmā ime parikkhāre gahetvā pabbajantū”ti
atk-abh01a0:321_8: akkharāni chinditvā devalokameva gate vissakammadevaputte sumedhapaṇḍito himavantapāde girikandarānusārena
atk-abh01a0:321_9: attano nivāsanānurūpaṃ phāsukaṭṭhānaṃ olokento nadīnivattane vissakammanimmitaṃ sakkadattiyaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ
atk-abh01a0:321_10: assamaṃ disvā caṅkamakoṭiṃ gantvā padavalañjaṃ apassanto “dhuvaṃ pabbajitā dhuragāme bhikkhaṃ pariyesitvā
atk-abh01a0:321_11: kilantarūpā āgantvā paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā nisinnā bhavissantī”ti cintetvā thokaṃ āgametvā “ativiya cirāyanti,
atk-abh01a0:321_12: jānissāmī”ti paṇṇasālakuṭidvāraṃ vivaritvā anto pavisitvā ito cito ca olokento mahābhittiyaṃ akkharāni vācetvā “mayhaṃ kappiyaparikkhārā ete,
atk-abh01a0:321_13: ime gahetvā pabbajissāmī”ti attanā nivatthapārutaṃ sāṭakayugaṃ pajahi.
atk-abh01a0:321_15: Evaṃ paviṭṭho ahaṃ sāriputta tassaṃ paṇṇasālāyaṃ sāṭakaṃ pajahiṃ.
atk-abh01a0:322_0: Navadosamupāgatanti sāṭakaṃ pajahanto nava dose disvā pajahinti dīpeti.
atk-abh01a0:322_1: Tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitānañhi sāṭakasmiṃ nava dosā upaṭṭhahanti.
atk-abh01a0:322_5: kiliṭṭho hi dhovitabbo ca rajitabbo ca hoti,
atk-abh01a0:322_6: paribhogena lahukaṃ jīraṇabhāvo eko jiṇṇassa hi tunnaṃ vā aggaḷadānaṃ vā kātabbaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:322_10: yathā hi naṃ paccatthikā na gaṇhanti,
atk-abh01a0:323_0: Vākacīraṃ nivāsesinti tadā ahaṃ sāriputta ime nava dose disvā sāṭakaṃ pahāya vākacīraṃ nivāsesiṃ muñjatiṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:323_1: hīraṃ hīraṃ katvā ganthetvā kataṃ vākacīraṃ nivāsanapārupanatthāya ādiyinti attho.
atk-abh01a0:324_2: appagghaṃ sundaraṃ kappiyanti ayaṃ tāva eko ānisaṃso,
atk-abh01a0:324_4: paribhogena saṇikaṃ kilissati dhoviyamānepi papañco natthīti ayaṃ tatiyo,
atk-abh01a0:324_12: vākuppattiyā dhammikaanavajjabhāvo ekādasamo vākacīre naṭṭhepi anapekkhabhāvo dvādasamoti.
atk-abh01a0:325_2: So kira varasāṭakayugaṃ omuñcanto cīvaravaṃse laggitaṃ anojapupphadāmasadisaṃ rattavākacīraṃ gahetvā
atk-abh01a0:325_3: nivāsetvā tassupari aparaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ vākacīraṃ paridahitvā punnāgapupphasantharasadisaṃ sakhuraṃ
atk-abh01a0:325_4: ajinacammaṃ ekaṃsaṃ katvā jaṭāmaṇḍalaṃ paṭimuñcitvā cūḷāya saddhiṃ niccalabhāvakaraṇatthaṃ sārasūciṃ
atk-abh01a0:325_5: pavesetvā muttājālasadisāya sikkāya pavāḷavaṇṇaṃ kuṇḍikaṃ odahitvā tīsu ṭhānesu vaṅkakājaṃ ādāya ekissā
atk-abh01a0:325_7: ekissā aṅkusakapacchitidaṇḍakādīni olaggetvā khārikājaṃ aṃse katvā dakkhiṇena hatthena kattaradaṇḍaṃ
atk-abh01a0:325_8: gahetvā paṇṇasālato nikkhamitvā saṭṭhihatthe mahācaṅkame aparāparaṃ caṅkamanto attano vesaṃ oloketvā
atk-abh01a0:325_11: buddhapaccekabuddhādīhi sabbehipi dhīrapurisehi vaṇṇitā thomitā ayaṃ pabbajjā nāma,
atk-abh01a0:325_16: labhissāmi aggaphalasukha”nti ussāhajāto khārikājaṃ otāretvā caṅkamavemajjhe muggavaṇṇasilāpaṭṭe suvaṇṇapaṭimā
atk-abh01a0:325_17: viya nisinno divasabhāgaṃ vītināmetvā sāyanhasamayaṃ paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā bidalamañcakapasse kaṭṭhattharikāya
atk-abh01a0:325_18: nipanno sarīraṃ utuṃ gāhāpetvā balavapaccūse pabujjhitvā attano āgamanaṃ āvajjesi “ahaṃ gharāvāse ādīnavaṃ
atk-abh01a0:325_19: disvā amitabhogaṃ anantayasaṃ pahāya araññaṃ pavisitvā nekkhamagavesako hutvā pabbajito,
atk-abh01a0:325_20: ito dāni paṭṭhāya pamādacāraṃ carituṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-abh01a0:325_30: na etto atirekatarā viya me gehasampadā paññāyatī”ti paṇṇasālāya dose vicinanto aṭṭha dose passi.
atk-abh01a0:326_3: Tiṇapaṇṇamattikāsu patitāsu tāsaṃ punappunaṃ ṭhapetabbatāya nibaddhajagganabhāvo dutiyo,
atk-abh01a0:326_5: avelāya vuṭṭhāpiyamānassa cittekaggatā na hotīti uṭṭhāpanīyabhāvo tatiyo,
atk-abh01a0:326_7: gehaṃ paviṭṭhena yaṃkiñci pāpaṃ sakkā kātunti garahapaṭicchādanabhāvo pañcamo,
atk-abh01a0:326_9: gehassa atthibhāvo nāmesa dutiyakavāso viyāti sattamo ūkāmaṅgulagharagoḷikādīnaṃ sādhāraṇatāya bahusādhāraṇabhāvo
atk-abh01a0:326_10: aṭṭhamoti ime aṭṭha ādīnave disvā mahāsatto paṇṇasālaṃ pajahi.
atk-abh01a0:327_0: Upāgamiṃ rukkhamūlaṃ guṇe dasahupāgatanti channaṃ paṭikkhipitvā dasahi guṇehi upetaṃ rukkhamūlaṃ upāgatosmīti vadati.
atk-abh01a0:328_1: appasamārambhatā eko guṇo upagamanamattameva hi tattha hotīti.
atk-abh01a0:328_2: Appaṭijagganatā dutiyo tañhi sammaṭṭhampi asammaṭṭhampi paribhogaphāsukaṃ hotiyeva.
atk-abh01a0:328_5: tattha hi pāpaṃ karonto lajjatīti garahāya appaṭicchādanabhāvo catuttho,
atk-abh01a0:328_6: abbhokāsāvāso viya kāyaṃ na santhambhetīti kāyassa asanthambhanabhāvo pañcamo.
atk-abh01a0:328_13: ime dasa guṇe disvā rukkhamūlaṃ upāgatosmīti vadati.
atk-abh01a0:329_0: Imāni ettakāni kāraṇāni sallakkhetvā mahāsatto punadivase bhikkhāya gāmaṃ pāvisi.
atk-abh01a0:329_1: Athassa sampattagāme manussā mahantena ussāhena bhikkhaṃ adaṃsu.
atk-abh01a0:329_2: So bhattakiccaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā assamaṃ āgamma nisīditvā cintesi “nāhaṃ ‘āhāraṃ na labhāmī’ti pabbajito siniddhāhāro nāmesa mānamadapurisamade vaḍḍheti.
atk-abh01a0:329_3: Āhāramūlakassa dukkhassa anto natthi yaṃnūnāhaṃ vāpitaṃ ropitaṃ dhaññanibbattakaṃ āhāraṃ pajahitvā pavattaphalabhojano bhaveyya”nti.
atk-abh01a0:329_4: So tato paṭṭhāya tathā katvā ghaṭento vāyamanto sattāhabbhantareyeva aṭṭha samāpattiyo pañca ca abhiññāyo nibbattesi.
atk-abh01a0:346_0: Te me puṭṭhā viyākaṃsu “buddho loke anuttaro;
atk-abh01a0:352_0: “Idha bījāni ropissaṃ, khaṇo ve mā upaccagā”.
atk-abh01a0:353_0: Yadi buddhassa sodhetha, ekokāsaṃ dadātha me;
atk-abh01a0:355_0: Adaṃsu te mamokāsaṃ, sodhetuṃ añjasaṃ tadā;
atk-abh01a0:362_0: Devā manusse passanti, manussāpi ca devatā;
atk-abh01a0:364_0: Devā dibbehi turiyehi, manussā mānusehi ca;
atk-abh01a0:374_0: Akkamitvāna maṃ buddho, saha sissehi gacchatu;
atk-abh01a0:375_0: Mā naṃ kalale akkamittha, hitāya me bhavissati.
atk-abh01a0:376_0: Pathaviyaṃ nipannassa, evaṃ me āsi cetaso;
atk-abh01a0:389_0: Aparimeyye ito kappe, buddho loke bhavissati.
atk-abh01a0:399_0: Pitā suddhodano nāma, ayaṃ hessati gotamo.
atk-abh01a0:401_0: Kolito upatisso ca, aggā hessanti sāvakā;
atk-abh01a0:414_0: Yathā manussā nadiṃ tarantā, paṭititthaṃ virajjhiya;
atk-abh01a0:416_0: Evameva mayaṃ sabbe, yadi muñcāmimaṃ jinaṃ;
atk-abh01a0:420_0: Ye tatthāsuṃ jinaputtā, sabbe padakkhiṇamakaṃsu maṃ;
atk-abh01a0:421_0: Narā nāgā ca gandhabbā, abhivādetvāna pakkamuṃ.
atk-abh01a0:425_0: Pītiyā ca abhissanno, pallaṅkaṃ ābhujiṃ tadā.
atk-abh01a0:435_0: Tāni ajja padissanti, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-abh01a0:437_0: Tāni ajja padissanti, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-abh01a0:438_0: Mahāvātā na vāyanti, na sandanti savantiyo;
atk-abh01a0:439_0: Tāni ajja padissanti, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-abh01a0:440_0: Thalajā dakajā pupphā, sabbe pupphanti tāvade;
atk-abh01a0:441_0: Tepajja pupphitā sabbe, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-abh01a0:442_0: Latā vā yadi vā rukkhā, phalabhārā honti tāvade;
atk-abh01a0:443_0: Tepajja phalitā sabbe, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-abh01a0:444_0: Ākāsaṭṭhā ca bhūmaṭṭhā, ratanā jotanti tāvade;
atk-abh01a0:445_0: Tepajja ratanā jotanti, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-abh01a0:446_0: Mānussakā ca dibbā ca, turiyā vajjanti tāvade;
atk-abh01a0:449_0: Tepi ajja pavassanti, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-abh01a0:453_0: Tepajja nibbutā aggī, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-abh01a0:454_0: Vimalo hoti sūriyo, sabbā dissanti tārakā;
atk-abh01a0:455_0: Tepi ajja padissanti, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-abh01a0:461_0: Tepajja āsayā chuddhā, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-abh01a0:462_0: Na hoti arati sattānaṃ, santuṭṭhā honti tāvade;
atk-abh01a0:463_0: Tepajja sabbe santuṭṭhā, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-abh01a0:466_0: Rogo tadā tanu hoti, doso moho vinassati;
atk-abh01a0:467_0: Tepajja vigatā sabbe, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-abh01a0:468_0: Bhayaṃ tadā na bhavati, ajjapetaṃ padissati;
atk-abh01a0:469_0: Tena liṅgena jānāma, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-abh01a0:471_0: Tena liṅgena jānāma, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-abh01a0:473_0: Sopajja vāyati gandho, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-abh01a0:475_0: Tepajja sabbe dissanti, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-abh01a0:476_0: Yāvatā nirayā nāma, sabbe dissanti tāvade;
atk-abh01a0:477_0: Tepajja sabbe dissanti, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-abh01a0:478_0: Kuṭṭā kavāṭā selā ca, na hontāvaraṇā tadā;
atk-abh01a0:480_0: Cutī ca upapatti ca, khaṇe tasmiṃ na vijjati;
atk-abh01a0:482_0: Daḷhaṃ paggaṇha vīriyaṃ, mā nivatta abhikkama;
atk-abh01a0:487_0: Vitathaṃ natthi buddhānaṃ, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavāmahaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:488_0: Yathā khittaṃ nabhe leḍḍu, dhuvaṃ patati bhūmiyaṃ;
atk-abh01a0:498_0: Handa buddhakare dhamme, vicināmi ito cito;
atk-abh01a0:499_0: Uddhaṃ adho dasa disā, yāvatā dhammadhātuyā.
atk-abh01a0:502_0: Imaṃ tvaṃ paṭhamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-abh01a0:504_0: Yathāpi kumbho sampuṇṇo, yassa kassaci adhokato;
atk-abh01a0:505_0: Vamate vudakaṃ nissesaṃ, na tattha parirakkhati.
atk-abh01a0:507_0: Dadāhi dānaṃ nissesaṃ, kumbho viya adhokato.
atk-abh01a0:512_0: Imaṃ tvaṃ dutiyaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-abh01a0:515_0: Upeti maraṇaṃ tattha, na vikopeti vāladhiṃ.
atk-abh01a0:517_0: Parirakkha sadā sīlaṃ, camarī viya vāladhiṃ.
atk-abh01a0:522_0: Imaṃ tvaṃ tatiyaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-abh01a0:525_0: Na tattha rāgaṃ janeti, muttimeva gavesati.
atk-abh01a0:526_0: Tatheva tvaṃ sabbabhave, passa andugharaṃ viya;
atk-abh01a0:532_0: Imaṃ tvaṃ catutthaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-abh01a0:535_0: Kulāni na vivajjento, evaṃ labhati yāpanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:536_0: Tatheva tvaṃ sabbakālaṃ, paripucchaṃ budhaṃ janaṃ;
atk-abh01a0:542_0: Imaṃ tvaṃ pañcamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-abh01a0:546_0: Tatheva tvaṃ sabbabhave, paggaṇha vīriyaṃ daḷhaṃ;
atk-abh01a0:552_0: Imaṃ tvaṃ chaṭṭhamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-abh01a0:554_0: Yathāpi pathavī nāma, sucimpi asucimpi ca;
atk-abh01a0:555_0: Sabbaṃ sahati nikkhepaṃ, na karoti paṭighaṃ tayā.
atk-abh01a0:562_0: Imaṃ tvaṃ sattamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-abh01a0:565_0: Samaye utuvasse vā, na vokkamati, vīthito.
atk-abh01a0:566_0: Tatheva tvampi saccesu, mā vokkamasi vīthito;
atk-abh01a0:572_0: Imaṃ tvaṃ aṭṭhamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-abh01a0:573_0: Tattha tvaṃ acalo hutvā, sambodhiṃ pāpuṇissasi.
atk-abh01a0:576_0: Tatheva tvampi adhiṭṭhāne, sabbadā acalo bhava;
atk-abh01a0:582_0: Imaṃ tvaṃ navamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-abh01a0:583_0: Mettāya asamo hohi, yadi bodhiṃ pattumicchasi.
atk-abh01a0:584_0: Yathāpi udakaṃ nāma, kalyāṇe pāpake jane;
atk-abh01a0:586_0: Tatheva tvampi hitāhite, samaṃ mettāya bhāvaya;
atk-abh01a0:592_0: Imaṃ tvaṃ dasamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-abh01a0:594_0: Yathāpi pathavī nāma, nikkhittaṃ asuciṃ suciṃ;
atk-abh01a0:596_0: Tatheva tvampi sukhadukkhe, tulābhūto sadā bhava;
atk-abh01a0:598_0: Ettakāyeva te loke, ye dhammā bodhipācanā;
atk-abh01a0:599_0: Tatuddhaṃ natthi aññatra, daḷhaṃ tattha patiṭṭhaha.
atk-abh01a0:603_0: Telayante yathā cakkaṃ, evaṃ kampati medinī.
atk-abh01a0:605_0: Pavedhamānā sā tattha, mucchitā sesi bhūmiyā.
atk-abh01a0:611_0: Sabbo upadduto loko, taṃ vinodehi cakkhuma.
atk-abh01a0:613_0: Vissatthā hotha mā bhātha, imasmiṃ pathavikampane.
atk-abh01a0:614_0: Yamahaṃ ajja byākāsiṃ, buddho loke bhavissati;
atk-abh01a0:618_0: Buddhassa vacanaṃ sutvā, mano nibbāyi tāvade;
atk-abh01a0:622_0: Dibbaṃ mānusakaṃ pupphaṃ, devā mānusakā ubho;
atk-abh01a0:624_0: Vedayanti ca te sotthiṃ, devā mānusakā ubho;
atk-abh01a0:625_0: Mahantaṃ patthitaṃ tuyhaṃ, taṃ labhassu yathicchitaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:627_0: Mā te bhavantvantarāyā, phusa khippaṃ bodhimuttamaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:628_0: Yathāpi samaye patte, pupphanti pupphino dumā;
atk-abh01a0:630_0: Yathā ye keci sambuddhā, pūrayuṃ dasapāramī;
atk-abh01a0:632_0: Yathā ye keci sambuddhā, bodhimaṇḍamhi bujjhare;
atk-abh01a0:634_0: Yathā ye keci sambuddhā, dhammacakkaṃ pavattayuṃ;
atk-abh01a0:639_0: Tatheva lokā muñcitvā, viroca siriyā tuvaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:640_0: Yathā yā kāci nadiyo, osaranti mahodadhiṃ;
atk-abh01a0:642_0: Tehi thutappasattho so, dasa dhamme samādiya;
atk-abh01a0:643_0: Te dhamme paripūrento, pavanaṃ pāvisī tadā.
atk-abh01a0:648_0: Kañci pañcasu sīlesu, sīle dasavidhe paraṃ.
atk-abh01a0:650_0: Kassaci asame dhamme, deti so paṭisambhidā.
atk-abh01a0:673_0: Vitthārikaṃ bāhujaññaṃ, iddhaṃ phītaṃ ahu tadā;
atk-abh01a0:677_0: Ye keci tena samayena, jahanti mānusaṃ bhavaṃ;
atk-abh01a0:681_0: Nagaraṃ rammavatī nāma, sudevo nāma khattiyo;
atk-abh01a0:683_0: Sumaṅgalo ca tisso ca, ahesuṃ aggasāvakā;
atk-abh01a0:685_0: Nandā ceva sunandā ca, ahesuṃ aggasāvikā;
atk-abh01a0:691_0: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ.
atk-abh01a0:694_0: Sā ca iddhi so ca yaso, tāni ca pādesu cakkaratanāni;
atk-abh01a0:696_0: Dīpaṅkarassa bhagavato aparabhāge ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ atikkamitvā koṇḍañño nāma satthā udapādi.
atk-abh01a0:697_0: Tadā bodhisatto vijitāvī nāma cakkavattī hutvā koṭisatasahassasaṅkhassa buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ adāsi.
atk-abh01a0:697_1: Satthā bodhisattaṃ “buddho bhavissatī”ti byākaritvā dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-abh01a0:697_2: So satthu dhammakathaṃ sutvā rajjaṃ niyyātetvā pabbaji.
atk-abh01a0:697_3: So tīṇi piṭakāni uggahetvā aṭṭha samāpattiyo,
atk-abh01a0:697_4: pañca ca abhiññāyo uppādetvā aparihīnajjhāno brahmaloke nibbatti.
atk-abh01a0:697_8: bhaddo ca subhaddo ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-abh01a0:697_10: tissā ca upatissā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-abh01a0:698_0: Tassa aparabhāge ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ atikkamitvā ekasmiṃyeva kappe cattāro buddhā nibbattiṃsu maṅgalo sumano revato sobhitoti.
atk-abh01a0:698_1: Maṅgalassa pana bhagavato tīsu sāvakasannipātesu paṭhamasannipāte koṭisatasahassabhikkhū ahesuṃ.
atk-abh01a0:698_4: Vemātikabhātā panassa ānandakumāro nāma navutikoṭisaṅkhyāya parisāya saddhiṃ dhammasavanatthāya satthu santikaṃ agamāsi,
atk-abh01a0:698_6: So saddhiṃ parisāya saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-abh01a0:698_7: Satthā tesaṃ kulaputtānaṃ pubbacariyakaṃ olokento iddhimayapattacīvarassa upanissayaṃ disvā dakkhiṇahatthaṃ pasāretvā “etha bhikkhavo”ti āha.
atk-abh01a0:698_8: Sabbe taṅkhaṇaññeva iddhimayapattacīvaradharā saṭṭhivassikattherā viya ākappasampannā hutvā satthāraṃ
atk-abh01a0:698_9: vanditvā parivārayiṃsu ayamassa tatiyo sāvakasannipāto ahosi.
atk-abh01a0:699_0: Yathā pana aññesaṃ buddhānaṃ samantā asītihatthappamāṇāyeva sarīrappabhā hoti, na,
atk-abh01a0:699_2: Tassa pana bhagavato sarīrappabhā niccakālaṃ dasasahassilokadhātuṃ pharitvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-abh01a0:699_3: Rukkhapathavīpabbatasamuddādayo antamaso ukkhaliyādīni upādāya suvaṇṇapaṭa pariyonaddhā viya ahesuṃ.
atk-abh01a0:699_5: Ettakaṃ kālaṃ candimasūriyādayo attano pabhāya virocituṃ nāsakkhiṃsu,
atk-abh01a0:699_7: Divā sūriyālokena viya sattā niccaṃ buddhālokeneva vicariṃsu.
atk-abh01a0:699_9: pāto ravanakasakuṇānañca vasena loko rattindivaparicchedaṃ sallakkhesi.
atk-abh01a0:699_10: Kiṃ pana aññesaṃ buddhānaṃ ayamānubhāvo natthīti?
atk-abh01a0:699_12: tepi hi ākaṅkhamānā dasasahassiṃ vā lokadhātuṃ,
atk-abh01a0:699_14: Maṅgalassa pana bhagavato pubbapatthanāvasena aññesaṃ byāmappabhā viya sarīrappabhā niccameva dasasahassilokadhātuṃ pharitvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-abh01a0:700_0: So kira bodhisattacariyakāle vessantarasadise attabhāve ṭhito saputtadāro vaṅkapabbatasadise pabbate vasi.
atk-abh01a0:700_1: Atheko kharadāṭhiko nāma yakkho mahāpurisassa dānajjhāsayataṃ sutvā brāhmaṇavaṇṇena upasaṅkamitvā mahāsattaṃ dve dārake yāci.
atk-abh01a0:700_2: Mahāsatto “dadāmi brāhmaṇassa puttake”ti haṭṭhapahaṭṭho udakapariyantaṃ pathaviṃ kampento dvepi dārake adāsi.
atk-abh01a0:700_3: Yakkho caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ ālambanaphalakaṃ nissāya ṭhatvā passantasseva mahāsattassa muḷālakalāpaṃ viya dve dārake khādi.
atk-abh01a0:700_4: Mahāpurisassa yakkhaṃ oloketvā vivaṭamatte aggijālaṃ viya lohitadhāraṃ uggiramānaṃ tassa mukhaṃ disvāpi kesaggamattampi domanassaṃ nuppajji,
atk-abh01a0:700_5: “sudinnaṃ vata me dāna”nti cintayato panassa sarīre mahantaṃ pītisomanassaṃ udapādi.
atk-abh01a0:700_6: So “imassa me nissandena anāgate imināva nīhārena sarīrato rasmiyo nikkhamantū”ti patthanaṃ akāsi.
atk-abh01a0:700_7: Tassa taṃ patthanaṃ nissāya buddhabhūtassa sarīrato rasmiyo nikkhamitvā ettakaṃ ṭhānaṃ phariṃsu.
atk-abh01a0:701_1: So kira bodhisattakāle ekassa buddhassa cetiyaṃ disvā “imassa buddhassa mayā jīvitaṃ pariccajituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-abh01a0:701_2: daṇḍakadīpikāveṭhananiyāmena sakalasarīraṃ veṭhāpetvā ratanamattamakulaṃ satasahassagghanikaṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ
atk-abh01a0:701_3: sappissa pūrāpetvā tattha sahassavaṭṭiyo jālāpetvā taṃ sīsenādāya sakalasarīraṃ jālāpetvā cetiyaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:701_5: Evaṃ yāva aruṇuggamanā vāyamantassāpissa lomakūpamattampi usumaṃ na gaṇhi,
atk-abh01a0:701_7: Dhammo hi nāmesa attānaṃ rakkhantaṃ rakkhati.
atk-abh01a0:706_0: Imassāpi kammassa nissandena tassa bhagavato sarīrobhāso dasasahassilokadhātuṃ pharitvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-abh01a0:707_0: Tadā amhākaṃ bodhisatto suruci nāma brāhmaṇo hutvā “satthāraṃ nimantessāmī”ti upasaṅkamitvā madhuradhammakathaṃ
atk-abh01a0:707_1: sutvā “sve mayhaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhatha bhante”ti āha.
atk-abh01a0:707_3: kittakā pana vo bhante parivārā bhikkhūti.
atk-abh01a0:707_6: sabbehipi saddhiṃ mayhaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti āha.
atk-abh01a0:707_8: Brāhmaṇo svātanāya nimantetvā gehaṃ gacchanto cintesi “ahaṃ ettakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yāgubhattavatthādīni dātuṃ no na sakkomi,
atk-abh01a0:707_10: Tassa sā cintā caturāsītiyojanasahassamatthake ṭhitassa devarañño paṇḍukambalasilāsanassa uṇhabhāvaṃ janesi.
atk-abh01a0:707_11: Sakko “ko nu kho maṃ imasmā ṭhānā cāvetukāmo”ti dibbacakkhunā olokento mahāpurisaṃ disvā “ayaṃ suruci
atk-abh01a0:707_12: brāhmaṇo buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nimantetvā nisīdanaṭṭhānatthāya cintesi,
atk-abh01a0:707_13: mayāpi tattha gantvā puññakoṭṭhāsaṃ gahetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vaḍḍhakivaṇṇaṃ nimminitvā vāsipharasuhattho mahāpurisassa purato pāturahosi.
atk-abh01a0:707_14: “Atthi nu kho kassaci bhatiyā kattabbakicca”nti āha.
atk-abh01a0:707_15: Mahāpuriso taṃ disvā “kiṃ kammaṃ karissasī”ti āha.
atk-abh01a0:707_17: gehaṃ vā maṇḍapaṃ vā yo yaṃ kāreti,
atk-abh01a0:707_19: Tena hi mayhaṃ kammaṃ atthīti. Kiṃ, ayyāti?
atk-abh01a0:708_0: Dvādasaterasayojanappamāṇo padeso kasiṇamaṇḍalaṃ viya samatalo ahosi.
atk-abh01a0:708_1: So “ettake ṭhāne sattaratanamayo maṇḍapo uṭṭhahatū”ti cintetvā olokesi.
atk-abh01a0:708_3: Tassa suvaṇṇamayesu thambhesu rajatamayā ghaṭakā ahesuṃ,
atk-abh01a0:708_10: yassa mandavāteritassa pañcaṅgikasseva tūriyassa madhurasaddo niggacchati.
atk-abh01a0:708_14: “Koṭisatasahassasaṅkhyānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ āsanāni ca ādhārakāni ca pathaviṃ bhinditvā uṭṭhahantū”ti cintesi.
atk-abh01a0:708_17: tāvadeva udakacāṭiyo uṭṭhahiṃsu ettakaṃ māpetvā brāhmaṇassa santikaṃ gantvā “ehi ayya tava maṇḍapaṃ oloketvā mayhaṃ bhatiṃ dehī”ti āha.
atk-abh01a0:708_19: Olokentassevassa sakalasarīraṃ pañcavaṇṇāya pītiyā nirantaraṃ phuṭaṃ ahosi.
atk-abh01a0:708_20: Athassa maṇḍapaṃ oloketvā etadahosi “nāyaṃ maṇḍapo manussabhūtena kato,
atk-abh01a0:708_21: mayhaṃ pana ajjhāsayaṃ mayhaṃ guṇaṃ āgamma addhā sakkassa bhavanaṃ uṇhaṃ ahosi.
atk-abh01a0:708_22: Tato sakkena devaraññā ayaṃ maṇḍapo kārito bhavissatī”ti.
atk-abh01a0:708_23: “Na kho pana me yuttaṃ evarūpe maṇḍape ekadivasaṃyeva dānaṃ dātuṃ,
atk-abh01a0:709_0: Bāhirakadānañhi tattakampi samānaṃ bodhisattānaṃ tuṭṭhiṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-abh01a0:709_2: hadayamaṃsaṃ vā uppāṭetvā dinnakāle bodhisattānaṃ cāgaṃ nissāya tuṭṭhi nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a0:709_3: Amhākampi hi bodhisattassa sivijātake devasikaṃ pañcasatasahassakahāpaṇāni vissajjetvā catūsu nagaradvāresu,
atk-abh01a0:709_4: majjhe nagare ca dānaṃ dadantassa taṃ dānaṃ tuṭṭhiṃ uppādetuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-abh01a0:709_5: Yadā panassa brāhmaṇavaṇṇena āgantvā sakko devarājā akkhīni yāci,
atk-abh01a0:709_6: tadā tāni uppāṭetvā dadamānasseva hāso uppajji,
atk-abh01a0:709_8: Evaṃ dānaṃ nissāya bodhisattānaṃ titti nāma natthi.
atk-abh01a0:709_9: Tasmā sopi mahāpuriso “sattāhaṃ mayā koṭisatasahassasaṅkhyānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dānaṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā
atk-abh01a0:709_10: tasmiṃ maṇḍape buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nisīdāpetvā sattāhaṃ gavapānaṃ nāma adāsi.
atk-abh01a0:709_11: Gavapānanti mahante mahante kolambe khīrassa pūretvā uddhanesu āropetvā ghanapākapakke khīre thoke taṇḍule
atk-abh01a0:709_16: Te pana bhikkhū attano ānubhāvena nisīdiṃsu.
atk-abh01a0:709_17: Pariyosānadivase sabbabhikkhūnaṃ pattāni dhovāpetvā bhesajjatthāya sappinavanītatelamadhuphāṇitānaṃ pūretvā ticīvarehi saddhiṃ adāsi.
atk-abh01a0:709_19: Satthā anumodanaṃ karonto “ayaṃ puriso evarūpaṃ mahādānaṃ adāsi,
atk-abh01a0:709_20: ko nu kho bhavissatī”ti upadhārento “anāgate kappasatasahassādhikānaṃ dvinnaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānaṃ matthake
atk-abh01a0:709_21: gotamo nāma buddho bhavissatī”ti disvā mahāpurisaṃ āmantetvā “tvaṃ ettakaṃ nāma kālaṃ atikkamitvā gotamo
atk-abh01a0:710_0: Mahāpuriso byākaraṇaṃ sutvā “ahaṃ kira buddho bhavissāmi,
atk-abh01a0:710_2: pabbajissāmī”ti cintetvā tathārūpaṃ sampattiṃ kheḷapiṇḍaṃ viya pahāya satthu santike pabbaji.
atk-abh01a0:710_4: samāpattiyo ca nibbattetvā āyupariyosane brahmaloke nibbatti.
atk-abh01a0:711_0: Maṅgalassa pana bhagavato uttaraṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosi.
atk-abh01a0:711_3: sudevo ca dhammaseno ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-abh01a0:711_5: sīvalī ca asokā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-abh01a0:711_8: Navutivassasahassāni ṭhatvā parinibbute pana tasmiṃ ekappahāreneva dasacakkavāḷasahassāni ekandhakārāni ahesuṃ.
atk-abh01a0:712_0: Evaṃ dasasahassilokadhātuṃ andhakāraṃ katvā parinibbutassa tassa bhagavato aparabhāge sumano nāma satthā udapādi.
atk-abh01a0:712_5: Tadā mahāsatto atulo nāma nāgarājā ahosi mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo,
atk-abh01a0:712_6: so “buddho uppanno”ti sutvā ñātisaṅghaparivuto nāgabhavanā nikkhamitvā koṭisatasahassabhikkhuparivārassa
atk-abh01a0:712_7: tassa bhagavato dibbatūriyehi upahāraṃ kārāpetvā mahādānaṃ pavattetvā paccekaṃ dussayugāni datvā saraṇesu
atk-abh01a0:712_9: Sopi naṃ satthā “anāgate buddho bhavissasī”ti byākāsi.
atk-abh01a0:713_0: Tassa bhagavato nagaraṃ mekhalaṃ nāma ahosi,
atk-abh01a0:713_3: saraṇo ca bhāvitatto ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-abh01a0:713_5: soṇā ca upasoṇā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-abh01a0:714_0: Tassa aparabhāge revato nāma satthā udapādi.
atk-abh01a0:714_5: Tadā bodhisatto atidevo nāma brāhmaṇo hutvā satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā saraṇesu patiṭṭhāya sirasmiṃ añjaliṃ
atk-abh01a0:714_6: ṭhapetvā tassa satthuno kilesappahāne vaṇṇaṃ vatvā uttarāsaṅgena pūjamakāsi.
atk-abh01a0:715_0: Tassa pana bhagavato nagaraṃ sudhaññavatī nāma ahosi,
atk-abh01a0:715_3: varuṇo ca brahmadevo ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-abh01a0:715_5: bhaddā ca subhaddā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-abh01a0:716_0: Tassa aparabhāge sobhito nāma satthā udapādi.
atk-abh01a0:716_5: Tadā bodhisatto ajito nāma brāhmaṇo hutvā satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā saraṇesu patiṭṭhāya buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ adāsi.
atk-abh01a0:717_0: Tassa pana bhagavato nagaraṃ sudhammaṃ nāma ahosi,
atk-abh01a0:717_3: asamo ca sunetto ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-abh01a0:717_5: nakulā ca sujātā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-abh01a0:718_0: Tassa aparabhāge ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ atikkamitvā ekasmiṃyeva kappe tayo buddhā nibbattiṃsu anomadassī, padumo, nāradoti.
atk-abh01a0:718_4: tatiye cha tadā bodhisatto eko yakkhasenāpati ahosi mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo anekakoṭisatasahassānaṃ yakkhānaṃ adhipati.
atk-abh01a0:718_5: So “buddho uppanno”ti sutvā āgantvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ adāsi.
atk-abh01a0:719_0: Anomadassissa pana bhagavato candavatī nāma nagaraṃ ahosi,
atk-abh01a0:719_3: nisabho ca anomo ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-abh01a0:719_5: sundarī ca sumanā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-abh01a0:720_0: Tassa aparabhāge padumo nāma satthā udapādi.
atk-abh01a0:720_4: tatiye agāmake araññe mahāvanasaṇḍavāsīnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dve satasahassāni.
atk-abh01a0:720_5: Tadā tathāgate tasmiṃyeva vanasaṇḍe vasante bodhisatto sīho hutvā satthāraṃ nirodhasamāpattisamāpannaṃ
atk-abh01a0:720_6: disvā pasannacitto vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pītisomanassajāto tikkhattuṃ sīhanādaṃ naditvā sattāhaṃ
atk-abh01a0:720_7: buddhārammaṇaṃ pītiṃavijahitvā pītisukheneva gocarāya apakkamitvā jīvitapariccāgaṃ katvā payirupāsamāno aṭṭhāsi.
atk-abh01a0:720_8: Satthā sattāhaccayena nirodhā vuṭṭhito sīhaṃ oloketvā “bhikkhusaṅghepi cittaṃ pasādetvā saṅghaṃ vandissatī”ti “bhikkhusaṅgho āgacchatū”ti cintesi.
atk-abh01a0:720_11: Satthā tassa mānasaṃ oloketvā “anāgate buddho bhavissasī”ti byākāsi.
atk-abh01a0:721_0: Padumassa pana bhagavato campakaṃ nagaraṃ ahosi asamo nāma rājā pitā,
atk-abh01a0:721_2: sālo ca upasālo ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-abh01a0:721_4: rāmā ca surāmā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-abh01a0:721_5: soṇarukkho nāma bodhi aṭṭhapaṇṇāsahatthubbedhaṃ sarīraṃ ahosi,
atk-abh01a0:722_0: Tassa aparabhāge nārado nāma satthā udapādi.
atk-abh01a0:722_5: Tadā bodhisatto isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā pañcasu abhiññāsu,
atk-abh01a0:722_6: aṭṭhasu ca samāpattīsu ciṇṇavasī hutvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā lohitacandanena pūjamakāsi,
atk-abh01a0:723_0: Tassa pana bhagavato dhaññavatī nāma nagaraṃ ahosi,
atk-abh01a0:723_3: bhaddasālo ca jitamitto ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-abh01a0:723_5: uttarā ca phaggunī ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-abh01a0:724_0: Nāradabuddhassa pana aparabhāge ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ atikkamitvā ito satasahassakappamatthake ekasmiṃ kappe ekova padumuttaro nāma buddho udapādi.
atk-abh01a0:724_5: Tadā bodhisatto jaṭilo nāma mahāraṭṭhiyo hutvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa sacīvaraṃ dānaṃ adāsi.
atk-abh01a0:724_7: Padumuttarassa pana bhagavato kāle titthiyā nāma nāhesuṃ sabbe devamanussā buddhameva saraṇamakaṃsu.
atk-abh01a0:725_3: devalo ca sujāto ca dve aggasāvakā sumano nāma upaṭṭhāko,
atk-abh01a0:725_4: amitā ca asamā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-abh01a0:725_7: sarīrappabhā samantato dvādasa yojanāni gaṇhi vassasatasahassaṃ āyūti.
atk-abh01a0:726_0: Tassa aparabhāge sattatikappasahassāni atikkamitvā ito tiṃsakappasahassamatthake sumedho ca sujāto cāti ekasmiṃ kappe dve buddhā nibbattiṃsu.
atk-abh01a0:726_5: Tadā bodhisatto uttaro nāma brāhmaṇamāṇavo hutvā nidahitvā ṭhapitaṃyeva asītikoṭidhanaṃ vissajjetvā buddhappamukhassa
atk-abh01a0:726_6: bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā dhammaṃ sutvā saraṇesu patiṭṭhāya nikkhamitvā pabbaji.
atk-abh01a0:727_0: Sumedhassa bhagavato sudassanaṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosi,
atk-abh01a0:727_3: saraṇo ca sabbakāmo ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-abh01a0:727_5: rāmā ca surāmā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-abh01a0:728_0: Tassa aparabhāge sujāto nāma satthā udapādi.
atk-abh01a0:728_5: Tadā bodhisatto cakkavattirājā hutvā “buddho uppanno”ti sutvā upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ sutvā buddhappamukhassa
atk-abh01a0:728_6: bhikkhusaṅghassa saddhiṃ sattahi ratanehi catumahādīparajjaṃ datvā satthu santike pabbaji.
atk-abh01a0:728_7: Sakalaraṭṭhavāsino raṭṭhuppādaṃ gahetvā ārāmikakiccaṃ sādhentā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa niccaṃ mahādānaṃ adaṃsu.
atk-abh01a0:729_0: Tassa bhagavato nagaraṃ sumaṅgalaṃ nāma ahosi,
atk-abh01a0:729_3: sudassano ca sudevo ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-abh01a0:729_5: nāgā ca nāgasamālā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-abh01a0:729_7: so kira mandacchiddo ghanakkhandho upariniggatāhi mahāsākhāhi morapiñchakalāpo viya virocittha.
atk-abh01a0:730_0: Tassa aparabhāge ito aṭṭhārasakappasatamatthake ekasmiṃ kappe piyadassī,
atk-abh01a0:730_7: Tadā bodhisatto kassapo nāma māṇavo tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāraṅgato hutvā satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā koṭisatasahassadhanapariccāgena
atk-abh01a0:730_8: saṅghārāmaṃ kāretvā saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-abh01a0:730_9: Atha naṃ satthā “aṭṭhārasakappasataccayena buddho bhavissasī”ti byākāsi.
atk-abh01a0:731_0: Tassa bhagavato anomaṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosi,
atk-abh01a0:731_3: pālito ca sabbadassī ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-abh01a0:731_5: sujātā ca dhammadinnā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-abh01a0:732_0: Tassa aparabhāge atthadassī nāma bhagavā udapādi.
atk-abh01a0:732_5: Tadā bodhisatto susīmo nāma mahiddhiko tāpaso hutvā devalokato mandāravapupphacchattaṃ āharitvā satthāraṃ pūjesi.
atk-abh01a0:733_0: Tassa bhagavato sobhaṇaṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosi,
atk-abh01a0:733_3: santo ca upasanto ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-abh01a0:733_5: dhammā ca sudhammā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-abh01a0:733_8: sarīrappabhā samantato sabbakālaṃ yojanamattaṃ pharitvā aṭṭhāsi,
atk-abh01a0:734_0: Tassa aparabhāge dhammadassī nāma satthā udapādi.
atk-abh01a0:734_5: Tadā bodhisatto sakko devarājā hutvā dibbagandhapupphehi ca dibbatūriyehi ca pūjamakāsi.
atk-abh01a0:735_0: Tassa bhagavato saraṇaṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosi,
atk-abh01a0:735_3: padumo ca phussadevo ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-abh01a0:735_5: khemā ca sabbanāmā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-abh01a0:736_0: Tassa aparabhāge ito catunavutikappamatthake ekasmiṃ kappe ekova siddhattho nāma buddho udapādi.
atk-abh01a0:736_4: Tadā bodhisatto uggatejo abhiññābalasampanno maṅgalo nāma tāpaso hutvā mahājambuphalaṃ āharitvā tathāgatassa adāsi.
atk-abh01a0:736_5: Satthā taṃ phalaṃ paribhuñjitvā “catunavutikappamatthake buddho bhavissasī”ti bodhisattaṃ byākāsi.
atk-abh01a0:737_0: Tassa bhagavato nagaraṃ vebhāraṃ nāma ahosi,
atk-abh01a0:737_3: sambalo ca sumitto ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-abh01a0:737_5: sīvalā ca surāmā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-abh01a0:738_0: Tassa aparabhāge ito dvenavutikappamatthake tisso phussoti ekasmiṃ kappe dve buddhā nibbattiṃsu.
atk-abh01a0:738_5: Tadā bodhisatto mahābhogo mahāyaso sujāto nāma khattiyo hutvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā mahiddhikabhāvaṃ
atk-abh01a0:738_6: patvā “buddho uppanno”ti sutvā dibbamandāravapadumapāricchattakapupphāni ādāya catuparisamajjhe gacchantaṃ
atk-abh01a0:738_9: Sopi naṃ satthā “ito dvenavutikappamatthake buddho bhavissasī”ti byākāsi.
atk-abh01a0:739_0: Tassa bhagavato khemaṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosi,
atk-abh01a0:739_3: brahmadevo ca udayo ca dve aggasāvakā samaṅgo nāma upaṭṭhāko,
atk-abh01a0:739_4: phussā ca sudattā ca dve aggasāvikā asanarukkho bodhi,
atk-abh01a0:740_0: Tassa aparabhāge phusso nāma satthā udapādi.
atk-abh01a0:740_5: Tadā bodhisatto vijitāvī nāma khattiyo hutvā mahārajjaṃ pahāya satthu santike pabbajitvā tīṇi piṭakāni uggahetvā mahājanassa dhammakathaṃ kathesi.
atk-abh01a0:741_0: Tassa bhagavato kāsi nāma nagaraṃ ahosi,
atk-abh01a0:741_3: surakkhito ca dhammaseno ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-abh01a0:741_5: cālā ca upacālā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-abh01a0:742_0: Tassa aparabhāge ito ekanavutikappe vipassī nāma bhagavā udapādi.
atk-abh01a0:742_5: Tadā bodhisatto mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo atulo nāma nāgarājā hutvā sattaratanakhacitaṃ sovaṇṇamayaṃ mahāpīṭhaṃ bhagavato adāsi.
atk-abh01a0:742_6: Sopi naṃ satthā “ito ekanavutikappe buddho bhavissasī”ti byākāsi.
atk-abh01a0:743_0: Tassa bhagavato bandhumatī nāma nagaraṃ ahosi,
atk-abh01a0:743_3: khaṇḍo ca tisso ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-abh01a0:743_5: candā ca candamittā ca dve aggasāvikā pāṭalirukkho bodhi,
atk-abh01a0:743_7: sarīrappabhā sadā satta yojanāni pharitvā aṭṭhāsi,
atk-abh01a0:744_6: Tadā bodhisatto arindamo nāma rājā hutvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa sacīvaraṃ mahādānaṃ pavattetvā
atk-abh01a0:744_7: sattaratanapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ hatthiratanaṃ datvā hatthippamāṇaṃ katvā kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ adāsi.
atk-abh01a0:744_8: Sopi naṃ “ito ekatiṃsakappe buddho bhavissasī”ti byākāsi.
atk-abh01a0:745_0: Tassa pana bhagavato aruṇavatī nāma nagaraṃ ahosi,
atk-abh01a0:745_3: abhibhū ca sambhavo ca dve aggasāvakā khemaṅkaro nāma upaṭṭhāko,
atk-abh01a0:745_4: sakhilā ca padumā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-abh01a0:746_0: Tassa aparabhāge vessabhū nāma satthā udapādi.
atk-abh01a0:746_1: Tassāpi tayo sāvakasannipātā paṭhamasannipāte asītibhikkhusahassāni ahesuṃ dutiye sattati,
atk-abh01a0:746_3: Tadā bodhisatto sudassano nāma rājā hutvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa sacīvaraṃ mahādānaṃ datvā
atk-abh01a0:746_4: satthu santike pabbajitvā ācāraguṇasampanno buddharatane cittīkārapītibahulo ahosi.
atk-abh01a0:746_5: Sopi naṃ “ito ekatiṃse kappe buddho bhavissasī”ti byākāsi.
atk-abh01a0:747_0: Tassa pana bhagavato anomaṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosi,
atk-abh01a0:747_3: soṇo ca uttaro ca dve aggasāvakā upasanto nāma upaṭṭhāko dāmā ca samālā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-abh01a0:748_0: Tassa aparabhāge imasmiṃ kappe cattāro buddhā nibbattā kakusandho,
atk-abh01a0:748_5: Tadā bodhisatto khemo nāma rājā hutvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa sapattacīvaraṃ mahādānañca añjanādibhesajjāni
atk-abh01a0:748_6: ca datvā satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pabbaji.
atk-abh01a0:749_0: Kakusandhassa pana bhagavato khemaṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosi,
atk-abh01a0:749_3: vidhuro ca sañjīvo ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-abh01a0:749_4: buddhijo nāma upaṭṭhāko sāmā ca campā ca dve aggasāvikā mahāsirīsarukkho bodhi sarīraṃ cattālīsahatthubbedhaṃ ahosi,
atk-abh01a0:750_0: Tassa aparabhāge koṇāgamano nāma satthā udapādi.
atk-abh01a0:750_3: Tadā bodhisatto pabbato nāma rājā hutvā amaccagaṇaparivuto satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammadesanaṃ sutvā
atk-abh01a0:750_4: buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nimantetvā mahādānaṃ pavattetvā pattuṇṇacīnapaṭakoseyyakambaladukulāni
atk-abh01a0:750_5: ceva suvaṇṇapādukañca datvā satthu santike pabbaji.
atk-abh01a0:751_0: Tassa bhagavato sobhavatī nāma nagaraṃ ahosi,
atk-abh01a0:751_3: bhiyyoso ca uttaro ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-abh01a0:751_5: samuddā ca uttarā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-abh01a0:752_0: Tassa aparabhāge kassapo nāma satthā udapādi.
atk-abh01a0:752_3: Tadā bodhisatto jotipālo nāma māṇavo tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū bhūmiyañceva antalikkhe ca pākaṭo ghaṭikārassa kumbhakārassa mitto ahosi,
atk-abh01a0:752_4: so tena saddhiṃ satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammakathaṃ sutvā pabbajitvā āraddhavīriyo tīṇi piṭakāni uggahetvā vattasampattiyā buddhasāsanaṃ sobhesi.
atk-abh01a0:753_0: Tassa bhagavato jātanagaraṃ bārāṇasī nāma ahosi.
atk-abh01a0:753_3: tisso ca bhāradvājo ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-abh01a0:753_4: sabbamitto nāma upaṭṭhāko anuḷā ca uruveḷā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-abh01a0:754_0: Tassa pana bhagavato orabhāge ṭhapetvā imaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ añño buddho nāma natthi.
atk-abh01a0:754_1: Iti dīpaṅkarādīnaṃ catuvīsatiyā buddhānaṃ santike laddhabyākaraṇo pana bodhisatto yenena –
atk-abh01a0:758_0: Ime aṭṭha dhamme samodhānetvā dīpaṅkarapādamūle katābhinīhārena “handa buddhakare dhamme vicināmi ito cito”ti ussāhaṃ katvā “vicinanto tadādakkhiṃ,
atk-abh01a0:758_1: paṭhamaṃ dānapārami”nti dānapāramitādayo buddhakarā dhammā diṭṭhā,
atk-abh01a0:758_3: Āgacchanto ca ye te katābhinīhārānaṃ bodhisattānaṃ ānisaṃsā saṃvaṇṇitā –
atk-abh01a0:764_0: Jāyamānā manussesu, jaccandhā na bhavanti te.
atk-abh01a0:774_1: Pāramiyo pūrentassa ca tassa akittibrāhmaṇakāle saṅkhabrāhmaṇakāle dhanañcayarājakāle mahāsudassanarājakāle
atk-abh01a0:774_2: mahāgovindakāle nimimahārājakāle candakumārakāle visayhaseṭṭhikāle sivirājakāle vessantararājakāleti
atk-abh01a0:776_0: Dānena me samo natthi, esā me dānapāramī”ti. (cariyā. 1.143 tassuddāna –
atk-abh01a0:777_0: Evaṃ attapariccāgaṃ karontassa dānapāramitā paramatthapāramī nāma jātā.
atk-abh01a0:778_0: Tathā sīlavanāgarājakāle campeyyanāgarājakāle bhūridattanāgarājakāle chaddantanāgarājakāle jayaddisarājaputtakāle
atk-abh01a0:778_1: alīnasattukumārakāleti sīlapāramitāya pūritattabhāvānaṃ parimāṇaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-abh01a0:780_0: Bhojaputte na kuppāmi, esā me sīlapāramī”ti. –
atk-abh01a0:781_0: Evaṃ attapariccāgaṃ karontassa sīlapāramitā paramatthapāramī nāma jātā.
atk-abh01a0:782_0: Tathā somanassakumārakāle hatthipālakumārakāle ayogharapaṇḍitakāleti mahārajjaṃ pahāya nekkhammapāramitāya pūritattabhāvānaṃ parimāṇaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-abh01a0:784_0: Cajato na hoti laganaṃ, esā me nekkhammapāramī”ti. –
atk-abh01a0:785_0: Evaṃ nissaṅgatāya rajjaṃ chaḍḍetvā nikkhamantassa nekkhammapāramitā paramatthapāramī nāma jātā.
atk-abh01a0:786_0: Tathā vidhurapaṇḍitakāle mahāgovindapaṇḍitakāle kudālapaṇḍitakāle arakapaṇḍitakāle bodhiparibbājakakāle
atk-abh01a0:786_1: mahosadhapaṇḍitakāleti paññāpāramitāya pūritattabhāvānaṃ parimāṇaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-abh01a0:788_0: Paññāya me samo natthi, esā me paññāpāramī”ti. –
atk-abh01a0:789_0: Antobhastagataṃ sappaṃ dassentassa paññāpāramitā paramatthapāramī nāma jātā.
atk-abh01a0:790_0: Tathā vīriyapāramitādīnampi pūritattabhāvānaṃ parimāṇaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-abh01a0:792_0: Cittassa aññathā natthi, esā me vīriyapāramī”ti. –
atk-abh01a0:793_0: Evaṃ mahāsamuddaṃ tarantassa vīriyapāramitā paramatthapāramī nāma jātā.
atk-abh01a0:796_0: Kāsirāje na kuppāmi, esā me khantipāramī”ti. –
atk-abh01a0:797_0: Evaṃ acetanabhāvena viya mahādukkhaṃ adhivāsentassa khantipāramitā paramatthapāramī nāma jātā.
atk-abh01a0:800_0: Mocesiṃ ekasataṃ khattiye, esā me saccapāramī”ti. –
atk-abh01a0:801_0: Evaṃ jīvitaṃ cavitvā saccamanurakkhantassa saccapāramitā paramatthapāramī nāma jātā.
atk-abh01a0:803_0: “Mātā pitā na me dessā, napi dessaṃ mahāyasaṃ;
atk-abh01a0:805_0: Evaṃ jīvitaṃ cajitvā vataṃ adhiṭṭhahantassa adhiṭṭhānapāramitā paramatthapāramī nāma jātā.
atk-abh01a0:807_0: “Na maṃ koci uttasati, napihaṃ bhāyāmi kassaci;
atk-abh01a0:809_0: Evaṃ jīvitaṃ anapaloketvā mettāyantassa mettāpāramitā paramatthapāramī nāma jātā.
atk-abh01a0:813_0: Evaṃ gāmadārakesu niṭṭhubhanādīhi ceva mālāgandhūpahārādīhi ca sukhadukkhaṃ uppādentesupi upekkhanaṃ
atk-abh01a0:817_0: Evaṃ mahāpathavīkampanāni mahāpuññāni katvā āyupariyosāne tato cuto tusitabhavane nibbatti,
atk-abh01a0:817_1: tattha aññe deve dasahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhitvā “yāvatāyukaṃ dibbasampattiṃ anubhavanto manussagaṇanāya
atk-abh01a0:817_2: idāni sattahi divasehi āyukkhayaṃ pāpuṇissatī”ti vatthāni kilissanti,
atk-abh01a0:817_6: devo devāsane na saṇṭhahatīti imesu pañcasu pubbanimittesu uppannesu tāni disvā “suññā vata bho saggā
atk-abh01a0:817_7: bhavissantī”ti saṃvegajātāhi devatāhi mahāsattassa pūritapāramibhāvaṃ ñatvā “imasmiṃ idāni aññaṃ devalokaṃ
atk-abh01a0:817_8: anupagantvā manussaloke uppajjitvā buddhabhāvaṃ patte puññāni katvā cutā cutā manussā devalokaṃ paripūressantī”ti
atk-abh01a0:822_0: Evaṃ buddhabhāvatthāya āyācito kālaṃ, dīpaṃ, desaṃ, kulaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:822_1: janettiyā āyuppamāṇanti imāni pañca mahāvilokanāni viloketvā katasanniṭṭhāno tato cuto sakyarājakule
atk-abh01a0:822_2: paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā tattha mahāsampattiyā parihariyamāno anukkamena bhadrayobbanaṃ anupāpuṇi.
atk-abh01a0:822_3: Imasmiṃ antare “sato sampajāno ānanda bodhisatto tusitā kāyā cavitvā mātukucchiṃ okkamī”tiādīnaṃ suttapadānañceva
atk-abh01a0:822_4: tesaṃ aṭṭhakathāya ca vasena vitthāro veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:823_0: So tiṇṇaṃ utūnaṃ anucchavikesu tīsu pāsādesu devalokasiriṃ viya rajjasiriṃ anubhavamāno uyyānakīḷāya
atk-abh01a0:823_1: gamanasamaye anukkamena jiṇṇabyādhimatasaṅkhāte tayo devadūte disvā sañjātasaṃvego nivattitvā catutthavāre
atk-abh01a0:823_2: pabbajitaṃ disvā ‘sādhu pabbajjā’ti pabbajjāya ruciṃ uppādetvā uyyānaṃ gantvā tattha divasabhāgaṃ khepetvā
atk-abh01a0:823_3: maṅgalapokkharaṇītīre nisinno kappakavesaṃ gahetvā āgatena vissakammena devaputtena alaṅkatapaṭiyatto
atk-abh01a0:823_4: rāhulabhaddassa jātasāsanaṃ sutvā puttasinehassa balavabhāvaṃ ñatvā ‘yāva idaṃ bandhanaṃ na vaḍḍhati
atk-abh01a0:823_5: tāvadeva naṃ chindissāmī’ti cintetvā sāyaṃ nagaraṃ pavisanto –
atk-abh01a0:824_0: “Nibbutā nūna sā mātā, nibbuto nūna so pitā;
atk-abh01a0:825_0: Nibbutā nūna sā nārī, yassāyaṃ īdiso patī”ti. ;
atk-abh01a0:826_0: Kisāgotamiyā nāma pitucchādhītāya bhāsitaṃ imaṃ gāthaṃ sutvā,
atk-abh01a0:826_1: ‘ahaṃ imāya nibbutapadaṃ sāvito’ti gīvato satasahassagghanikaṃ muttāhāraṃ muñcitvā,
atk-abh01a0:826_4: sirisayane nisinno niddāvasena nāṭakānaṃ vippakāraṃ disvā,
atk-abh01a0:826_9: teneva rattāvasesena tīṇi mahārajjāni atikkamma anomānadītīre pabbajitvā,
atk-abh01a0:826_12: paṇḍavapabbatapabbhāre nisinno magadharājena rajjena nimantiyamāno taṃ paṭikkhipitvā,
atk-abh01a0:826_13: sabbaññutaṃ patvā tassa vijitaṃ āgamanatthāya tena gahitapaṭiñño,
atk-abh01a0:826_15: tesaṃ santike adhigatavisesena aparituṭṭho chabbassāni mahāpadhānaṃ padahitvā,
atk-abh01a0:826_16: visākhāpuṇṇamadivase pātova senānigame sujātāya dinnaṃ pāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā,
atk-abh01a0:826_18: nerañjarāya tīre mahāvanasaṇḍe nānāsamāpattīhi divasabhāgaṃ vītināmetvā,
atk-abh01a0:826_20: kāḷena nāgarājena abhitthutaguṇo bodhimaṇḍaṃ āruyha tiṇāni santharitvā,
atk-abh01a0:826_21: ‘na tāvimaṃ pallaṅkaṃ bhindissāmi yāva me na anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimuccissatī’ti paṭiññaṃ katvā,
atk-abh01a0:826_26: pacchimayāmāvasāne dasabalacatuvesārajjādisabbabuddhaguṇapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭivijjhantoyeva imaṃ abhidhammanayasamuddaṃ adhigañchi.
