atk-abh01a0:827_0: Evaṃ adhigatābhidhammo ekapallaṅkena nisinnasattāhaṃ animisasattāhaṃ caṅkamanasattāhañca atikkamitvā,
atk-abh01a0:827_1: catutthe sattāhe sayambhūñāṇādhigamena adhigataṃ abhidhammaṃ vicinitvā aparānipi ajapālamucalindarājāyatanesu tīṇi sattāhāni vītināmetvā,
atk-abh01a0:827_2: aṭṭhame sattāhe ajapālanigrodharukkhamūle nisinno dhammagambhīratāpaccavekkhaṇena appossukkataṃ āpajjamāno
atk-abh01a0:827_3: dasasahassimahābrahmaparivārena sahampatibrahmunā āyācitadhammadesano buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ oloketvā,
atk-abh01a0:827_4: brahmuno ajjhesanaṃ ādāya “kassa nu kho ahaṃ paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ deseyya’nti olokento āḷārudakānaṃ kālaṅkatabhāvaṃ ñatvā,
atk-abh01a0:827_6: uṭṭhāyāsanā kāsipuraṃ gacchanto antarāmagge upakena saddhiṃ mantetvā,
atk-abh01a0:827_7: āsāḷhīpuṇṇamadivase isipatane migadāye pañcavaggiyānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ patvā,te ananucchavikena samudācārena samudācarante saññāpetvā,
atk-abh01a0:827_8: dhammacakkaṃ pavattento aññāsikoṇḍaññattherappamukhā aṭṭhārasa brahmakoṭiyo amatapānaṃ pāyesi.
atk-abh01a0:827_11: Vitthāro pana sāṭṭhakathānaṃ ariyapariyesana pabbajjasuttādīnaṃ vasena veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:828_0: Evaṃ adhigamanidānadesanānidānasampannassa panassa abhidhammassa aparānipi dūrenidānaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:828_3: Tattha dīpaṅkarapādamūlato paṭṭhāya yāva tusitapurā dūrenidānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:828_5: ‘Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā devesu viharati tāvatiṃsesu pāricchattakamūle paṇḍukambalasilāyaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:828_6: tattha kho bhagavā devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ abhidhammakathaṃ kathesī’ti idamassa santikenidānaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:834_0: Avikkhittā nisāmetha, dullabhā hi ayaṃ kathāti.
atk-abh01a0:835_1: Tattha yasmā abhidhammo nāma dhammasaṅgaṇīādīni sattappakaraṇāni;
atk-abh01a0:835_7: tikamātikāyapi kusalattikaṃ kusalattikepi kusalā dhammāti idaṃ padaṃ; tasmā –
atk-abh01a0:838_3: abyākatā dhammā”ti ayaṃ tāva ādipadena laddhanāmo kusalattiko nāma.
atk-abh01a0:838_6: adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā dhammā”ti ayaṃ sabbapadehi laddhanāmo vedanāttiko nāma.
atk-abh01a0:838_7: Evaṃ ādipadavasena vā sabbapadavasena vā sabbesampi tikadukānaṃ nāmaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:838_12: nahetū dhammā”tiādayo hi cha dukā ganthato ca atthato ca aññamaññasambandhena kaṇṇikā viya ghaṭā viya hutvā ṭhitattā ‘hetugocchako’ti vuccati.
atk-abh01a0:838_13: Tato apare “sappaccayā dhammā appaccayā dhammā”tiādayo satta dukā,
atk-abh01a0:838_15: kevalaṃ dukasāmaññato uccinitvā uccinitvā visuṃ visuṃ gocchakantare ṭhapitattā aññehi ca mahantaradukehi cūḷakattā ‘cūḷantaradukā’ti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:838_21: Tato paraṃ “sārammaṇā dhammā”tiādayo catuddasa dukā ‘mahantaradukā’ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:838_24: Tato paraṃ dassanenapahātabbadukādayo aṭṭhārasa dukā abhidhammamātikāya pariyosāne ṭhapitattā ‘piṭṭhidukā’ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:838_25: “Vijjābhāgino dhammā avijjābhāgino dhammā”tiādayo pana dvācattālīsa dukā ‘suttantikadukā’ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:838_26: Evaṃ sabbepete pañcadasahi paricchedehi vavatthitāti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:839_0: Evaṃ vavatthitā panete sappadesanippadesavasena dve koṭṭhāsā honti.
atk-abh01a0:839_1: Tesu hi nava tikā ekasattati ca dukā sappadesānaṃ rūpārūpadhammānaṃ pariggahitattā sappadesā nāma.
atk-abh01a0:839_2: Avasesā terasa tikā ekasattati ca dukā nippadesā nāma.
atk-abh01a0:839_3: Tattha tikesu tāva vedanāttiko vitakkattiko pītittiko uppannattiko atītattiko cattāro ārammaṇattikāti ime nava tikā sappadesā nāma.
atk-abh01a0:839_4: Dukesu hetugocchakādīnaṃ upādānagocchakapariyosānānaṃ navannaṃ gocchakānaṃ pariyosāne tayo tayo dukā,
atk-abh01a0:839_9: suttantikadukesu adhivacanadukaṃ niruttidukaṃ paññattidukaṃ nāmarūpadukanti ime cattāro duke ṭhapetvā avasesā aṭṭhatiṃsa dukā cāti ete sappadesā nāma.
atk-abh01a0:840_8: etadānuttariyaṃ yathā bhagavā dhammaṃ deseti kusalesu dhammesū”ti ca evamādīsu anavajje.
atk-abh01a0:841_1: Ayañhi “dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇāti suttaṃ geyya”ntiādīsu pariyattiyaṃ dissati.
atk-abh01a0:842_0: “Na hi dhammo adhammo ca, ubho samavipākino;
atk-abh01a0:843_0: Adhammo nirayaṃ neti, dhammo pāpeti suggati”nti. –
atk-abh01a0:845_1: kucchite pāpake dhamme salayanti calayanti kampenti viddhaṃsentīti kusalā.
atk-abh01a0:845_3: Te akusalasaṅkhāte kuse lunanti chindantīti kusalā.
atk-abh01a0:845_4: Kucchitānaṃ vā sānato tanukaraṇato osānakaraṇato ñāṇaṃ kusaṃ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:845_7: Yathā vā kusā ubhayabhāgagataṃ hatthappadesaṃ lunanti,
atk-abh01a0:846_0: Kiṃ panetāni ‘kusalā’ti vā ‘dhammā’ti vātiādīni ekatthāni udāhu nānatthānīti?
atk-abh01a0:846_2: Yadi tāva ekatthāni ‘kusalā dhammā’ti idaṃ ‘kusalākusalā’tivuttasadisaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:846_3: Atha nānatthāni tikadukānaṃ chakkacatukkabhāvo āpajjati padānañca asambandho.
atk-abh01a0:847_0: Yathā hi ‘kusalā’ ‘rūpaṃ’‘cakkhumā’ti vutte atthavasena aññamaññaṃ anolokentānaṃ padānaṃ na koci sambandho,
atk-abh01a0:847_2: Pubbāparasambandharahitāni ca padāni nippayojanāni nāma honti.
atk-abh01a0:847_3: Yāpi cesā parato ‘katame dhammā kusalā’ti pucchā,
atk-abh01a0:847_12: Tasmā dhammattayena saddhiṃ atthato ninnānatthānaṃ kusalādīnampi ekattaṃ āpajjati.
atk-abh01a0:847_21: bhāvato ca añño abhāvoti kusalaparā bhāvasaṅkhātā dhammā añño akusalaparo dhammo abhāvo siyā,
atk-abh01a0:847_24: Evaṃ abhāvattaṃ āpannehi dhammehi anaññe kusalādayopi abhāvāyeva siyu’nti.
atk-abh01a0:848_2: Vohāro hi yathā yathā atthesu anumato sampaṭicchito tathā tatheva siddho.
atk-abh01a0:848_3: Na cāyaṃ “kusalā dhammā”tiādīsu kusalapubbo dhammābhilāpo dhammaparo ca kusalābhilāpo,
atk-abh01a0:848_7: saddo panettha anavajjasukhavipākasaṅkhātassa atthassa jotakabhāvena sampaṭicchito,
atk-abh01a0:848_13: So etesaṃ aññatarānantare vuccamāno attano atthasāmaññaṃ dīpeti.
atk-abh01a0:848_14: Sabbeva hi ete sabhāvadhāraṇādinā lakkhaṇena dhammā.
atk-abh01a0:848_15: Kusalādisaddā cāpi dhammasaddassa purato vuccamānā attano attano atthavisesaṃ tassa dīpenti.
atk-abh01a0:848_16: Dhammo hi kusalo vā hoti akusalo vā abyākato vā.
atk-abh01a0:848_17: Evamete visuṃ visuṃ vuccamānā attano attano atthamattadīpakattena sampaṭicchitā.
atk-abh01a0:848_18: Dhammasaddena saha vuccamānā attano attano atthasāmaññaṃ atthavisesaṃ vā dīpakattena loke paṇḍitehi sampaṭicchitā.
atk-abh01a0:848_19: Tasmā yadetamettha ekatthanānātthataṃ vikappetvā dosāropanakāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ sabbametaṃ akāraṇaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:849_5: “sukhā virāgatā loke”tiādīsu sukhamūle “yasmā ca kho, mahāli,
atk-abh01a0:849_12: na sukaraṃ akkhānena pāpuṇituṃ yāva sukhā saggā”,
atk-abh01a0:849_13: “na te sukhaṃ pajānanti ye na passanti nandana”ntiādīsu sukhapaccayaṭṭhāne.
atk-abh01a0:850_9: na sukaraṃ akkhānena pāpuṇituṃ yāva dukkhā nirayā”tiādīsu dukkhapaccayaṭṭhāne.
atk-abh01a0:851_15: Āmantā”ti hi imassa pañhassa paṭikkhepe “nanu atthi keci dhammā kehici dhammehi sahagatā sahajātā saṃsaṭṭhā
atk-abh01a0:851_16: ekuppādā ekanirodhā ekavatthukā ekārammaṇā”ti evaṃ ekuppādatādīnaṃ vasena sampayogattho vutto.
atk-abh01a0:851_17: Iti imehi ekuppādatādīhi samaṃ pakārehi yuttāti sampayuttā.
atk-abh01a0:852_4: Yathā jātijarāsabhāvā jātijarāpakatikā sattā jātidhammā jarādhammāti vuccanti evaṃ vipākajanakaṭṭhena vipākasabhāvā vipākapakatikā dhammāti attho.
atk-abh01a0:853_1: Upādinnupādāniyattike ārammaṇakaraṇavasena taṇhādiṭṭhīhi upetena kammunā ādinnā,
atk-abh01a0:853_3: Ārammaṇabhāvaṃ upagantvā upādānasambandhena upādānānaṃ hitāti upādāniyā.
atk-abh01a0:853_5: Upādiṇṇā ca te upādāniyā cāti upādiṇṇupādāniyā;
atk-abh01a0:853_7: Iti iminā nayena sesapadadvayepi paṭisedhasahito attho veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:854_5: Attānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattanena saṃkilesaṃ arahanti,
atk-abh01a0:854_9: Saṃkiliṭṭhā ca te saṃkilesikā cāti saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikā.
atk-abh01a0:855_1: Vitakkattike sampayogavasena vattamānena saha vitakkena savitakkā.
atk-abh01a0:855_3: Savitakkā ca te savicārā cāti savitakkasavicārā.
atk-abh01a0:855_7: Vicārato uttari vitakkena saddhiṃ sampayogaṃ na gacchantīti attho.
atk-abh01a0:855_8: Avitakkā ca te vicāramattā cāti avitakkavicāramattā.
atk-abh01a0:856_1: Pītittike pītiyā saha ekuppādādibhāvaṃ gatāti pītisahagatā,
atk-abh01a0:856_7: Iti vedanāttikato padadvayameva gahetvā nippītikassa sukhassa sappītikasukhato visesadassanavasena ayaṃ tiko vutto.
atk-abh01a0:857_2: So hi paṭhamaṃ nibbānaṃ dassanato dassananti vutto.
atk-abh01a0:857_4: yathā pana rañño santikaṃ kenacideva karaṇīyena āgato puriso dūratova rathikāya carantaṃ hatthikkhandhagataṃ
atk-abh01a0:857_5: rājānaṃ disvāpi ‘diṭṭho te rājā’ti puṭṭho disvāpi kattabbakiccassa akatattā ‘na passāmī’ti āha.
atk-abh01a0:857_6: Evameva nibbānaṃ disvāpi kattabbassa kilesappahānassābhāvā na dassananti vuccati.
atk-abh01a0:857_9: Sesamaggattayañhi paṭhamamaggena diṭṭhasmiṃyeva dhamme bhāvanāvasena uppajjati,
atk-abh01a0:858_1: Tadanantarattike dassanena pahātabbo hetu etesanti dassanena pahātabbahetukā.
atk-abh01a0:858_3: Tatiyapade neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbo hetu etesanti evamatthaṃ aggahetvā neva dassanena na
atk-abh01a0:858_4: bhāvanāya pahātabbo hetu etesaṃ atthīti evamattho gahetabbo.
atk-abh01a0:858_6: hetuyeva hi tesaṃ natthi yo dassanabhāvanāhi pahātabbo siyā.
atk-abh01a0:858_9: hetuyeva hi etesaṃ ‘neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbo’ti vutto,
atk-abh01a0:858_12: Tasmā neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbo hetu etesaṃ atthīti nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukāti ayamattho gahetabbo.
atk-abh01a0:859_3: Tassa kāraṇaṃ hutvā nipphādanakabhāvena taṃ ācayaṃ gacchanti,
atk-abh01a0:859_4: yassa vā pavattanti taṃ puggalaṃ yathāvuttameva ācayaṃ gamentītipi ācayagāmino;
atk-abh01a0:859_8: Taṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattanato apacayaṃ gacchantīti apacayagāmino;
atk-abh01a0:859_10: Apica pākāraṃ iṭṭhakavaḍḍhakī viya pavattaṃ ācinantā gacchantīti ācayagāmino.
atk-abh01a0:859_11: Tena citaṃ citaṃ iṭṭhakaṃ viddhaṃsayamāno puriso viya tadeva pavattaṃ apacinantā gacchantīti apacayagāmino.
atk-abh01a0:861_1: Parittattike samantato khaṇḍitattā appamattakaṃ parittanti vuccati;
atk-abh01a0:861_5: Kilesavikkhambhanasamatthatāya vipulaphalatāya dīghasantānatāya ca mahantabhāvaṃ gatā,
atk-abh01a0:861_6: mahantehi vā uḷāracchandavīriyacittapaññehi gatā paṭipannātipi mahaggatā.
atk-abh01a0:861_8: Ārammaṇato vā sampayogato vā natthi etesaṃ pamāṇaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:862_0: 13. Parittārammaṇattike parittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ etesanti parittārammaṇā. Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo.
atk-abh01a0:863_3: Avasesā tebhūmakā dhammā uttamaṭṭhena atappakaṭṭhena ca paṇītā;
atk-abh01a0:864_1: Micchattattike ‘hitasukhāvahā me bhavissantī’ti evaṃ āsīsitāpi tathā abhāvato,
atk-abh01a0:864_4: micchattā ca te niyatā cāti micchattaniyatā.
atk-abh01a0:864_6: sammattā ca te niyatā ca anantarameva phaladānenāti sammattaniyatā.
atk-abh01a0:865_4: Aṭṭhaṅgikopi maggo paccayaṭṭhena etesaṃ hetūti maggahetukā.
atk-abh01a0:865_5: Maggasampayuttā vā hetū magge vā hetūti maggahetū.
atk-abh01a0:865_7: Sammādiṭṭhi sayaṃ maggo ceva hetu ca.
atk-abh01a0:865_9: Abhibhavitvā pavattanaṭṭhena maggo adhipati etesanti maggādhipatino.
atk-abh01a0:866_1: Uppannattike uppādato paṭṭhāya yāva bhaṅgā uddhaṃ pannā gatā pavattāti uppannā.
atk-abh01a0:867_1: Atītattike attano sabhāvaṃ uppādādikkhaṇaṃ vā patvā atikkantāti atītā.
atk-abh01a0:867_3: Taṃ taṃ kāraṇaṃ paṭicca uppannāti paccuppannā.
atk-abh01a0:868_0: 19. Anantarattike atītaṃ ārammaṇaṃ etesanti atītārammaṇā. Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo.
atk-abh01a0:869_2: ‘gamissāmā’ti iminā viya adhippāyena attānaṃ adhikāraṃ katvā pavattāti ajjhattā.
atk-abh01a0:869_4: saddo panāyaṃ gocarajjhatte niyakajjhatte ajjhattajjhatte visayajjhatteti catūsu atthesu dissati.
atk-abh01a0:869_6: bhikkhunā tasmiṃyeva purimasmiṃ samādhinimitte ajjhattameva cittaṃ saṇṭhapetabbaṃ”,
atk-abh01a0:869_12: vihāro tathāgatena abhisambuddho yadidaṃ sabbanimittānaṃ amanasikārā ajjhattaṃ suññataṃ upasampajja viharatī”tiādīsu visayajjhatte;
atk-abh01a0:869_16: Tasmā attano santāne pavattā pāṭipuggalikā dhammā ajjhattāti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:869_17: Tato bāhirabhūtā pana indriyabaddhā vā anindriyabaddhā vā bahiddhā nāma.
atk-abh01a0:870_0: 21. Anantarattiko teyeva tippakārepi dhamme ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattanavasena vutto.
atk-abh01a0:871_3: Sanidassanā ca te sappaṭighā cāti sanidassanasappaṭighā.
atk-abh01a0:871_5: Anidassanā ca te vuttanayeneva sappaṭighā cāti anidassanasappaṭighā.
atk-abh01a0:874_2: Hetugocchake tāva hetudhammāti mūlaṭṭhena hetusaṅkhātā dhammā.
atk-abh01a0:874_6: Tatheva pavatto natthi etesaṃ hetūti ahetukā.
atk-abh01a0:874_9: Imesaṃ dvinnampi dukānaṃ kiñcāpi atthato nānattaṃ natthi,
atk-abh01a0:874_10: desanāvilāsena pana tathā bujjhantānaṃ vā puggalānaṃ ajjhāsayavasena vuttā.
atk-abh01a0:874_11: Tato paraṃ paṭhamadukaṃ dutiyatatiyehi saddhiṃ yojetvā tesaṃ ‘hetū na hetū’tiādīnaṃ padānaṃ vasena yathāsambhavato aparepi tayo dukā vuttā.
atk-abh01a0:874_12: Tattha yatheva ‘hetū ceva dhammā sahetukā cā’ti etaṃ sambhavati,
atk-abh01a0:874_13: tathā ‘hetū ceva dhammā ahetukā cā’ti idampi.
atk-abh01a0:874_14: Yathā ca ‘sahetukā ceva dhammā na ca hetū’ti etaṃ sambhavati,
atk-abh01a0:874_15: tathā ‘ahetukā ceva dhammā na ca hetū’ti idampi.
atk-abh01a0:875_0: Tatra yadetaṃ ‘na hetū dhammā sahetukāpi ahetukāpī’ti siddhe,
atk-abh01a0:875_1: ‘na hetū kho pana dhammā’ti atirittaṃ ‘kho panā’ti padaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:875_2: tassa vasena ayaṃ atirekattho saṅgahitoti veditabbo. Kathaṃ?
atk-abh01a0:875_3: Na kevalaṃ ‘na hetu dhammā atha kho aññepi na ca sahetukāpi ahetukāpi icceva,
atk-abh01a0:875_6: yatheva hi ‘na hetū dhammā sahetukāpi ahetukāpi’,
atk-abh01a0:875_8: Yathā ca ‘na hetū dhammā sahetukāpi ahetukāpi’,
atk-abh01a0:876_1: Cūḷantaradukesu attano nipphādakena saha paccayenāti sappaccayā.
atk-abh01a0:876_2: Natthi etesaṃ uppāde vā ṭhitiyaṃ vā paccayoti appaccayā.
atk-abh01a0:876_10: Lokiyā dhammāti loko vuccati lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena vaṭṭaṃ;
atk-abh01a0:876_14: Kenaci viññeyyāti cakkhuviññāṇādīsu kenaci ekena cakkhuviññāṇena vā sotaviññāṇena vā vijānitabbā.
atk-abh01a0:876_15: Kenaci na viññeyyāti teneva cakkhuviññāṇena vā sotaviññāṇena vā na vijānitabbā.
atk-abh01a0:876_16: Evaṃ sante dvinnampi padānaṃ atthanānattato duko hoti.
atk-abh01a0:877_5: okāsato yāva bhavaggaṃ savantīti vā āsavā.
atk-abh01a0:877_6: Ete dhamme etañca okāsaṃ antokaritvā pavattantīti attho.
atk-abh01a0:877_17: Āyataṃ vā saṃsāradukkhaṃ savanti pasavantītipi āsavā.
atk-abh01a0:877_19: Attānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattehi saha āsavehīti sāsavā.
atk-abh01a0:877_20: Evaṃ pavattamānā natthi etesaṃ āsavāti anāsavā.
atk-abh01a0:877_23: yathā tattha ‘na hetū kho pana dhammā sahetukāpi ahetukāpīti ayaṃ osānaduko paṭhamadukassa dutiyapadaṃ ādimhi ṭhapetvā vutto,
atk-abh01a0:877_24: evaṃ idha ‘no āsavā kho pana dhammā sāsavāpi anāsavāpī’ti na vutto.
atk-abh01a0:877_26: atha kho ayañca añño ca bhedo tattha vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:878_2: taṃ puggalaṃ vaṭṭasmiṃ saṃyojenti bandhantīti saṃyojanā.
atk-abh01a0:878_4: Ārammaṇabhāvaṃ upagantvā saṃyojanasambandhane saṃyojanānaṃ hitāti saṃyojaniyā.
atk-abh01a0:879_1: Ganthagocchake yassa saṃvijjanti taṃ cutipaṭisandhivasena vaṭṭasmiṃ ganthenti ghaṭentīti ganthā.
atk-abh01a0:879_6: evaṃ ito paresupi vuttāvasesaṃ tattha tattha vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:880_1: Oghagocchake yassa saṃvijjanti taṃ vaṭṭasmiṃyeva ohananti osīdāpentīti oghā.
atk-abh01a0:880_2: Ārammaṇaṃ katvā atikkamanīyato oghehi atikkamitabbāti oghaniyā.
atk-abh01a0:881_0: 38-43. Yogagocchake vaṭṭasmiṃ yojentīti yogā. Yoganiyā oghaniyā viya veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:883_1: Parāmāsagocchake dhammānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ aniccādiākāraṃ atikkamitvā ‘nicca’nti ādivasena pavattamānā parato āmasantīti parāmāsā.
atk-abh01a0:884_1: Mahantaradukesu ārammaṇaṃ aggahetvā appavattito saha ārammaṇenāti sārammaṇā.
atk-abh01a0:884_9: Ekato vattamānāpi nirantarabhāvaṃ anupagamanatāya cittena visaṃsaṭṭhāti cittavisaṃsaṭṭhā.
atk-abh01a0:884_17: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhā ca te cittasamuṭṭhānā cāti cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānā.
atk-abh01a0:884_18: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhā ca te cittasamuṭṭhānā ca cittasahabhuno eva cāti cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuno.
atk-abh01a0:884_19: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhā ca te cittasamuṭṭhānā ca cittānuparivattino eva cāti cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattino.
atk-abh01a0:884_21: Ajjhattajjhattaṃ sandhāya ajjhattattike vuttavasena ajjhattāva ajjhattikā.
atk-abh01a0:885_0: 69-74. Upādānagocchake bhusaṃ ādiyantīti upādānā; daḷhaggāhaṃ gaṇhantīti attho. Tato aññe noupādānā.
atk-abh01a0:887_1: Piṭṭhidukesu kāme avacarantīti kāmāvacarā rūpe avacarantīti rūpāvacarā.
atk-abh01a0:887_7: Vaṭṭamūlaṃ chindantā nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā vaṭṭato niyyantīti niyyānikā.
atk-abh01a0:887_9: Cutiyā vā attano vā pavattiyā anantaraṃ phaladāne niyatattā niyatā.
atk-abh01a0:887_12: Attānaṃ uttarituṃ samatthehi saha uttarehīti sauttarā.
atk-abh01a0:887_15: yehi abhibhūtā sattā nānappakārena kandanti paridevanti,
atk-abh01a0:887_17: Sampayogavasena pahānekaṭṭhatāvasena ca saha raṇehīti saraṇā.
atk-abh01a0:889_7: Pacchimena atthena tāsu yā kāci ekā vijjā vijjā.
atk-abh01a0:889_9: Evaṃ vijjāpi vijjāya sampayuttadhammāpi vijjābhāginotveva veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:889_13: Tattha dukkhapaṭicchādakaṃ tamo samudayādipaṭicchādakanti catasso avijjā.
atk-abh01a0:889_15: Tāsu yā kāci ekā avijjā avijjā.
atk-abh01a0:889_17: Evaṃ avijjāpi avijjāya sampayuttadhammāpi avijjābhāginotveva veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:890_0: Puna anajjhottharaṇabhāvena kilesandhakāraṃ viddhaṃsetuṃ asamatthatāya vijju upamā etesanti vijjūpamā.
atk-abh01a0:890_1: Nissesaṃ viddhaṃsanasamatthatāya vajiraṃ upamā etesanti vajirūpamā.
atk-abh01a0:890_2: Bālesu ṭhitattā yattha ṭhitā tadupacārena bālā.
atk-abh01a0:890_12: Idha ceva samparāye ca tapentīti tapanīyā.
atk-abh01a0:891_2: Sirivaḍḍhako dhanavaḍḍhakoti ādayo hi vacanamattameva adhikāraṃ katvā pavattā adhivacanā nāma.
atk-abh01a0:891_6: tasmā saṅkhārā”ti evaṃ niddhāretvā sahetukaṃ katvā vuccamānā abhilāpā nirutti nāma.
atk-abh01a0:891_8: Takko vitakko saṅkappoti evaṃ tena tena pakārena ñāpanato paññatti nāma.
atk-abh01a0:891_10: Ettha ca ekaṃ dukaṃ vatvāpi itaresaṃ vacane payojanaṃ hetugocchake vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:892_1: Nāmarūpaduke nāmakaraṇaṭṭhena namanaṭṭhena nāmanaṭṭhena ca nāmaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:892_11: Sassato attā ca loko cāti pavattā diṭṭhi sassatadiṭṭhi.
atk-abh01a0:892_17: Ahirikanti yaṃ na hiriyati hiriyitabbenāti evaṃ vitthāritā nillajjatā.
atk-abh01a0:892_18: Anottappanti yaṃ na ottappati ottappitabbenāti evaṃ vitthārito abhāyanakaākāro.
atk-abh01a0:892_21: Dovacassatādīsu dukkhaṃ vaco etasmiṃ vippaṭikūlagāhimhi vipaccanīkasāte anādare puggaleti dubbaco.
atk-abh01a0:892_24: Pāpā assaddhādayo puggalā etassa mittāti pāpamitto;
atk-abh01a0:892_26: Sovacassatā ca kalyāṇamittatā ca vuttapaṭipakkhanayena veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:893_2: sattapi āpattikkhandhā āpattiyo’ti evaṃ vuttāsu āpattīsu kusalabhāvo āpattikusalatā.
atk-abh01a0:894_6: Yathā parehi saddhiṃ attano chiddaṃ na hoti evaṃ dhammāmisehi paṭisantharaṇaṃ paṭisanthāro.
atk-abh01a0:894_7: Indriyasaṃvarabhedasaṅkhāto manacchaṭṭhesu indriyesu aguttadvārabhāvo indriyesu aguttadvāratā.
atk-abh01a0:894_8: Paṭiggahaṇaparibhogavasena bhojane mattaṃ ajānanabhāvo bhojane amattaññutā.
atk-abh01a0:894_15: Vīriyasīsena satta bojjhaṅge bhāventassa uppannaṃ balaṃ bhāvanābalaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:894_18: Samathova taṃ ākāraṃ gahetvā puna pavattetabbassa samathassa nimittavasena samathanimittaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:895_3: Soraccameva sīlassa sampādanato sīlaparipūraṇato sīlassa sampadāti sīlasampadā.
atk-abh01a0:895_10: Diṭṭhivisuddhi kho pana yathādiṭṭhissa ca padhānanti kammassakataññāṇādisaṅkhātā diṭṭhivisuddhi ceva
atk-abh01a0:895_11: yathādiṭṭhissa ca anurūpadiṭṭhissa kalyāṇadiṭṭhissa taṃsampayuttameva padhānaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:895_14: Saṃviggassa ca yonisopadhānanti evaṃ saṃvegajātassa upāyapadhānaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:895_15: Asantuṭṭhitā ca kusalesu dhammesūti kusaladhammapūraṇe asantuṭṭhibhāvo.
atk-abh01a0:895_16: Appaṭivānitā ca padhānasminti arahattaṃ apatvā padhānasmiṃ anivattanatā anosakkanatā.
atk-abh01a0:895_20: Anuppāde ñāṇanti paṭisandhivasena anuppādabhūte taṃtaṃmaggavajjhakilesānaṃ anuppādapariyosāne uppanne ariyaphale ñāṇaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:898_1: Idāni yathānikkhittāya mātikāya saṅgahite dhamme pabhedato dassetuṃ katame dhammā kusalāti idaṃ padabhājanīyaṃ āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:898_2: Tattha yadetaṃ yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hotīti paṭhamaṃ kāmāvacarakusalaṃ dassitaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:898_3: tassa tāva niddese dhammavavatthānavāro saṅgahavāro suññatavāroti tayo mahāvārā honti.
atk-abh01a0:898_9: Tesu ‘katame dhammā kusalā’ti ayaṃ pucchā nāma.
atk-abh01a0:898_14: ‘Ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā ime dhammā kusalā’ti ayaṃ appanā nāma.
atk-abh01a0:899_0: Evaṃ catūhi paricchedehi ṭhitassa uddesavārassa yvāyaṃ paṭhamo pucchāparicchedo,
atk-abh01a0:900_3: Tassa ñāṇāya dassanāya tulanāya tīraṇāya vibhūtatthāya vibhāvanatthāya pañhaṃ pucchati.
atk-abh01a0:901_3: so aññehi paṇḍitehi saddhiṃ saṃsandanatthāya pañhaṃ pucchati.
atk-abh01a0:903_4: rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā’ti? ‘Aniccaṃ, bhante’.
atk-abh01a0:903_5: ‘Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vā taṃ sukhaṃ vā’ti? ‘Dukkhaṃ, bhante’.
atk-abh01a0:903_7: kallaṃ nu taṃ samanupassituṃ etaṃ mama,
atk-abh01a0:905_0: Tattha buddhānaṃ purimā tisso pucchā natthi. Kasmā?
atk-abh01a0:905_3: adiṭṭhaṃ anaññātaṃ ajotitaṃ atulitaṃ atīritaṃ avibhūtaṃ avibhāvitaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-abh01a0:905_5: Yaṃ pana bhagavatā attano ñāṇena paṭividdhaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:905_6: tassa aññena samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā saddhiṃ saṃsandanakiccaṃ natthi.
atk-abh01a0:905_8: Yasmā panesa akathaṃkathī tiṇṇavicikiccho sabbadhammesu vihatasaṃsayo,
atk-abh01a0:905_10: Itarā dve pana pucchā bhagavato atthi.
atk-abh01a0:906_1: ‘Dhammā kusalā’ti hi vacanamattena ‘kiṃ katā kiṃ vā karontī’ti na sakkā ñātuṃ.
atk-abh01a0:907_0: Kasmā panettha mātikāyaṃ viya ‘kusalā dhammā’ti avatvā ‘dhammā kusalā’ti padānukkamo katoti?
atk-abh01a0:907_8: Pabhedato hi desanā ghanavinibbhogapaṭisambhidāñāṇāvahā hotīti ‘kusalā dhammā’ti evaṃ pabhedato dhammānaṃ desanaṃ dīpetvā,
atk-abh01a0:907_9: idāni ye tena pabhedena desetabbā dhammā te dassetuṃ,
atk-abh01a0:907_10: ayaṃ ‘katame dhammā kusalā’ti padānukkamo katoti veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:907_11: Pabhedavantesu hi dassitesu pabhedo dassiyamāno yujjati suviññeyyo ca hotīti.
atk-abh01a0:908_0: Idāni yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittanti. Ettha –
atk-abh01a0:909_0: Samaye niddisi cittaṃ, cittena samayaṃ muni;
atk-abh01a0:911_0: ‘Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ citta’nti hi niddisanto bhagavā samaye cittaṃ niddisi.
atk-abh01a0:911_2: Tena samayaniyamitena cittena pariyosāne ‘tasmiṃ samaye’ti evaṃ samayaṃ niyametvāna,
atk-abh01a0:911_3: atha vijjamānepi samayanānatte yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ tasmiṃyeva samaye phasso hoti,
atk-abh01a0:911_4: vedanā hotīti evaṃ tasmiṃ cittaniyamite samaye ete santatisamūhakiccārammaṇaghanavasena duranubodhappabhede phassavedanādayo dhamme bodhetunti attho.
atk-abh01a0:913_0: Samavāye khaṇe kāle, samūhe hetu diṭṭhisu;
atk-abh01a0:914_0: Paṭilābhe pahāne ca, paṭivedhe ca dissati.
atk-abh01a0:915_0: Tathā hissa “appeva nāma svepi upasaṅkameyyāma kālañca samayañca upādāyā”ti evamādīsu samavāyo attho.
atk-abh01a0:915_3: khaṇo ca samayo ca brahmacariyavāsāyā”tiādīsu khaṇo.
atk-abh01a0:915_9: bhagavāpi maṃ jānissati ‘bhaddāli nāma bhikkhu satthusāsane sikkhāya aparipūrakārī’ti.
atk-abh01a0:915_12: “Tena kho pana samayena uggāhamāno paribbājako samaṇamuṇḍikāputto samayappavādake tindukācīre ekasālake mallikāya ārāme paṭivasatī”tiādīsu diṭṭhi.
atk-abh01a0:916_0: “Diṭṭhe dhamme ca yo attho, yo cattho samparāyiko;
atk-abh01a0:918_2: “Dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭho saṅkhataṭṭho santāpaṭṭho vipariṇāmaṭṭho abhisamayaṭṭho”tiādīsu paṭivedho.
atk-abh01a0:919_0: Samavāyo khaṇo kālo, samūho hetuyeva ca;
atk-abh01a0:920_0: Ete pañcapi viññeyyā, samayā idha viññunā.
atk-abh01a0:921_0: ‘Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusala’nti imasmiñhi kusalādhikāre tesu navasu samayesu ete samavāyādayo pañca samayā paṇḍitena veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:923_0: Ekova navamo ñeyyo, cakkāni caturopi vā.
atk-abh01a0:924_0: Yā hi esā sādhāraṇaphalanipphādakattena saṇṭhitā paccayānaṃ sāmaggī,
atk-abh01a0:924_4: khaṇo ca samayo ca brahmacariyavāsāyā”ti evaṃ vutto pana navamova khaṇo eko khaṇoti veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:924_7: cakkāni yehi samannāgatānaṃ devamanussānaṃ catucakkaṃ vattatī”ti –
atk-abh01a0:924_11: pubbe ca katapuññatā’ti cattāri cakkāni vuttāni,
atk-abh01a0:924_12: etāni vā ekajjhaṃ katvā okāsaṭṭhena khaṇoti veditabbāni.
atk-abh01a0:926_0: Taṃ taṃ upādāya paññatto, kālo vohāramattako;
atk-abh01a0:928_7: ‘pubbaṇho sāyanho divā rattī’tiādinā nayena candimasūriyādiparivattanaṃ vā,
atk-abh01a0:928_9: evaṃ taṃ taṃ upādāya paññatto kālo nāma.
atk-abh01a0:928_10: So panesa sabhāvato avijjamānattā paññattimattako evāti veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:931_1: tassa dvārānaṃ vā paccayānaṃ vā vasena anekabhāvo veditabbo. Kathaṃ?
atk-abh01a0:931_2: Cakkhudvārādīsu hi uppajjamānānaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ cakkhurūpaālokamanasikārādayo paccayā,
atk-abh01a0:931_3: mahāpakaraṇe ca “hetupaccayo ārammaṇapaccayo”tiādinā nayena catuvīsati paccayā vuttā.
atk-abh01a0:931_7: Evamassa iminā dvāravasena vā paccayavasena vā anekabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:931_8: Evamete samavāyādayo pañca atthā idha samayasaddena pariggahitāti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:932_0: ‘Kasmā pana etesu yaṃkiñci ekaṃ apariggahetvā sabbesaṃ pariggaho kato’ti?
atk-abh01a0:932_2: Etesu hi samavāyasaṅkhāto samayo anekahetuto vuttiṃ dīpeti.
atk-abh01a0:932_4: Samavāyo ca nāma sādhāraṇaphalanipphādane aññamaññāpekkho hoti.
atk-abh01a0:932_5: Tasmā ‘eko kattā nāma natthī’ti imampi atthaṃ dīpeti.
atk-abh01a0:932_6: Sabhāvena hi kāraṇe sati kāraṇantarāpekkhā ayuttāti.
atk-abh01a0:932_7: Evaṃ ekassa kassaci kāraṇassa abhāvadīpanena “sayaṃkataṃ sukhadukkha”ntiādi paṭisedhitaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:933_4: ‘Na hi ekasmiṃ andhe daṭṭhuṃ asakkonte andhasataṃ passatī’ti.
atk-abh01a0:933_8: Na ca andhānaṃ dassanaṃ nāma sādhāraṇaphalaṃ’.
atk-abh01a0:933_12: Asāmaggiyaṃ ahetūnampi ca sāmaggiyaṃ hetubhāvo siddho.
atk-abh01a0:933_19: Ayaṃ tāva samavāyasaṅkhātena samayena attho dīpito.
atk-abh01a0:934_0: Yo panesa aṭṭhahi akkhaṇehi parivajjito navamo khaṇo,
atk-abh01a0:934_1: patirūpadesavāsādiko ca catucakkasaṅkhāto okāsaṭṭhena khaṇo vutto,
atk-abh01a0:934_4: Iti khaṇassa dullabhattā suṭṭhutaraṃ khaṇāyattaṃ lokuttaradhammānaṃ upakārabhūtaṃ kusalaṃ dullabhameva.
atk-abh01a0:934_5: Evametesu khaṇasaṅkhāto samayo kusaluppattiyā dullabhabhāvaṃ dīpeti.
atk-abh01a0:934_6: Evaṃ dīpentena anena adhigatakhaṇānaṃ khaṇāyattasseva tassa kusalassa ananuṭṭhānena moghakhaṇaṃ kurumānānaṃ pamādavihāro paṭisedhito hoti.
atk-abh01a0:935_0: Yo panetassa kusalacittassa pavattikālo nāma hoti,
atk-abh01a0:935_6: yathā ca yā devatā candimasūriyānaṃ purato dhāvanti tāsaṃ devatānaṃ javo,
atk-abh01a0:935_9: Tatra hi so rūpajīvitindriyassa tāva parittako kālo vutto.
atk-abh01a0:935_10: Yāva paṭuppannaṃ rūpaṃ tiṭṭhati tāva soḷasa cittāni uppajjitvā bhijjanti.
atk-abh01a0:935_15: upamāpi na sukarā yāva lahuparivattaṃ citta”nti.
atk-abh01a0:935_16: Evametesu kālasaṅkhāto samayo kusalacittappavattikālassa atiparittataṃ dīpeti.
atk-abh01a0:935_20: tasmā etassa paṭivedhe mahāussāho ca ādaro ca kattabboti ovādo dinno hoti.
atk-abh01a0:936_0: Samūhasaṅkhāto pana samayo anekesaṃ sahuppattiṃ dīpeti.
atk-abh01a0:936_2: Tasmiñca uppajjamānaṃ cittaṃ saha tehi dhammehi uppajjatīti anekesaṃ sahuppatti dīpitā.
atk-abh01a0:936_3: Evaṃ dīpentena cānena ekasseva dhammassa uppatti paṭisedhitā hoti.
atk-abh01a0:937_1: ‘Yasmiṃ samaye’ti hi padassa yasmā ‘yasmiṃ hetumhi sati’ uppannaṃ hotīti ayamattho,
atk-abh01a0:937_3: Evaṃ dīpentena cānena dhammānaṃ savasavattitābhimāno paṭisedhito hoti.
atk-abh01a0:938_0: Tattha ‘yasmiṃ samaye’ti kālasaṅkhātassa samayassa vasena ‘yasmiṃ kāle’ti attho;
atk-abh01a0:938_4: yamhi hetumhi sati’ kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti,
atk-abh01a0:938_8: Khaṇasamavāyahetusaṅkhātassa ca samayassa bhāvena tesaṃ bhāvo lakkhīyatīti bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇavasenettha bhummaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:939_1: Heṭṭhato avīcinirayaṃ uparito paranimmitavasavattiṃ pariyantaṃ katvā”tiādinā nayena vuttesu kāmāvacaradhammesu pariyāpannaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:939_5: Tattha kilesakāmo atthato chandarāgova vatthukāmo tebhūmakavaṭṭaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:939_8: Yasmiṃ pana padese duvidhopeso kāmo pavattivasena avacarati,
atk-abh01a0:939_14: Yathā hi yasmiṃ padese sasatthā purisā avacaranti,
atk-abh01a0:939_17: evaṃ vijjamānesupi aññesu rūpāvacarādīsu tattha avacarantesu,
atk-abh01a0:939_21: Evamidaṃ cittaṃ imasmiṃ ekādasapadesasaṅkhāte kāme avacaratīti kāmāvacaraṃ.
atk-abh01a0:940_1: yathā pana saṅgāme avacaraṇato saṅgāmāvacaroti laddhanāmako nāgo nagare carantopi ‘saṅgāmāvacaro’tveva vuccati,
atk-abh01a0:940_2: thalajalacarā ca pāṇā athale ajale ca ṭhitāpi ‘thalacarā jalacarā’tveva vuccanti,
atk-abh01a0:940_4: Ārammaṇakaraṇavasena vā ettha kāmo avacaratītipi kāmāvacaraṃ.
atk-abh01a0:940_9: mahiyaṃ vā senti sabbesaṃ taṃ nāmaṃ hoti,
atk-abh01a0:940_11: Apica kāmabhavasaṅkhāte kāme paṭisandhiṃ avacāretītipi kāmāvacaraṃ.
atk-abh01a0:941_1: Apica ārogyaṭṭhena anavajjaṭṭhena kosallasambhūtaṭṭhena ca kusalaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:941_2: Yatheva hi ‘kacci nu bhoto kusala’nti rūpakāye anāturatāya agelaññena nibyādhitāya ārogyaṭṭhena kusalaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:941_3: evaṃ arūpadhammepi kilesāturatāya kilesagelaññassa ca kilesabyādhino abhāvena ārogyaṭṭhena kusalaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:941_4: Kilesavajjassa pana kilesadosassa kilesadarathassa ca abhāvā anavajjaṭṭhena kusalaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:942_3: Yathā hi tālapaṇṇehi akatvā kilañjādīhi katampi taṃsarikkhattā ruḷhīsaddena tālavaṇṭantveva vuccati,
atk-abh01a0:942_5: Nippariyāyena pana ‘ñāṇasampayuttaṃ’ ārogyaṭṭhena anavajjaṭṭhena kosallasambhūtaṭṭhenāti tividhenapi kusalanti nāmaṃ labhati,
atk-abh01a0:942_7: Iti yañca jātakapariyāyena yañca bāhitikasuttapariyāyena yañca abhidhammapariyāyena kusalaṃ kathitaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ tīhipi atthehi imasmiṃ citte labbhati.
atk-abh01a0:943_8: Lakkhaṇādīsu hi tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ sabhāvo vā sāmaññaṃ vā lakkhaṇaṃ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:943_9: Kiccaṃ vā sampatti vā raso nāma.
atk-abh01a0:943_10: Upaṭṭhānākāro vā phalaṃ vā paccupaṭṭhānaṃ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:943_12: Iti yattha yattha lakkhaṇādīni vakkhāma tattha tattha imināva nayena tesaṃ nānattaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:944_4: taṃ javanavīthivasena attano santānaṃ cinotīti cittaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:944_18: sabbesupi cetesu aññaṃ hīnaṃ aññaṃ majjhimaṃ aññaṃ paṇītaṃ;
atk-abh01a0:944_22: tasmā assa imesaṃ sampayuttabhūmiārammaṇahīnamajjhimapaṇītādhipatīnaṃ vasena cittatā veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:944_23: Kāmañcettha ekameva evaṃ cittaṃ na hoti,
atk-abh01a0:944_24: cittānaṃ pana antogadhattā etesu yaṃkiñci ekampi cittatāya cittanti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-abh01a0:945_1: Lokasmiñhi cittakammato uttari aññaṃ cittaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-abh01a0:945_2: Tasmimpi caraṇaṃ nāma cittaṃ aticittameva hoti.
atk-abh01a0:945_3: Taṃ karontānaṃ cittakārānaṃ ‘evaṃvidhāni ettha rūpāni kātabbānī’ti cittasaññā uppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:945_5: tato caraṇasaṅkhāte citte aññataraṃ vicittarūpaṃ nipphajjati.
atk-abh01a0:945_8: ubhayapasse ida’nti cintetvā yathācintitena kamena sesacittarūpanipphādanaṃ hoti,
atk-abh01a0:945_9: evaṃ yaṃkiñci loke vicittaṃ sippajātaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ citteneva kariyati,
atk-abh01a0:945_10: evaṃ imāya karaṇavicittatāya tassa tassa cittassa nipphādakaṃ cittampi tatheva cittaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:945_11: Yathācintitassa vā anavasesassa anipphajjanato tatopi cittameva cittataraṃ.
atk-abh01a0:947_0: Tathā yadetaṃ devamanussanirayatiracchānabhedāsu gatīsu kammaliṅgasaññāvohārādibhedaṃ ajjhattikaṃ cittaṃ tampi cittakatameva.
atk-abh01a0:947_2: Kammanānatteneva ca tāsu tāsu gatīsu hatthapādakaṇṇaudaragīvāmukhādisaṇṭhānabhinnaṃ liṅganānattaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:947_3: Liṅganānattato yathāgahitasaṇṭhānavasena ‘ayaṃ itthī ayaṃ puriso’ti uppajjamānāya saññāya saññānānattaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:947_4: Saññānānattato saññānurūpena ‘itthī’ti vā ‘puriso’ti vā voharantānaṃ vohāranānattaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:947_5: Vohāranānattavasena pana yasmā ‘itthī bhavissāmi puriso bhavissāmi,
atk-abh01a0:947_6: khattiyo bhavissāmi brāhmaṇo bhavissāmī’ti evaṃ tassa tassa attabhāvassa janakaṃ kammaṃ karīyati,
atk-abh01a0:947_8: Taṃ panetaṃ kammanānattaṃ yathāpatthitaṃ bhavaṃ nibbattentaṃ yasmā gativasena nibbatteti tasmā kammanānattato gatinānattaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:947_9: Kammanānatteneva ca tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ tassā tassā gatiyā apādakadvipādakāditā,
atk-abh01a0:947_13: Tasmā sabbametaṃ devamanussanirayatiracchānabhedāsu gatīsu kammaliṅgasaññāvohārādibhedaṃ ajjhattikaṃ cittaṃ citteneva katanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:947_14: Svāyamattho imassa saṅgītianāruḷhassa suttassa vasena veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:948_4: Kammanānākaraṇaṃ paṭicca sattānaṃ gatiyā nānākaraṇaṃ paññāyati –
atk-abh01a0:948_8: Kammanānākaraṇaṃ paṭicca sattānaṃ upapattiyā nānākaraṇaṃ paññāyati –
atk-abh01a0:948_10: Kammanānākaraṇaṃ paṭicca sattānaṃ attabhāve nānākaraṇaṃ paññāyati –
atk-abh01a0:948_12: Kammanānākaraṇaṃ paṭicca sattānaṃ lokadhamme nānākaraṇaṃ paññāyati –
atk-abh01a0:951_0: Saññāto bhedaṃ gacchanti, itthāyaṃ purisoti vā.
atk-abh01a0:958_0: “Kammassakā māṇava sattā kammadāyādā kammayonī kammabandhū kammapaṭisaraṇā;
atk-abh01a0:959_0: Evaṃ imāya karaṇacittatāyapi cittassa cittatā veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:959_1: Sabbānipi hi etāni vicitrāni citteneva katāni.
atk-abh01a0:959_2: Aladdhokāsassa pana cittassa yaṃ vā pana avasesapaccayavikalaṃ tassa ekaccacittakaraṇābhāvato yadetaṃ cittena kataṃ ajjhattikaṃ cittaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:960_2: aññaṃ ekanikāyampi samanupassāmi evaṃ cittaṃ yathayidaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:961_0: Uppannaṃ hotīti ettha vattamānabhūtāpagatokāsakatabhūmiladdhavasena uppannaṃ nāma anekappabhedaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:961_7: “Yānissa tāni pubbe katāni kammānī”ti evamādinā nayena vuttaṃ kammaṃ atītampi samānaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:961_8: aññaṃ vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā attano vipākassokāsaṃ katvā ṭhitattā,
atk-abh01a0:961_9: tathā katokāsañca vipākaṃ anuppannampi samānaṃ evaṃ kate okāse ekantena uppajjanato okāsakatuppannaṃ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:961_10: Tāsu tāsu bhūmīsu asamūhataṃ akusalaṃ bhūmiladdhuppannaṃ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:961_11: Ettha ca bhūmiyā bhūmiladdhassa ca nānattaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:961_13: Bhūmiladdhaṃ nāma tesu khandhesu uppattārahaṃ kilesajātaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:961_14: Tena hesā bhūmi laddhā nāma hoti,
atk-abh01a0:962_3: saddo panesa atīte paṭiladdhe samuṭṭhite avikkhambhite asamucchinne khaṇattayagateti anekesu atthesu dissati.
atk-abh01a0:962_6: samayena kakusandho bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho loke uppanno”ti ettha atīte āgato.
atk-abh01a0:962_7: “Āyasmato ānandassa atirekacīvaraṃ uppannaṃ hotī”ti ettha paṭiladdhe.
atk-abh01a0:962_10: uppannaṃ mahāmeghaṃ tamenaṃ mahāvāto antarāyeva antaradhāpetī”ti ettha samuṭṭhite.
atk-abh01a0:962_12: uppannuppanne pāpake akusale dhamme ṭhānaso antaradhāpetī”ti ettha avikkhambhite.
atk-abh01a0:962_13: “Ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāvento bahulīkaronto uppannuppanne pāpake akusale dhamme ṭhānaso antarāyeva antaradhāpetī”ti ettha asamucchinne.
atk-abh01a0:963_2: Tasmā yathā rājā āgatoti vutte na parisaṃ pahāya ekakova āgato,
atk-abh01a0:964_0: Lokiyadhammañhi patvā cittaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ cittaṃ dhuraṃ cittaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:964_1: Lokuttaradhammaṃ patvā paññā jeṭṭhikā paññā dhurā paññā pubbaṅgamā.
atk-abh01a0:964_2: Teneva bhagavā vinayapariyāyaṃ patvā pañhaṃ pucchanto ‘kiṃphassosi,
atk-abh01a0:964_5: kiṃcetanosī’ti apucchitvā “kiṃcitto tvaṃ bhikkhū”ti cittameva dhuraṃ katvā pucchati.
atk-abh01a0:964_6: “Atheyyacitto ahaṃ bhagavā”ti ca vutte ‘anāpatti atheyyaphassassā’tiādīni avatvā “anāpatti bhikkhu atheyyacittassā”ti vadati.
atk-abh01a0:965_1: aññampi lokiyadesanaṃ desento cittameva dhuraṃ katvā deseti. Yathāha – “ye keci,
atk-abh01a0:965_3: dhammā akusalā akusalabhāgiyā akusalapakkhikā sabbete manopubbaṅgamā.
atk-abh01a0:967_0: Manasā ce paduṭṭhena, bhāsati vā karoti vā;
atk-abh01a0:968_0: Tato naṃ dukkhamanveti, cakkaṃva vahato padaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:970_0: Manasā ce pasannena, bhāsati vā karoti vā;
atk-abh01a0:975_0: “Pabhassaramidaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ, tañca kho āgantukehi upakkilesehi upakkiliṭṭhaṃ” ;
atk-abh01a0:977_0: Evaṃ lokiyadhammaṃ patvā cittaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ hoti,
atk-abh01a0:977_3: Imesu pana suttesu ekaṃ vā dve vā aggahetvā suttānurakkhaṇatthāya sabbānipi gahitānīti veditabbāni.
atk-abh01a0:978_6: catutthaṃ maggapaññaṃ adhigato’ti paññaṃ jeṭṭhikaṃ paññaṃ dhuraṃ katvā pucchati.
atk-abh01a0:978_7: Paññuttarā sabbe kusalā dhammā na parihāyanti.
atk-abh01a0:978_14: tadanvayo samādhi saṇṭhātī”ti evamādīni panettha suttāni daṭṭhabbāni.
atk-abh01a0:978_15: Iti lokuttaradhammaṃ patvā paññā jeṭṭhikā hoti paññā dhurā paññā pubbaṅgamāti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:978_17: Tasmā cittaṃ dhuraṃ katvā desento “cittaṃ uppannaṃ hotī”ti āha.
atk-abh01a0:979_0: Somanassasahagatanti sātamadhuravedayitasaṅkhātena somanassena saha ekuppādādibhāvaṃ gataṃ.
atk-abh01a0:979_2: saddo tabbhāve vokiṇṇe nissaye ārammaṇe saṃsaṭṭheti imesu atthesu dissati.
atk-abh01a0:979_3: Tattha “yāyaṃ taṇhā ponobbhavikā nandirāgasahagatā”ti tabbhāve veditabbo;
atk-abh01a0:979_7: antarantarā uppajjamānena kosajjena vokiṇṇāti ayamettha attho.
atk-abh01a0:979_9: aṭṭhikasaññaṃ nissāya aṭṭhikasaññaṃ bhāvetvā paṭiladdhanti attho.
atk-abh01a0:979_10: “Lābhī hoti rūpasahagatānaṃ vā samāpattīnaṃ arūpasahagatānaṃ vā”ti ārammaṇe;
atk-abh01a0:979_12: “Idaṃ sukhaṃ imāya pītiyā sahagataṃ hoti sahajātaṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ sampayutta”nti saṃsaṭṭhe.
atk-abh01a0:980_1: saddopi cesa sadise avassute mittasanthave sahajāteti bahūsu atthesu dissati.
atk-abh01a0:980_2: Ayañhi “kise thūle vivajjetvā saṃsaṭṭhā yojitā hayā”ti ettha sadise āgato.
atk-abh01a0:980_5: “Idaṃ sukhaṃ imāya pītiyā sahagataṃ hoti sahajātaṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ sampayutta”nti sahajāte.
atk-abh01a0:980_7: Tattha ‘sahagataṃ’ asahajātaṃ asaṃsaṭṭhaṃ asampayuttaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-abh01a0:980_10: Rūpārūpadhammesu hi ekato jātesu rūpaṃ arūpena sahajātaṃ hoti,
atk-abh01a0:980_15: arūpaṃ pana arūpena saddhiṃ niyamatova sahagataṃ sahajātaṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ sampayuttameva hotīti.
atk-abh01a0:981_2: Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ siyā taṃ mātikāvaṇṇanāya vedanāttike vuttanayameva.
atk-abh01a0:981_3: Tasmā ekuppādā ekanirodhā ekavatthukā ekārammaṇāti iminā lakkhaṇenetaṃ sampayuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:981_5: Arūpe pana vināpi ekavatthukabhāvaṃ sampayogo labbhati.
atk-abh01a0:982_1: Kāmāvacarakusalesu somanassasahagataṃ tihetukaṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ asaṅkhārikaṃ mahācittaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:982_2: “Katame dhammā kusalā”ti hi aniyamitapucchāya catubhūmakakusalaṃ gahitaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:982_3: ‘Kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hotī’ti vacanena pana tebhūmakaṃ kusalaṃ pariccajitvā,
atk-abh01a0:982_5: ‘Somanassasahagata’nti vacanena tato catubbidhaṃ upekkhāsahagataṃ pariccajitvā catubbidhaṃ somanassasahagatameva gahitaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:982_6: ‘Ñāṇasampayutta’nti vacanena tato duvidhaṃ ñāṇavippayuttaṃ pariccajitvā dve ñāṇasampayuttāneva gahitāni.
atk-abh01a0:982_9: parato pana ‘sasaṅkhārenā’ti vacanato idha ‘asaṅkhārenā’ti avuttepi asaṅkhārikabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:982_10: Sammāsambuddho hi āditova idaṃ mahācittaṃ bhājetvā dassetuṃ niyametvāva imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhīti evamettha sanniṭṭhānaṃ katanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:983_0: Idāni tameva cittaṃ ārammaṇato dassetuṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ vātiādimāha.
atk-abh01a0:983_1: Bhagavā hi arūpadhammaṃ dassento vatthunā vā dasseti,
atk-abh01a0:983_17: manañca paṭicca dhamme ca uppajjati manoviññāṇaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:983_22: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne ārammaṇena dassento ‘rūpārammaṇaṃ’ vātiādimāha.
atk-abh01a0:984_5: Ekasamuṭṭhānā dvisamuṭṭhānā tisamuṭṭhānā catusamuṭṭhānā nakutocisamuṭṭhānā atītānāgatapaccuppannā cittacetasikā,
atk-abh01a0:984_8: Ye pana anāpāthagatā rūpādayopi dhammārammaṇamicceva vadanti te iminā suttena paṭikkhipitabbā.
atk-abh01a0:985_1: pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ nānāvisayānaṃ nānāgocarānaṃ na aññamaññassa gocaravisayaṃ paccanubhontānaṃ mano
atk-abh01a0:986_1: Tāni manena paccanubhaviyamānānipi rūpārammaṇādīniyevāti ayamattho siddho hoti.
atk-abh01a0:986_4: na ca tāni dhammārammaṇāni bhavantīti vuttanayeneva ārammaṇavavatthānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:987_0: Tattha ekekaṃ ārammaṇaṃ dvīsu dvīsu dvāresu āpāthamāgacchati.
atk-abh01a0:987_1: Rūpārammaṇañhi cakkhupasādaṃ ghaṭṭetvā taṅkhaṇaññeva manodvāre āpāthamāgacchati;
atk-abh01a0:987_4: Yathā hi sakuṇo ākāsenāgantvā rukkhagge nilīyamānova rukkhasākhañca ghaṭṭeti,
atk-abh01a0:987_5: chāyā cassa pathaviyaṃ paṭihaññati sākhāghaṭṭanachāyāpharaṇāni apubbaṃ acarimaṃ ekakkhaṇeyeva bhavanti,
atk-abh01a0:987_6: evaṃ paccuppannarūpādīnaṃ cakkhupasādādighaṭṭanañca bhavaṅgacalanasamatthatāya manodvāre āpāthagamanañca apubbaṃ acarimaṃ ekakkhaṇeyeva hoti.
atk-abh01a0:987_7: Tato bhavaṅgaṃ vicchinditvā cakkhudvārādīsu uppannānaṃ āvajjanādīnaṃ voṭṭhabbanapariyosānānaṃ anantarā
atk-abh01a0:987_8: tesaṃ ārammaṇānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ idaṃ mahācittaṃ uppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:988_1: Pakatiyā diṭṭhasutaghāyitasāyitaphuṭṭhavaseneva etāni ārammaṇāni āpāthamāgacchanti. Kathaṃ?
atk-abh01a0:988_3: dīpamālāparikkhittaṃ atimanoramāya siriyā virocamānaṃ alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ mahācetiyaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā
atk-abh01a0:988_4: soḷasasu pādapiṭṭhikāsu pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā añjaliṃ paggayha ullokento buddhārammaṇaṃ pītiṃ gahetvā tiṭṭhati.
atk-abh01a0:988_5: Tassa evaṃ cetiyaṃ passitvā buddhārammaṇaṃ pītiṃ nibbattetvā aparabhāge yattha katthaci gatassa rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānesu
atk-abh01a0:988_6: nisinnassa āvajjamānassa alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ mahācetiyaṃ cakkhudvāre āpāthamāgatasadisameva hoti,
atk-abh01a0:989_0: Madhurena pana sarena dhammakathikassa vā dhammaṃ kathentassa,
atk-abh01a0:989_1: sarabhāṇakassa vā sarena bhaṇantassa saddaṃ sutvā aparabhāge yattha katthaci nisīditvā āvajjamānassa
atk-abh01a0:989_2: dhammakathā vā sarabhaññaṃ vā sotadvāre āpāthamāgataṃ viya hoti,
atk-abh01a0:990_0: Sugandhaṃ pana gandhaṃ vā mālaṃ vā labhitvā āsane vā cetiye vā gandhārammaṇena cittena pūjaṃ katvā aparabhāge
atk-abh01a0:990_1: yattha katthaci nisīditvā āvajjamānassa taṃ gandhārammaṇaṃ ghānadvāre āpāthamāgataṃ viya hoti,
atk-abh01a0:991_0: Paṇītaṃ pana khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā sabrahmacārīhi saddhiṃ saṃvibhajitvā paribhuñjitvā aparabhāge
atk-abh01a0:991_1: yattha katthaci kudrūsakādibhojanaṃ labhitvā ‘asukakāle paṇītaṃ bhojanaṃ sabrahmacārīhi saddhiṃ saṃvibhajitvā
atk-abh01a0:991_2: paribhutta’nti āvajjamānassa taṃ rasārammaṇaṃ jivhādvāre āpāthamāgataṃ viya hoti,
atk-abh01a0:992_0: Mudukaṃ pana sukhasamphassaṃ mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā attharaṇapāpuraṇaṃ vā paribhuñjitvā aparabhāge yattha
atk-abh01a0:992_1: katthaci dukkhaseyyaṃ kappetvā ‘asukakāle me mudukaṃ mañcapīṭhaṃ attharaṇapāvuraṇaṃ paribhutta’nti āvajjamānassa
atk-abh01a0:992_2: taṃ phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ kāyadvāre āpāthamāgataṃ viya hoti.
atk-abh01a0:992_6: Pakatiyā diṭṭhasutaghāyitasāyitaphuṭṭhavaseneva etāni ārammaṇāni āpāthamāgacchantīti veditabbāni.
atk-abh01a0:993_0: Idāni pakatiyā diṭṭhādīnaṃ vasena āpāthagamane ayamaparopi aṭṭhakathāmuttako nayo hoti.
atk-abh01a0:993_1: Diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ ubhayasambandhanti ime tāva diṭṭhādayo veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:993_5: Iti imesampi diṭṭhādīnaṃ vasena etāni manodvāre āpāthamāgacchantīti veditabbāni.
atk-abh01a0:993_6: Tattha diṭṭhavasena tāva āpāthagamanaṃ heṭṭhā pañcahi nayehi vuttameva.
atk-abh01a0:994_3: kismiñci padese kesañci pupphānaṃ atimanuñño gandho,
atk-abh01a0:994_8: Athassa taṃ cittaṃ tasmiṃ rūpe vā sadde vā pasādavasena gandhādīsu ariyānaṃ dātukāmatāvasena aññehi dinnesu anumodanāvasena vā pavattati.
atk-abh01a0:995_0: Aparena pana yathāvuttāni rūpādīni diṭṭhāni vā sutāni vā honti.
atk-abh01a0:995_1: Tassa ‘īdisaṃ rūpaṃ āyatiṃ uppajjanakabuddhassāpi bhavissatī’tiādinā nayena cakkhupasādādighaṭṭanaṃ vinā
atk-abh01a0:995_3: Athassa heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva tesu aññatarārammaṇaṃ idaṃ mahācittaṃ pavattati.
atk-abh01a0:996_1: Saddhāruciākāraparivitakkadiṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiādīnaṃ pana vasena vitthārato etesaṃ manodvāre āpāthagamanaṃ veditabbameva.
atk-abh01a0:996_2: Yasmā pana evaṃ āpāthaṃ āgacchantāni bhūtānipi honti abhūtānipi,
atk-abh01a0:996_3: tasmā ayaṃ nayo aṭṭhakathāyaṃ na gahito.
atk-abh01a0:996_4: Evaṃ ekekārammaṇaṃ javanaṃ dvīsu dvīsu dvāresu uppajjatīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:997_0: Tattha manodvāre uppajjamānaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ javanaṃ dānamayaṃ sīlamayaṃ bhāvanāmayanti tividhaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:997_1: Tesu ekekaṃ kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ manokammanti tividhameva hoti.
atk-abh01a0:998_0: Tattha rūpaṃ tāva ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppajjamānaṃ etaṃ mahākusalacittaṃ nīlapītalohitodātavaṇṇesu pupphavatthadhātūsu
atk-abh01a0:998_1: aññataraṃ subhanimittasaṅkhātaṃ iṭṭhaṃ kantaṃ manāpaṃ rajanīyaṃ vaṇṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:998_3: Kathaṃ etaṃ cittaṃ kusalaṃ nāma jātanti?
atk-abh01a0:998_5: Yassa hi ‘kusalameva mayā kattabba’nti kusalakaraṇe cittaṃ niyamitaṃ hoti,
atk-abh01a0:998_8: patirūpadesavāsasappurisūpanissayasaddhammasavanapubbekatapuññatādīhi ca upanissayehi yoniso ca ābhogo pavattati,
atk-abh01a0:998_9: tassa iminā niyamitavasena pariṇāmitavasena samudācāravasena ābhujitavasena ca kusalaṃ nāma jātaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:999_3: Assaddhānañhi micchādiṭṭhīnañca ekantaiṭṭhārammaṇabhūtaṃ tathāgatarūpampi disvā somanassaṃ nuppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:999_4: Ye ca kusalappavattiyaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ na passanti tesaṃ parehi ussāhitānaṃ kusalaṃ karontānampi somanassaṃ nuppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:999_8: buddhānussati dhammānussati saṅghānussati sīlānussati cāgānussati devatānussati upasamānussati lūkhapuggalaparivajjanatā
atk-abh01a0:999_11: Imesaṃ pana vitthāro bojjhaṅgavibhaṅge āvi bhavissati.
atk-abh01a0:1000_3: kilesadūrībhāvatoti imehi panettha kāraṇehi ñāṇasampayuttatā veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1000_4: Yo hi paresaṃ dhammaṃ deseti anavajjāni sippāyatanakammāyatanavijjāṭṭhānāni sikkhāpeti dhammakathikaṃ sakkāraṃ katvā dhammaṃ kathāpeti,
atk-abh01a0:1000_5: ‘āyatiṃ paññavā bhavissāmī’ti patthanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nānappakāraṃ dānaṃ deti,
atk-abh01a0:1000_6: tassa evarūpaṃ kammaṃ upanissāya kusalaṃ uppajjamānaṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ uppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:1000_7: Abyāpajje loke uppannassa vāpi “tassa tattha sukhino dhammapadā pilavanti… dandho,
atk-abh01a0:1000_10: atha so satto khippaṃyeva visesagāmī hotī”ti iminā nayena upapattiṃ nissāyapi uppajjamānaṃ kusalaṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ uppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:1000_11: Tathā indriyaparipākaṃ upagatānaṃ paññādasakappattānaṃ indriyaparipākaṃ nissāyapi kusalaṃ uppajjamānaṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ uppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:1000_12: Yehi pana kilesā vikkhambhitā tesaṃ kilesadūrībhāvaṃ nissāyapi uppajjamānaṃ kusalaṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ uppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:1002_0: Evaṃ kammato upapattito indriyaparipākato kilesadūrībhāvatoti imehi kāraṇehi ñāṇasampayuttatā veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1003_0: Apica satta dhammā dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti –
atk-abh01a0:1003_9: Imesaṃ pana vitthāro bojjhaṅgavibhaṅge āvi bhavissati.
atk-abh01a0:1004_0: Evaṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ hutvā uppannañcetaṃ asaṅkhārena appayogena anupāyacintanāya uppannattā asaṅkhāraṃ nāma jātaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1004_1: Tayidaṃ rajanīyavaṇṇārammaṇaṃ hutvā uppajjamānameva tividhena niyamena uppajjati –
atk-abh01a0:1005_1: Yadā hi nīlapītalohitodātesu pupphādīsu aññataraṃ labhitvā vaṇṇavasena ābhujitvā ‘vaṇṇadānaṃ mayha’nti buddharatanādīni pūjeti,
atk-abh01a0:1005_4: bhaṇḍāgārikasaṅghamitto kira ekaṃ suvaṇṇakhacitaṃ vatthaṃ labhitvā idampi vatthaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1005_9: Yadā pana tathārūpameva deyyadhammaṃ labhitvā ‘mayhaṃ kulavaṃso,
atk-abh01a0:1005_11: kulavattaṃ eta’nti buddharatanādīni pūjeti tadā sīlamayaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1005_12: Yadā pana tādiseneva vatthunā ratanattayassa pūjaṃ katvā ‘ayaṃ vaṇṇo khayaṃ gacchissati,
atk-abh01a0:1006_0: Dānamayaṃ pana hutvā vattamānampi yadā tīṇi ratanāni sahatthena pūjentassa pavattatti,
atk-abh01a0:1006_2: Yadā tīṇi ratanāni pūjento puttadāradāsakammakaraporisādayopi āṇāpetvā pūjāpeti tadā vacīkammaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1006_3: Yadā tadeva vuttappakāraṃ vijjamānakavatthuṃ ārabbha vaṇṇadānaṃ dassāmīti cinteti tadā manokammaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1006_4: Vinayapariyāyaṃ patvā hi ‘dassāmi karissāmī’ti vācā bhinnā hotīti iminā lakkhaṇena dānaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1006_5: Abhidhammapariyāyaṃ patvā pana vijjamānakavatthuṃ ārabbha ‘dassāmī’ti manasā cintitakālato paṭṭhāya kusalaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1006_6: Aparabhāge kāyena vā vācāya vā kattabbaṃ karissatīti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1007_0: Yadā pana taṃ vuttappakāraṃ vatthuṃ labhitvā kulavaṃsādivasena sahatthā ratanattayaṃ pūjeti tadā sīlamayaṃ kāyakammaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1007_1: Yadā kulavaṃsādivaseneva puttadārādayo āṇāpetvā pūjāpeti tadā vacīkammaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1007_4: kulavattameta’nti vijjamānakavatthuṃ ārabbha ‘vaṇṇadānaṃ dassāmī’ti cinteti tadā manokammaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1008_0: Yadā pana taṃ vuttappakāraṃ vatthuṃ labhitvā tīṇi ratanāni pūjetvā caṅkamanto khayavayaṃ paṭṭhapeti tadā bhāvanāmayaṃ kāyakammaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1008_2: kāyaṅgavācaṅgāni acopetvā manasāva sammasanaṃ paṭṭhapentassa manokammaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1008_4: Evametaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ kusalaṃ tividhapuññakiriyavatthuvasena navahi kammadvārehi bhājetvā dassesi dhammarājā.
atk-abh01a0:1009_0: Bherisaddādīsu hi rajanīyasaddaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva tīhi niyamehetaṃ kusalaṃ uppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:1009_1: Tattha saddaṃ kandamūlaṃ viya uppāṭetvā nīluppalahatthakaṃ viya ca hatthe ṭhapetvā dātuṃ nāma na sakkā,
atk-abh01a0:1009_2: savatthukaṃ pana katvā dento saddadānaṃ deti nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1009_3: Tasmā yadā ‘saddadānaṃ dassāmī’ti bherimudiṅgādīsu aññataratūriyena tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ upahāraṃ karoti,
atk-abh01a0:1009_11: Yadā etadeva vidhānaṃ kulavaṃsādivasena vattavasena karoti tadā sīlamayaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1009_12: Yadā sabbampetaṃ katvā ayaṃ ettako saddo brahmalokappamāṇopi hutvā ‘khayaṃ gamissati,
atk-abh01a0:1009_13: vayaṃ gamissatī’ti sammasanaṃ paṭṭhapeti tadā bhāvanāmayaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1010_0: Tattha dānamayaṃ tāva yadā bheriādīni gahetvā sahatthā upahāraṃ karoti,
atk-abh01a0:1010_6: amhākaṃ saddadānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ upahāraṃ karothā’ti āṇāpeti,
atk-abh01a0:1010_13: Yadā kāyaṅgavācaṅgāni acopetvā ‘saddadānaṃ dassāmī’ti vijjamānakavatthuṃ manasā pariccajati,
atk-abh01a0:1011_0: Sīlamayampi ‘saddadānaṃ nāma mayhaṃ kulavaṃso kulatanti kulappaveṇī’ti bheriādīhi sahatthā upahāraṃ karontassa,
atk-abh01a0:1011_6: buddharatanādīnaṃ upahāraṃ karothā’ti āṇāpentassa kulavaṃsavaseneva attanā dhammakathaṃ vā sarabhaññaṃ vā karontassa ca vacīkammaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1011_7: ‘Saddadānaṃ nāma mayhaṃ kulavaṃso saddadānaṃ dassāmī’ti kāyaṅgavācaṅgāni acopetvā manasāva vijjamānakavatthuṃ pariccajantassa manokammaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1012_0: Bhāvanāmayampi yadā caṅkamanto sadde khayavayaṃ paṭṭhapeti tadā kāyakammaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1012_1: Kāyaṅgaṃ pana acopetvā vācāya sammasantassa vacīkammaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1012_2: Kāyaṅgavācaṅgaṃ acopetvā manasāva saddāyatanaṃ sammasantassa manokammaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1012_3: Evaṃ saddārammaṇampi kusalaṃ tividhapuññakiriyavatthuvasena navahi kammadvārehi bhājetvā dassesi dhammarājā.
atk-abh01a0:1013_0: Mūlagandhādīsupi rajanīyagandhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva tīhi niyamehetaṃ kusalaṃ uppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:1013_1: Tattha yadā mūlagandhādīsu yaṃkiñci gandhaṃ labhitvā gandhavasena ābhujitvā ‘gandhadānaṃ mayha’nti buddharatanādīni pūjeti,
atk-abh01a0:1013_2: tadā dānamayaṃ hotīti sabbaṃ vaṇṇadāne vuttanayeneva vitthārato veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1013_3: Evaṃ gandhārammaṇampi kusalaṃ tividhapuññakiriyavatthuvasena navahi kammadvārehi bhājetvā dassesi dhammarājā.
atk-abh01a0:1014_0: Mūlarasādīsu pana rajanīyarasaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva tīhi niyamehetaṃ kusalaṃ uppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:1014_1: Tattha yadā mūlarasādīsu yaṃkiñci rajanīyaṃ rasavatthuṃ labhitvā rasavasena ābhujitvā ‘rasadānaṃ mayha’nti deti pariccajati,
atk-abh01a0:1014_2: tadā dānamayaṃ hotīti sabbaṃ vaṇṇadāne vuttanayeneva vitthārato veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1014_3: Sīlamaye panettha ‘saṅghassa adatvā paribhuñjanaṃ nāma amhākaṃ na āciṇṇa’nti dvādasannaṃ bhikkhusahassānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1014_4: dāpetvā sādurasaṃ paribhuttassa duṭṭhagāmaṇiabhayarañño vatthuṃ ādiṃ katvā mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vatthūni āgatāni.
atk-abh01a0:1014_6: Evaṃ rasārammaṇampi kusalaṃ tividhapuññakiriyavatthuvasena navahi kammadvārehi bhājetvā dassesi dhammarājā.
atk-abh01a0:1015_0: Phoṭṭhabbārammaṇepi pathavīdhātu tejodhātu vāyodhātūti tīṇi mahābhūtāni phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1015_1: Imasmiṃ ṭhāne etesaṃ vasena yojanaṃ akatvā mañcapīṭhādivasena kātabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1015_2: Yadā hi mañcapīṭhādīsu yaṃkiñci rajanīyaṃ phoṭṭhabbavatthuṃ labhitvā phoṭṭhabbavasena ābhujitvā ‘phoṭṭhabbadānaṃ mayha’nti deti pariccajati,
atk-abh01a0:1015_3: tadā dānamayaṃ hotīti sabbaṃ vaṇṇadāne vuttanayeneva vitthārato veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1015_4: Evaṃ phoṭṭhabbārammaṇampi kusalaṃ tividhapuññakiriyavatthuvasena navahi kammadvārehi bhājetvā dassesi dhammarājā.
atk-abh01a0:1016_7: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne etesaṃ vasena yojanaṃ akatvā ojadānapānadānajīvitadānavasena kātabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1016_8: Ojādīsu hi rajanīyaṃ dhammārammaṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva tīhi niyamehetaṃ kusalaṃ uppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:1017_10: aññānipi jīvitaparittāṇatthaṃ evarūpāni kammāni karoti tadā dānamayaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1017_11: Yadā pana ‘ojadānapānadānajīvitadānāni mayhaṃ kulavaṃso kulatanti kulappaveṇī’ti vattasīsena ojadānādīni pavatteti tadā sīlamayaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1017_12: Yadā dhammārammaṇasmiṃ khayavayaṃ paṭṭhapeti tadā bhāvanāmayaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1018_0: Dānamayaṃ pana hutvā pavattamānampi yadā ojadānapānadānajīvitadānāni sahatthā deti,
atk-abh01a0:1018_4: Yadā kāyaṅgavācaṅgāni acopetvā ojadānapānadānajīvitadānavasena vijjamānakavatthuṃ ‘dassāmī’ti manasā cinteti,
atk-abh01a0:1019_0: Yadā pana vuttappakāraṃ vijjamānakavatthuṃ kulavaṃsādivasena sahatthā deti,
atk-abh01a0:1019_4: Yadā kulavaṃsādivaseneva vuttappakāraṃ vijjamānakavatthuṃ ‘dassāmī’ti manasāva cinteti,
atk-abh01a0:1020_0: Caṅkamitvā dhammārammaṇe khayavayaṃ paṭṭhapentassa pana bhāvanāmayaṃ kāyakammaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1020_1: Kāyaṅgaṃ acopetvā vācāya khayavayaṃ paṭṭhapentassa vacīkammaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1020_2: Kāyaṅgavācaṅgāni acopetvā manasāva dhammārammaṇe khayavayaṃ paṭṭhapentassa manokammaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1020_4: Evametaṃ dhammārammaṇampi kusalaṃ tividhapuññakiriyavatthuvasena navahi kammadvārehi bhājetvā dassesi dhammarājā.
atk-abh01a0:1021_1: Idaṃ pana ekavatthusmimpi nānārammaṇavasena labbhatiyeva. Kathaṃ?
atk-abh01a0:1021_2: Catūsu hi paccayesu cīvare cha ārammaṇāni labbhanti –
atk-abh01a0:1021_3: navarattassa hi cīvarassa vaṇṇo manāpo hoti dassanīyo,
atk-abh01a0:1021_15: Evaṃ catūsu paccayesu nānārammaṇavasena yojanaṃ katvā dānamayādibhedo veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1025_0: Imassa panatthassa pakāsanatthaṃ imasmiṃ ṭhāne mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ dvārakathā kathitā.
atk-abh01a0:1026_0: Tattha kiñcāpi tīṇi kammāni paṭhamaṃ vuttāni,
atk-abh01a0:1026_1: tāni pana ṭhapetvā ādito tāva tīṇi kammadvārāni bhājetvā dassitāni.
atk-abh01a0:1027_6: kammasamuṭṭhānāneva catasso dhātuyo vaṇṇo gandho raso ojāti aṭṭha upādinnakakāyo nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1028_0: Tesu kāyakammadvāranti neva upādinnakakāyassa nāmaṃ na itaresaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1028_1: Cittasamuṭṭhānesu pana aṭṭhasu rūpesu ekā viññatti atthi,
atk-abh01a0:1028_14: ‘Abhikkamissāmi paṭikkamissāmī’ti hi cittaṃ uppajjamānaṃ rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
atk-abh01a0:1028_15: Tattha yā pathavīdhātu āpodhātu tejodhātu vāyodhātu tannissito vaṇṇo gandho raso ojāti imesaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1028_17: sā attanā sahajātaṃ rūpakāyaṃ santhambheti sandhāreti cāleti abhikkamāpeti paṭikkamāpeti.
atk-abh01a0:1029_0: Tattha ekāvajjanavīthiyaṃ sattasu javanesu paṭhamacittasamuṭṭhitā vāyodhātu attanā sahajātaṃ rūpakāyaṃ santhambhetuṃ sandhāretuṃ sakkoti,
atk-abh01a0:1029_3: Sattamacittena pana samuṭṭhitā vāyodhātu heṭṭhā chahi cittehi samuṭṭhitaṃ vāyodhātuṃ upatthambhanapaccayaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1029_4: labhitvā attanā sahajātaṃ rūpakāyaṃ santhambhetuṃ sandhāretuṃ cāletuṃ abhikkamāpetuṃ paṭikkamāpetuṃ ālokāpetuṃ
atk-abh01a0:1030_0: Yathā hi sattahi yugehi ākaḍḍhitabbe sakaṭe paṭhamayuge yuttagoṇā yugaṃ tāva santhambhetuṃ sandhāretuṃ sakkonti,
atk-abh01a0:1030_3: sattamayuge pana goṇe yojetvā yadā cheko sārathi dhure nisīditvā yottāni ādāya sabbapurimato paṭṭhāya patodalaṭṭhiyā goṇe ākoṭeti,
atk-abh01a0:1030_4: tadā sabbeva ekabalā hutvā dhurañca sandhārenti cakkāni ca pavaṭṭenti.
atk-abh01a0:1030_5: ‘Sakaṭaṃ gahetvā dasayojanaṃ vīsatiyojanaṃ gatā’ti vattabbataṃ āpādenti –
atk-abh01a0:1031_0: Tattha yo cittasamuṭṭhānikakāyo na so viññatti,
atk-abh01a0:1031_1: cittasamuṭṭhānāya pana vāyodhātuyā sahajātaṃ rūpakāyaṃ santhambhetuṃ sandhāretuṃ cāletuṃ paccayo bhavituṃ samattho eko ākāravikāro atthi,
atk-abh01a0:1031_3: Sā aṭṭha rūpāni viya na cittasamuṭṭhānā.
atk-abh01a0:1031_8: evaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ viññattitāya sāpi cittasamuṭṭhānā nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1032_3: Cakkhupathasmiñhi ṭhito hatthaṃ vā pādaṃ vā ukkhipati,
atk-abh01a0:1032_6: Viññatti pana na cakkhuviññeyyā manoviññeyyā eva.
atk-abh01a0:1032_7: Cakkhunā hi hatthavikārādivasena vipphandamānaṃ vaṇṇārammaṇameva passati.
atk-abh01a0:1032_8: Viññattiṃ pana manodvārikacittena cintetvā ‘idañcidañca esa kāreti maññe’ti jānāti.
atk-abh01a0:1033_0: Yathā hi araññe nidāghasamaye udakaṭṭhāne manussā ‘imāya saññāya idha udakassa atthibhāvaṃ jānissantī’ti rukkhagge tālapaṇṇādīni bandhāpenti,
atk-abh01a0:1033_2: uccaṃ vā pana rukkhaṃ vāto paharitvā cāleti,
atk-abh01a0:1033_3: antoudake macche calante upari bubbuḷakāni uṭṭhahanti,
atk-abh01a0:1033_5: Tattha tālapaṇṇadhajasākhācalanabubbuḷakatiṇapaṇṇakasaṭe disvā yathā cakkhunā adiṭṭhampi ‘ettha udakaṃ bhavissati,
atk-abh01a0:1033_9: ettakaṃ ṭhānaṃ ajjhottharitvā ogho gato bhavissatī’ti manoviññāṇena jānāti,
atk-abh01a0:1033_11: Cakkhunā hi hatthavikārādivasena vipphandamānaṃ vaṇṇārammaṇameva passati.
atk-abh01a0:1033_12: Viññattiṃ pana manodvārikacittena cintetvā ‘idañcidañca esa kāreti maññe’ti jānāti.
atk-abh01a0:1034_2: Ayañhi paresaṃ antamaso tiracchānagatānampi pākaṭā hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1034_3: Tattha tattha sannipatitā hi soṇasiṅgālakākagoṇādayo daṇḍaṃ vā leḍḍuṃ vā gahetvā paharaṇākāre dassite
atk-abh01a0:1034_4: ‘ayaṃ no paharitukāmo’ti ñatvā yena vā tena vā palāyanti.
atk-abh01a0:1034_6: Kiñcāpi tasmiṃ khaṇe apākaṭā sammukhībhūtānaṃ pana pākaṭattā viññattiyeva nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1035_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānike pana kāye calante tisamuṭṭhāniko calati na calatīti?
atk-abh01a0:1035_3: Yathā hi udake gacchante udake patitāni sukkhadaṇḍakatiṇapaṇṇādīnipi udakagatikāneva bhavanti,
atk-abh01a0:1035_7: Evamesā cittasamuṭṭhānesu rūpesu viññatti kāyakammadvāraṃ nāmāti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1036_0: Yā pana tasmiṃ dvāre siddhā cetanā yāya pāṇaṃ hanati,
atk-abh01a0:1036_6: tamhi dvāre siddhā cetanā kāyakammaṃ ‘kusalaṃ vā akusalaṃ vā’ti ṭhapetabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1036_7: Paravādimhi pana asati ‘abyākataṃ vā’ti tikaṃ pūretvāva ṭhapetabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1036_10: tena tena pana dvārena mahājano sañcarati,
atk-abh01a0:1036_12: kammaṃ pana tasmiṃ tasmiṃ dvāre uppajjanato carati.
atk-abh01a0:1037_0: Dvāre caranti kammāni, na dvārā dvāracārino;
atk-abh01a0:1039_2: Yathā hi viññāṇādīnaṃ uppajjanaṭṭhānāni viññāṇadvāraṃ phassadvāraṃ asaṃvaradvāraṃ saṃvaradvāranti nāmaṃ labhanti,
atk-abh01a0:1039_3: evaṃ kāyakammassa uppajjanaṭṭhānaṃ kāyakammadvāranti nāmaṃ labhati.
atk-abh01a0:1039_5: Yathā pana tasmiṃ tasmiṃ rukkhe adhivatthā devatā simbalidevatā palāsadevatā pucimandadevatā phandanadevatāti tena tena rukkhena nāmaṃ labhati,
atk-abh01a0:1039_6: evameva kāyadvārena kataṃ kammampi kāyakammanti dvārena nāmaṃ labhati.
atk-abh01a0:1039_10: kāyena pana katattā taṃ kāyakammanti vuccati.
atk-abh01a0:1040_0: Kāyena ce kataṃ kammaṃ, kāyakammanti vuccati;
atk-abh01a0:1042_0: Sūciyā ce kataṃ kammaṃ, sūcikammanti vuccati;
atk-abh01a0:1044_0: Vāsiyā ce kataṃ kammaṃ, vāsikammanti vuccati;
atk-abh01a0:1046_0: Purisena ce kataṃ kammaṃ, purisakammanti vuccati;
atk-abh01a0:1049_0: Kāyena ce kataṃ kammaṃ, kāyakammanti vuccati;
atk-abh01a0:1051_2: Kāyaviññattiyañhi “dvāre caranti kammānī”ti vacanato vacīkammampi pavattati,
atk-abh01a0:1051_8: Kāyakammameva hi yebhuyyena kāyaviññattiyaṃ pavattati na itarāni,
atk-abh01a0:1051_9: tasmā kāyakammassa yebhuyyena pavattito tassā kāyakammadvārabhāvo siddho.
atk-abh01a0:1051_11: Kāyakammaṃ pana kāyadvāramhiyeva bahulaṃ pavattati appaṃ vacīdvāre.
atk-abh01a0:1051_12: Tasmā kāyadvāre bahulaṃ pavattito etassa kāyakammabhāvo siddho,
atk-abh01a0:1054_0: Vacīkammadvārakathāyaṃ pana cetanāviratisaddavasena tividhā vācā nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1054_3: aṅgehi samannāgatā vācā subhāsitā hoti no dubbhāsitā,
atk-abh01a0:1054_9: “Vācā girā byappatho udīraṇaṃ ghoso ghosakammaṃ vācā vacībhedo”ti,
atk-abh01a0:1054_11: Tāsu vacīkammadvāranti neva cetanāya nāmaṃ na viratiyā.
atk-abh01a0:1054_16: Yā kusalacittassa vā akusalacittassa vā abyākatacittassa vā vācā girā byappatho udīraṇaṃ ghoso ghosakammaṃ vācā vacībhedo,
atk-abh01a0:1054_18: Yā tāya vācāya viññatti viññāpanā viññāpitattaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1055_0: ‘Idaṃ vakkhāmi etaṃ vakkhāmī’ti hi vitakkayato vitakkavipphārasaddo nāma uppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:1055_1: Ayaṃ na sotaviññeyyo manoviññeyyoti mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgato.
atk-abh01a0:1055_2: Āgamaṭṭhakathāsu pana ‘vitakkavipphārasadda’nti vitakkavipphāravasena uppannaṃ vippalapantānaṃ suttappamattādīnaṃ saddaṃ;
atk-abh01a0:1055_4: yaṃ vitakkayato tassa so saddo uppanno;
atk-abh01a0:1055_6: itthampi te mano’ti ādisatīti vatvā vatthūnipi kathitāni.
atk-abh01a0:1055_7: Paṭṭhānepi “cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ saddāyatanaṃ sotaviññāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti āgataṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1055_8: Tasmā vinā viññattighaṭṭanāya uppajjamāno asotaviññeyyo vitakkavipphārasaddo nāma natthi.
atk-abh01a0:1055_9: ‘Idaṃ vakkhāmi etaṃ vakkhāmī’ti uppajjamānaṃ pana cittaṃ pathavīdhātu āpodhātu tejodhātu vāyodhātu vaṇṇo gandho raso ojāti aṭṭha rūpāni samuṭṭhāpeti.
atk-abh01a0:1055_10: Tesaṃ abbhantare cittasamuṭṭhānā pathavīdhātu upādinnakaṃ ghaṭṭayamānāva uppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:1055_14: Tassā pana cittasamuṭṭhānāya pathavīdhātuyā upādinnakaghaṭṭanassa paccayabhūto eko ākāravikāro atthi,
atk-abh01a0:1055_16: Ito paraṃ sā aṭṭha rūpāni viya na cittasamuṭṭhānātiādi sabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1056_1: mittā’ti pakkosantassa saddaṃ sutvā viññattiṃ manodvārikacittena cintetvā ‘idañcidañca esa kāreti maññe’ti jānāti.
atk-abh01a0:1056_2: Kāyaviññatti viya ca ayampi tiracchānagatānampi pākaṭā hoti. ‘Ehi,
atk-abh01a0:1056_3: yāhī’ti hi saddaṃ sutvā tiracchānagatāpi ‘idaṃ nāmesa kāreti maññe’ti ñatvā āgacchanti ceva gacchanti ca.
atk-abh01a0:1056_5: ayaṃ pana vāro idha na labbhati.
atk-abh01a0:1056_7: Yā pana tasmiṃ vacīdvāre siddhā cetanā,
atk-abh01a0:1056_14: Ito paraṃ sabbaṃ kammavavatthānañca dvāravavatthānañca heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
atk-abh01a0:1059_0: Manokammadvārakathāyaṃ pana kāmāvacarādivasena catubbidho mano mano nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1059_5: Tattha ayaṃ nāma mano manodvāraṃ na hotīti na vattabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1059_6: Yathā hi ayaṃ nāma cetanā kammaṃ na hotīti na vattabbā,
atk-abh01a0:1059_7: antamaso pañcaviññāṇasampayuttāpi hi cetanā mahāpakaraṇe kammantveva niddiṭṭhā,
atk-abh01a0:1059_8: evameva ayaṃ nāma mano manodvāraṃ na hotīti na vattabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1060_10: Sāpi hi sahajāte sampayuttakkhandhe āyūhati abhisaṅkharoti piṇḍaṃ karoti ceteti kappeti pakappetīti.
atk-abh01a0:1060_15: Yā pana tasmiṃ manodvāre siddhā cetanā yāya abhijjhābyāpādamicchādassanāni ceva anabhijjhāabyāpādasammādassanāni ca gaṇhāti,
atk-abh01a0:1060_17: Ito paraṃ sabbaṃ kammavavatthānañca dvāravavatthānañca heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
atk-abh01a0:1063_0: Idāni yāni tīṇi kammāni ṭhapetvā imāni kammadvārāni dassitāni,
atk-abh01a0:1063_1: tāni ādiṃ katvā avasesassa dvārakathāya mātikāṭhapanassa vitthārakathā hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1064_3: cetayitvā kammaṃ karoti kāyena vācāya manasā”.
atk-abh01a0:1064_7: sati vacīsañcetanāhetu uppajjati ajjhattaṃ sukhadukkhaṃ; mane vā, ānanda,
atk-abh01a0:1064_16: manosañcetanā akusalaṃ manokammaṃ dukkhudrayaṃ dukkhavipākaṃ tividhā,
atk-abh01a0:1064_18: kāyasañcetanā kusalaṃ kāyakammaṃ sukhudrayaṃ sukhavipākaṃ catubbidhā,
atk-abh01a0:1064_24: samiddhi moghapuriso pāṭaliputtassa paribbājakassa evaṃ puṭṭho evaṃ byākareyya –
atk-abh01a0:1064_31: samiddhi moghapuriso pāṭaliputtassa paribbājakassa sammā byākaramāno byākareyyā”ti.
atk-abh01a0:1066_2: kammāni mayā sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā paveditāni.
atk-abh01a0:1066_11: kammaṃ akaṇhaṃ asukkaṃ akaṇhaasukkavipākaṃ kammakkhayāya saṃvattati.…
atk-abh01a0:1066_14: kammaṃ akaṇhaṃ asukkaṃ akaṇhaasukkavipākaṃ kammakkhayāya saṃvattati?
atk-abh01a0:1066_20: kammaṃ akaṇhaṃ asukkaṃ akaṇhaasukkavipākaṃ kammakkhayāya saṃvattati.…
atk-abh01a0:1066_23: kammaṃ akaṇhaṃ asukkaṃ akaṇhaasukkavipākaṃ kammakkhayāya saṃvattati?
atk-abh01a0:1066_30: kammaṃ akaṇhaṃ asukkaṃ akaṇhaasukkavipākaṃ kammakkhayāya saṃvattatī”ti.
atk-abh01a0:1067_0: Evaṃ ime bojjhaṅgamaggaṅgappabhedato pannarasa dhammā kammacatukkena dīpitā. Abhijjhā, byāpādo,
atk-abh01a0:1067_3: sammādiṭṭhīti imehi pana chahi saddhiṃ ekavīsati cetanāsampayuttakā dhammā veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1068_0: Tattha lokuttaramaggo bhajāpiyamāno kāyakammādīni tīṇi kammāni bhajati.
atk-abh01a0:1068_7: Etasmiṃ dvaye gahite sammāājīvo tappakkhikattā gahitova hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1068_12: Evaṃ lokuttaramaggo bhajāpiyamāno tīṇi kammāni bhajati.
atk-abh01a0:1069_1: Kāyavacīdvāresu hi copanaṃ patvā kammapathaṃ appattampi atthi,
atk-abh01a0:1069_2: manodvāre ca samudācāraṃ patvā kammapathaṃ appattampi atthi;
atk-abh01a0:1070_7: So araññe divasaṃ caritvā antamaso sasabiḷāramattampi na labhati,
atk-abh01a0:1070_8: idaṃ akusalaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma hoti na hotīti? Na hoti. Kasmā?
atk-abh01a0:1070_10: Kevalaṃ pana kāyaduccaritaṃ nāma hotīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1071_0: Vacīdvārepi ‘migavaṃ gamissāmi’ ‘vegena dhanuādīni sajjethā’ti āṇāpetvā purimanayeneva araññe kiñci alabhantassa kiñcāpi vacīdvāre copanaṃ pattaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1071_1: kammapathaṃ appattatāya pana kāyakammaṃ na hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1072_0: Manodvāre pana vadhakacetanāya uppannamattāya eva kammapathabhedova hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1072_1: So ca kho byāpādavasena na pāṇātipātavasena.
atk-abh01a0:1072_5: Akusalaṃ manokammaṃ pana tīsupi dvāresu samuṭṭhāti;
atk-abh01a0:1073_1: Sahatthā hi pāṇaṃ hanantassa adinnaṃ ādiyantassa micchācāraṃ carantassa kammaṃ kāyakammameva hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1073_3: Evaṃ tāva akusalaṃ kāyakammaṃ kāyadvāre samuṭṭhāti.
atk-abh01a0:1073_4: Tehi pana cittehi sahajātā abhijjhābyāpādamicchādiṭṭhiyo cetanāpakkhikā vā bhavanti,
atk-abh01a0:1073_7: itthannāmaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ avaharā’ti āṇāpentassa pana kammaṃ kāyakammaṃ hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1073_10: Tehi pana cittehi sahajātā abhijjhābyāpādamicchādiṭṭhiyo cetanāpakkhikā vā bhavanti abbohārikā vā.
atk-abh01a0:1074_2: So ‘tayo saṅgahe āruḷhaṃ suttaṃ āharāhī’ti vutto idaṃ kulumbasuttaṃ nāma āhari –
atk-abh01a0:1075_2: idhekacco samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā iddhimā cetovasippatto aññissā kucchigataṃ gabbhaṃ pāpakena manasā anupekkhako hoti –
atk-abh01a0:1075_3: ‘aho vatāyaṃ kucchigato gabbho na sotthinā abhinikkhameyyā’ti. Evaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1076_1: ‘evaṃ cintitamatteyeva manasā kucchigato gabbho pheṇapiṇḍo viya vilīyati.
atk-abh01a0:1076_2: Ettha kuto kāyaṅgacopanaṃ vā vācaṅgacopanaṃ vā?
atk-abh01a0:1076_3: Manodvārasmiṃyeva pana idaṃ akusalaṃ kāyakammaṃ samuṭṭhātī’ti.
atk-abh01a0:1077_0: Tamenaṃ ‘tava suttassa atthaṃ tulayissāmā’ti vatvā evaṃ tulayiṃsu –
atk-abh01a0:1077_12: tattha tattha sammāpayogapaccayā ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhīti dasavidhā.
atk-abh01a0:1077_17: vadanti yathā hi paraṃ paharitukāmena udakabharite ghaṭe khitte ghaṭopi bhijjati,
atk-abh01a0:1077_21: Atha naṃ ‘bhāvanāmayiddhiyā neva ekavāraṃ na dve vāre parūpaghātakammaṃ hotī’ti vatvā taṃ saññattiṃ āgacchantaṃ pucchiṃsu –
atk-abh01a0:1078_0: Imaṃ pana pañhaṃ yo jānāti so evaṃ vakkhati –
atk-abh01a0:1078_12: ‘Evaṃ sante tava pañho neva kusalattikena sameti,
atk-abh01a0:1079_3: “Iddhimā cetovasippatto”ti ettha hi neva bhāvanāmayiddhi adhippetā,
atk-abh01a0:1079_6: Sā pana kāyavacīdvārāni muñcitvā kātuṃ na sakkā.
atk-abh01a0:1079_7: Āthabbaṇiddhikā hi sattāhaṃ aloṇakaṃ bhuñjitvā dabbe attharitvā pathaviyaṃ sayamānā tapaṃ caritvā sattame
atk-abh01a0:1079_8: divase susānabhūmiṃ sajjetvā sattame pade ṭhatvā hatthaṃ vaṭṭetvā vaṭṭetvā mukhena vijjaṃ parijappanti.
atk-abh01a0:1079_10: Evaṃ ayampi iddhi kāyavacīdvārāni muñcitvā kātuṃ na sakkāti.
atk-abh01a0:1080_0: Hatthamuddāya pana musāvādādīni kathentassa kammaṃ vacīkammaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1080_3: Tehi pana cittehi sahajātā abhijjhābyāpādamicchādiṭṭhiyo cetanāpakkhikā vā bhavanti,
atk-abh01a0:1080_5: Vacībhedaṃ pana katvā musāvādādīni kathentassa kammampi vacīkammaṃ dvārampi vacīdvārameva.
atk-abh01a0:1080_7: Tehi pana cittehi sahajātā abhijjhābyāpādamicchādiṭṭhiyo cetanāpakkhikā vā bhavanti abbohārikā vā.
atk-abh01a0:1081_2: So ‘tayo saṅgahe āruḷhaṃ suttaṃ āharāhī’ti vutto idaṃ uposathakkhandhakato suttaṃ āhari –
atk-abh01a0:1082_0: “Yo pana bhikkhu yāvatatiyaṃ anussāviyamāne saramāno santiṃ āpattiṃ nāvikareyya sampajānamusāvādassa hotī”ti.
atk-abh01a0:1083_1: ‘evaṃ āpattiṃ anāvikaronto tuṇhībhūtova aññaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati,
atk-abh01a0:1083_2: ettha kuto kāyaṅgacopanaṃ vā vācaṅgacopanaṃ vā?
atk-abh01a0:1083_3: Manodvārasmiṃyeva pana idaṃ akusalaṃ vacīkammaṃ samuṭṭhātī’ti.
atk-abh01a0:1084_9: sammāsambuddhena hi sabbāpattiyo imesuyeva dvīsu dvāresu paññattā,
atk-abh01a0:1084_12: yo satthārā apaññatte ṭhāne āpattiṃ paññapesi,
atk-abh01a0:1084_14: jinacakkaṃ paharasī’tiādivacanehi niggaṇhitvā uttari pañhaṃ pucchitabbo –
atk-abh01a0:1084_19: Addhā hi kiriyaṃ apassanto vighātaṃ āpajjissati.
atk-abh01a0:1084_27: bhagavato pana vacanena vacīdvāre akiriyasamuṭṭhānā āpatti hotīti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1089_0: Evaṃ akusalaṃ vacīkammaṃ na manodvāre samuṭṭhātīti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1090_0: Yadā pana abhijjhāsahagatena cetasā kāyaṅgaṃ copento hatthaggāhādīni karoti,
atk-abh01a0:1091_0: Yadā pana abhijjhāsahagatena cetasā vācaṅgaṃ copento ‘aho vata yaṃ parassa,
atk-abh01a0:1092_0: Yadā pana kāyaṅgavācaṅgāni acopetvā raho nisinno abhijjhābyāpādamicchādiṭṭhisahagatāni cittāni uppādeti,
atk-abh01a0:1092_4: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne cetanāpi cetanāsampayuttakā dhammāpi manodvāreyeva samuṭṭhahanti.
atk-abh01a0:1092_5: Evaṃ akusalaṃ manokammaṃ tīsupi dvāresu samuṭṭhātīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1093_2: yadā hi kenaci kāraṇena vattuṃ asakkonto ‘pāṇātipātā adinnādānā kāmesumicchācārā paṭiviramāmī’ti imāni sikkhāpadāni hatthamuddāya gaṇhāti,
atk-abh01a0:1093_5: Tehi cittehi sahagatā anabhijjhādayo cetanāpakkhikā vā honti,
atk-abh01a0:1094_0: Yadā pana tāneva sikkhāpadāni vacībhedaṃ katvā gaṇhāti,
atk-abh01a0:1094_4: Tehi cittehi sahagatā anabhijjhādayo cetanāpakkhikā vā honti,
atk-abh01a0:1095_0: Yadā pana tesu sikkhāpadesu diyyamānesu kāyaṅgavācaṅgāni acopetvā manasāva ‘pāṇātipātā adinnādānā kāmesumicchācārā paṭiviramāmī’ti gaṇhāti,
atk-abh01a0:1095_4: Tehi cittehi sahagatā anabhijjhādayo cetanāpakkhikā vā honti,
atk-abh01a0:1096_0: ‘Musāvādā veramaṇī’ādīni pana cattāri sikkhāpadāni vuttanayeneva kāyādīhi gaṇhantassa kusalaṃ vacīkammaṃ tīsu dvāresu samuṭṭhātīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1097_0: Anabhijjhādisahagatehi pana cittehi kāyaṅgaṃ copetvā cetiyaṅgaṇasammajjanagandhamālādipūjanacetiyavandanādīni karontassa kammaṃ manokammaṃ hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1097_4: Anabhijjhāsahagatena cittena vācaṅgaṃ copetvā ‘aho vata yaṃ parassa vittūpakaraṇaṃ na taṃ mamassā’ti
atk-abh01a0:1097_5: anabhijjhāyato abyāpādasahagatena cittena ‘sabbe sattā averā abyābajjhā anīghā sukhī attānaṃ pariharantū’ti
atk-abh01a0:1097_6: vadantassa sammādiṭṭhisahagatena cittena ‘atthi dinna’ntiādīni udāharantassa kammaṃ manokammaṃ hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1097_10: Kāyaṅgavācaṅgāni pana acopetvā raho nisinnassa manasāva anabhijjhādisahagatāni cittāni uppādentassa kammaṃ manokammaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1097_13: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne cetanāpi cetanāsampayuttakā dhammāpi manodvāreyeva samuṭṭhahanti.
atk-abh01a0:1098_0: Tattha āṇattisamuṭṭhitesu pāṇātipātaadinnādānesu kammampi kāyakammaṃ dvārampi kammavaseneva kāyadvāranti vadanto kammaṃ rakkhati,
atk-abh01a0:1098_3: kammampi dvāravaseneva kāyakammanti vadanto dvāraṃ rakkhati kammaṃ bhindati nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1098_6: Yathāvutteneva pana nayena kammañca dvārañca veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1098_7: Evaṃ kathento hi neva kammaṃ na dvāraṃ bhindatīti.
atk-abh01a0:1100_0: Idāni ‘pañca viññāṇāni pañcaviññāṇadvārānī’tiādīsu cakkhuviññāṇaṃ sotaviññāṇaṃ ghānaviññāṇaṃ jivhāviññāṇaṃ kāyaviññāṇanti imāni pañca viññāṇāni nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1100_3: Imesaṃ pañcannaṃ dvārānaṃ vasena uppannā cetanā neva kāyakammaṃ hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1100_7: manosamphassoti ime pana cha samphassā nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1101_4: Te atthato ‘dussīlyaṃ muṭṭhassaccaṃ aññāṇaṃ akkhanti kosajja’nti ime pañca dhammā honti.
atk-abh01a0:1101_5: Tesu ekadhammopi pañcadvāre voṭṭhabbanapariyosānesu cittesu nuppajjati,
atk-abh01a0:1102_14: Yadā pana rūpādīsu aññatarārammaṇaṃ manodvārikajavanaṃ vinā vacīdvārena suddhaṃ kāyadvārasaṅkhātaṃ copanaṃ pāpayamānaṃ uppajjati,
atk-abh01a0:1102_15: tadā tena cittena sahajāto phasso manosamphasso nāma,
atk-abh01a0:1102_18: copanassa uppannattā manodvāranti saṅkhyaṃ na gacchati.
atk-abh01a0:1102_20: Yadā tādisaṃyeva javanaṃ vinā kāyadvārena suddhaṃ vacīdvārasaṅkhātaṃ copanaṃ pāpayamānaṃ uppajjati,
atk-abh01a0:1102_21: tadā tena cittena sahajāto phasso manosamphasso nāma,
atk-abh01a0:1102_24: copanassa uppannattā manodvāranti saṅkhyaṃ na gacchati.
atk-abh01a0:1102_26: Yadā pana tādisaṃ javanacittaṃ vinā kāyavacīdvārehi suddhaṃ manodvārameva hutvā uppajjati,
atk-abh01a0:1102_27: tadā tena cittena sahajāto phasso manosamphasso nāma,
atk-abh01a0:1102_31: Iti imesaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ asaṃvarānaṃ vasena cakkhuasaṃvaradvāraṃ, sota… ghāna… jivhā…
atk-abh01a0:1103_3: manosaṃvaroti ime pana aṭṭha saṃvarā nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1103_4: Te atthato ‘sīlaṃ sati ñāṇaṃ khanti vīriya’nti ime pañca dhammā honti.
atk-abh01a0:1103_5: Tesupi ekadhammopi pañcadvāre voṭṭhabbanapariyosānesu cittesu nuppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:1103_8: Tassa sabbassāpi cakkhuviññāṇasahajāto hi phasso cakkhusamphassotiādinā asaṃvare vuttanayeneva uppatti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1103_9: Iti imesaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ saṃvarānaṃ vasena cakkhusaṃvaradvāraṃ…pe…
atk-abh01a0:1105_6: micchādiṭṭhīti ime pana dasa akusalakammapathā nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1106_5: Tasmiṃ pana pāṇe pāṇasaññino jīvitindriyupacchedakaupakkamasamuṭṭhāpikā kāyavacīdvārānaṃ aññataradvārappavattā vadhakacetanā pāṇātipāto.
atk-abh01a0:1106_6: So guṇavirahitesu tiracchānagatādīsu pāṇesu khuddake pāṇe appasāvajjo,
atk-abh01a0:1106_12: Sarīraguṇānaṃ pana samabhāve sati kilesānaṃ upakkamānañca mudutāya appasāvajjo,
atk-abh01a0:1107_11: Aññañca evarūpaṃ atthikehi pana samantapāsādikaṃ vinayaṭṭhakathaṃ oloketvā gahetabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1108_4: yattha paro yathākāmakāritaṃ āpajjanto adaṇḍāraho anupavajjo ca hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1108_5: Tasmiṃ parapariggahite parapariggahitasaññino tadādāyakaupakkamasamuṭṭhāpikā theyyacetanā adinnādānaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1108_9: Vatthusamatte sati guṇādhikānaṃ santake vatthusmiṃ mahāsāvajjaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1108_10: Taṃtaṃguṇādhikaṃ upādāya tato tato hīnaguṇassa santake vatthusmiṃ appasāvajjaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1109_11: kusāvahāroti imesaṃ pañcannaṃ avahārānaṃ vasena pavattanti.
atk-abh01a0:1110_2: Lakkhaṇato pana asaddhammādhippāyena kāyadvārappavattā agamanīyaṭṭhānavītikkamacetanā kāmesumicchācāro.
atk-abh01a0:1111_19: muhuttikāti etā dhanakkītādayo dasāti vīsati itthiyo.
atk-abh01a0:1111_21: dasannañca dhanakkītādīnanti dvādasannaṃ itthīnaṃ aññe purisā idaṃ agamanīyaṭṭhānaṃ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1112_0: So panesa micchācāro sīlādiguṇarahite agamanīyaṭṭhāne appasāvajjo,
atk-abh01a0:1113_6: Lakkhaṇato pana atathaṃ vatthuṃ tathato paraṃ viññāpetukāmassa tathāviññattisamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā musāvādo.
atk-abh01a0:1113_7: So yamatthaṃ bhañjati tassa appatāya appasāvajjo,
atk-abh01a0:1113_9: Apica gahaṭṭhānaṃ attano santakaṃ adātukāmatāya ‘natthī’tiādinayappavatto appasāvajjo.
atk-abh01a0:1113_11: Pabbajitānaṃ appakampi telaṃ vā sappiṃ vā labhitvā hasādhippāyena ‘ajja gāme telaṃ nadī maññe sandatī’ti pūraṇakathānayena pavatto appasāvajjo.
atk-abh01a0:1113_12: Adiṭṭhaṃyeva pana diṭṭhantiādinā nayena vadantānaṃ mahāsāvajjo.
atk-abh01a0:1114_7: So ca kāyena vā kāyappaṭibaddhena vā vācāya vā paravisaṃvādakakiriyākaraṇe daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1114_8: Tāya ce kiriyāya paro tamatthaṃ jānāti,
atk-abh01a0:1114_10: Yasmā pana yathā kāyakāyappaṭibaddhavācāhi paraṃ visaṃvādeti,
atk-abh01a0:1115_0: ‘Pisuṇavācā’tiādīsu yāya vācāya yassa taṃ vācaṃ bhāsati tassa hadaye attano piyabhāvaṃ parassa ca suññabhāvaṃ karoti,
atk-abh01a0:1115_2: Yāya pana attānampi parampi pharusaṃ karoti,
atk-abh01a0:1115_3: yā vācā sayampi pharusā neva kaṇṇasukhā,
atk-abh01a0:1116_0: Tattha saṃkiliṭṭhacittassa paresaṃ vā bhedāya attano piyakamyatāya vā kāyavacīpayogasamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā pisuṇavācā nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1116_1: Sā yassa bhedaṃ karoti tassa appaguṇatāya appasāvajjā,
atk-abh01a0:1117_1: ‘bhinditabbo paro’ iti ‘ime nānā bhavissa’nti vinā bhavissantīti bhedapurekkhāratā vā,
atk-abh01a0:1117_2: ‘iti ahaṃ piyo bhavissāmi vissāsiko’ti piyakamyatā vā,
atk-abh01a0:1118_2: eko kira dārako mātu vacanaṃ anādiyitvā araññaṃ gacchati.
atk-abh01a0:1118_3: Taṃ mātā nivattetuṃ asakkontī ‘caṇḍā taṃ mahiṃsī anubandhatū’ti akkosi.
atk-abh01a0:1118_5: Dārako ‘yaṃ mama mātā mukhena kathesi taṃ mā hotu,
atk-abh01a0:1118_6: yaṃ cittena cintesi taṃ hotū’ti saccakiriyaṃ akāsi.
atk-abh01a0:1118_8: Evaṃ mammacchedakopi payogo cittasaṇhatāya pharusavācā na hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1118_9: Mātāpitaro hi kadāci puttake evampi vadanti –
atk-abh01a0:1118_11: uppalapattampi ca nesaṃ upari patantaṃ na icchanti.
atk-abh01a0:1118_12: Ācariyupajjhāyā ca kadāci nissitake evaṃ vadanti –
atk-abh01a0:1118_16: Yathā ca cittasaṇhatāya pharusavācā na hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1118_18: Na hi mārāpetukāmassa ‘imaṃ sukhaṃ sayāpethā’ti vacanaṃ apharusavācā hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1118_20: Sā yaṃ sandhāya pavattitā tassa appaguṇatāya appasāvajjā,
atk-abh01a0:1119_6: Pare pana taṃ kathaṃ agaṇhante kammapathabhedo natthi,
atk-abh01a0:1120_2: Sā ‘aho tava idaṃ mamassā’ti evaṃ parabhaṇḍābhijjhāyanalakkhaṇā.
atk-abh01a0:1120_7: Parabhaṇḍavatthuke hi lobhe uppannepi na tāva kammapathabhedo hoti yāva na ‘aho vata idaṃ mamassā’ti attano pariṇāmeti.
atk-abh01a0:1121_6: Parasattavatthuke hi kodhe uppannepi na tāva kammapathabhedo hoti yāva ‘aho vatāyaṃ ucchijjeyya vinasseyyā’ti tassa vināsanaṃ na cintesi.
atk-abh01a0:1122_7: yathā ca taṃ gaṇhāti tathābhāvena tassupaṭṭhānanti.
atk-abh01a0:1123_0: Imesaṃ pana dasannaṃ akusalakammapathānaṃ dhammato koṭṭhāsato ārammaṇato vedanāto mūlato cāti pañcahākārehi vinicchayo veditabbo –
atk-abh01a0:1124_0: Tattha ‘dhammato’ti etesu hi paṭipāṭiyā satta cetanādhammāva honti,
atk-abh01a0:1125_1: micchādiṭṭhi cāti ime aṭṭha kammapathā eva honti;
atk-abh01a0:1125_4: Abhijjhā hi mūlaṃ patvā ‘lobho akusalamūlaṃ’ hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1126_1: Adinnādānaṃ sattārammaṇaṃ vā hoti saṅkhārārammaṇaṃ vā.
atk-abh01a0:1126_8: Samphappalāpo diṭṭhasutamutaviññātavasena sattārammaṇo vā saṅkhārārammaṇo vā.
atk-abh01a0:1127_1: Kiñcāpi hi rājāno coraṃ disvā hasamānāpi ‘gacchatha naṃ ghātethā’ti vadanti,
atk-abh01a0:1127_4: Tañhi parabhaṇḍaṃ disvā haṭṭhatuṭṭhassa gaṇhato sukhavedanaṃ hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1127_7: Gahaṇakāle majjhattabhāve ṭhitassa pana gaṇhato adukkhamasukhavedanaṃ hotīti.
atk-abh01a0:1127_14: Paresu hi sādhukāraṃ dentesu celukkhepādīni khipantesu haṭṭhatuṭṭhassa sītāharaṇabhāratayuddhādīni kathanakāle so sukhavedano hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1127_15: Paṭhamaṃ dinnavetanena ekena pacchā āgantvā ‘ādito paṭṭhāya kathehī’ti vutte ‘ananusandhikaṃ pakiṇṇakakathaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1127_16: kathessāmi nu kho no’ti domanassitassa kathanakāle dukkhavedano hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1131_0: Pāṇātipātādīhi pana viratiyo anabhijjhāabyāpādasammādiṭṭhiyo cāti ime dasa kusalakammapathā nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1131_5: Yā pāṇātipātā viramantassa “yā tasmiṃ samaye pāṇātipātā ārati viratī”ti evaṃ vuttā kusalacittasampayuttā virati,
atk-abh01a0:1132_0: Tattha asamādinnasikkhāpadānaṃ attano jātivayabāhusaccādīni paccavekkhitvā ‘ayuttaṃ amhākaṃ evarūpaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1132_1: pāpaṃ kātu’nti sampattaṃ vatthuṃ avītikkamantānaṃ uppajjamānā virati ‘sampattaviratī’ti veditabbā –
atk-abh01a0:1132_3: Tassa kira daharakāleyeva mātuyā rogo uppajji.
atk-abh01a0:1132_8: Tasmiñca samaye eko saso taruṇasassaṃ khādituṃ āgato hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1132_9: So taṃ disvāva vegena dhāvanto valliyā baddho ‘kiri kirī’ti saddamakāsi.
atk-abh01a0:1132_10: Cakkano tena saddena gantvā taṃ gahetvā cintesi –
atk-abh01a0:1132_13: ‘na metaṃ patirūpaṃ yvāhaṃ mātu jīvitakāraṇā paraṃ jīvitā voropeyya’nti.
atk-abh01a0:1132_15: araññe sasehi saddhiṃ tiṇodakaṃ paribhuñjā’ti muñci.
atk-abh01a0:1132_16: Bhātarā ca ‘kiṃ tāta saso laddho’ti pucchito taṃ pavattiṃ ācikkhi.
atk-abh01a0:1132_18: So mātusantikaṃ gantvā ‘yato ahaṃ jāto nābhijānāmi sañcicca pāṇaṃ jīvitā voropetā’ti saccaṃ vatvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-abh01a0:1133_0: Samādinnasikkhāpadānaṃ pana sikkhāpadasamādāne ca tatuttariñca attano jīvitampi pariccajitvā vatthuṃ
