atk-abh01a0:1133_3: So kira ambariyavihāravāsino piṅgalabuddharakkhitattherassa santike sikkhāpadāni gahetvā khettaṃ kasati.
atk-abh01a0:1133_10: ‘na metaṃ patirūpaṃ yvāhaṃ bhāvanīyassa garuno santike sikkhāpadāni gahetvā bhindeyya’nti evaṃ yāvatatiyaṃ cintetvā ‘jīvitaṃ pariccajāmi,
atk-abh01a0:1133_11: na sikkhāpada’nti aṃse ṭhapitaṃ tikhiṇadaṇḍavāsiṃ araññe chaḍḍesi.
atk-abh01a0:1134_1: yassā uppattito pabhuti ‘pāṇaṃ ghātessāmī’ti ariyapuggalānaṃ cittampi nuppajjatīti.
atk-abh01a0:1135_0: Idāni yathā akusalānaṃ evaṃ imesampi kusalakammapathānaṃ dhammato koṭṭhāsato ārammaṇato vedanāto mūlatoti pañcahākārehi vinicchayo veditabbo –
atk-abh01a0:1136_0: Tattha ‘dhammato’ti etesu hi paṭipāṭiyā satta cetanāpi vaṭṭanti,
atk-abh01a0:1137_2: Ante tayo kammapathā ceva mūlāni ca.
atk-abh01a0:1137_3: Anabhijjhā hi mūlaṃ patvā ‘alobho kusalamūlaṃ’ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1138_2: Yathā pana nibbānārammaṇo ariyamaggo kilese pajahati,
atk-abh01a0:1138_3: evaṃ jīvitindriyādiārammaṇāpete kammapathā pāṇātipātādīni dussīlyāni pajahantīti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1139_0: ‘Vedanāto’ti sabbe sukhavedanā vā honti majjhattavedanā vā.
atk-abh01a0:1139_1: Kusalaṃ patvā hi dukkhavedanā nāma natthi.
atk-abh01a0:1140_0: ‘Mūlato’ti paṭipāṭiyā satta kammapathā ñāṇasampayuttacittena viramantassa alobhaadosaamohavasena timūlā honti;
atk-abh01a0:1140_4: Alobho pana attanāva attano mūlaṃ na hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1142_0: Idāni imasmiṃ ṭhāne kammapathasaṃsandanaṃ nāma veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1142_1: Pañcaphassadvāravasena hi uppanno asaṃvaro akusalaṃ manokammameva hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1142_3: so hi kāyadvāre copanappatto akusalaṃ kāyakammaṃ hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1143_0: Pañcaphassadvāravasena uppanno saṃvaropi kusalaṃ manokammameva hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1144_4: taṃ kāyavacīdvāresu copanaṃ pattaṃ akusalaṃ kāyavacīkammaṃ hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1145_3: Etāni pana kāyaṅgavācaṅgaṃ acopetvā sikkhāpadāni gaṇhantassa manosaṃvaradvārepi uppajjanti eva.
atk-abh01a0:1145_4: Tattha kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ tividhakammadvāravasena uppajjati,
atk-abh01a0:1145_7: sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā’ti iminā pana nayena chaphassadvāravasena uppajjati;
atk-abh01a0:1145_12: tasmā idampi cittaṃ tividhakammadvāravasena vā uppannaṃ hotu,
atk-abh01a0:1145_17: dhammārammaṇaṃ vā”ti vutte sabbaṃ vuttameva hotīti.
atk-abh01a0:1147_0: Yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbhāti ettha ayaṃ yojanā –
atk-abh01a0:1147_1: heṭṭhā vuttesu rūpārammaṇādīsu rūpārammaṇaṃ vā ārabbha,
atk-abh01a0:1147_5: Ettāvatā etassa cittassa etesu ārammaṇesu yaṃkiñci ekameva ārammaṇaṃ anuññātasadisaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1147_6: Idañca ekasmiṃ samaye ekassa vā puggalassa rūpārammaṇaṃ ārabbha uppannaṃ puna aññasmiṃ samaye aññassa
atk-abh01a0:1147_7: vā puggalassa saddādīsupi aññataraṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārabbha uppajjati eva.
atk-abh01a0:1147_8: Evaṃ uppajjamānassa cassa ekasmiṃ bhave paṭhamaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ ārabbha pavatti hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1147_10: Rūpādīsu cāpi paṭhamaṃ nīlārammaṇaṃ pacchā pītārammaṇanti ayampi niyamo natthi.
atk-abh01a0:1147_13: kamābhāvepi ca nīlapītādīsu niyamābhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ‘yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbhā’ti āha.
atk-abh01a0:1147_16: atha kho yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha uppannaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1147_17: Evaṃ uppajjamānampi ca ‘paṭhamaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ pacchā saddārammaṇaṃ ārabbhā’ti evampi anuppajjitvā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha uppannaṃ hoti;
atk-abh01a0:1147_20: rūpārammaṇādīsu yaṃ vā taṃ vā ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppannaṃ hotī’ti attho.
atk-abh01a0:1147_21: Rūpārammaṇesupi ca ‘paṭhamaṃ nīlārammaṇaṃ pacchā pītārammaṇa’nti imināpi niyamena anuppajjitvā,
atk-abh01a0:1147_22: yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha ‘nīlapītakādīsu rūpārammaṇesu yaṃ vā taṃ vā rūpārammaṇaṃ ārabbha uppannaṃ hotī’ti attho.
atk-abh01a0:1148_4: dhammārammaṇaṃ vā cittaṃ uppannaṃ hotīti vatvā puna ‘yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbhā’ti āha.
atk-abh01a0:1148_6: etesu rūpādīsu heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva yaṃ vā taṃ vā pana ārabbha uppannaṃ hotīti.
atk-abh01a0:1148_8: heṭṭhā gahitameva gahita’nti vatvā ‘rūpaṃ vā ārabbha…pe…
atk-abh01a0:1148_10: idaṃ vā idaṃ vā ārabbhāti kathetuṃ idaṃ vutta’nti ettakameva āgataṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1151_0: Tasmiṃ samayeti idaṃ aniyamaniddiṭṭhassa samayassa niyamato paṭiniddesavacanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1151_1: Tasmā ‘yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1151_4: Tattha yatheva cittaṃ evaṃ phassādīsupi phasso hoti. Kiṃ hoti?
atk-abh01a0:1151_8: somanassasahagato hotī’tiādinā nayena labbhamānapadavasena yojanā kātabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1152_2: Ārammaṇasmiñhi cittassa paṭhamābhinipāto hutvā phasso ārammaṇaṃ phusamāno uppajjati,
atk-abh01a0:1153_1: ayaṃ phasso nāma yathā pāsādaṃ patvā thambho nāma sesadabbasambhārānaṃ balavapaccayo,
atk-abh01a0:1153_8: Ekacittasmiñhi uppannadhammānaṃ ‘ayaṃ paṭhamaṃ uppanno ayaṃ pacchā’ti idaṃ vattuṃ na labbhā.
atk-abh01a0:1153_16: cetanā hoti vitakko hotīti āharitumpi hi vaṭṭeyya.
atk-abh01a0:1153_17: Desanāvārena pana phassova paṭhamaṃ vuttoti veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1153_18: Yathā cettha evaṃ sesadhammesupi pubbāparakkamo nāma na pariyesitabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1155_0: Ayañhi arūpadhammopi samāno ārammaṇe phusanākāreneva pavattatīti phusanalakkhaṇo.
atk-abh01a0:1155_1: Ekadesena ca anallīyamānopi rūpaṃ viya cakkhuṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1155_4: Vatthārammaṇasaṅghaṭṭanato vā uppannattā sampattiatthenapi rasena saṅghaṭṭanarasoti veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1156_0: Idañca vatvā idaṃ suttaṃ ābhataṃ – “yathā, mahārāja,
atk-abh01a0:1156_2: tesu yathā eko meṇḍo evaṃ cakkhu daṭṭhabbaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1156_3: yathā dutiyo meṇḍo evaṃ rūpaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ;
atk-abh01a0:1156_4: yathā tesaṃ sannipāto evaṃ phasso daṭṭhabbo”.
atk-abh01a0:1156_9: yathā eko pāṇi evaṃ cakkhu daṭṭhabbaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1156_10: yathā dutiyo pāṇi evaṃ rūpaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1156_11: yathā tesaṃ sannipāto evaṃ phasso daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1156_12: Evaṃ phusanalakkhaṇo ca phasso saṅghaṭṭanaraso cā”ti vitthāro.
atk-abh01a0:1157_0: Yathā vā “cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā”tiādīsu cakkhuviññāṇādīni cakkhuādināmena vuttāni,
atk-abh01a0:1157_2: Tasmā ‘evaṃ cakkhu daṭṭhabba’ntiādīsu evaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ daṭṭhabbanti iminā nayena attho veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1157_3: Evaṃ sante cittārammaṇasaṅghaṭṭanato imasmimpi sutte kiccaṭṭheneva rasena saṅghaṭṭanarasoti siddho hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1158_0: Tikasannipātasaṅkhātassa pana attano kāraṇassa vasena paveditattā sannipātapaccupaṭṭhāno.
atk-abh01a0:1158_1: Ayañhi tattha tattha “tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati phasso”ti evaṃ kāraṇassa vasena paveditoti.
atk-abh01a0:1158_2: Imassa ca suttapadassa tiṇṇaṃ saṅgatiyā phassoti ayamattho;
atk-abh01a0:1159_0: Evaṃ paveditattā pana tenevākārena paccupaṭṭhātīti sannipātapaccupaṭṭhānoti vutto.
atk-abh01a0:1159_1: Phalaṭṭhena pana paccupaṭṭhānenesa vedanāpaccupaṭṭhāno nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1159_3: Uppādayamāno ca yathā bahiddhā uṇhapaccayāpi lākhāsaṅkhātadhātunissitā usmā attano nissaye mudubhāvakārī hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1159_4: na attano paccayabhūtepi bahiddhā vītaccitaṅgārasaṅkhāte uṇhabhāve,
atk-abh01a0:1159_6: cittanissitattā attano nissayabhūte citte eva esa vedanuppādako hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1159_7: na attano paccayabhūtepi vatthumhi ārammaṇe vāti veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1159_8: Tajjāsamannāhārena pana indriyena ca parikkhate visaye anantarāyena uppajjanato esa āpāthagatavisayapadaṭṭhānoti vuccati.
atk-abh01a0:1161_1: Anubhavanarasatā pana sukhavedanāyameva labbhatī’ti vatvā puna taṃ vādaṃ paṭikkhipitvā ‘sukhavedanā vā hotu,
atk-abh01a0:1161_10: Ekaṃsato pana issaravatāya vissavitāya sāmibhāvena vedanāva ārammaṇarasaṃ anubhavati.
atk-abh01a0:1162_2: Yathā sūdo nānārasabhojanaṃ sampādetvā peḷāya pakkhipitvā lañchanaṃ datvā rañño santike otāretvā lañchanaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1162_3: bhinditvā peḷaṃ vivaritvā sabbasūpabyañjanehi aggaggaṃ ādāya bhājane pakkhipitvā sadosaniddosabhāvavīmaṃsanatthaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1162_6: Rājā issaravatāya vissavitāya sāmī hutvā icchiticchitaṃ bhuñjati.
atk-abh01a0:1162_7: Tattha hi sūdassa bhattavīmaṃsanamattamiva avasesadhammānaṃ ārammaṇarasassa ekadesānubhavanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1162_8: Yathā hi sūdo bhattekadesamattameva vīmaṃsati evaṃ sesadhammāpi ārammaṇarasekadesameva anubhavanti.
atk-abh01a0:1162_9: Yathā pana rājā issaravatāya vissavitāya sāmī hutvā yadicchakaṃ bhuñjati,
atk-abh01a0:1162_10: evaṃ vedanāpi issaravatāya vissavitāya sāmibhāvena ārammaṇarasaṃ anubhavati.
atk-abh01a0:1163_0: Dutiye atthavikappe ayaṃ idha adhippetā vedanā yathā vā tathā vā ārammaṇassa iṭṭhākārameva sambhuñjatīti iṭṭhākārasambhogarasāti vuttā.
atk-abh01a0:1163_1: Cetasikaassādato panesā attano sabhāveneva upaṭṭhānaṃ sandhāya cetasikaassādapaccupaṭṭhānāti vuttā.
atk-abh01a0:1163_2: Yasmā pana “passaddhikāyo sukhaṃ vedeti” tasmā passaddhipadaṭṭhānāti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1164_4: Yā panettha abhiññāṇena sañjānāti sā paccābhiññāṇarasā nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1165_1: vaḍḍhakissa dārumhi abhiññāṇaṃ katvā puna tena abhiññāṇena taṃ paccābhijānanakāle,
atk-abh01a0:1165_2: purisassa kāḷatilakādiabhiññāṇaṃ sallakkhetvā puna tena abhiññāṇena asuko nāma esoti tassa paccābhijānanakāle,
atk-abh01a0:1165_3: rañño piḷandhanagopakabhaṇḍāgārikassa tasmiṃ tasmiṃ piḷandhane nāmapaṇṇakaṃ bandhitvā ‘asukaṃ piḷandhanaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1165_4: nāma āharā’ti vutte dīpaṃ jāletvā ratanagabbhaṃ pavisitvā paṇṇaṃ vācetvā tassa tasseva piḷandhanassa
atk-abh01a0:1166_10: Yā panettha ñāṇasampayuttā hoti sā saññā ñāṇameva anuvattati.
atk-abh01a0:1167_0: Cetayatīti cetanā saddhiṃ attanā sampayuttadhamme ārammaṇe abhisandahatīti attho.
atk-abh01a0:1167_7: Kusalākusalakammāyūhanaṭṭhānañhi patvā sesasampayuttadhammānaṃ ekadesamattakameva kiccaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1167_13: Yathā khettasāmī puriso pañcapaṇṇāsa balipurise gahetvā ‘lāyissāmī’ti ekato khettaṃ otarati.
atk-abh01a0:1167_22: Pañcapaṇṇāsa balipurisā viya cittaṅgavasena uppannā pañcapaṇṇāsa kusalā dhammā.
atk-abh01a0:1167_23: Khettasāmipurisassa diguṇussāhadiguṇavāyāmakaraṇakālo viya kusalākusalakammāyūhanaṭṭhānaṃ patvā cetanāya diguṇussāho diguṇavāyāmo hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1168_4: Yathā hi jeṭṭhasisso upajjhāyaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ disvā sayaṃ adhīyamāno itarepi dārake attano attano ajjhayanakamme pavattayati,
atk-abh01a0:1168_7: Yathā ca mahāvaḍḍhakī sayaṃ tacchanto itarepi tacchake attano attano tacchanakamme pavattayati,
atk-abh01a0:1168_10: Yathā ca yodhanāyako sayaṃ yujjhamāno itarepi yodhe sampahāravuttiyaṃ pavattayati,
atk-abh01a0:1168_11: tasmiñhi yujjhituṃ āraddhe tepi anivattamānā yujjhanti,
atk-abh01a0:1168_13: Evamesāpi attano kiccena ārammaṇe pavattamānā aññepi sampayuttadhamme attano attano kiriyāya pavatteti.
atk-abh01a0:1168_19: Accāyikakammānussaraṇādīsu ca panāyaṃ sampayuttānaṃ ussāhanabhāvena pavattamānā pākaṭā hotīti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1169_0: ‘Ārammaṇaṃ cintetī’ti cittanti nayena cittassa vacanattho vutto eva.
atk-abh01a0:1169_7: Dvāraṃ pana patvā ārammaṇavibhāvanaṭṭhāne cittaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ purecārikaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1169_8: Cakkhunā hi diṭṭhaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ citteneva vijānāti…pe…
atk-abh01a0:1169_10: Yathā hi nagaraguttiko nāma nagaramajjhe siṅghāṭake nisīditvā ‘ayaṃ nevāsiko ayaṃ āgantuko’ti āgatāgataṃ janaṃ upadhāreti vavatthapeti –
atk-abh01a0:1169_13: nagaraguttiko nāma majjhe nagarassa siṅghāṭake nisinno puratthimato disato purisaṃ āgacchantaṃ passeyya…
atk-abh01a0:1169_18: yaṃ cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati taṃ viññāṇena vijānāti,
atk-abh01a0:1169_25: Evaṃ dvāraṃ patvā ārammaṇavibhāvanaṭṭhāne cittameva pubbaṅgamaṃ purecārikaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1170_0: Tadetaṃ pacchimaṃ pacchimaṃ uppajjamānaṃ purimaṃ purimaṃ nirantaraṃ katvā sandahanameva upaṭṭhātīti sandahanapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1171_0: Kiṃ panetaṃ cittaṃ purimaniddiṭṭhacittena saddhiṃ ekameva udāhu aññanti? Ekameva.
atk-abh01a0:1171_4: yathā hi rūpādīni upādāya paññattā sūriyādayo na atthato rūpādīhi aññe honti,
atk-abh01a0:1171_5: teneva yasmiṃ samaye sūriyo udeti tasmiṃ samaye tassa tejasaṅkhātaṃ rūpampīti.
atk-abh01a0:1171_6: Evaṃ vuccamānepi na rūpādīhi añño sūriyo nāma atthi.
atk-abh01a0:1171_10: Tena ‘yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti ekaṃseneva tasmiṃ samaye phassādīhi atthato aññameva taṃ hotī’ti
atk-abh01a0:1171_11: imassatthassa dīpanatthāya etaṃ puna vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1172_0: Yathā ca “yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti…pe…
atk-abh01a0:1172_2: tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti vedanā hotī”tiādīsu pana bhāventena vavatthāpite samaye yo bhāveti na so atthato uppajjati nāma,
atk-abh01a0:1172_3: teneva tattha yathā “phasso hoti vedanā hotī”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1172_4: na evaṃ “yo bhāveti so hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1172_5: “Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hotī”tiādīsu pana cittena vavatthāpite samaye samayavavatthāpitaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1172_7: Yatheva pana tadā ‘phasso hoti vedanā hoti’,
atk-abh01a0:1172_8: tathā ‘cittampi hotī’ti imassapi atthassa dīpanatthamidaṃ puna vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1172_10: uddesavāre saṅgaṇhanatthaṃ niddesavāre ca vibhajanatthaṃ purimena hi ‘citta’-
atk-abh01a0:1172_12: Tasmiṃ pana cittena vavatthāpitasamaye ye dhammā honti tesaṃ dassanatthaṃ “phasso hotī”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1172_15: Imasmiñca ṭhāne etasmiṃ avuccamāne “katamaṃ tasmiṃ samaye citta”nti na sakkā bhaveyya niddesavāre vibhajituṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1172_17: Tasmā tassa niddesavāre vibhajanatthampi etañca vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1173_0: Yasmā vā “uppannaṃ hotī”ti ettha cittaṃ uppannanti etaṃ desanāsīsameva,
atk-abh01a0:1173_1: ‘na pana cittaṃ ekameva uppajjatī’ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vicāritaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1173_2: tasmā cittaṃ “uppanna”nti etthāpi cittamattameva aggahetvā paropaṇṇāsakusaladhammehi saddhiṃyeva cittaṃ gahitaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1173_3: Evaṃ tattha saṅkhepato sabbepi cittacetasikadhamme gahetvā idha sarūpena pabhedato dassetuṃ “phasso hotī”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1173_4: Iti phassādayo viya cittampi vuttamevāti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1176_5: Yathā hi koci rājavallabhaṃ ñātiṃ vā mittaṃ vā nissāya rājagehaṃ ārohati,
atk-abh01a0:1176_6: evaṃ vitakkaṃ nissāya cittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārohati.
atk-abh01a0:1176_7: Tasmā so ārammaṇe cittassa abhiniropanalakkhaṇoti vutto.
atk-abh01a0:1176_10: bherī ākoṭitā atha pacchā anuravati anusaddāyati,
atk-abh01a0:1176_13: Yathā pacchā anuravanā anusaddāyanā evaṃ vicāro daṭṭhabbo”ti.
atk-abh01a0:1176_15: Tathā hi tena yogāvacaro ārammaṇaṃ vitakkāhataṃ vitakkapariyāhataṃ karotīti vuccati.
atk-abh01a0:1177_6: Santepi ca nesaṃ katthaci aviyoge oḷārikaṭṭhena pubbaṅgamaṭṭhena ca ghaṇṭābhighāto viya abhiniropanaṭṭhena ca cetaso paṭhamābhinipāto vitakko.
atk-abh01a0:1177_7: Sukhumaṭṭhena anumajjanasabhāvaṭṭhena ca ghaṇṭānuravo viya anuppabandho vicāro.
atk-abh01a0:1177_14: paribbhamanaṃ viya ca padumābhimukhapatitassa bhamarassa padumassa uparibhāge.
atk-abh01a0:1178_0: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “ākāse gacchato mahāsakuṇassa ubhohi pakkhehi vātaṃ gahetvā pakkhe sannisīdāpetvā
atk-abh01a0:1178_1: gamanaṃ viya ārammaṇe cetaso abhiniropanabhāvena pavatto vitakko.
atk-abh01a0:1178_2: So hi ekaggo hutvā appeti vātaggahaṇatthaṃ pakkhe phandāpayamānassa gamanaṃ viya.
atk-abh01a0:1178_6: So pana nesaṃ viseso paṭhamadutiyajjhānesu pākaṭo hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1178_7: Apica malaggahitaṃ kaṃsabhājanaṃ ekena hatthena daḷhaṃ gahetvā itarena hatthena cuṇṇatelavālaṇḍupakena
atk-abh01a0:1178_10: Tathā kumbhakārassa daṇḍappahārena cakkaṃ bhamayitvā bhājanaṃ karontassa uppīḷanahattho viya vitakko,
atk-abh01a0:1178_11: ito cito ca sañcaraṇahattho viya vicāro.
atk-abh01a0:1178_12: Tathā maṇḍalaṃ karontassa majjhe sannirumbhitvā ṭhitakaṇṭako viya abhiniropano vitakko,
atk-abh01a0:1180_0: Tattha khuddikāpīti sarīre lomahaṃsamattameva kātuṃ sakkoti.
atk-abh01a0:1180_7: Tathā hi puṇṇavallikavāsī mahātissatthero puṇṇamadivase sāyaṃ cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ gantvā candālokaṃ disvā mahācetiyābhimukho
atk-abh01a0:1180_8: hutvā ‘imāya vata velāya catasso parisā mahācetiyaṃ vandantī’ti pakatiyā diṭṭhārammaṇavasena buddhārammaṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1180_9: ubbegaṃ pītiṃ uppādetvā sudhātale pahaṭacitrageṇḍuko viya ākāse uppatitvā mahācetiyaṅgaṇeyeva aṭṭhāsi.
atk-abh01a0:1181_0: Tathā girikaṇḍakavihārassa upanissaye vattakālakagāme ekā kuladhītāpi balavabuddhārammaṇāya ubbegāya pītiyā ākāse laṅghesi.
atk-abh01a0:1181_1: Tassā kira mātāpitaro sāyaṃ dhammasavanatthāya vihāraṃ gacchantā ‘amma,
atk-abh01a0:1181_4: mayaṃ tuyhaṃ pattiṃ katvā dhammaṃ sossāmā’ti agamaṃsu.
atk-abh01a0:1181_5: Sā gantukāmāpi tesaṃ vacanaṃ paṭibāhituṃ asakkontī ghare ohīyitvā gharadvāre ṭhatvā candālokena girikaṇḍake
atk-abh01a0:1181_7: Catasso ca parisā mālāgandhādīhi cetiyapūjaṃ katvā padakkhiṇaṃ karontiyo bhikkhusaṅghassa ca gaṇasajjhāyasaddaṃ assosi.
atk-abh01a0:1181_8: Athassā ‘dhaññā vatime manussā ye vihāraṃ gantvā evarūpe cetiyaṅgaṇe anusañcarituṃ evarūpañca madhuraṃ
atk-abh01a0:1181_9: dhammakathaṃ sotuṃ labhantī’ti muttarāsisadisaṃ cetiyaṃ passantiyā eva ubbegāpīti udapādi.
atk-abh01a0:1181_10: Sā ākāse laṅghitvā mātāpitūnaṃ purimataraṃyeva ākāsato cetiyaṅgaṇe oruyha cetiyaṃ vanditvā dhammaṃ suṇamānā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-abh01a0:1181_17: ‘mayhaṃ candālokena cetiyaṃ olokentiyā ṭhitāya buddhārammaṇā balavapīti uppajjati,
atk-abh01a0:1181_18: athāhaṃ neva attano ṭhitabhāvaṃ na nisinnabhāvaṃ aññāsiṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1181_19: gahitanimitteneva pana ākāsaṃ laṅghitvā cetiyaṅgaṇe patiṭṭhitāmhī’ti.
atk-abh01a0:1182_0: Pharaṇapītiyā pana uppannāya sakalasarīraṃ dhamitvā pūritavatthi viya,
atk-abh01a0:1182_1: mahatā udakoghena pakkhandapabbatakucchi viya ca anuparipphuṭaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1182_2: Sā panesā pañcavidhā pīti gabbhaṃ gaṇhantī paripākaṃ gacchantī duvidhaṃ passaddhiṃ paripūreti –
atk-abh01a0:1182_4: Passaddhi gabbhaṃ gaṇhantī paripākaṃ gacchantī duvidhaṃ sukhaṃ paripūreti –
atk-abh01a0:1182_6: Sukhaṃ gabbhaṃ gaṇhantaṃ paripākaṃ gacchantaṃ tividhaṃ samādhiṃ paripūreti –
atk-abh01a0:1182_8: Tāsu ṭhapetvā appanāsamādhipūrikaṃ itarā dvepi idha yujjanti.
atk-abh01a0:1183_1: yassa uppajjati taṃ sukhitaṃ karotīti attho.
atk-abh01a0:1184_4: Satipi ca nesaṃ pītisukhānaṃ katthaci avippayoge,
atk-abh01a0:1184_8: Yattha sukhaṃ tattha na niyamato pīti.
atk-abh01a0:1185_0: Yathā hi puriso mahākantāramaggaṃ paṭipanno ghammapareto tasito pipāsito paṭipathe purisaṃ disvā ‘kattha pānīyaṃ atthī’ti puccheyya.
atk-abh01a0:1185_3: So tassa kathaṃ sutvā haṭṭhapahaṭṭho bhaveyya.
atk-abh01a0:1185_4: Tato gacchanto bhūmiyaṃ patitāni uppaladalanālapattādīni disvā suṭṭhutaraṃ haṭṭhapahaṭṭho hutvā gacchanto allavatthe allakese purise passeyya,
atk-abh01a0:1185_9: So bhiyyo bhiyyo haṭṭhapahaṭṭho hutvā jātassaraṃ otaritvā yathāruci nhatvā ca pivitvā ca paṭippassaddhadaratho
atk-abh01a0:1185_10: bhisamuḷālapokkharādīni khāditvā nīluppalādīni piḷandhitvā mandālakamūlāni khandhe karitvā uttaritvā
atk-abh01a0:1185_13: sītacchāyāya mandamande vāte paharante nipanno ‘aho sukhaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1186_0: Tassa hi purisassa jātassaravanasaṇḍasavanato paṭṭhāya yāva udakadassanā haṭṭhapahaṭṭhakālo viya pubbabhāgārammaṇe haṭṭhapahaṭṭhākārā pīti.
atk-abh01a0:1186_1: Nhatvā ca pivitvā ca sītacchāyāya mandamande vāte paharante ‘aho sukhaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1186_2: aho sukha’nti vadato nipannakālo viya balavappattaṃ ārammaṇarasānubhavanākārasaṇṭhitaṃ sukhaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1186_3: Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ samaye pākaṭabhāvato cetaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1186_4: Yattha pana pīti sukhampi tattha atthīti vuttamevetaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1187_4: Yathā hi kūṭāgārakaṇṇikā sesadabbasambhārānaṃ ābandhanato pamukhā hoti evameva sabbakusaladhammānaṃ samādhicittena
atk-abh01a0:1187_5: ijjhanato sabbesampi tesaṃ dhammānaṃ samādhi pāmokkho hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1188_1: kūṭāgārassa yā kāci gopānasiyo sabbā tā kūṭaṅgamā honti,
atk-abh01a0:1188_5: ye keci kusalā dhammā sabbe te samādhininnā honti,
atk-abh01a0:1189_0: Yathā ca senaṅgaṃ patvā rājā nāma yattha yattha senā osīdati taṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ gacchati,
atk-abh01a0:1189_3: evameva sahajātadhammānaṃ vikkhipituṃ vippakirituṃ appadānato samādhi avikkhepalakkhaṇo nāma hotīti.
atk-abh01a0:1190_1: ayaṃ cittassekaggatāsaṅkhāto samādhi nāma avisāralakkhaṇo vā avikkhepalakkhaṇo vā,
atk-abh01a0:1190_7: nivāte dīpaccīnaṃ ṭhiti viya cetaso ṭhitīti daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1192_6: Sā panesā sampasādanalakkhaṇā ca saddhā sampakkhandanalakkhaṇā ca.
atk-abh01a0:1193_0: Yathā hi rañño cakkavattissa udakappasādako maṇi udake pakkhitto paṅkasevālapaṇakakaddamaṃ sannisīdāpeti,
atk-abh01a0:1193_6: Pasannena cittena yogāvacaro kulaputto dānaṃ deti,
atk-abh01a0:1194_1: rājā cakkavatti caturaṅginiyā senāya saddhiṃ addhānamaggappaṭipanno parittaṃ udakaṃ tareyya,
atk-abh01a0:1194_2: taṃ udakaṃ hatthīhi ca assehi ca rathehi ca pattīhi ca saṅkhubhitaṃ bhaveyya āvilaṃ lulitaṃ kalalībhūtaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1194_3: uttiṇṇo ca rājā cakkavatti manusse āṇāpeyya ‘pānīyaṃ bhaṇe āharatha,
atk-abh01a0:1194_6: ‘Evaṃ devā’ti kho te manussā rañño cakkavattissa paṭissutvā taṃ udakappasādakaṃ maṇiṃ udake pakkhipeyyuṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1195_2: Yathā te manussā evaṃ yogāvacaro daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1195_3: Yathā paṅkasevālapaṇakaṃ kaddamo ca evaṃ kilesā daṭṭhabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1195_4: Yathā udakappasādako maṇi evaṃ saddhā daṭṭhabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1195_5: Yathā udakappasādake maṇimhi pakkhittamatte paṅkasevālapaṇakaṃ vigacchati kaddamo ca sannisīdati,
atk-abh01a0:1195_9: vinīvaraṇaṃ cittaṃ hoti acchaṃ vippasannaṃ anāvila”nti.
atk-abh01a0:1196_0: Yathā pana kumbhilamakaragāharakkhasādikiṇṇaṃ pūraṃ mahānadiṃ āgamma bhīrukajano ubhosu tīresu tiṭṭhati.
atk-abh01a0:1196_1: Saṅgāmasūro pana mahāyodho āgantvā ‘kasmā ṭhitatthā’ti pucchitvā ‘sappaṭibhayabhāvena otarituṃ na visahāmā’ti
atk-abh01a0:1196_2: vutte sunisitaṃ asiṃ gahetvā ‘mama pacchato etha,
atk-abh01a0:1196_3: mā bhāyitthā’ti vatvā nadiṃ otaritvā āgatāgate kumbhilādayo paṭibāhitvā orimatīrato manussānaṃ sotthibhāvaṃ karonto pārimatīraṃ neti.
atk-abh01a0:1196_5: Evameva dānaṃ dadato sīlaṃ rakkhato uposathakammaṃ karoto bhāvanaṃ ārabhato saddhā pubbaṅgamā purecārikā hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1198_2: Vidhinā vā nayena upāyena īrayitabbaṃ pavattayitabbanti vīriyaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1198_7: Yathā hi jiṇṇagharaṃ āgantukena thūṇupatthambhena tiṭṭhati,
atk-abh01a0:1198_8: evameva yogāvacaro vīriyupatthambhena upatthambhito hutvā sabbakusaladhammehi na hāyati,
atk-abh01a0:1199_1: puriso gehe patante tamaññena dārunā upatthambheyya,
atk-abh01a0:1199_2: upatthambhitaṃ santaṃ evaṃ taṃ gehaṃ na pateyya,
atk-abh01a0:1199_4: vīriyupatthambhitā sabbe kusalā dhammā na hāyanti na parihāyantī”ti.
atk-abh01a0:1200_0: Yathā vā pana khuddikāya ca mahatikāya ca senāya saṅgāme pavatte khuddikā senā olīyeyya,
atk-abh01a0:1200_4: evameva vīriyaṃ sahajātasampayuttadhammānaṃ olīyituṃ osakkituṃ na deti,
atk-abh01a0:1201_6: Sammā āraddhaṃ sabbāsaṃ sampattīnaṃ mūlaṃ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1202_6: Sā panesā apilāpanalakkhaṇā ca sati upaggaṇhanalakkhaṇā ca.
atk-abh01a0:1202_7: Yathā hi rañño bhaṇḍāgāriko dasavidhaṃ ratanaṃ gopayanto sāyaṃpātaṃ rājānaṃ issariyasampattiṃ sallakkhāpeti sāreti,
atk-abh01a0:1202_8: evameva sati kusalaṃ dhammaṃ sallakkhāpeti sarāpeti.
atk-abh01a0:1203_1: rañño cakkavattissa bhaṇḍāgāriko rājānaṃ cakkavattiṃ sāyaṃpātaṃ yasaṃ sarāpeti – ‘ettakā, deva, hatthī,
atk-abh01a0:1203_22: ime lokuttarā dhammāti. Evaṃ kho, mahārāja,
atk-abh01a0:1204_0: Yathā pana rañño cakkavattissa pariṇāyakaratanaṃ rañño ahite ca hite ca ñatvā ahite apayāpeti,
atk-abh01a0:1204_2: evameva sati hitāhitānaṃ dhammānaṃ gatiyo samanvesitvā ‘ime kāyaduccaritādayo dhammā ahitā’ti ahite dhamme apanudeti,
atk-abh01a0:1204_3: ‘ime kāyasucaritādayo dhammā hitā’ti hite dhamme upaggaṇhāti.
atk-abh01a0:1205_1: rañño cakkavattissa pariṇāyakaratanaṃ rañño hitāhite jānāti ‘ime rañño hitā ime ahitā,
atk-abh01a0:1205_5: sati uppajjamānā hitāhitānaṃ dhammānaṃ gatiyo samanvesati ‘ime dhammā hitā ime dhammā ahitā,
atk-abh01a0:1205_6: ime dhammā upakārā ime dhammā anupakārā’ti,
atk-abh01a0:1205_7: tato ahite dhamme apanudeti hite dhamme upaggaṇhāti. Evaṃ kho, mahārāja,
atk-abh01a0:1206_6: ārammaṇe daḷhaṃ patiṭṭhitattā pana esikā viya,
atk-abh01a0:1207_0: Ārammaṇe cittaṃ sammā adhiyati ṭhapetīti samādhi.
atk-abh01a0:1208_9: Sā panesā obhāsanalakkhaṇā ca paññā pajānanalakkhaṇā ca.
atk-abh01a0:1208_10: Yathā hi catubhittike gehe rattibhāge dīpe jalite andhakāro nirujjhati āloko pātubhavati,
atk-abh01a0:1208_13: Paññavato hi ekapallaṅkena nisinnassa dasasahassilokadhātu ekālokā hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1209_10: pākaṭāni ca ariyasaccāni karoti. Evaṃ kho, mahārāja,
atk-abh01a0:1210_0: Yathā pana cheko bhisakko āturānaṃ sappāyāsappāyāni bhojanāni jānāti,
atk-abh01a0:1210_1: evaṃ paññā uppajjamānā kusalākusale sevitabbāsevitabbe hīnappaṇītakaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāgaappaṭibhāge dhamme pajānāti.
atk-abh01a0:1214_4: Lakkhaṇādīhi pana attanā avinibhuttānaṃ dhammānaṃ anupālanalakkhaṇaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1214_8: Santepi ca anupālanalakkhaṇādimhi vidhāne atthikkhaṇeyeva taṃ te dhamme anupāleti udakaṃ viya uppalādīni,
atk-abh01a0:1214_9: yathāsakaṃpaccayuppannepi ca dhamme pāleti dhātī viya kumāraṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1214_11: na bhaṅgato uddhaṃ pavattayati attano ca pavattayitabbānañca abhāvā,
atk-abh01a0:1214_12: na bhaṅgakkhaṇe ṭhapeti sayaṃ bhijjamānattā khīyamāno viya vaṭṭisineho dīpasikhaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1214_13: Na ca anupālanapavattanaṭṭhapanānubhāvavirahitaṃ yathāvuttakkhaṇe tassa tassa sādhanatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1216_14: sammā vā tena samādhiyantīti sammāsamādhi. Apica,
atk-abh01a0:1219_0: Tattha purimāni pañca heṭṭhā lakkhaṇādīhi pakāsitāneva.
atk-abh01a0:1219_5: Tesaṃ nānākaraṇadīpanatthaṃ ‘samuṭṭhānaṃ adhipati lajjā bhayalakkhaṇena cā’ti imaṃ mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā ayaṃ vitthārakathā vuttā.
atk-abh01a0:1221_0: Tattha ajjhattasamuṭṭhānaṃ hiriṃ catūhi kāraṇehi samuṭṭhāpeti –
atk-abh01a0:1221_7: Mādisassa jātisampannassa idaṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ na yutta’nti,
atk-abh01a0:1221_8: evaṃ tāva jātiṃ paccavekkhitvā pāṇātipātādipāpaṃ akaronto hiriṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
atk-abh01a0:1221_10: mādisassa vaye ṭhitassa idaṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ na yutta’nti,
atk-abh01a0:1221_11: evaṃ vayaṃ paccavekkhitvā pāṇātipātādipāpaṃ akaronto hiriṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
atk-abh01a0:1221_14: Mādisassa sūrabhāvasampannassa idaṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ na yutta’nti,
atk-abh01a0:1221_15: evaṃ sūrabhāvaṃ paccavekkhitvā pāṇātipātādipāpaṃ akaronto hiriṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
atk-abh01a0:1221_18: Mādisassa paṇḍitassa bahussutassa idaṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ na yutta’nti,
atk-abh01a0:1221_19: evaṃ bāhusaccaṃ paccavekkhitvā pāṇātipātādipāpaṃ akaronto hiriṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
atk-abh01a0:1221_21: Samuṭṭhāpetvā ca pana attano citte hiriṃ pavesetvā pāpakammaṃ na karoti.
atk-abh01a0:1222_1: Sace tvaṃ pāpakammaṃ karissasi catūsu parisāsu garahappatto bhavissasi.
atk-abh01a0:1223_0: Garahissanti taṃ viññū, asuciṃ nāgariko yathā;
atk-abh01a0:1225_0: Evaṃ paccavekkhanto hi bahiddhāsamuṭṭhitena ottappena pāpakammaṃ na karoti.
atk-abh01a0:1226_1: Idhekacco kulaputto attānaṃ adhipatiṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā ‘mādisassa saddhāpabbajitassa bahussutassa dhutaṅgadharassa
atk-abh01a0:1226_2: na yuttaṃ pāpakammaṃ kātu’nti pāpaṃ na karoti.
atk-abh01a0:1226_5: “so attānaṃyeva adhipatiṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ karitvā akusalaṃ pajahati kusalaṃ bhāveti,
atk-abh01a0:1227_1: Idhekacco kulaputto lokaṃ adhipatiṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā pāpakammaṃ na karoti. Yathāha –
atk-abh01a0:1227_3: Mahantasmiṃ kho pana lokasannivāse santi samaṇabrāhmaṇā iddhimanto dibbacakkhukā paracittaviduno,
atk-abh01a0:1227_7: tepimaṃ evaṃ jānissanti ‘passatha bho imaṃ kulaputtaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1227_8: saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito samāno vokiṇṇo viharati pāpakehi akusalehi dhammehī’ti.
atk-abh01a0:1227_13: tāpi maṃ jānissanti ‘passatha bho imaṃ kulaputtaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1227_14: saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito samāno vokiṇṇo viharati pāpakehi akusalehi dhammehī’ti…
atk-abh01a0:1227_15: so lokaṃyeva adhipatiṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā akusalaṃ pajahati kusalaṃ bhāveti,
atk-abh01a0:1228_8: yathā nāma eko kulaputto uccārapassāvādīni karonto lajjitabbayuttakaṃ ekaṃ disvā lajjanākārappatto bhaveyya hīḷito,
atk-abh01a0:1228_9: evameva ajjhattaṃ lajjidhammaṃ okkamitvā pāpakammaṃ na karoti.
atk-abh01a0:1228_10: Ekacco apāyabhayabhīto hutvā pāpakammaṃ na karoti.
atk-abh01a0:1229_1: yathā hi dvīsu ayoguḷesu eko sītalo bhaveyya gūthamakkhito,
atk-abh01a0:1229_3: Tattha paṇḍito sītalaṃ gūthamakkhitattā jigucchanto na gaṇhāti,
atk-abh01a0:1229_5: Tattha sītalassa gūthamakkhanajigucchāya agaṇhanaṃ viya ajjhattaṃ lajjidhammaṃ okkamitvā pāpassa akaraṇaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1229_6: Uṇhassa ḍāhabhayena agaṇhanaṃ viya apāyabhayena pāpassa akaraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1230_2: Idampi dvayaṃ pāpaparivajjane eva pākaṭaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1230_3: Ekacco hi jātimahattapaccavekkhaṇā satthumahattapaccavekkhaṇā dāyajjamahattapaccavekkhaṇā sabrahmacārīmahattapaccavekkhaṇāti
atk-abh01a0:1230_4: catūhi kāraṇehi sappatissavalakkhaṇaṃ hiriṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā pāpaṃ na karoti.
atk-abh01a0:1230_5: Ekacco attānuvādabhayaṃ parānuvādabhayaṃ daṇḍabhayaṃ duggatibhayanti catūhi kāraṇehi vajjabhīrukabhayadassāvilakkhaṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1230_7: Tattha jātimahattapaccavekkhaṇādīni ceva attānuvādabhayādīni ca vitthāretvā kathetabbāni.
atk-abh01a0:1232_12: Amoho lakkhaṇādīhi heṭṭhā paññindriyapade vibhāvito eva.
atk-abh01a0:1233_0: Imesu pana tīsu alobho maccheramalassa paṭipakkho,
atk-abh01a0:1234_0: Alobhena cettha vijjamānaṃ dosaṃ dosato dhārento dose pavattati;
atk-abh01a0:1234_2: Adosena vijjamānaṃ guṇaṃ guṇato dhārento guṇe pavattati;
atk-abh01a0:1234_4: Amohena yāthāvasabhāvaṃ yāthāvasabhāvato dhārento yāthāvasabhāve pavattati.
atk-abh01a0:1234_5: Mūḷho hi ‘tacchaṃ atacchanti atacchaṃ ca taccha’nti gaṇhāti.
atk-abh01a0:1236_0: Visesato cettha alobhena pettivisaye upapatti na hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1236_1: Yebhuyyena hi sattā taṇhāya pettivisayaṃ upapajjanti,
atk-abh01a0:1236_4: Dosena hi caṇḍajātitāya dosasadisaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjanti.
atk-abh01a0:1236_9: Etesu ca alobho rāgavasena upagamanassa abhāvakaro,
atk-abh01a0:1237_0: Tīhipi cetehi yathāpaṭipāṭiyā nekkhammasaññā abyāpādasaññā avihiṃsāsaññāti imā tisso.
atk-abh01a0:1237_1: Asubhasaññā appamāṇasaññā dhātusaññāti imā ca tisso saññāyo honti.
atk-abh01a0:1237_8: Purimāni ca dve satipaṭṭhānāni purimānaṃ dvinnaṃ ānubhāvena,
atk-abh01a0:1238_1: aluddho hi lobhanīyampi asappāyaṃ na sevati,
atk-abh01a0:1238_4: aduṭṭho hi valipalitāvahena dosagginā aḍayhamāno dīgharattaṃ yuvā hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1238_6: amūḷho hi hitāhitaṃ ñatvā ahitaṃ parivajjanto hitañca paṭisevamāno dīghāyuko hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1239_3: mettāya mittānaṃ paṭilābhato ceva aparihānato ca.
atk-abh01a0:1239_5: amūḷho hi attano hitameva karonto attānaṃ sampādeti.
atk-abh01a0:1240_0: Alobhena cettha sakapakkhesu sattasaṅkhāresu nibbuto hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1241_1: luddho hi upabhogāsāya aniccepi saṅkhāre aniccato na passati.
atk-abh01a0:1241_3: adosajjhāsayo hi pariccattaāghātavatthupariggaho saṅkhāreyeva dukkhato passati.
atk-abh01a0:1241_5: amūḷho hi yāthāvagahaṇakusalo apariṇāyakaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ apariṇāyakato bujjhati.
atk-abh01a0:1241_6: Yathā ca etehi aniccadassanādīni evametepi aniccadassanādīhi honti.
atk-abh01a0:1241_10: Ko hi nāma ‘aniccamida’nti sammā ñatvā tassatthāya pihaṃ uppādeyya,
atk-abh01a0:1241_11: saṅkhāre vā ‘dukkha’nti jānanto aparampi accantatikhiṇaṃ kodhadukkhaṃ uppādeyya,
atk-abh01a0:1243_1: Kāyikacetasikasukhaṃ idhalokaparalokahitaṃ guṇānubhāvapaṭiladdhaṃ kittisaddañca na byāpādetīti abyāpādo.
atk-abh01a0:1245_2: Lokañhi ime dve dhammā pālayanti. Yathāha –
atk-abh01a0:1246_6: dve sukkā dhammā lokaṃ pālenti. Sace,
atk-abh01a0:1246_8: dve sukkā dhammā lokaṃ na pāleyyuṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1246_14: Sambhedaṃ loko agamissa yathā ajeḷakā kukkuṭasūkarā soṇasiṅgālā.
atk-abh01a0:1246_17: ime dve sukkā dhammā lokaṃ pālenti,
atk-abh01a0:1246_18: tasmā paññāyati mātāti vā mātucchāti vā mātulānīti vā ācariyabhariyāti vā garūnaṃ dārāti vā”ti.
atk-abh01a0:1248_3: Ubhopi panetā ekato katvā kāyacittadarathavūpasamalakkhaṇā kāyacittapassaddhiyo,
atk-abh01a0:1254_3: Sātthakasampajaññaṃ sappāyasampajaññaṃ gocarasampajaññaṃ asammohasampajaññanti imesaṃ catunnaṃ panassa vasena bhedo veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1254_4: Lakkhaṇādīni ca tesaṃ satindriyapaññindriyesu vuttanayeneva veditabbāni.
atk-abh01a0:1254_5: Iti heṭṭhā vuttamevetaṃ dhammadvayaṃ puna imasmiṃ ṭhāne upakāravasena gahitaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1255_1: Aniccādivasena vividhehi ākārehi dhamme passatīti vipassanā.
atk-abh01a0:1256_1: Uddhaccasaṅkhātassa vikkhepassa paṭipakkhabhāvato na vikkhepoti avikkhepo.
atk-abh01a0:1256_3: Idha panetaṃ dvayaṃ vīriyasamādhiyojanatthāya gahitanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1258_0: Ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā,
atk-abh01a0:1258_2: avikkhepo hotī’ti na kevalaṃ padapaṭipāṭiyā uddiṭṭhā ime paropaṇṇāsadhammā eva,
atk-abh01a0:1258_3: atha kho yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ tihetukaṃ somanassasahagataṃ paṭhamaṃ asaṅkhārikaṃ mahācittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1258_4: tasmiṃ samaye ye vā pana aññepi tehiyeva phassādīhi sampayuttā hutvā pavattamānā atthi,
atk-abh01a0:1258_5: attano attano anurūpaṃ paccayaṃ paṭicca samuppannā rūpābhāvena arūpino,
atk-abh01a0:1258_6: sabhāvato upalabbhamānā dhammā sabbepi ime dhammā kusalā.
atk-abh01a0:1259_0: Ettāvatā cittaṅgavasena pāḷiyaṃ āruḷhe paropaṇṇāsadhamme dīpetvā yevāpanakavasena aparepi nava dhamme dhammarājā dīpeti.
atk-abh01a0:1259_1: Tesu tesu hi suttapadesu ‘chando adhimokkho manasikāro tatramajjhattatā karuṇā muditā kāyaduccaritavirati
atk-abh01a0:1259_2: vacīduccaritavirati micchājīvaviratī’ti ime nava dhammā paññāyanti.
atk-abh01a0:1260_4: so adose gahite gahito eva hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1260_8: so pana tatramajjhattatāya gahitāya gahitova hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1261_0: Imesu pana navasu chando adhimokkho manasikāro tatramajjhattatāti ime cattārova ekakkhaṇe labbhanti,
atk-abh01a0:1261_2: Yadā hi iminā cittena micchāvācaṃ pajahati,
atk-abh01a0:1261_5: sammāvācā cāti ime pañca ekakkhaṇe labbhanti.
atk-abh01a0:1261_13: muditāpubbabhāgo cāti ime pañca ekakkhaṇe labbhanti.
atk-abh01a0:1261_15: dānaṃ dentassa sīlaṃ pūrentassa yoge kammaṃ karontassa cattāri apaṇṇakaṅgāneva labbhanti.
atk-abh01a0:1262_5: Ārammaṇassa gahaṇe cāyaṃ cetaso hatthappasāraṇaṃ viya daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1265_5: Cittacetasikānaṃ ajjhupekkhanavasena samappavattānaṃ ājāneyyānaṃ ajjhupekkhanasārathi viya daṭṭhabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1268_0: Iti phassādīni chappaññāsa yevāpanakavasena vuttāni navāti sabbānipi imasmiṃ dhammuddesavāre pañcasaṭṭhi dhammapadāni bhavanti.
atk-abh01a0:1268_5: Tehi mutte ekasmiṃ ṭhāne samasaṭṭhi bhavanti.
atk-abh01a0:1268_6: Ṭhapetvā pana yevāpanake pāḷiyaṃ yathārutavasena gayhamānāni chappaññāsāva honti.
atk-abh01a0:1268_12: kāyapassaddhicittapassaddhiādayo dvādasa dhammāti samatiṃsa dhammā honti.
atk-abh01a0:1269_0: Tesu samatiṃsāya dhammesu aṭṭhārasa dhammā avibhattikā honti,
atk-abh01a0:1269_3: Phasso saññā cetanā vicāro pīti jīvitindriyaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1269_4: kāyapassaddhiādayo dvādasa dhammāti ime aṭṭhārasa avibhattikā.
atk-abh01a0:1269_8: alobho adosoti ime dvādasa dhammā savibhattikā.
atk-abh01a0:1269_9: Tesu satta dhammā dvīsu ṭhānesu vibhattā, eko tīsu,
atk-abh01a0:1270_0: Kathaṃ? Cittaṃ vitakko saddhā hirī ottappaṃ alobho adosoti ime satta dvīsu ṭhānesu vibhattā.
atk-abh01a0:1271_0: Etesu hi cittaṃ tāva phassapañcakaṃ patvā cittaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1271_2: Vitakko jhānaṅgāni patvā vitakko hotīti vutto,
atk-abh01a0:1271_4: Saddhā indriyāni patvā saddhindriyaṃ hotīti vuttā,
atk-abh01a0:1271_6: Hirī balāni patvā hiribalaṃ hotīti vuttā,
atk-abh01a0:1271_9: Alobho mūlaṃ patvā alobho hotīti vutto,
atk-abh01a0:1271_11: Adoso mūlaṃ patvā adoso hotīti vutto,
atk-abh01a0:1272_0: Vedanā pana phassapañcakaṃ patvā vedanā hotīti vuttā,
atk-abh01a0:1272_3: Evaṃ eko dhammo tīsu ṭhānesu vibhatto.
atk-abh01a0:1273_0: Vīriyaṃ pana indriyāni patvā vīriyindriyaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1273_4: Satipi indriyāni patvā satindriyaṃ hotīti vuttā,
atk-abh01a0:1273_8: Evaṃ ime dve dhammā catūsu ṭhānesu vibhattā.
atk-abh01a0:1274_0: Samādhi pana jhānaṅgāni patvā cittassekaggatā hotīti vutto,
atk-abh01a0:1274_5: Evamayaṃ eko dhammo chasu ṭhānesu vibhatto.
atk-abh01a0:1275_0: Paññā pana indriyāni patvā paññindriyaṃ hotīti vuttā,
atk-abh01a0:1275_6: Evaṃ eko dhammo sattasu ṭhānesu vibhatto.
atk-abh01a0:1276_2: heṭṭhā gahitameva gaṇhitvā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne padaṃ pūritaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1276_10: Sammāsambuddho hi tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ kiccaṃ jānāti,
atk-abh01a0:1276_11: taṃ ñatvā kiccavasena vibhattiṃ āropento aṭṭhārasa dhammā ekekakiccāti ñatvā ekekasmiṃ ṭhāne vibhattiṃ āropesi.
atk-abh01a0:1276_12: Satta dhammā dvedvekiccāti ñatvā dvīsu dvīsu ṭhānesu vibhattiṃ āropesi.
atk-abh01a0:1276_13: Vedanā tikiccāti ñatvā tīsu ṭhānesu vibhattiṃ āropesi.
atk-abh01a0:1276_14: Vīriyasatīnaṃ cattāri cattāri kiccānīti ñatvā catūsu catūsu ṭhānesu vibhattiṃ āropesi.
atk-abh01a0:1276_15: Samādhi chakiccoti ñatvā chasu ṭhānesu vibhattiṃ āropesi.
atk-abh01a0:1276_16: Paññā sattakiccāti ñatvā sattasu ṭhānesu vibhattiṃ āropesi’.
atk-abh01a0:1277_1: eko kira paṇḍito rājā rahogato cintesi –
atk-abh01a0:1277_2: ‘imaṃ rājakulasantakaṃ na yathā vā tathā vā khāditabbaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1277_4: So sabbe sippike sannipātāpetvā ‘ekekasippajānanake pakkosathā’ti āha.
atk-abh01a0:1277_7: ‘Dve dve sippāni jānantā āgacchantū’ti vutte pana satta janā āgamaṃsu.
atk-abh01a0:1277_9: ‘Tīṇi sippāni jānantā āgacchantū’ti vutte ekova āgacchi.
atk-abh01a0:1277_11: ‘Cattāri sippāni jānantā āgacchantū’ti vutte dve janā āgamaṃsu.
atk-abh01a0:1277_13: ‘Pañca sippāni jānantā āgacchantū’ti vutte ekopi nāgacchi.
atk-abh01a0:1277_14: ‘Cha sippāni jānantā āgacchantū’ti vutte ekova āgacchi.
atk-abh01a0:1277_16: ‘Satta sippāni jānantā āgacchantū’ti vutte ekova āgacchi.
atk-abh01a0:1278_0: Tattha paṇḍito rājā viya anuttaro dhammarājā.
atk-abh01a0:1278_2: Sippānucchavikavetanavaḍḍhanaṃ viya kiccavasena tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ vibhattiāropanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1279_0: Sabbepi panete dhammā phassapañcakavasena jhānaṅgavasena indriyavasena maggavasena balavasena mūlavasena
atk-abh01a0:1279_1: kammapathavasena lokapālavasena passaddhivasena lahutāvasena mudutāvasena kammaññatāvasena pāguññatāvasena
atk-abh01a0:1279_2: ujukatāvasena satisampajaññavasena samathavipassanāvasena paggāhāvikkhepavasenāti sattarasa rāsayo hontīti.
atk-abh01a0:1282_1: Idāni tāneva dhammuddesavāre pāḷiāruḷhāni chappaññāsa padāni vibhajitvā dassetuṃ ‘katamo tasmiṃ samaye phasso hotī’tiādinā nayena niddesavāro āraddho.
atk-abh01a0:1283_1: yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ somanassasahagataṃ tihetukaṃ asaṅkhārikaṃ mahācittaṃ uppajjati,
atk-abh01a0:1283_3: katamo so phassoti iminā nayena sabbapucchāsu attho veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1284_0: Yo tasmiṃ samaye phassoti tasmiṃ samaye yo phusanakavasena uppanno phasso,
atk-abh01a0:1284_4: Samphusanāti phusanākārova upasaggena padaṃ vaḍḍhetvā vutto.
atk-abh01a0:1284_10: yaṃ tasmiṃ samaye samphusitattaṃ; atha vā,
atk-abh01a0:1284_12: aññenāpi pariyāyena phusanā samphusanā samphusitattanti vuccati,
atk-abh01a0:1284_14: Vedanādīnampi niddesesu imināva nayena padayojanā veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1285_1: Yānimāni bhagavatā paṭhamaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ mahācittaṃ bhājetvā dassentena atirekapaṇṇāsapadāni mātikāvasena
atk-abh01a0:1285_2: ṭhapetvā puna ekekapadaṃ gahetvā vibhattiṃ āropitāni,
atk-abh01a0:1285_3: tāni vibhattiṃ gacchantāni tīhi kāraṇehi vibhattiṃ gacchanti;
atk-abh01a0:1285_4: nānā hontāni catūhi kāraṇehi nānā bhavanti.
atk-abh01a0:1285_5: Aparadīpanā panettha dve ṭhānāni gacchati. Kathaṃ?
atk-abh01a0:1285_6: Etānihi byañjanavasena upasaggavasena atthavasenāti imehi tīhi kāraṇehi vibhattiṃ gacchanti.
atk-abh01a0:1285_8: doso dussanā dussitattanti evaṃ byañjanavasena vibhattigamanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1285_9: Ettha hi ekova kodho byañjanavasena evaṃ vibhattiṃ gato.
atk-abh01a0:1285_10: Cāro vicāro anuvicāro upavicāroti evaṃ pana upasaggavasena vibhattigamanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1285_11: Paṇḍiccaṃ kosallaṃ nepuññaṃ vebhabyā cintā upaparikkhāti evaṃ atthavasena vibhattigamanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1285_12: Tesu phassapadaniddese tāva imā tissopi vibhattiyo labbhanti.
atk-abh01a0:1286_0: Nānā hontānipi pana nāmanānattena lakkhaṇanānattena kiccanānattena paṭikkhepanānattenāti imehi catūhi kāraṇehi nānā honti.
atk-abh01a0:1286_1: Tattha katamo tasmiṃ samaye byāpādo hoti?
atk-abh01a0:1286_2: Yo tasmiṃ samaye doso dussanāti ettha byāpādoti vā,
atk-abh01a0:1287_0: Rāsaṭṭhena ca pañcapi khandhā ekova khandho hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1287_5: viññāṇaṃ vijānanalakkhaṇanti iminā lakkhaṇanānattena pañcakkhandhā honti.
atk-abh01a0:1288_1: “idha bhikkhu anuppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ anuppādāya…pe…
atk-abh01a0:1288_2: cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahatī”ti ekameva vīriyaṃ kiccanānattena catūsu ṭhānesu āgataṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1290_0: Imāni pana cattāri nānattāni na phasseyeva labbhanti,
atk-abh01a0:1291_1: Alobhādiniddese pana alobho alubbhanā alubbhitattantiādinā nayena labbhatīti evaṃ paṭikkhepanānattena nānattaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1291_2: Evaṃ sabbapadaniddesesu labbhamānavasena catubbidhampi nānattaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1292_0: Aparadīpanā pana padatthuti vā hoti daḷhīkammaṃ vāti evaṃ dve ṭhānāni gacchati.
atk-abh01a0:1292_1: Yaṭṭhikoṭiyā uppīḷentena viya hi sakimeva phassoti vutte etaṃ padaṃ phullitamaṇḍitavibhūsitaṃ nāma na hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1292_2: Punappunaṃ byañjanavasena upasaggavasena atthavasena ‘phasso phusanā samphusanā samphusitatta’nti vutte phullitamaṇḍitavibhūsitaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1292_4: manoramaṃ vatthaṃ paridahāpetvā pupphāni piḷandhāpetvā akkhīni añjetvā athassa nalāṭe ekameva manosilābinduṃ kareyyuṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1292_5: tassa na ettāvatā cittatilako nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1292_6: Nānāvaṇṇehi pana parivāretvā bindūsu katesu cittatilako nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1293_0: Byañjanavasena upasaggavasena atthavasena ca punappunaṃ bhaṇanameva daḷhīkammaṃ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1293_1: Yathā hi ‘āvuso’ti vā ‘bhante’ti vā ‘yakkho’ti vā ‘sappo’ti vā vutte daḷhīkammaṃ nāma na hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1293_2: ‘Āvuso āvuso’‘bhante bhante’‘yakkho yakkho’‘sappo sappo’ti vutte pana daḷhīkammaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1293_3: Evameva sakideva yaṭṭhikoṭiyā uppīḷentena viya ‘phasso’ti vutte padaṃ daḷhīkammaṃ nāma na hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1293_4: Punappunaṃ byañjanavasena upasaggavasena atthavasena ‘phasso phusanā samphusanā samphusitatta’nti vutteyeva ‘daḷhīkammaṃ’ nāma hotīti.
atk-abh01a0:1293_6: Etassāpi vasena labbhamānakapadaniddesesu sabbattha attho veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1294_0: Ayaṃ tasmiṃ samaye phasso hotīti yasmiṃ samaye paṭhamaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ mahākusalacittaṃ uppajjati,
atk-abh01a0:1294_1: tasmiṃ samaye ayaṃ phasso nāma hotīti attho.
atk-abh01a0:1294_3: Ito paresu pana vedanādīnaṃ padānaṃ niddesesu visesamattameva vaṇṇayissāma.
atk-abh01a0:1295_1: Yaṃ tasmiṃ samayeti ettha kiñcāpi katamā tasmiṃ samaye vedanā hotīti āraddhaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1295_3: Tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātusamphassajanti ettha ‘tajjā’ vuccati tassa sātasukhassa anucchavikā sāruppā.
atk-abh01a0:1295_7: Tehi vā rūpādīhi ārammaṇehi imassa ca sukhassa paccayehi jātātipi tajjā.
atk-abh01a0:1295_14: yaṃ tasmiṃ samaye yathāvuttena atthena tajjāya manoviññāṇadhātuyā samphassajaṃ cetasikaṃ sātaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1296_0: Idāni cetasikaṃ sukhantiādīsu cetasikapadena kāyikasukhaṃ paṭikkhipati,
atk-abh01a0:1297_1: Saññāniddese tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātusamphassajāti tassākusalasaññāya anucchavikāya manoviññāṇadhātuyā samphassamhi jātā.
atk-abh01a0:1299_3: “Antalikkhacaro pāso yvāyaṃ carati mānaso”ti hi ettha pana sampayuttakadhammo ‘mānaso’ti vutto.
atk-abh01a0:1301_0: Appattamānaso sekkho, kālaṃ kayirā jane sutā”ti. ;
atk-abh01a0:1303_2: hadayaṃ vā te phālessāmī”ti ettha uro hadayanti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1303_3: “Hadayā hadayaṃ maññe aññāya tacchatī”ti ettha cittaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1304_0: Mano manāyatananti idha pana manoggahaṇaṃ manasseva āyatanabhāvadīpanatthaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1304_3: atha kho mano eva āyatanaṃ manāyatana’nti.
atk-abh01a0:1304_4: Tattha nivāsaṭhānaṭṭhena ākaraṭṭhena samosaraṇaṭhānaṭṭhena sañjātidesaṭṭhena kāraṇaṭṭhena ca āyatanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1304_5: Tathā hi loke ‘issarāyatanaṃ vāsudevāyatana’ntiādīsu nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ āyatananti vuccati.
atk-abh01a0:1304_7: Sāsane pana “manorame āyatane sevanti naṃ vihaṅgamā”tiādīsu samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1304_9: “Tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṃ pāpuṇāti sati satiāyatane”tiādīsu kāraṇaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1304_10: Idha pana sañjātidesaṭṭhena samosaraṇaṭhānaṭṭhena kāraṇaṭṭhenāti tidhāpi vaṭṭati.
atk-abh01a0:1305_0: Phassādayo hi dhammā ettha sañjāyantīti sañjātidesaṭṭhenapi etaṃ āyatanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1305_1: Bahiddhā rūpasaddagandharasaphoṭṭhabbā ārammaṇabhāvenettha osarantīti samosaraṇaṭhānaṭṭhenapi āyatanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1305_2: Phassādīnaṃ pana sahajātādipaccayaṭṭhena kāraṇattā kāraṇaṭṭhenapi āyatananti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1306_5: “Addasā kho bhagavā mahantaṃ dārukkhandha”nti ettha paṇṇattimattaṭṭhena.
atk-abh01a0:1306_7: Rāsaṭṭhena hi viññāṇakkhandhassa ekadeso ekaṃ viññāṇaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1306_8: Tasmā yathā rukkhassa ekadesaṃ chindanto rukkhaṃ chindatīti vuccati,
atk-abh01a0:1306_9: evameva viññāṇakkhandhassa ekadesabhūtaṃ ekampi viññāṇaṃ ruḷhito viññāṇakkhandhoti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1307_0: Tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātūti tesaṃ phassādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ anucchavikā manoviññāṇadhātu.
atk-abh01a0:1307_1: Imasmiñhi pade ekameva cittaṃ minanaṭṭhena mano,
atk-abh01a0:1307_3: sabhāvaṭṭhena nissattaṭṭhena vā dhātūti tīhi nāmehi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1307_4: Iti imasmiṃ phassapañcamake phasso tāva yasmā phasso eva,
atk-abh01a0:1307_7: tasmā imasmiṃ padadvaye ‘tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātusamphassajā’ti paññatti na āropitā.
atk-abh01a0:1307_8: Vitakkapadādīsu pana labbhamānāpi idha pacchinnattā na uddhaṭā.
atk-abh01a0:1308_0: Imesañca pana phassapañcamakānaṃ dhammānaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ vinibbhogaṃ katvā paññattiṃ uddharamānena bhagavatā dukkaraṃ kataṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1308_1: Nānāudakānañhi nānātelānaṃ vā ekabhājane pakkhipitvā divasaṃ nimmathitānaṃ vaṇṇa gandharasānaṃ nānatāya
atk-abh01a0:1308_2: disvā vā ghāyitvā vā sāyitvā vā nānākaraṇaṃ sakkā bhaveyya ñātuṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1308_4: Sammāsambuddhena pana imesaṃ arūpīnaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ dhammānaṃ ekārammaṇe pavattamānānaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1308_5: pāṭiyekkaṃ vinibbhogaṃ katvā paññattiṃ uddharamānena atidukkaraṃ kataṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1309_6: yaṃ imesaṃ arūpīnaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ dhammānaṃ ekārammaṇe pavattamānānaṃ vavatthānaṃ akkhātaṃ –
atk-abh01a0:1309_13: kocideva puriso nāvāya samuddaṃ ajjhogāhetvā hatthapuṭena udakaṃ gahetvā jivhāya sāyitvā jāneyya nu kho, mahārāja,
atk-abh01a0:1309_23: bhagavatā kataṃ yaṃ imesaṃ arūpīnaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ dhammānaṃ…pe…
atk-abh01a0:1310_2: Tassa tittakaṃ takkesi kumbhaṃ takkesi sakaṭaṃ takkesi yojanaṃ takkesi addhayojanaṃ takkesīti evaṃ takkanavasena pavatti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1310_10: Ārammaṇe cittaṃ abhiniropeti patiṭṭhāpetīti cetaso abhiniropanā.
atk-abh01a0:1310_11: Yāthāvatāya niyyānikatāya ca kusalabhāvappatto pasattho saṅkappoti sammāsaṅkappo.
atk-abh01a0:1312_5: Yathā vā bhesajjānaṃ vā telānaṃ vā uṇhodakasītodakānaṃ vā ekatokaraṇaṃ modanāti vuccati,
atk-abh01a0:1312_7: Upasaggavasena pana maṇḍetvā āmodanā pamodanāti vuttā.
atk-abh01a0:1312_14: Yathā hi dhanino dhanaṃ paṭicca somanassaṃ uppajjati,
atk-abh01a0:1312_15: evaṃ pītimatopi pītiṃ paṭicca somanassaṃ uppajjati,
atk-abh01a0:1312_18: Pītimā pana puggalo kāyacittānaṃ uggatattā abbhuggatattā udaggoti vuccati.
atk-abh01a0:1312_21: Anabhiraddhassa hi mano dukkhapadaṭṭhānattā attano mano nāma na hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1312_22: abhiraddhassa pana sukhapadaṭṭhānattā attano mano nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1312_26: Sā pana yasmā na aññassa kassaci attano manatā,
atk-abh01a0:1313_3: Apica sampayuttadhamme ārammaṇamhi sampiṇḍetvā tiṭṭhatīti saṇṭhiti.
atk-abh01a0:1313_11: Akusalapakkhe pana tayo dhammā ārammaṇaṃ ogāhanti –
atk-abh01a0:1313_15: Yathā hi rajuṭṭhānaṭṭhāne udakena siñcitvā sammaṭṭhe thokameva kālaṃ rajo sannisīdati,
atk-abh01a0:1313_17: evameva akusalapakkhe cittekaggatā na balavatī hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1313_18: Yathā pana tasmiṃ ṭhāne ghaṭehi udakaṃ āsiñcitvā kudālena khanitvā ākoṭanamaddanaghaṭṭanāni katvā upalitte ādāse viya chāyā paññāyati,
atk-abh01a0:1314_2: Ayaṃ pana tathāvidho vikkhepo na hotīti avikkhepo.
atk-abh01a0:1314_3: Uddhaccavicikicchāvaseneva ca cittaṃ visāhaṭaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1314_5: Ayaṃ pana evaṃ avisāhaṭassa mānasassa bhāvoti avisāhaṭamānasatā.
atk-abh01a0:1315_4: Tattha aṭṭhasu samāpattīsu cittekaggatā cittasamatho nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1315_5: Tañhi āgamma cittacalanaṃ cittavipphanditaṃ sammati vūpasammati,
atk-abh01a0:1315_8: Tañhi āgamma tāni tāni adhikaraṇāni sammanti vūpasammanti,
atk-abh01a0:1315_10: Yasmā pana sabbe saṅkhārā nibbānaṃ āgamma sammanti vūpasammanti,
atk-abh01a0:1316_2: Buddhādīni vā ratanāni saddahati pattiyāyatīti saddhā.
atk-abh01a0:1316_6: Buddhādīnaṃ guṇesu etāya sattā ativiya pasīdanti,
atk-abh01a0:1316_8: Idāni yasmā saddhindriyādīnaṃ samāsapadānaṃ vasena aññasmiṃ pariyāye āraddhe ādipadaṃ gahetvāva padabhājanaṃ karīyati –
atk-abh01a0:1316_15: Evaṃ sabbapadaniddesesu ādipadassa puna vacane payojanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1317_1: Vīriyindriyaniddese cetasikoti idaṃ vīriyassa niyamato cetasikabhāvadīpanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1317_6: Itihidaṃ uddesaṃ gacchatī”ti evamādīsu suttesu caṅkamādīni karontassa uppannattā ‘kāyika’nti vuccamānampi kāyaviññāṇaṃ viya kāyikaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-abh01a0:1317_11: saddo kamme āpattiyaṃ kiriyāyaṃ vīriye hiṃsāya vikopaneti anekesu atthesu āgato.
atk-abh01a0:1320_1: “Ārambhati ca vippaṭisārī ca hotī”ti ettha āpatti.
atk-abh01a0:1320_2: “Mahāyaññā mahārambhā na te honti mahapphalā”ti ettha yūpussāpanādikiriyā.
atk-abh01a0:1320_4: “Samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ uddissa pāṇaṃ ārabhantī”ti ettha hiṃsā.
atk-abh01a0:1320_17: Cittacetasikānaṃ dhāraṇavasena avicchedato vā pavattanavasena kusalasantānaṃ dhāretīti dhiti.
atk-abh01a0:1322_0: “Kāmaṃ taco ca nhāru ca aṭṭhi ca avasissatū”ti evaṃ pavattikāle asithilaparakkamavasena asithilaparakkamatā;
atk-abh01a0:1322_3: Yasmā panetaṃ vīriyaṃ kusalakammakaraṇaṭṭhāne chandaṃ na nikkhipati,
atk-abh01a0:1322_9: Yathā pana tajjātike udakasambhinnaṭṭhāne dhuravāhagoṇaṃ gaṇhathāti vadanti,
atk-abh01a0:1322_10: so jaṇṇunā bhūmiṃ uppīḷetvāpi dhuraṃ vahati,
atk-abh01a0:1322_12: evameva vīriyaṃ kusalakammakaraṇaṭṭhāne dhuraṃ ukkhipati paggaṇhāti,
atk-abh01a0:1323_4: Abhimukhaṃ gantvā viya saraṇato paṭisaraṇavasena paṭissati.
atk-abh01a0:1323_7: Yasmā pana saraṇatāti tiṇṇaṃ saraṇānampi nāmaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1323_8: tasmā taṃ paṭisedhetuṃ puna satiggahaṇaṃ kataṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1323_18: Upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇe jotanalakkhaṇe ca indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti indriyaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1324_1: Paññindriyaniddese tassa tassa atthassa pākaṭakaraṇasaṅkhātena paññāpanaṭṭhena paññā.
atk-abh01a0:1324_2: Tena tena vā aniccādinā pakārena dhamme jānātītipi paññā.
atk-abh01a0:1324_9: Sāyeva puna upasagganānattena upalakkhaṇā paccupalakkhaṇāti vuttā.
atk-abh01a0:1324_15: Yassa vā uppajjati taṃ aniccādīni cintāpetītipi cintā.
atk-abh01a0:1324_18: Ayampi saṇhaṭṭhena vitthaṭaṭṭhena ca bhūrī viyāti bhūrī.
atk-abh01a0:1324_21: Tāya pathavīsamāya vitthaṭāya vipulāya paññāya samannāgatoti bhūripaññoti.
atk-abh01a0:1324_24: Asani viya siluccaye kilese medhati hiṃsatīti medhā.
atk-abh01a0:1324_26: Yassa uppajjati taṃ attahitapaṭipattiyaṃ sampayuttadhamme ca yāthāvalakkhaṇapaṭivedhe parinetīti pariṇāyikā.
atk-abh01a0:1324_29: Uppathapaṭipanne sindhave vīthiāropanatthaṃ patodo viya uppathe dhāvanakaṃ kūṭacittaṃ vīthiāropanatthaṃ vijjhatīti patodo viya patodo.
atk-abh01a0:1325_3: Paññavato hi ekapallaṅkena nisinnassa dasasahassilokadhātu ekālokā ekobhāsā ekapajjotā hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1325_5: Imesu pana tīsu padesu ekapadenapi etasmiṃ atthe siddhe,
atk-abh01a0:1325_9: Candāloko sūriyāloko agyāloko paññāloko. Ime kho,
atk-abh01a0:1325_22: Attho hi anekehi ākārehi vibhajjamāno suvibhatto hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1326_0: Ratikaraṇaṭṭhena pana ratidāyakaṭṭhena ratijanakaṭṭhena cittīkataṭṭhena dullabhapātubhāvaṭṭhena atulaṭṭhena
atk-abh01a0:1326_3: sayaṃ vā ārammaṇe na muyhatīti amoho.
atk-abh01a0:1326_8: yvāyaṃ amoho so na kevalaṃ mohato añño dhammo,
atk-abh01a0:1327_1: Jīvitindriyaniddese yo tesaṃ arūpīnaṃ dhammānaṃ āyūti tesaṃ sampayuttakānaṃ arūpadhammānaṃ yo āyāpanaṭṭhena āyu,
atk-abh01a0:1327_2: tasmiñhi sati arūpadhammā ayanti gacchanti pavattanti,
atk-abh01a0:1327_5: Yasmā panete dhammā āyusmiṃyeva sati tiṭṭhanti yapenti yāpenti iriyanti vattanti pālayanti,
atk-abh01a0:1327_11: Evaṃ bujjhantānaṃ pana vasena purimapade rassattaṃ kataṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1328_1: Hiribalaniddese yaṃ tasmiṃ samayeti yena dhammena tasmiṃ samaye.
atk-abh01a0:1328_2: Liṅgavipallāsaṃ vā katvā yo dhammo tasmiṃ samayetipi attho veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1328_8: Tesaṃ dhammānaṃ samāpattiṃ paṭilābhaṃ samaṅgībhāvaṃ hiriyati jigucchatīti attho.
atk-abh01a0:1329_2: Ottappitabbayuttakena ottappassa hetubhūtena kāyaduccaritādinā vuttappakārāya ca samāpattiyā ottappassa hetubhūtāya ottappati,
atk-abh01a0:1330_13: Alobho hi kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ mūlaṃ paccayaṭṭhenāti kusalamūlaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1332_1: Kāyapassaddhiniddesādīsu yasmā kāyoti tayo khandhā adhippetā,
atk-abh01a0:1332_10: Sabbapadehipi tiṇṇaṃ khandhānaṃ kilesadarathapaṭippassaddhi eva kathitā.
atk-abh01a0:1333_8: Evaṃ paṭhamena tiṇṇaṃ khandhānaṃ lahutākāro kathito.
atk-abh01a0:1337_3: Ujukassa khandhattayassa viññāṇakkhandhassa ca bhāvo ujukatā.
atk-abh01a0:1338_0: Yo hi pāpaṃ katvāva ‘na karomī’ti bhāsati,
atk-abh01a0:1338_4: Yo pāpaṃ karontova ‘ko pāpassa na bhāyeyyā’ti bhāsati,
atk-abh01a0:1340_0: Tassa kilesavasena evaṃ vaṅkassa puggalassa bhāvo jimhatā vaṅkatā kuṭilatāti vuccati.
atk-abh01a0:1340_5: Evaṃ sabbehipi imehi padehi purimanayena tiṇṇaṃ khandhānaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1340_6: pacchimanayena viññāṇakkhandhassāti arūpīnaṃ dhammānaṃ nikkilesatāya ujutākārova kathitoti veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1341_1: tena dhammuddesavāre dassitānaṃ ‘yevāpanakānaṃ’yeva saṅkhepato niddeso kathito hotīti.
atk-abh01a0:1343_0: Ettāvatā pucchā samayaniddeso dhammuddeso appanāti uddesavāre catūhi paricchedehi,
atk-abh01a0:1343_1: pucchā samayaniddeso dhammuddeso appanāti niddesavāre catūhi paricchedehīti aṭṭhaparicchedapaṭimaṇḍito dhammavavatthānavāro niṭṭhitova hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1345_1: Idāni tasmiṃ kho pana samaye cattāro khandhā hontīti saṅgahavāro āraddho.
atk-abh01a0:1345_3: Tattha ‘tasmiṃ kho pana samaye cattāro khandhā’ti evamādiko uddeso.
atk-abh01a0:1345_4: Katame tasmiṃ samaye cattāro khandhā’tiādiko niddeso.
atk-abh01a0:1345_5: Katamo tasmiṃ samaye vedanākkhandhotiādiko paṭiniddesoti veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1346_0: Tattha uddesavāre cattāro khandhātiādayo tevīsati koṭṭhāsā honti.
atk-abh01a0:1346_2: yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ paṭhamaṃ mahākusalacittaṃ uppajjati,
atk-abh01a0:1346_6: te sabbepi saṅgayhamānā rāsaṭṭhena cattārova khandhā honti.
atk-abh01a0:1346_7: Heṭṭhā vuttena āyatanaṭṭhena dve āyatanāni honti.
atk-abh01a0:1346_8: Sabhāvaṭṭhena suññataṭṭhena nissattaṭṭhena dveva dhātuyo honti.
atk-abh01a0:1346_9: Paccayasaṅkhātena āhāraṭṭhena tayovettha dhammā āhārā honti.
atk-abh01a0:1347_0: ‘Kiṃ panete aññamaññaṃ vā taṃsamuṭṭhānarūpassa vā paccayā na hontī’ti?
atk-abh01a0:1347_3: aññathā cāti samānepi paccayatte atirekapaccayā honti,
atk-abh01a0:1347_6: yesaṃ dhammānaṃ avasesā cittacetasikā paccayā honti,
atk-abh01a0:1347_9: Manosañcetanāhāro tesañca paccayo hoti tayo ca bhave āharati.
atk-abh01a0:1347_10: Viññāṇāhāro tesañca paccayo hoti paṭisandhināmarūpañca āharatī’ti.
atk-abh01a0:1347_11: ‘Nanu ca so vipākova idaṃ pana kusalaviññāṇa’nti?
atk-abh01a0:1347_14: Upatthambhakaṭṭhena vā ime tayo āhārāti vuttā.
atk-abh01a0:1347_19: “arūpino āhārā sampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ āhārapaccayena paccayo”ti.
atk-abh01a0:1348_1: ajjhattikasantatiyā visesapaccayattā kabaḷīkārāhāro ca ime ca tayo dhammā āhārāti vuttā.
atk-abh01a0:1348_2: Visesapaccayo hi kabaḷīkārāhārabhakkhānaṃ sattānaṃ rūpakāyassa kabaḷīkāro āhāro;
atk-abh01a0:1350_0: Adhipatiyaṭṭhena pana aṭṭheva dhammā indriyāni honti,
atk-abh01a0:1351_0: Niyyānaṭṭhena ca hetvaṭṭhena ca pañceva dhammā maggaṅgāni honti.
atk-abh01a0:1351_4: lokiyacitte pana ekakkhaṇe tisso viratiyo na labbhanti,
atk-abh01a0:1351_7: ariyassetaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikassa maggassa adhivacana”nti imasmiṃ sutte ‘yatheva lokuttaramaggo aṭṭhaṅgiko,
atk-abh01a0:1351_8: pubbabhāgavipassanāmaggopi tatheva aṭṭhaṅgiko’ti yathāgatavacanena imassatthassa dīpitattā,
atk-abh01a0:1351_12: “pubbeva kho panassa kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ ājīvo suparisuddho hotī”ti.
atk-abh01a0:1351_14: Lokiyacittasmiñhi tisso viratiyo ekakkhaṇe na labbhanti,
atk-abh01a0:1352_0: Akampiyaṭṭhena pana satteva dhammā balāni honti.
atk-abh01a0:1352_7: Rāsaṭṭhena ceva vedayitaṭṭhena ca ekova dhammo vedanākkhandho.
atk-abh01a0:1352_8: Rāsaṭṭhena ca sañjānanaṭṭhena ca ekova dhammo saññākkhandho.
atk-abh01a0:1352_9: Rāsaṭṭhena ca abhisaṅkharaṇaṭṭhena ca ekova dhammo saṅkhārakkhandho.
atk-abh01a0:1352_10: Rāsaṭṭhena ca cittavicittaṭṭhena ca ekova dhammo viññāṇakkhandho.
atk-abh01a0:1352_11: Vijānanaṭṭhena ceva heṭṭhā vuttaāyatanaṭṭhena ca ekameva manāyatanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1352_12: Vijānanaṭṭhena ca adhipatiyaṭṭhena ca ekameva manindriyaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1352_13: Vijānanaṭṭhena ca sabhāvasuññatanissattaṭṭhena ca ekova dhammo manoviññāṇadhātu nāma hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1352_16: yathāvuttena atthena avasesā sabbepi dhammā ekaṃ dhammāyatanameva,
atk-abh01a0:1353_0: Ye vā pana tasmiṃ samayeti iminā pana appanāvārena idhāpi heṭṭhā vuttā yevāpanakāva saṅgahitā.
atk-abh01a0:1357_1: Idāni tasmiṃ kho pana samaye dhammā hontīti suññatavāro āraddho.
atk-abh01a0:1357_3: Tattha uddesavāre ‘dhammā hontī’ti iminā saddhiṃ catuvīsati koṭṭhāsā honti.
atk-abh01a0:1357_4: Sabbakoṭṭhāsesu ca ‘cattāro dve tayo’ti gaṇanaparicchedo na vutto. Kasmā?
atk-abh01a0:1357_7: Na hettha satto vā bhāvo vā attā vā upalabbhati.
atk-abh01a0:1357_8: Dhammāva ete dhammamattā asārā apariṇāyakāti imissā suññatāya dīpanatthaṃ vuttā.
atk-abh01a0:1357_10: yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ paṭhamaṃ mahākusalacittaṃ uppajjati,
atk-abh01a0:1357_11: tasmiṃ samaye cittaṅgavasena uppannā atirekapaṇṇāsadhammā sabhāvaṭṭhena dhammā eva honti.
atk-abh01a0:1357_12: Na añño koci satto vā bhāvo vā poso vā puggalo vā hotīti.
atk-abh01a0:1357_19: Upanijjhāyanaṭṭhena hi jhānameva hetvaṭṭhena maggova hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1357_20: Na añño koci satto vā bhāvo vāti.
atk-abh01a0:1359_0: Niṭṭhitā ca tīhi mahāvārehi maṇḍetvā niddiṭṭhassa
atk-abh01a0:1362_1: Idāni dutiyacittādīni dassetuṃ puna “katame dhammā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1362_2: Tesu sabbesupi paṭhamacitte vuttanayeneva tayo tayo mahāvārā veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1362_4: paṭhamacitte vuttasadisānaṃ sabbapadānaṃ atthopi vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1362_6: Imasmiṃ tāva dutiyacittaniddese sasaṅkhārenāti idameva apubbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1362_9: Tena sasaṅkhārena sappayogena saupāyena paccayagaṇenāti attho.
atk-abh01a0:1362_10: Yena hi ārammaṇādinā paccayagaṇena paṭhamaṃ mahācittaṃ uppajjati,
atk-abh01a0:1363_1: idhekacco bhikkhu vihārapaccante vasamāno cetiyaṅgaṇasammajjanavelāya vā therupaṭṭhānavelāya vā sampattāya,
atk-abh01a0:1363_2: dhammasavanadivase vā sampatte ‘mayhaṃ gantvā paccāgacchato atidūraṃ bhavissati,
atk-abh01a0:1363_4: ‘bhikkhussa nāma cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ vā therupaṭṭhānaṃ vā dhammasavanaṃ vā agantuṃ asāruppaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1363_7: parena vā vattādīnaṃ akaraṇe ca ādīnavaṃ karaṇe ca ānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā ovadiyamānassa,
atk-abh01a0:1363_9: idaṃ karohī’ti kāriyamānassa uppannaṃ kusalacittaṃ sasaṅkhārena paccayagaṇena uppannaṃ nāma hotīti.
atk-abh01a0:1366_2: Idampi hi ārammaṇe haṭṭhapahaṭṭhaṃ hoti paricchindakañāṇaṃ panettha na hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1366_3: Tasmā idaṃ daharakumārakānaṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā ‘ayaṃ thero mayha’nti vandanakāle,
atk-abh01a0:1366_4: teneva nayena cetiyavandanadhammasavanakālādīsu ca uppajjatīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1366_5: Pāḷiyaṃ panettha sattasu ṭhānesu paññā parihāyati.
atk-abh01a0:1369_2: Idaṃ pana sasaṅkhārenāti vacanato yadā mātāpitaro daharakumārake sīse gahetvā cetiyādīni vandāpenti te
atk-abh01a0:1372_4: Pāḷiyaṃ panettha jhānacatukke upekkhā hotīti indriyaṭṭhake upekkhindriyaṃ hotīti vatvā sabbesampi vedanādipadānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1372_5: niddese sātāsātasukhadukkhapaṭikkhepavasena desanaṃ katvā adukkhamasukhavedanā kathitā.
atk-abh01a0:1372_7: Padapaṭipāṭiyā ca ekasmiṃ ṭhāne pīti parihīnā.
atk-abh01a0:1372_8: Tasmā cittaṅgavasena pāḷiāruḷhā pañcapaṇṇāseva dhammā honti.
atk-abh01a0:1372_9: Tesaṃ vasena sabbakoṭṭhāsesu sabbavāresu ca vinicchayo veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1375_4: Karuṇāmuditā parikammakālepi hi imesaṃ uppatti mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ anuññātā eva.
atk-abh01a0:1377_0: Tāni sabbānipi dasahi puññakiriyavatthūhi dīpetabbāni. Kathaṃ?
atk-abh01a0:1377_10: diṭṭhijukammaṃ puññakiriyavatthūti imāni dasa puññakiriyavatthūni nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1377_12: Puññakiriyā ca sā tesaṃ tesaṃ ānisaṃsānaṃ vatthu cāti puññakiriyavatthu.
atk-abh01a0:1378_3: taṃ taṃ dentassa tesaṃ tesaṃ uppādanato paṭṭhāya pubbabhāge,
atk-abh01a0:1378_5: pacchā somanassacittena anussaraṇakāle cāti tīsu kālesu pavattā cetanā ‘dānamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu’ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1379_8: ājīvaṃ sodhentassa ca pavattā cetanā ‘sīlamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu’ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1380_0: Paṭisambhidāyaṃ vuttena vipassanāmaggena cakkhuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato bhāventassa…pe… manaṃ… rūpe…pe… dhamme…
atk-abh01a0:1380_8: jarāmaraṇaṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato bhāventassa pavattā cetanā,
atk-abh01a0:1380_9: aṭṭhatiṃsāya vā ārammaṇesu appanaṃ appattā sabbāpi cetanā ‘bhāvanāmayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu’ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1382_0: Vuḍḍhatarānaṃ vattappaṭipattikaraṇavasena gāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhaṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā pattaṃ gahetvā gāme bhikkhaṃ samādapetvā upasaṃharaṇavasena,
atk-abh01a0:1382_1: ‘gaccha bhikkhūnaṃ pattaṃ āharā’ti sutvā vegena gantvā pattāharaṇādivasena ca kāyaveyyāvaṭikakāle ‘veyyāvaccasahagataṃ’ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1383_0: Dānaṃ datvā gandhādīhi pūjaṃ katvā ‘asukassa nāma patti hotū’ti vā,
atk-abh01a0:1383_2: Kiṃ panevaṃ pattiṃ dadato puññakkhayo hotīti? Na hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1383_3: Yathā pana ekaṃ dīpaṃ jāletvā tato dīpasahassaṃ jālentassa paṭhamadīpo khīṇoti na vattabbo;
atk-abh01a0:1383_4: purimālokena pana saddhiṃ pacchimāloko ekato hutvā atimahā hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1383_5: Evameva pattiṃ dadato parihāni nāma natthi.
atk-abh01a0:1384_0: Parehi dinnāya pattiyā vā aññāya vā puññakiriyāya ‘sādhu sādhū’ti anumodanavasena ‘abbhanumodanaṃ’ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1385_0: Eko ‘evaṃ maṃ dhammakathikoti maṃ jānissantī’ti icchāya ṭhatvā lābhagaruko hutvā deseti,
atk-abh01a0:1385_2: Eko attano paguṇaṃ dhammaṃ apaccāsīsamāno vimuttāyatanasīsena paresaṃ deseti,
atk-abh01a0:1386_0: Eko suṇanto ‘iti maṃ saddhoti jānissantī’ti suṇāti,
atk-abh01a0:1386_2: Eko ‘evaṃ me mahapphalaṃ bhavissatī’ti hitapharaṇena muducittena dhammaṃ suṇāti,
atk-abh01a0:1387_3: yaṃkiñci puññaṃ karontassa hi diṭṭhiyā ujukabhāveneva mahapphalaṃ hotī’ti.
atk-abh01a0:1388_0: Etesu pana puññakiriyavatthūsu dānamayaṃ tāva ‘dānaṃ dassāmī’ti cintentassa uppajjati,
atk-abh01a0:1388_3: Evaṃ pubbacetanaṃ muñcanacetanaṃ aparacetananti tissopi cetanā ekato katvā ‘dānamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu’ nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1388_7: Tā sabbāpi ekato katvā ‘sīlamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu’ nāma hoti…pe…
atk-abh01a0:1388_11: Tā sabbāpi ekato katvā ‘diṭṭhijukammaṃ puññakiriyavatthu’ nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1389_5: Ye pana ‘diṭṭhijukammaṃ sabbesaṃ niyamalakkhaṇa’nti vadanti tesaṃ taṃ tīsupi saṅgahaṃ gacchati.
atk-abh01a0:1389_6: Evametāni saṅkhepato tīṇi hutvā vitthārato dasa honti.
atk-abh01a0:1390_0: Tesu ‘dānaṃ dassāmī’ti cintento aṭṭhannaṃ kāmāvacarakusalacittānaṃ aññatareneva cinteti;
atk-abh01a0:1390_2: ‘dānaṃ me dinna’nti paccavekkhantopi tesaṃyeva aññatarena paccavekkhati.
atk-abh01a0:1390_5: ‘sīlaṃ me pūrita’nti paccavekkhantopi tesaṃyeva aññatarena paccavekkhati.
atk-abh01a0:1390_8: ‘bhāvanā me bhāvitā’ti paccavekkhantopi tesaṃyeva aññatarena paccavekkhati.
atk-abh01a0:1391_9: ‘pattiṃ vā sesakusalaṃ vā anumodissāmī’ti cintentopi tesaṃyeva aññatarena cinteti;
atk-abh01a0:1391_18: ‘Diṭṭhiṃ ujukaṃ karissāmī’ti cintentopi tesaṃyeva aññatarena cinteti,
atk-abh01a0:1391_19: ujuṃ karonto pana catunnaṃ ñāṇasampayuttānaṃ aññatarena karoti,
atk-abh01a0:1391_20: ‘diṭṭhi me ujukā katā’ti paccavekkhanto aṭṭhannaṃ aññatarena paccavekkhati.
atk-abh01a0:1392_0: Imasmiṃ ṭhāne cattāri anantāni nāma gahitāni.
atk-abh01a0:1392_6: Ākāsassa hi puratthimāya disāya vā pacchimuttaradakkhiṇāsu vā ettakāni vā yojanasatāni ettakāni vā yojanasahassānīti paricchedo natthi.
atk-abh01a0:1392_7: Sinerumattampi ayokūṭaṃ pathaviṃ dvidhā katvā heṭṭhā khittaṃ bhassetheva,
atk-abh01a0:1393_0: Cakkavāḷānampi satehi vā sahassehi vā paricchedo natthi.
atk-abh01a0:1393_2: daḷhathāmadhanuggahassa lahukena sarena tiriyaṃ tālacchāyaṃ atikkamanamattena kālena cakkavāḷasatasahassaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1393_3: atikkamanasamatthena javena samannāgatā cattāro mahābrahmāno ‘cakkavāḷapariyantaṃ passissāmā’ti tena
atk-abh01a0:1394_0: Ettakesu pana cakkavāḷesu udakaṭṭhakathalaṭṭhakasattānaṃ pamāṇaṃ natthi.
atk-abh01a0:1395_0: Evaṃ aparimāṇesu cakkavāḷesu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ kāmāvacarasomanassasahagatañāṇasampayuttaasaṅkhārikakusalacittāni ekassa bahūni uppajjanti.
atk-abh01a0:1395_2: Tāni sabbānipi kāmāvacaraṭṭhena somanassasahagataṭṭhena ñāṇasampayuttaṭṭhena asaṅkhārikaṭṭhena ekattaṃ gacchanti.
atk-abh01a0:1395_3: Ekameva somanassasahagataṃ tihetukaṃ asaṅkhārikaṃ mahācittaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1395_6: Evaṃ sabbānipi aparimāṇesu cakkavāḷesu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ uppajjamānāni kāmāvacarakusalacittāni sammāsambuddho mahātulāya tulayamāno viya,
atk-abh01a0:1395_8: sabbaññutaññāṇena paricchinditvā ‘aṭṭhevetānī’ti sarikkhaṭṭhena aṭṭheva koṭṭhāse katvā dassesi.
atk-abh01a0:1396_0: Puna imasmiṃ ṭhāne chabbidhena puññāyūhanaṃ nāma gahitaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1397_6: Tesu sayaṃkāraṃ karontopi imesaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ kusalacittānaṃ aññatareneva karoti.
atk-abh01a0:1397_9: āṇāpetvā karontopi imesaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ kusalacittānaṃ aññatareneva karoti.
atk-abh01a0:1398_0: Aparāpi imasmiṃ ṭhāne catasso dakkhiṇāvisuddhiyo gahitā –
atk-abh01a0:1398_5: Tattha dhammena samena uppannā paccayā ‘dhammikā’ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1398_6: Saddahitvā okappetvā dadato pana ‘cetanāmahattaṃ’ nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1398_9: Imāni cattāri samodhānetvā dātuṃ sakkontassa kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ imasmiṃyeva attabhāve vipākaṃ deti.
atk-abh01a0:1399_0: Saṅkhepato panetaṃ sabbampi kāmāvacarakusalacittaṃ ‘citta’nti karitvā cittavicittaṭṭhena ekameva hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1399_3: Somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ asaṅkhārikaṃ mahācittañhi upekkhāsahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ asaṅkhārikaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1399_4: mahācittañca ñāṇasampayuttaṭṭhena asaṅkhārikaṭṭhena ca ekameva hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1399_8: Evaṃ ñāṇavibhattidesanāvasena catubbidhe panetasmiṃ asaṅkhārasasaṅkhāravibhattito cattāri asaṅkhārikāni
atk-abh01a0:1399_10: Tāni yāthāvato ñatvā bhagavā sabbaññū gaṇīvaro muniseṭṭho ācikkhati deseti paññapeti paṭṭhapeti vivarati vibhajati uttānīkarotīti.
atk-abh01a0:1404_1: Idāni rūpāvacarakusalaṃ dassetuṃ katame dhammā kusalātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1404_2: Tattha rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāvetīti rūpaṃ vuccati rūpabhavo.
atk-abh01a0:1404_6: taṃ upapattiṃ maggati gavesati janeti nipphādetīti maggo.
atk-abh01a0:1404_8: yena maggena rūpabhave upapatti hoti nibbatti jāti sañjāti,
atk-abh01a0:1404_10: Kiṃ panetena niyamato rūpabhave upapatti hotīti? Na hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1404_13: samāhito yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti passatī”ti evaṃ vuttena hi nibbedhabhāgiyena rūpabhavātikkamopi hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1404_14: Rūpūpapattiyā pana ito añño maggo nāma natthi,
atk-abh01a0:1404_16: Atthato cāyaṃ maggo nāma cetanāpi hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1404_21: pajānāmi nirayagāmiñca magga”nti hi ettha cetanā maggo nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1405_0: “Saddhā hiriyaṃ kusalañca dānaṃ, dhammā ete sappurisānuyātā;
atk-abh01a0:1406_0: Etañhi maggaṃ diviyaṃ vadanti, etena hi gacchati devaloka”nti. ;
atk-abh01a0:1407_2: ayaṃ paṭipadā”ti saṅkhārupapattisuttādīsu cetanāpi cetanāsampayuttadhammāpi maggo nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1407_3: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne ‘jhāna’nti vacanato cetanāsampayuttā adhippetā.
atk-abh01a0:1408_2: Aññattha pana upasaggavasena sambhāvanā paribhāvanā vibhāvanāti evaṃ aññathāpi attho hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1408_5: paramena sīlakkhandhena samannāgato”ti ayaṃ sambhāvanā nāma;
atk-abh01a0:1408_9: paññāparibhāvitaṃ cittaṃ sammadeva āsavehi vimuccatī”ti ayaṃ paribhāvanā nāma;
atk-abh01a0:1408_16: yathāpaṭipannā me sāvakā cattāro satipaṭṭhāne bhāventī”ti,
atk-abh01a0:1409_1: yathā kāmāvacarakusalaniddese dhammapubbaṅgamā desanā katā tathā akatvā,
atk-abh01a0:1409_5: na kāmāvacaraṃ viya vinā paṭipadāya uppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:1409_6: Paṭipadā ca nāmesā paṭipannake sati hotīti etamatthaṃ dassetuṃ puggalapubbaṅgamaṃ desanaṃ karonto ‘rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāvetī’ti āha.
atk-abh01a0:1410_6: tasmā tasmiṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharaṇasamaye avijjamānānampi kāmānaṃ tassa paṭhamajjhānassa paṭipakkhabhāvaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1410_8: ‘Vivicceva kāmehī’ti evañhi niyame kariyamāne idaṃ paññāyati –
atk-abh01a0:1410_9: nūnimassa kāmā paṭipakkhabhūtā yesu sati idaṃ na pavattati,
atk-abh01a0:1410_11: Tesaṃ pariccāgeneva cassa adhigamo hoti orimatīrapariccāgena pārimatīrasseva.
atk-abh01a0:1411_3: Kiṃ akusalehi dhammehi aviviccāpi jhānaṃ upasampajja vihareyyā’ti?
atk-abh01a0:1411_6: Kāmadhātusamatikkamanato hi kāmarāgapaṭipakkhato ca idaṃ jhānaṃ kāmānameva nissaraṇaṃ. Yathāha –
atk-abh01a0:1411_14: Na hi sakkā ito aññehipi nīvaraṇasaṅkhātehi akusalehi dhammehi avivicca jhānaṃ upasampajja viharituṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1411_15: tasmā ‘vivicceva kāmehi vivicceva akusalehi dhammehī’ti evaṃ padadvayepi esa daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1411_16: Padadvayepi ca kiñcāpi viviccāti iminā sādhāraṇavacanena tadaṅgavivekādayo kāyavivekādayo ca sabbepi vivekā saṅgahaṃ gacchanti,
atk-abh01a0:1411_17: tathāpi kāyaviveko cittaviveko vikkhambhanavivekoti tayo eva idha daṭṭhabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1412_0: Kāmehīti iminā pana padena ye ca niddese “katame vatthukāmā?
atk-abh01a0:1412_2: ye ca tattheva vibhaṅge ca “chando kāmo,
atk-abh01a0:1412_8: ime vuccanti kāmā”ti evaṃ kilesakāmā vuttā,
atk-abh01a0:1412_10: Evañhi sati vivicceva kāmehīti vatthukāmehipi viviccevāti attho yujjati.
atk-abh01a0:1413_0: Vivicca akusalehi dhammehīti kilesakāmehi sabbākusalehi vā viviccāti attho yujjati.
atk-abh01a0:1413_2: Purimena cettha vatthukāmehi vivekavacanato eva kāmasukhapariccāgo,
atk-abh01a0:1413_3: dutiyena kilesakāmehi vivekavacanato nekkhammasukhapariggaho vibhāvito hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1413_4: Evaṃ vatthukāmakilesakāmavivekavacanatoyeva ca etesaṃ paṭhamena saṃkilesavatthuppahānaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1413_10: Esa tāva nayo ‘kāmehī’ti ettha vuttakāmesu vatthukāmapakkhe.
atk-abh01a0:1414_0: Kilesakāmapakkhe pana ‘chandoti ca rāgo’ti ca evamādīhi anekabhedo kāmacchandoyeva kāmoti adhippeto.
atk-abh01a0:1414_1: So ca akusalapariyāpannopi samāno “tattha katamo kāmacchando kāmo”tiādinā nayena vibhaṅge jhānapaṭipakkhato visuṃ vutto.
atk-abh01a0:1414_5: Aññesampi ca dhammānaṃ akusalabhāve vijjamāne “tattha katame akusalā dhammā?
atk-abh01a0:1415_0: Evamettha ‘vivicceva kāmehī’ti iminā kāmacchandassa vikkhambhanaviveko vutto hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1415_4: tathā paṭhamena tīsu akusalamūlesu pañcakāmaguṇabhedavisayassa lobhassa,
atk-abh01a0:1415_11: dutiyena sesānaṃ catunnaṃ akusalacittuppādānaṃ vikkhambhanaviveko vutto hotīti veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1415_12: Ayaṃ tāva ‘vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehī’ti ettha atthappakāsanā.
atk-abh01a0:1416_0: Ettāvatā ca paṭhamassa jhānassa pahānaṅgaṃ dassetvā idāni sampayogaṅgaṃ dassetuṃ savitakkaṃ savicārantiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1416_1: Tattha heṭṭhā vuttalakkhaṇādivibhāgena appanāsampayogato rūpāvacarabhāvappattena vitakkena ceva vicārena ca saha vattati.
atk-abh01a0:1416_2: Rukkho viya pupphena ca phalena cāti idaṃ jhānaṃ savitakkaṃ savicāranti vuccati.
atk-abh01a0:1416_3: Vibhaṅge pana “iminā ca vitakkena iminā ca vicārena upeto hoti samupeto”tiādinā nayena puggalādhiṭṭhānā desanā katā.
atk-abh01a0:1417_10: Tesu pana vuttappakārāya pañcavidhāya pītiyā yā appanāsamādhissa mūlaṃ hutvā vaḍḍhamānā samādhisampayogaṃ gatā pharaṇāpīti –
atk-abh01a0:1417_12: Ayañca pīti idañca sukhaṃ assa jhānassa,
atk-abh01a0:1417_13: asmiṃ vā jhāne atthīti idaṃ jhānaṃ pītisukhanti vuccati.
atk-abh01a0:1417_14: Atha vā pīti ca sukhañca pītisukhaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1417_19: Yatheva hi jhānaṃ evaṃ pītisukhampettha vivekajameva hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1417_22: Vibhaṅge pana “idaṃ sukhaṃ imāya pītiyā sahagata”ntiādinā nayena vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1418_5: Ciṇṇavasībhāvo hi aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī ādito paṭṭhāya matthakaṃ pāpentopi samāpajjituṃ sakkoti.
atk-abh01a0:1418_6: Matthakato paṭṭhāya ādiṃ pāpentopi samāpajjituṃ sakkoti.
atk-abh01a0:1418_8: Evaṃ pubbuppattiyaṭṭhena pana paṭhamaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1419_2: Tattha aṭṭha samāpattiyo pathavikasiṇādiārammaṇaṃ upanijjhāyantīti ārammaṇūpanijjhānanti saṅkhyaṃ gatā.
atk-abh01a0:1419_5: Vipassanāya katakiccassa maggena ijjhanato maggo lakkhaṇūpanijjhānaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1419_6: Phalaṃ pana nirodhasaccaṃ tathalakkhaṇaṃ upanijjhāyatīti lakkhaṇūpanijjhānaṃ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1419_8: Tasmā ārammaṇūpanijjhānato paccanīkajjhāpanato vā jhānanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1420_3: Vibhaṅge pana “upasampajjāti paṭhamassa jhānassa lābho paṭilābho patti sampatti phusanā sacchikiriyā upasampadā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1420_5: Viharatīti tadanurūpena iriyāpathavihārena itivuttappakārajjhānasamaṅgī hutvā attabhāvassa iriyanaṃ vuttiṃ
atk-abh01a0:1420_6: pālanaṃ yapanaṃ yāpanaṃ cāraṃ vihāraṃ abhinipphādeti.
atk-abh01a0:1420_8: “viharatīti iriyati vattati pāleti yapeti yāpeti carati viharati,
atk-abh01a0:1421_0: Pathavikasiṇanti ettha pathavimaṇḍalampi sakalaṭṭhena pathavikasiṇanti vuccati.
atk-abh01a0:1421_3: Tattha imasmiṃ atthe jhānaṃ pathavīkasiṇanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1421_4: Pathavikasiṇasaṅkhātaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharatīti ayañhettha saṅkhepattho.
atk-abh01a0:1421_5: Imasmiṃ pana pathavikasiṇe parikammaṃ katvā catukkapañcakajjhānāni nibbattetvā jhānapadaṭṭhānaṃ vipassanaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1421_6: vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pattukāmena kulaputtena kiṃ kattabbanti?
atk-abh01a0:1421_7: Ādito tāva pātimokkhasaṃvaraindriyasaṃvaraājīvapārisuddhipaccayasannissitasaṅkhātāni cattāri sīlāni visodhetvā suparisuddhe sīle patiṭṭhitena,
atk-abh01a0:1421_8: yvāssa āvāsādīsu dasasu palibodhesu palibodho atthi,
atk-abh01a0:1421_9: taṃ upacchinditvā kammaṭṭhānadāyakaṃ kalyāṇamittaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pāḷiyā āgatesu aṭṭhatiṃsāya kammaṭṭhānesu
atk-abh01a0:1421_10: attano cariyānukūlaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ upaparikkhantena sacassa idaṃ pathavikasiṇaṃ anukūlaṃ hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1421_11: idameva kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā jhānabhāvanāya ananurūpaṃ vihāraṃ pahāya anurūpe vihāre viharantena khuddakapalibodhupacchedaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1421_17: Sabbakammaṭṭhānānañhi bhāvanāvidhānaṃ sabbaṃ aṭṭhakathānayena gahetvā visuddhimagge vitthāritaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1421_18: Kiṃ tena tattha tattha puna vuttenāti na naṃ puna vitthārayāma.
atk-abh01a0:1421_19: Pāḷiyā pana heṭṭhā anāgataṃ atthaṃ aparihāpentā nirantaraṃ anupadavaṇṇanameva karissāma.
atk-abh01a0:1422_0: Tasmiṃ samayeti tasmiṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ upasampajja viharaṇasamaye.
atk-abh01a0:1422_2: avikkhepo hotīti ime kāmāvacarapaṭhamakusalacitte vuttappakārāya padapaṭipāṭiyā chapaṇṇāsa dhammā honti.
atk-abh01a0:1422_4: ime bhūmantaravasena mahaggatā rūpāvacarāti ayamettha viseso.
atk-abh01a0:1425_1: Dutiyajjhānaniddese vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamāti vitakkassa ca vicārassa cāti imesaṃ dvinnaṃ vūpasamā,
atk-abh01a0:1425_4: Tattha kiñcāpi dutiyajjhāne sabbepi paṭhamajjhānadhammā na santi,
atk-abh01a0:1425_5: aññeyeva hi paṭhamajjhāne phassādayo aññe idha,
atk-abh01a0:1425_6: oḷārikassa pana oḷārikassa aṅgassa samatikkamā paṭhamajjhānato paresaṃ dutiyajjhānādīnaṃ adhigamo hotīti
atk-abh01a0:1425_7: dīpanatthaṃ vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamāti evaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1426_3: Yasmā vā taṃ jhānaṃ sampasādanasamannāgatattā vitakkavicārakkhobhavūpasamanena ca ceto sampasādayati,
atk-abh01a0:1426_5: Imasmiñca atthavikappe ‘sampasādanaṃ cetaso’ti evaṃ padasambandho veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1426_6: Purimasmiṃ pana atthavikappe ‘cetaso’ti etaṃ ekodibhāvena saddhiṃ yojetabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1427_2: vitakkavicārehi anajjhāruḷhattā aggo seṭṭho hutvā udetīti attho.
atk-abh01a0:1427_4: Vitakkavicāravirahato vā eko asahāyo hutvātipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-abh01a0:1427_7: Seṭṭhaṭṭhena eko ca so udi cāti ekodi.
atk-abh01a0:1427_9: Iti imaṃ ekodiṃ bhāveti vaḍḍhetīti idaṃ dutiyajjhānaṃ ekodibhāvaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1428_2: atha kasmā idameva sampasādanaṃ cetaso ekodibhāvañcāti vuttanti? Vuccate –
atk-abh01a0:1428_3: ‘aduñhi paṭhamajjhānaṃ vitakkavicārakkhobhena vīcitaraṅgasamākulamiva jalaṃ na suppasannaṃ hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1428_4: tasmā satiyāpi saddhāya sampasādana’nti na vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1428_5: Na suppasannattā eva cettha samādhipi na suṭṭhu pākaṭo.
atk-abh01a0:1428_7: Imasmiṃ pana jhāne vitakkavicārapalibodhābhāvena laddhokāsā balavatī saddhā,
atk-abh01a0:1428_10: Vibhaṅge pana “sampasādananti yā saddhā saddahanā okappanā abhippasādo;
atk-abh01a0:1428_13: Evaṃ vuttena panetena saddhiṃ ayaṃ atthavaṇṇanā yathā na virujjhati aññadatthu saṃsandati ceva sameti ca,
atk-abh01a0:1429_0: Avitakkaṃ avicāranti bhāvanāya pahīnattā etasmiṃ etassa vā vitakko natthīti avitakkaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1429_3: “iti ayañca vitakko ayañca vicāro santā honti samitā vūpasantā atthaṅgatā abbhatthaṅgatā appitā byappitā sositā visositā byantīkatā,
atk-abh01a0:1430_1: nanu ca vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamāti imināpi ayamattho siddho?
atk-abh01a0:1430_2: Atha kasmā puna ‘vuttaṃ avitakkaṃ avicāra’nti? Vuccate – evametaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1430_6: ‘oḷārikassa pana oḷārikassa aṅgassa samatikkamā paṭhamajjhānato paresaṃ dutiyajjhānādīnaṃ samadhigamo
atk-abh01a0:1430_7: hotīti dīpanatthaṃ vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamāti evaṃ vutta’nti.
atk-abh01a0:1431_4: na paṭhamajjhānamiva ca aṅgapātubhāvāti evaṃ sampasādanaekodibhāvānaṃ hetuparidīpakamidaṃ vacanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1431_5: Tathā vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā idaṃ avitakkaṃ avicāraṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1431_10: Vitakkavicārābhāvamattaparidīpakameva pana avitakkaṃ avicāranti idaṃ vacanaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1432_0: Samādhijanti paṭhamajjhānasamādhito sampayuttasamādhito vā jātanti attho.
atk-abh01a0:1432_2: atha kho ayameva samādhi ‘samādhī’ti vattabbataṃ arahati,
atk-abh01a0:1432_4: Tasmā imassa vaṇṇabhaṇanatthaṃ idameva samādhijanti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1433_2: Tasmiṃ samaye phasso hotītiādīsu jhānapañcake vitakkavicārapadāni maggapañcake ca sammāsaṅkappapadaṃ parihīnaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1436_1: Tatiyajjhānaniddese pītiyā ca virāgāti virāgo nāma vuttappakārāya pītiyā jigucchanaṃ vā samatikkamo vā.
atk-abh01a0:1436_4: So vūpasamaṃ vā sampiṇḍeti vitakkavicāravūpasamaṃ vā.
atk-abh01a0:1436_5: Tattha yadā vūpasamameva sampiṇḍeti tadā pītiyā virāgā ca,
atk-abh01a0:1436_6: kiñca bhiyyo ‘vūpasamā’ cāti evaṃ yojanā veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1436_7: Imissā ca yojanāya virāgo jigucchanattho hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1436_8: Tasmā pītiyā jigucchanā ca vūpasamā cāti ayamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1436_9: Yadā pana vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamaṃ sampiṇḍeti tadā pītiyā ca virāgā kiñca bhiyyo ‘vitakkavicārānañca vūpasamā’ti evaṃ yojanā veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1436_10: Imissā ca yojanāya virāgo samatikkamanattho hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1436_11: tasmā pītiyā ca samatikkamā vitakkavicārānañca vūpasamāti ayamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1437_1: imassa pana jhānassa maggaparidīpanatthaṃ vaṇṇabhaṇanatthañcetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1437_2: Vitakkavicārānañca vūpasamāti hi vutte idaṃ paññāyati –
atk-abh01a0:1437_4: Yathā ca tatiye ariyamagge appahīnānampi sakkāyadiṭṭhādīnaṃ “pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ pahānā”ti
atk-abh01a0:1437_7: evameva idha avūpasantānampi vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamo vuccamāno vaṇṇabhaṇanaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1438_4: Tāya visadāya vipulāya thāmagatāya samannāgatattā tatiyajjhānasamaṅgī upekkhakoti vuccati.
atk-abh01a0:1439_1: chaḷaṅgupekkhā brahmavihārupekkhā bojjhaṅgupekkhā vīriyupekkhā saṅkhārupekkhā vedanupekkhā vipassanupekkhā
atk-abh01a0:1440_2: bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā neva sumano hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1440_4: upekkhako ca viharati sato sampajāno”ti evamāgatā khīṇāsavassa chasu dvāresu iṭṭhāniṭṭhachaḷārammaṇāpāthe
atk-abh01a0:1441_0: Yā pana “upekkhāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatī”ti evamāgatā sattesu majjhattākārabhūtā upekkhā,
atk-abh01a0:1442_0: Yā “upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti vivekanissita”nti evamāgatā sahajātadhammānaṃ majjhattākārabhūtā upekkhā,
atk-abh01a0:1443_0: Yā pana “kālena kālaṃ upekkhānimittaṃ manasi karotī”ti evamāgatā anaccāraddhanātisithilavīriyasaṅkhātā upekkhā,
atk-abh01a0:1444_3: dasa saṅkhārupekkhā vipassanāvasena uppajjantī”ti evamāgatā nīvaraṇādipaṭisaṅkhāsantiṭṭhanāgahaṇe majjhattabhūtā upekkhā,
atk-abh01a0:1445_0: Yā pana “yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti upekkhāsahagata”nti evamāgatā adukkhamasukhasaṅkhātā upekkhā ayaṃ ‘vedanupekkhā’ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1446_3: upekkhaṃ paṭilabhatī”ti evamāgatā vicinane majjhattabhūtā upekkhā,
atk-abh01a0:1447_0: Yā pana chandādīsu yevāpanakesu āgatā sahajātānaṃ samavāhitabhūtā upekkhā ayaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1448_0: Yā “upekkhako ca viharatī”ti evamāgatā aggasukhepi tasmiṃ apakkhapātajananī upekkhā,
atk-abh01a0:1449_0: Yā “upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṃ catutthaṃ jhāna”nti evamāgatā sabbapaccanīkaparisuddhā paccanīkavūpasamanepi abyāpārabhūtā upekkhā,
atk-abh01a0:1450_0: Tattha chaḷaṅgupekkhā ca brahmavihārupekkhā ca bojjhaṅgupekkhā ca tatramajjhattupekkhā ca jhānupekkhā
