atk-abh01a0:1450_1: ca pārisuddhupekkhā ca atthato ekā tatramajjhattupekkhāva hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1450_2: Tena tena avatthābhedena panassā ayaṃ bhedo.
atk-abh01a0:1450_3: Ekassāpi sato sattassa kumārayuvathera senāpatirājādivasena bhedo viya.
atk-abh01a0:1450_4: Tasmā tāsu yattha chaḷaṅgupekkhā na tattha bojjhaṅgupekkhādayo,
atk-abh01a0:1450_5: yattha vā pana bojjhaṅgupekkhā na tattha chaḷaṅgupekkhādayo hontīti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1451_2: Paññā eva hi esā kiccavasena dvidhā bhinnā.
atk-abh01a0:1451_3: Yathā hi purisassa sāyaṃ gehaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ sappaṃ ajapadadaṇḍaṃ gahetvā pariyesamānassa taṃ thusakoṭṭhake
atk-abh01a0:1451_4: nipannaṃ disvā ‘sappo nu kho no’ti avalokentassa sovatthikattayaṃ disvā nibbematikassa ‘sappo,
atk-abh01a0:1451_6: evameva yā āraddhavipassakassa vipassanāñāṇena lakkhaṇattaye diṭṭhe saṅkhārānaṃ aniccabhāvādivicinane majjhattatā uppajjati,
atk-abh01a0:1451_8: Yathā pana tassa purisassa ajapadadaṇḍakena gāḷhaṃ sappaṃ gahetvā ‘kintāhaṃ imaṃ sappaṃ aviheṭhento attānañca
atk-abh01a0:1451_9: iminā aḍaṃsāpento muñceyya’nti muñcanākārameva pariyesato gahaṇe majjhattatā hoti;
atk-abh01a0:1451_14: Iti vipassanupekkhāya siddhāya saṅkhārupekkhāpi siddhāva hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1451_15: Iminā panesā vicinanaggahaṇesu majjhattasaṅkhātena kiccena dvidhā bhinnāti.
atk-abh01a0:1451_16: Viriyupekkhā pana vedanupekkhā ca aññamaññañca avasesāhi ca atthato bhinnāyevāti.
atk-abh01a0:1452_1: Sā majjhattalakkhaṇā anābhogarasā abyāpārapaccupaṭṭhānā pītivirāgapadaṭṭhānāti. Etthāha –
atk-abh01a0:1452_4: tasmā tatrāpi ‘upekkhako ca viharatī’ti evamayaṃ vattabbā siyā.
atk-abh01a0:1452_9: Idha panāyaṃ vitakkavicārapītīhi anabhibhūtattā ukkhittasirā viya hutvā paribyattakiccā jātā,
atk-abh01a0:1455_0: Idāni sato ca sampajānoti ettha saratīti sato.
atk-abh01a0:1455_2: Iti puggalena sati ca sampajaññañca vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1456_0: Tattha kiñcāpi idaṃ satisampajaññaṃ purimajjhānesupi atthi –
atk-abh01a0:1456_1: muṭṭhassatissa hi asampajānassa upacāramattampi na sampajjati,
atk-abh01a0:1456_9: satisampajaññakiccapariggahitā eva cittassa gati icchitabbāti idheva vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1456_11: Yathā dhenupago vaccho dhenuto apanīto arakkhiyamāno punadeva dhenuṃ upagacchati,
atk-abh01a0:1456_12: evamidaṃ tatiyajjhānasukhaṃ pītito apanītampi satisampajaññārakkhena arakkhiyamānaṃ punadeva pītiṃ upagaccheyya,
atk-abh01a0:1456_18: no aññathāti imampi atthavisesaṃ dassetuṃ idamidheva vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1457_0: Idāni sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedetīti ettha kiñcāpi tatiyajjhānasamaṅgino sukhapaṭisaṃvedanābhogo natthi,
atk-abh01a0:1457_1: evaṃ santepi yasmā tassa nāmakāyena sampayuttaṃ sukhaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1457_3: taṃsamuṭṭhānenassa yasmā atipaṇītena rūpena rūpakāyo phuṭo,
atk-abh01a0:1457_4: yassa phuṭattā jhānā vuṭṭhitopi sukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedeyya,
atk-abh01a0:1457_5: tasmā etamatthaṃ dassento ‘sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedetī’ti āha.
atk-abh01a0:1458_0: Idāni yaṃ taṃ ariyā ācikkhanti upekkhako satimā sukhavihārīti ettha yaṃjhānahetu yaṃjhānakāraṇā taṃ tatiyajjhānasamaṅgīpuggalaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1458_1: buddhādayo ariyā “ācikkhanti desenti paññāpenti paṭṭhapenti vivaranti vibhajanti uttānīkaronti pakāse”nti
atk-abh01a0:1458_4: taṃ tatiyajjhānaṃ upasampajja viharatīti evamettha yojanā veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1459_0: Kasmā pana taṃ te evaṃ pasaṃsantīti?
atk-abh01a0:1459_2: Ayañhi yasmā atimadhurasukhe sukhapāramippattepi tatiyajjhāne upekkhako,
atk-abh01a0:1459_4: ‘yathā ca pīti na uppajjati’ evaṃ upaṭṭhitasatitāya satimā,
atk-abh01a0:1459_5: yasmā ca ariyakantaṃ ariyajanasevitameva asaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ sukhaṃ nāmakāyena paṭisaṃvedeti tasmā pasaṃsāraho;
atk-abh01a0:1459_6: iti pasaṃsārahato naṃ ariyā te evaṃ pasaṃsāhetubhūte guṇe pakāsentā ‘upekkhako satimā sukhavihārī’ti evaṃ pasaṃsantīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1460_2: Tasmiṃ samaye phasso hotītiādīsu jhānapañcake pītipadampi parihīnaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1463_1: Catutthajjhānaniddese sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānāti kāyikasukhassa ca kāyikadukkhassa ca pahānā.
atk-abh01a0:1463_2: Pubbevāti tañca kho pubbeva na catutthajjhānakkhaṇe.
atk-abh01a0:1463_3: Somanassadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamāti cetasikasukhassa ca cetasikadukkhassa cāti imesampi dvinnaṃ pubbeva atthaṅgamā;
atk-abh01a0:1463_9: Evametesaṃ pahānakkamena avuttānaṃ indriyavibhaṅge pana indriyānaṃ uddesakkameneva idhāpi vuttānaṃ sukhadukkhasomanassadomanassānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1464_0: Yadi panetāni tassa tassa jhānassa upacārakkhaṇeyeva pahīyanti,
atk-abh01a0:1464_1: atha kasmā “kattha cuppannaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ aparisesaṃ nirujjhati? Idha,
atk-abh01a0:1464_12: Etthuppannaṃ somanassindriyaṃ aparisesaṃ nirujjhatī”ti evaṃ jhānesveva nirodho vuttoti?
atk-abh01a0:1464_18: Tathā hi nānāvajjane paṭhamajjhānupacāre niruddhassāpi dukkhindriyassa ḍaṃsamakasādisamphassena vā,
atk-abh01a0:1464_21: Upacāre vā niruddhampetaṃ na suṭṭhu niruddhaṃ hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1464_23: Antoappanāyaṃ pana pītipharaṇena sabbo kāyo sukhokkanto hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1464_24: Sukhokkantakāyassa ca suṭṭhu niruddhaṃ hoti dukkhindriyaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1464_26: Nānāvajjaneyeva ca dutiyajjhānupacāre pahīnassa domanassindriyassa yasmā etaṃ vitakkavicārapaccayepi kāyakilamathe cittupaghāte ca sati uppajjati,
atk-abh01a0:1464_29: appahīnā eva ca dutiyajjhānupacāre vitakkavicārāti tatthassa siyā uppatti,
atk-abh01a0:1464_32: Tathā tatiyajjhānupacāre pahīnassāpi sukhindriyassa pītisamuṭṭhānapaṇītarūpaphuṭakāyassa siyā uppatti,
atk-abh01a0:1464_34: Tatiyajjhāne hi sukhassa paccayabhūtā pīti sabbaso niruddhāti.
atk-abh01a0:1464_36: appanāppattāya upekkhāya abhāvena sammā anatikkantattā ca,
atk-abh01a0:1464_39: Tasmā eva ca ‘etthuppannaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ aparisesaṃ nirujjhatī’ti tattha tattha aparisesaggahaṇaṃ katanti.
atk-abh01a0:1465_1: ‘athevaṃ tassa tassa jhānassupacāre pahīnāpi etā vedanā idha kasmā samāhaṭā’ti?
atk-abh01a0:1465_3: Yā hi ayaṃ ‘adukkhamasukha’nti ettha adukkhamasukhā vedanā vuttā,
atk-abh01a0:1465_7: Tasmā yathā nāma duṭṭhassa yathā tathā vā upasaṅkamitvā gahetuṃ asakkuṇeyyassa goṇassa gahaṇatthaṃ gopo ekasmiṃ vaje sabbā gāvo samāharati,
atk-abh01a0:1465_10: evameva bhagavā sukhagahaṇatthaṃ sabbāpi etā samāharīti.
atk-abh01a0:1465_11: Evañhi samāhaṭā etā dassetvā yaṃ neva sukhaṃ na dukkhaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1465_13: ayaṃ adukkhamasukhāvedanāti sakkā hoti esā gāhayituṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1466_0: Apica adukkhamasukhāya cetovimuttiyā paccayadassanatthañcāpi etā vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1466_6: catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati, ime kho, āvuso,
atk-abh01a0:1466_8: Yathā vā aññattha pahīnāpi sakkāyadiṭṭhiādayo tatiyamaggassa vaṇṇabhaṇanatthaṃ tattha pahīnāti vuttā,
atk-abh01a0:1466_9: evaṃ vaṇṇabhaṇanatthampetassa jhānassetā idha vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1466_10: Paccayaghātena vā ettha rāgadosānaṃ atidūrabhāvaṃ dassetumpetā vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1466_15: Sukhādighātena ca sappaccayā rāgadosā hatāti atidūre hontīti.
atk-abh01a0:1468_2: Yā ca tassā satiyā pārisuddhi sā upekkhāya katā,
atk-abh01a0:1468_6: “ayaṃ sati imāya upekkhāya visadā hoti parisuddhā pariyodātā,
atk-abh01a0:1468_8: Yāya ca upekkhāya ettha sati pārisuddhi hoti sā atthato tatramajjhattatāti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1468_9: Na kevalañcettha tāya satiyeva parisuddhā apica kho sabbepi sampayuttadhammā.
atk-abh01a0:1469_0: Tattha kiñcāpi ayaṃ upekkhā heṭṭhāpi tīsu jhānesu vijjati –
atk-abh01a0:1469_1: yathā pana divā sūriyappabhābhibhavā sommabhāvena ca attano upakārakattena vā sabhāgāya rattiyā alābhā
atk-abh01a0:1469_2: divā vijjamānāpi candalekhā aparisuddhā hoti apariyodātā –
atk-abh01a0:1469_3: evamayampi tatramajjhattupekkhācandalekhā vitakkādipaccanīkadhammatejābhibhavā sabhāgāya ca upekkhāvedanārattiyā
atk-abh01a0:1469_5: Tassā ca aparisuddhāya divā aparisuddhacandalekhāya pabhā viya sahajātāpi satiādayo aparisuddhāva honti.
atk-abh01a0:1469_7: Idha pana vitakkādipaccanīkadhammatejābhibhavābhāvā sabhāgāya ca upekkhā vedanārattiyā paṭilābhā ayaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1469_9: Tassā parisuddhattā parisuddhacandalekhāya pabhā viya sahajātāpi satiādayo parisuddhā honti pariyodātā.
atk-abh01a0:1470_2: Phasso hotītiādīsu phassapañcake tāva vedanāti upekkhāvedanā veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1470_3: Jhānapañcakaindriyaaṭṭhakesu pana upekkhā hoti upekkhindriyaṃ hotīti vuttameva.
atk-abh01a0:1473_1: Idāni katame dhammā kusalāti pañcakanayo āraddho.
atk-abh01a0:1473_4: Sannisinnadevaparisāya kira ekaccānaṃ devānaṃ vitakko eva oḷārikato upaṭṭhāsi,
atk-abh01a0:1473_6: Tesaṃ sappāyavasena satthā caturaṅgikaṃ avitakkaṃ vicāramattaṃ dutiyajjhānaṃ nāma bhājesi.
atk-abh01a0:1473_9: Tesaṃ sappāyavasena tivaṅgikaṃ tatiyajjhānaṃ nāma bhājesi.
atk-abh01a0:1473_12: Tesaṃ sappāyavasena duvaṅgikaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ nāma bhājesi.
atk-abh01a0:1473_15: Tesaṃ sappāyavasena duvaṅgikaṃ pañcamajjhānaṃ nāma bhājesi.
atk-abh01a0:1474_0: Yassā pana dhammadhātuyā suppaṭividdhattā desanāvilāsappatto nāma hoti –
atk-abh01a0:1474_2: tasmā ñāṇamahattatāya desanāvidhānesu kusalo desanāvilāsappatto satthā yaṃ yaṃ aṅgaṃ labbhati tassa tassa
atk-abh01a0:1474_3: vasena yathā yathā icchati tathā tathā desanaṃ niyāmetīti so idha pañcaṅgikaṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ bhājesi,
atk-abh01a0:1475_4: avitakkaavicāro samādhī”ti suttante tayo samādhī desitā,
atk-abh01a0:1475_5: tesu heṭṭhā savitakkasavicāro samādhi avitakkaavicāro samādhi ca bhājetvā dassito,
atk-abh01a0:1475_7: Taṃ dassetumpi ayaṃ pañcakanayo āraddhoti veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1476_1: koṭṭhāsavāre “caturaṅgikaṃ jhānaṃ hoti caturaṅgiko maggo hotī”ti ayameva viseso.
atk-abh01a0:1476_3: Yāni ca catukkanaye dutiyatatiyacatutthāni tāneva idha tatiyacatutthapañcamāni.
atk-abh01a0:1477_0: Eko kira amaccaputto rājānaṃ upaṭṭhātuṃ janapadato nagaraṃ āgato.
atk-abh01a0:1477_1: So ekadivasameva rājānaṃ disvā pānabyasanena sabbaṃ vibhavajātaṃ nāsesi.
atk-abh01a0:1477_2: Taṃ ekadivasaṃ surāmadamattaṃ niccoḷaṃ katvā jiṇṇakaṭasārakamattena paṭicchādetvā pānāgārato nīhariṃsu.
atk-abh01a0:1477_3: Tamenaṃ saṅkārakūṭe nipajjitvā niddāyantaṃ eko aṅgavijjāpāṭhako disvā ‘ayaṃ puriso mahājanassa avassayo bhavissati,
atk-abh01a0:1477_4: paṭijaggitabbo eso’ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā mattikāya nhāpetvā thūlasāṭakayugaṃ nivāsāpetvā puna gandhodakena
atk-abh01a0:1477_5: nhāpetvā sukhumena dukūlayugaḷena acchādetvā pāsādaṃ āropetvā subhojanaṃ bhojetvā ‘evaṃ naṃ paricāreyyāthā’ti
atk-abh01a0:1477_8: Pānāgāragamanapaṭibāhanatthañca naṃ cattāro tāva janā catūsu hatthapādesu uppīḷetvā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-abh01a0:1478_0: So sayanupagamanena vigatakilamatho thokaṃ niddāyitvā vuṭṭhito hatthapādanippīḷanaṃ asahamāno ‘ko me hatthapāde uppīḷeti?
atk-abh01a0:1478_3: Tato puna thokaṃ niddāyitvā vuṭṭhito pādaparimajjanaṃ asahamāno ‘ko me pāde parimajjati?
atk-abh01a0:1478_6: Puna thokaṃ niddāyitvā vuṭṭhito vātavuṭṭhi viya tālavaṇṭavātaṃ asahanto ‘ko esa?
atk-abh01a0:1478_9: Puna thokaṃ niddāyitvā vuṭṭhito kaṇṇasūlaṃ viya gītavāditasaddaṃ asahamāno vīṇāvādakaṃ tajjesi.
atk-abh01a0:1478_11: Athevaṃ anukkamena pahīnakilamathuppīḷanaparimajjanavātappahāragītavāditasaddupaddavo sukhaṃ sayitvā vuṭṭhāya rañño santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-abh01a0:1479_0: Tattha pānabyasanena pārijuññappatto so amaccaputto viya anekabyasanapārijuññappatto gharāvāsagato kulaputto daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1479_3: paṭijagganaṃ arahatī’ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ viya tathāgatassa ‘ayaṃ mahājanassa avassayo bhavissati,
atk-abh01a0:1480_0: Athassa amaccaputtassa mattikāmattena nhāpanaṃ viya kulaputtassāpi pabbajjāpaṭilābho.
atk-abh01a0:1481_0: Dukūlacchāditassa panassa pāsādāropanaṃ viya imassāpi sīlavisuddhidukūlacchāditassa samādhibhāvanāpāsādārohanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1482_0: Bhuttabhojanassa pana tassa paricārakehi sayanāropanaṃ viya imassāpi vitakkādīhi upacārajjhānāropanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1482_1: Puna tassa pānāgāragamanapaṭibāhanatthaṃ hatthapāduppīḷanakapurisacatukkaṃ viya imassāpi kāmasaññābhimukhagamanapaṭibāhanatthaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1482_3: Tassa pādaparimajjakapuriso viya imassāpi ārammaṇe cittānumajjanako vicāro.
atk-abh01a0:1482_4: Tassa tālavaṇṭavātadāyako viya imassāpi cetaso sītalabhāvadāyikā pīti.
atk-abh01a0:1483_0: Tassa sotānuggahakaro gandhabbapuriso viya imassāpi cittānuggāhakaṃ somanassaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1483_1: Tassa sayanupagamanena vigatakilamathassa thokaṃ niddupagamanaṃ viya imassāpi upacārajjhānasannissayena
atk-abh01a0:1484_0: Athassa niddāyitvā vuṭṭhitassa hatthapāduppīḷanāsahanena hatthapāduppīḷakānaṃ santajjanaṃ tesañca apagamanena
atk-abh01a0:1484_1: puna thokaṃ niddupagamanaṃ viya imassāpi paṭhamajjhānato vuṭṭhitassa cittuppīḷakavitakkāsahanena vitakkadosadassanaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1485_0: Tato tassa punappunaṃ niddāyitvā vuṭṭhitassa yathāvuttena kamena pādaparimajjanādīnaṃ asahanena paṭipāṭiyā pādaparimajjakādīnaṃ santajjanaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1485_1: tesaṃ tesañca apagamanena punappunaṃ thokaṃ niddupagamanaṃ viya imassāpi punappunaṃ dutiyādīhi jhānehi
atk-abh01a0:1485_2: vuṭṭhitassa yathāvuttadosānaṃ vicārādīnaṃ asahanena paṭipāṭiyā vicārādidosadassanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1485_3: Tesaṃ tesañca pahānā punappunaṃ avitakkaavicāranippītika pahīnasomanassajjhānupagamanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1486_0: Tassa pana sayanā vuṭṭhāya rañño santikaṃ gatassa issariyappatti viya imassāpi pañcamajjhānato vuṭṭhitassa vipassanā maggaṃ upagatassa arahattappatti.
atk-abh01a0:1487_0: Tassa pattissariyassa bahūnaṃ janānaṃ avassayabhāvo viya imassāpi arahattappattassa bahūnaṃ avassayabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1487_1: Ettāvatā hi esa anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ nāma hotīti.
atk-abh01a0:1489_0: Ettāvatā catukkapañcakanayadvayabhedo suddhikanavako nāma pakāsito hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1489_1: Atthato panesa pañcakanaye catukkanayassa paviṭṭhattā jhānapañcako evāti veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1491_1: Idāni yasmā etaṃ jhānaṃ nāma paṭipadākamena sijjhati,
atk-abh01a0:1491_2: tasmā tassa paṭipadābhedaṃ dassetuṃ puna katame dhammā kusalātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1491_5: Iti dukkhapaṭipadanti vā dandhābhiññanti vā pathavīkasiṇanti vā tīṇipi jhānasseva nāmāni.
atk-abh01a0:1492_0: Tattha paṭhamasamannāhārato paṭṭhāya yāva tassa tassa jhānassa upacāraṃ uppajjati tāva pavattā jhānabhāvanā ‘paṭipadā’ti vuccati.
atk-abh01a0:1492_1: Upacārato pana paṭṭhāya yāva appanā tāva pavattā paññā ‘abhiññā’ti vuccati.
atk-abh01a0:1492_2: Sā panesā paṭipadā ekaccassa dukkhā hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1492_8: Tasmā yo ādito kilese vikkhambhento dukkhena sasaṅkhārena sappayogena kilamanto vikkhambheti,
atk-abh01a0:1492_10: Yo pana vikkhambhitakileso appanāparivāsaṃ vasanto cirena aṅgapātubhāvaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-abh01a0:1492_12: Yo khippaṃ aṅgapātubhāvaṃ pāpuṇāti tassa khippābhiññā nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1492_13: Yo kilese vikkhambhento sukhena akilamanto vikkhambheti,
atk-abh01a0:1493_0: Tattha yāni sappāyāsappāyāni ca palibodhupacchedādīni pubbakiccāni ca appanākosallāni ca visuddhimagge cittabhāvanāniddese niddiṭṭhāni,
atk-abh01a0:1493_2: tassa dukkhā paṭipadā dandhā ca abhiññā hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1493_3: Sappāyasevino sukhā paṭipadā khippā ca abhiññā.
atk-abh01a0:1493_4: Yo pana pubbabhāge asappāyaṃ sevitvā aparabhāge sappāyasevī hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1493_5: pubbabhāge vā sappāyaṃ sevitvā aparabhāge asappāyasevī,
atk-abh01a0:1493_7: Tathā palibodhupacchedādikaṃ pubbakiccaṃ asampādetvā bhāvanaṃ anuyuttassa dukkhā paṭipadā hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1493_9: Appanākosallāni pana asampādentassa dandhā abhiññā hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1494_0: Apica taṇhāavijjāvasena samathavipassanākatādhikāravasena cāpi etāsaṃ pabhedo veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1494_5: Yo ca samathe akatādhikāro tassa dukkhā paṭipadā hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1495_1: Tibbakilesassa hi mudindriyassa dukkhā paṭipadā hoti dandhā ca abhiññā,
atk-abh01a0:1495_3: Mandakilesassa ca mudindriyassa sukhā paṭipadā hoti dandhā ca abhiññā,
atk-abh01a0:1496_0: Iti imāsu paṭipadāabhiññāsu yo puggalo dukkhāya paṭipadāya dandhāya abhiññāya jhānaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-abh01a0:1496_1: tassa taṃ jhānaṃ dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññanti vuccati.
atk-abh01a0:1497_0: Tattha ‘tadanudhammatā sati santiṭṭhati ṭhitibhāginī paññā’ti evaṃ vuttasatiyā vā taṃtaṃjhānanikantiyā vā vikkhambhane paṭipadā,
atk-abh01a0:1497_1: taṃtaṃjhānupacārappattassa appanāya parivāse abhiññā ca veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1497_3: Dukkhapaṭipadañhi dandhābhiññaṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ patvā pavattaṃ dutiyampi tādisameva hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1497_5: Yathā ca catukkanaye evaṃ pañcakanayepi paṭipadāvasena catudhā bhedo veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1497_6: Iti paṭipadāvasenapi cattāro navakā vuttā honti.
atk-abh01a0:1497_8: atthato pana pañcakanaye catukkanayassa paviṭṭhattā vīsatimeva bhavantīti.
atk-abh01a0:1500_1: Idāni yasmā etaṃ jhānaṃ nāma yathā paṭipadābhedena evaṃ ārammaṇabhedenāpi catubbidhaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1500_2: Tasmāssa taṃ pabhedaṃ dassetuṃ puna katame dhammā kusalātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1500_3: Tattha parittaṃ parittārammaṇantiādīsu yaṃ appaguṇaṃ hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1500_6: Yaṃ pana avaḍḍhite suppamatte vā sarāvamatte vā ārammaṇe pavattaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1500_8: Yaṃ paguṇaṃ subhāvitaṃ uparijjhānassa paccayo bhavituṃ sakkoti,
atk-abh01a0:1500_10: Yaṃ vipule ārammaṇe pavattaṃ taṃ vuḍḍhippamāṇattā appamāṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ assāti appamāṇārammaṇaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1500_12: Iti ārammaṇavasenapi cattāro navakā vuttā honti.
atk-abh01a0:1503_1: Idāni ārammaṇapaṭipadāmissakaṃ soḷasakkhattukanayaṃ dassetuṃ puna katame dhammā kusalātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1503_2: Tattha paṭhamanaye vuttajjhānaṃ dukkhapaṭipadattā dandhābhiññattā parittattā parittārammaṇattāti catūhi kāraṇehi hīnaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1503_3: soḷasamanaye vuttajjhānaṃ sukhapaṭipadattā khippābhiññattā appamāṇattā appamāṇārammaṇattāti catūhi kāraṇehi paṇītaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1503_4: Sesesu cuddasasu ekena dvīhi tīhi ca kāraṇehi hīnappaṇītatā veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1504_2: Sammāsambuddhena hi pathavīkasiṇe suddhikajjhānaṃ catukkanayavasena pañcakanayavasena ca dassitaṃ;
atk-abh01a0:1504_5: Tattha yā devatā pathavīkasiṇe suddhikajjhānaṃ catukkanayavasena desiyamānaṃ bujjhituṃ sakkonti,
atk-abh01a0:1504_11: tāsaṃ sappāyavasena suddhikapaṭipadāya suddhikārammaṇe catukkanayo desito.
atk-abh01a0:1504_12: Yā pañcakanayavasena desiyamānaṃ bujjhituṃ sakkonti tāsaṃ sappāyavasena pañcakanayo.
atk-abh01a0:1505_0: Desanāvilāsappatto cesa pabhinnapaṭisambhido dasabalacatuvesārajjavisadañāṇo dhammānaṃ yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇassa
atk-abh01a0:1505_1: suppaṭividdhattā dhammapaññattikusalatāya yo yo nayo labbhati tassa tassa vasena desanaṃ niyametuṃ sakkoti,
atk-abh01a0:1505_2: tasmā imāya desanāvilāsappattiyāpi tena esā pathavīkasiṇe suddhikacatukkanayādivasena desanā katā.
atk-abh01a0:1506_0: Yasmā pana ye keci jhānaṃ uppādenti nāma na te ārammaṇapaṭipadāhi vinā uppādetuṃ sakkonti,
atk-abh01a0:1506_1: tasmā niyamato jhānuppattikāraṇattā ayaṃ soḷasakkhattukanayo kathito.
atk-abh01a0:1507_3: ime ca soḷasa navakāti pañcavīsati navakā kathitā honti.
atk-abh01a0:1507_4: Tattha ekekasmiṃ navake catukkapañcakavasena dve dve nayāti paññāsa nayā.
atk-abh01a0:1507_6: pañcakanayesu pañcavīsasata”nti pāṭhato pañcavīsādhikāni dve jhānacittasatāni honti.
atk-abh01a0:1507_7: Pañcakanaye pana catukkanayassa paviṭṭhattā atthato pañcavīsādhikameva cittasataṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1507_8: Yāni cetāni pāṭhe pañcavīsādhikāni dve cittasatāni tesu ekekassa niddese dhammavavatthānādayo tayo tayo mahāvārā honti.
atk-abh01a0:1507_9: Te pana tattha tattha nayamattameva dassetvā saṃkhittāti.
atk-abh01a0:1509_1: Idāni yasmā āpokasiṇādīsupi etāni jhānāni uppajjanti,
atk-abh01a0:1509_2: tasmā tesaṃ dassanatthaṃ puna katame dhammā kusalātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1509_3: Tesu sabbo pāḷinayo ca atthavibhāvanā ca cittagaṇanā ca vārasaṅkhepo ca pathavīkasiṇe vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1509_4: Bhāvanānayo pana kasiṇaparikammaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbo visuddhimagge (visuddhi 1.91 ādayo) pakāsitoyeva.
atk-abh01a0:1509_6: Tesu viññāṇakasiṇaṃ ākāse pavattitamahaggataviññāṇampi tattha parikammaṃ katvā nibbattā viññāṇañcāyatanasamāpattipi
atk-abh01a0:1510_3: taṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppannaṃ catukkapañcakajjhānampi vuccati.
atk-abh01a0:1510_6: Iti missakattā imaṃ rūpāvacaradesanaṃ na āruḷhaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1510_7: Paricchedākāse nibbattajjhānaṃ pana rūpūpapattiyā maggo hoti tasmā taṃ gahetabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1510_11: Tañhi punappunaṃ ugghāṭiyamānampi ākāsameva hotīti na tattha kasiṇugghāṭanaṃ labbhati,
atk-abh01a0:1510_16: Anupubbanirodho panettha yāva pañcamajjhānā labbhati vaṭṭapādakaṃ hotiyeva.
atk-abh01a0:1510_17: Yathā cetaṃ evaṃ purimakasiṇesu uppannaṃ jhānampi.
atk-abh01a0:1510_19: Sesamettha ākāsakasiṇe yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā taṃ sabbaṃ visuddhimagge vuttameva.
atk-abh01a0:1511_0: ‘Ekopi hutvā bahudhā hotī’tiādinayaṃ pana vikubbanaṃ icchantena purimesu aṭṭhasu kasiṇesu aṭṭha samāpattiyo
atk-abh01a0:1512_1: pubbe abhāvitabhāvano ādikammiko yogāvacaro iddhivikubbanaṃ sampādessatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
atk-abh01a0:1512_6: Uppanne nimitte taṃ vaḍḍhetvā appanādhigamo bhāro,
atk-abh01a0:1512_13: satesu sahassesu vā ekova khippanisanti hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1512_14: Therambatthale mahārohanaguttattherassa gilānupaṭṭhānaṃ āgatesu tiṃsamattesu iddhimantasahassesu upasampadāya aṭṭhavassiko rakkhitatthero viya.
atk-abh01a0:1515_2: idāni yasmā samānepi ārammaṇe bhāvanāya asamānaṃ imesu aṭṭhasu kasiṇesu aññampi abhibhāyatanasaṅkhātaṃ rūpāvacarakusalaṃ pavattati,
atk-abh01a0:1515_3: tasmā taṃ dassetuṃ puna katame dhammā kusalātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1515_4: Tattha ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññīti alābhitāya vā anatthikatāya vā ajjhattarūpe parikammasaññāvirahito.
atk-abh01a0:1515_5: Bahiddhā rūpāni passatīti bahiddhā aṭṭhasu kasiṇesu kataparikammatāya parikammavasena ceva appanāvasena
atk-abh01a0:1515_6: ca tāni bahiddhā aṭṭhasu kasiṇesu rūpāni passati.
atk-abh01a0:1515_8: Tāni abhibhuyyāti yathā nāma sampannagahaṇiko kaṭacchumattaṃ bhattaṃ labhitvā ‘kiṃ ettha bhuñjitabbaṃ atthī’ti saṅkaḍḍhitvā ekakabaḷameva karoti,
atk-abh01a0:1515_9: evameva ñāṇuttariko puggalo visadañāṇo ‘kimettha parittake ārammaṇe samāpajjitabbaṃ atthi,
atk-abh01a0:1515_10: nāyaṃ mama bhāro’ti tāni rūpāni abhibhavitvā samāpajjati.
atk-abh01a0:1515_12: Jānāmi passāmīti iminā panassa pubbabhāgo kathito.
atk-abh01a0:1516_1: Abhibhuyyāti ettha pana yathā mahagghaso puriso ekaṃ bhattavaḍḍhitakaṃ labhitvā ‘aññāpi hotu ‘kimesā mayhaṃ karissatī’ti taṃ na mahantato passati,
atk-abh01a0:1516_4: na mayhaṃ cittekaggatākaraṇe bhāro atthī’ti tāni abhibhavitvā samāpajjati.
atk-abh01a0:1517_0: Parittaṃ parittārammaṇaṃ appamāṇaṃ parittārammaṇanti idha parittānīti āgatattā appamāṇārammaṇatā na gahitā,
atk-abh01a0:1517_3: ‘imasmiṃ ṭhāne cattāri cattāri ārammaṇāni aggahetvā dve dveva gahitāni.
atk-abh01a0:1517_5: Catūsu hi gahitesu desanā soḷasakkhattukā hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1517_6: satthārā ca heṭṭhā soḷasakkhattukā desanā kilañjamhi tile pattharantena viya vitthārato kathitā.
atk-abh01a0:1517_7: Tassa imasmiṃ ṭhāne aṭṭhakkhattukaṃ desanaṃ kātuṃ ajjhāsayo.
atk-abh01a0:1518_3: Āgamaṭṭhakathāsu pana ‘suvaṇṇāni vā hontu dubbaṇṇāni vā,
atk-abh01a0:1518_5: Imesu pana catūsu parittaṃ vitakkacaritavasena āgataṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1518_10: Sā ca tesaṃ sappāyatā vitthārato visuddhimagge cariyaniddese vuttā.
atk-abh01a0:1519_1: yathā suttante “ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati parittānī”tiādi vuttaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1519_2: evaṃ avatvā idha catūsupi abhibhāyatanesu ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññitāva vuttāti?
atk-abh01a0:1519_4: Tattha vā hi idha vā bahiddhārūpāneva abhibhavitabbāni,
atk-abh01a0:1519_5: tasmā tāni niyamato vattabbānīti tatrapi idhapi vuttāni.
atk-abh01a0:1519_6: Ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññīti idaṃ pana satthu desanāvilāsamattameva.
atk-abh01a0:1519_8: Suddhikanayapaṭipadābhedo panettha pathavīkasiṇe vuttanayeneva ekekasmiṃ abhibhāyatane veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1519_15: ārammaṇapaṭipadāmissake aṭṭha navakāti pannarasa navakāti catūsupi abhibhāyatanesu samasaṭṭhi navakā veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1520_10: Suvisuddhavaṇṇavasena hi imāni cattāri abhibhāyatanāni vuttāni.
atk-abh01a0:1520_13: Pupphasmiṃ vā vatthasmiṃ vā vaṇṇadhātuyā vātiādikaṃ panettha kasiṇakaraṇañca parikammañca appanāvidhānañca sabbaṃ visuddhimagge vitthārato vuttameva.
atk-abh01a0:1520_14: Yathā ca pathavīkasiṇe evamettha ekekasmiṃ abhibhāyatane pañcavīsati pañcavīsati navakā veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1523_1: Idāni yasmā idaṃ rūpāvacarakusalaṃ nāma na kevalaṃ ārammaṇasaṅkhātānaṃ āyatanānaṃ abhibhavanato abhibhāyatanavaseneva uppajjati,
atk-abh01a0:1523_3: tasmā tampi nayaṃ dassetuṃ puna katame dhammā kusalātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1524_5: Pituaṅke vissaṭṭhaaṅgapaccaṅgassa dārakassa sayanaṃ viya aniggahitabhāvena nirāsaṅkatāya ārammaṇe pavattīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1524_6: Evaṃlakkhaṇañhi vimokkhabhāvappattaṃ rūpāvacarakusalaṃ dassetuṃ ayaṃ nayo āraddho.
atk-abh01a0:1525_0: Tattha rūpīti ajjhattaṃ kesādīsu uppāditaṃ rūpajjhānaṃ rūpaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1525_2: Ajjhattañhi nīlaparikammaṃ karonto kese vā pitte vā akkhitārakāya vā karoti.
atk-abh01a0:1525_3: Pītaparikammaṃ karonto mede vā chaviyā vā akkhīnaṃ pītaṭṭhāne vā karoti.
atk-abh01a0:1525_4: Lohitaparikammaṃ karonto maṃse vā lohite vā jivhāya vā hatthatalapādatalesu vā akkhīnaṃ rattaṭṭhāne vā karoti.
atk-abh01a0:1525_5: Odātaparikammaṃ karonto aṭṭhimhi vā dante vā nakhe vā akkhīnaṃ setaṭṭhāne vā karoti.
atk-abh01a0:1525_6: Evaṃ parikammaṃ katvā uppannajjhānasamaṅginaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1525_7: Rūpāni passatīti bahiddhāpi nīlakasiṇādirūpāni jhānacakkhunā passati.
atk-abh01a0:1526_2: Iminā bahiddhā parikammaṃ katvā bahiddhāva paṭiladdhajjhānatā dassitā.
atk-abh01a0:1527_0: Subhanti iminā suvisuddhesu nīlādīsu vaṇṇakasiṇesu jhānāni dassitāni.
atk-abh01a0:1527_2: yo pana suvisuddhaṃ subhakasiṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā viharati,
atk-abh01a0:1527_7: Paṭisambhidāmagge pana “kathaṃ subhantveva adhimutto hotīti vimokkho?
atk-abh01a0:1527_8: Idha bhikkhu mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ…pe… viharati,
atk-abh01a0:1527_9: mettāya bhāvitattā sattā appaṭikūlā honti; karuṇā… muditā…
atk-abh01a0:1527_12: evaṃ subhantveva adhimutto hotī”ti vimokkhoti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1527_13: Idha pana upari pāḷiyaṃyeva brahmavihārānaṃ āgatattā taṃ nayaṃ paṭikkhipitvā sunīlakasupītakasulohitakasuodātakaparisuddhanīlakaparisuddhapītakaparisuddhalohitakaparisuddhaodātakavaseneva
atk-abh01a0:1527_15: Iti kasiṇanti vā abhibhāyatananti vā vimokkhoti vā rūpāvacarajjhānameva.
atk-abh01a0:1527_18: ārammaṇe adhimuccanaṭṭhena paccanīkadhammehi ca vimuccanaṭṭhena vimokkho nāmāti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1527_22: Ekekasmiṃ pana vimokkhe pathavīkasiṇe viya pañcavīsati pañcavīsatīti katvā pañcasattati navakā veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1530_1: Idāni mettādibrahmavihāravasena pavattamānaṃ rūpāvacarakusalaṃ dassetuṃ puna katame dhammā kusalātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1530_4: Yena panesa vidhānena paṭipanno mettādisahagatāni jhānāni upasampajja viharati,
atk-abh01a0:1530_5: taṃ mettādīnaṃ bhāvanāvidhānaṃ sabbaṃ visuddhimagge vitthāritameva.
atk-abh01a0:1530_6: Avasesāya pāḷiyā attho pathavīkasiṇe vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1531_1: idha purimāsu tīsu tikacatukkajjhānikavasena pañcavīsati sattakā,
atk-abh01a0:1531_3: karuṇāmuditāsu ca chandādīhi catūhi saddhiṃ karuṇāmuditāti imepi yevāpanakā labbhanti.
atk-abh01a0:1533_0: Brahmuttamena kathite, brahmavihāre ime iti viditvā;
atk-abh01a0:1535_0: Etāsu hi mettākaruṇāmuditāupekkhāsu atthato tāva mejjatīti mettā,
atk-abh01a0:1535_4: Paradukkhe sati sādhūnaṃ hadayakampanaṃ karotīti karuṇā.
atk-abh01a0:1535_5: Kiṇāti vā paradukkhaṃ hiṃsati vināsetīti karuṇā.
atk-abh01a0:1535_6: Kirīyati vā dukkhitesu pharaṇavasena pasāriyatīti karuṇā.
atk-abh01a0:1536_22: te kassa ruciyā sukhitā vā bhavissanti,
atk-abh01a0:1537_0: Catunnampi panetesaṃ brahmavihārānaṃ vipassanāsukhañceva bhavasampatti ca sādhāraṇappayojanaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1539_0: Ekamekassa cettha āsannadūravasena dve dve paccatthikā.
atk-abh01a0:1539_6: Pabbatādigahananissito viya purisassa sapatto sabhāvavisabhāgatāya byāpādo dūrapaccatthiko.
atk-abh01a0:1539_8: Mettāyissati ca nāma kopañca karissatīti aṭṭhānametaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1540_0: Karuṇābrahmavihārassa “cakkhuviññeyyānaṃ rūpānaṃ iṭṭhānaṃ kantānaṃ manāpānaṃ manoramānaṃ lokāmisapaṭisaṃyuttānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1540_1: appaṭilābhaṃ vā appaṭilābhato samanupassato pubbe vā paṭiladdhapubbaṃ atītaṃ niruddhaṃ vipariṇataṃ samanussarato
atk-abh01a0:1540_3: Yaṃ evarūpaṃ domanassaṃ idaṃ vuccati gehassitaṃ domanassa”ntiādinā nayena āgataṃ gehassitaṃ domanassaṃ vipattidassanasabhāgatāya āsannapaccatthikaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1540_6: Karuṇañca nāma karissati pāṇiādīhi ca vihesissatīti aṭṭhānametaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1541_0: Muditābrahmavihārassa “cakkhuviññeyyānaṃ rūpānaṃ iṭṭhānaṃ kantānaṃ manāpānaṃ manoramānaṃ lokāmisapaṭisaṃyuttānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1541_1: paṭilābhaṃ vā paṭilābhato samanupassato pubbe vā paṭiladdhapubbaṃ atītaṃ niruddhaṃ vipariṇataṃ samanussarato
atk-abh01a0:1541_3: Yaṃ evarūpaṃ somanassaṃ idaṃ vuccati gehassitaṃ somanassa”ntiādinā nayena āgataṃ gehassitaṃ somanassaṃ sampattidassanasabhāgatāya āsannapaccatthikaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1541_6: Pamudito ca nāma bhavissati pantasenāsanesu ca adhikusaladhammesu ca ukkaṇṭhissatīti aṭṭhānametaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1542_0: Upekkhābrahmavihārassa pana “cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā uppajjati upekkhā bālassa mūḷhassa puthujjanassa anodhijinassa
atk-abh01a0:1542_2: Yā evarūpā upekkhā rūpaṃ sā nātivattati.
atk-abh01a0:1542_3: Tasmā sā upekkhā gehassitāti vuccatī”tiādinā nayena āgatā gehassitā aññāṇupekkhā dosaguṇānaṃ avicāraṇavasena sabhāgattā āsannapaccatthikā.
atk-abh01a0:1542_6: Upekkhissati ca nāma rajjissati ca paṭihaññissati cāti aṭṭhānametaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1543_3: paññattidhammavasena eko vā satto anekā vā sattā ārammaṇaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1543_4: upacāre vā appanāya vā pattāya ārammaṇavaḍḍhanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1544_1: yathā hi kusalo kassako kasitabbaṭṭhānaṃ paricchinditvā kasati,
atk-abh01a0:1544_2: evaṃ paṭhamameva ekaṃ āvāsaṃ paricchinditvā tattha sattesu ‘imasmiṃ āvāse sattā averā hontū’tiādinā nayena mettā bhāvetabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1544_3: Tattha cittaṃ muduṃ kammaniyaṃ katvā dve āvāsā paricchinditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1544_4: Tato anukkamena tayo cattāro pañca cha satta aṭṭha nava dasa,
atk-abh01a0:1544_7: ekā disāti evaṃ yāva ekaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1544_8: tato vā pana bhiyyo tattha tattha sattesu mettā bhāvetabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1545_5: Yathā hi thambhe anussāpetvā tulāsaṅghāṭaṃ anāropetvā na sakkā ākāse kūṭagopānasiyo ṭhapetuṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1545_6: evaṃ purimesu tatiyajjhānaṃ vinā na sakkā catutthaṃ bhāvetuṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1546_1: ‘kasmā panetā mettā karuṇā muditā upekkhā brahmavihārāti vuccanti? Kasmā ca,
atk-abh01a0:1546_4: Vibhaṅge ca kasmā appamaññāti vuttā’ti? Vuccate –
atk-abh01a0:1546_5: seṭṭhaṭṭhena tāva niddosabhāvena cettha brahmavihāratā veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1546_6: Sattesu sammāpaṭipattibhāvena hi seṭṭhā ete vihārā.
atk-abh01a0:1546_8: evaṃ etehi sampayuttā yogino brahmasamāva hutvā viharantīti seṭṭhaṭṭhena niddosabhāvena ca brahmavihārāti vuccanti.
atk-abh01a0:1547_0: Kasmā ca catassotiādipañhassa pana idaṃ vissajjanaṃ –
atk-abh01a0:1552_5: yasmā ca yathā mātā daharagilānayobbanappattasakiccapasutesu catūsu puttesu daharassa abhivuḍḍhikāmā hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1553_0: Yasmā pana catassopetā bhāvetukāmena paṭhamaṃ hitākārappavattivasena sattesu paṭipajjitabbaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1553_2: tato evaṃ patthitahitānaṃ sattānaṃ dukkhābhibhavaṃ disvā vā sutvā vā sambhāvetvā vā dukkhāpanayanākārappavattivasena,
atk-abh01a0:1553_4: athevaṃ patthitahitānaṃ patthitadukkhāpagamānañca nesaṃ sampattiṃ disvā sampattippamodanavasena,
atk-abh01a0:1553_6: tato paraṃ pana kattabbābhāvato ajjhupekkhakatāsaṅkhātena majjhattākārena paṭipajjitabbaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1553_8: tasmā ito hitādiākāravasā panāsaṃ paṭhamaṃ mettā vuttā.
atk-abh01a0:1553_9: Atha karuṇā muditā upekkhāti ayaṃ kamo veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1554_0: Yasmā pana sabbāpetā appamāṇe gocare pavattanti,
atk-abh01a0:1554_3: ‘ekasattassāpi ca ettake padese mettādayo bhāvetabbā’ti evaṃ pamāṇaṃ aggahetvā sakalapharaṇavaseneva pavattāti,
atk-abh01a0:1559_0: Evaṃ appamāṇagocaratāya ekalakkhaṇāsu cāpi etāsu purimā tisso tikacatukkajjhānikāva honti. Kasmā?
atk-abh01a0:1559_6: Na hi sattesu majjhattākārappavattā brahmavihārupekkhā upekkhāvedanaṃ vinā vattatīti.
atk-abh01a0:1562_1: Idāni rāgacaritasattānaṃ ekantahitaṃ nānārammaṇesu ekekajjhānavaseneva pavattamānaṃ rūpāvacarakusalaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1562_2: dassetuṃ puna katame dhammā kusalātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1563_2: uddhaṃ jīvitapariyādānā yathānukkamaṃ samuggatena sūnabhāvena dhumātattā uddhumātaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1563_21: Ito ca etto ca vividhākārena soṇasiṅgālādīhi khāyitaṃ vikkhāyitaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1563_28: ‘Aññena hatthaṃ aññena pādaṃ aññena sīsa’nti evaṃ tato tato khittassa chavasarīrassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1563_30: Kākapadākārena aṅgapaccaṅgesu satthena hanitvā vuttanayena vikkhittakassa chavasarīrassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1563_41: Imāni ca pana uddhumātakādīni nissāya uppannanimittānampi nimittesu paṭiladdhajjhānānampi etāneva nāmāni.
atk-abh01a0:1564_0: Tattha uddhumātakanimitte appanāvasena uppannā saññā uddhumātakasaññā.
atk-abh01a0:1569_0: Evaṃ pāḷinayeneva, tāva sabbāni tāni jānitvā;
atk-abh01a0:1571_0: Etesu hi yattha katthaci adhigatajjhāno suvikkhambhitarāgattā vītarāgo viya nilloluppacāro hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1571_2: so sarīrasabhāvappattivasena ca rāgacaritabhedavasena cāti veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1572_0: Chavasarīrañhi paṭikūlabhāvaṃ āpajjamānaṃ uddhumātakasabhāvappattaṃ vā siyā,
atk-abh01a0:1572_2: Iti yādisaṃ yādisaṃ sakkā hoti laddhuṃ tādise tādise uddhumātakapaṭikūlaṃ vinīlakapaṭikūlanti evaṃ nimittaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1572_3: gaṇhitabbamevāti sarīrasabhāvappattivasena dasadhā asubhappabhedo vuttoti veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1573_0: Visesato cettha uddhumātakaṃ sarīrasaṇṭhānavipattippakāsanato sarīrasaṇṭhānarāgino sappāyaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1573_2: Vipubbakaṃ kāyavaṇapaṭibaddhassa duggandhabhāvassa pakāsanato mālāgandhādivasena samuṭṭhāpitasarīragandharāgino sappāyaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1573_4: Vikkhāyitakaṃ maṃsūpacayasampattivināsappakāsanato thanādīsu sarīrappadesesu maṃsūpacayarāgino sappāyaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1573_8: Puḷavakaṃ kāyassa anekakimikulasādhāraṇabhāvappakāsanato kāye mamattarāgino sappāyaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1573_10: Evaṃ rāgacaritavasenāpi dasadhā asubhappabhedo vuttoti veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1574_0: Yasmā pana dasavidhepi etasmiṃ asubhe seyyathāpi nāma aparisaṇṭhitajalāya sīghasotāya nadiyā arittabaleneva nāvā tiṭṭhati,
atk-abh01a0:1574_2: evameva dubbalattā ārammaṇassa vitakkabaleneva cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati,
atk-abh01a0:1574_6: Paṭikūlepi cetasmiṃ ārammaṇe ‘addhā imāya paṭipadāya jarāmaraṇamhā parimuccissāmī’ti evaṃ ānisaṃsadassāvitāya
atk-abh01a0:1574_8: ‘bahuṃ dāni vetanaṃ labhissāmī’ti ānisaṃsadassāvino pupphachaḍḍakassa gūtharāsimhi viya,
atk-abh01a0:1575_0: Dasavidhampi cetaṃ asubhaṃ lakkhaṇato ekameva hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1575_1: Dasavidhassapi hi etassa asuciduggandhajegucchapaṭikūlabhāvo eva lakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1575_2: Tadetaṃ iminā lakkhaṇena na kevalaṃ matasarīreyeva dantaṭṭhikadassāvino pana cetiyapabbatavāsino mahātissattherassa viya,
atk-abh01a0:1575_3: hatthikkhandhagataṃ rājānaṃ ullokentassa saṅgharakkhitattherupaṭṭhākasāmaṇerassa viya ca,
atk-abh01a0:1575_5: Yatheva hi matasarīraṃ evaṃ jīvamānakampi asubhameva.
atk-abh01a0:1575_6: Asubhalakkhaṇaṃ panettha āgantukena alaṅkārena paṭicchannattā na paññāyatīti.
atk-abh01a0:1577_0: Kiṃ pana pathavīkasiṇaṃ ādiṃ katvā aṭṭhikasaññāpariyosānāvesā rūpāvacarappanā,
atk-abh01a0:1577_2: ānāpānajjhānañhi kāyagatāsatibhāvanā ca idha na kathitā.
atk-abh01a0:1577_3: Kiñcāpi na kathitā vāyokasiṇe pana gahite ānāpānajjhānaṃ gahitameva;
atk-abh01a0:1577_4: vaṇṇakasiṇesu ca gahitesu kesādīsu catukkapañcakajjhānavasena uppannā kāyagatāsati,
atk-abh01a0:1577_5: dasasu asubhesu gahitesu dvattiṃsākāre paṭikūlamanasikārajjhānavasena ceva navasivathikāvaṇṇajjhānavasena ca pavattā kāyagatāsati gahitāvāti.
atk-abh01a0:1581_1: Idāni arūpāvacarakusalaṃ dassetuṃ puna katame dhammā kusalātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1581_5: Maggaṃ bhāvetīti upāyaṃ hetuṃ kāraṇaṃ uppādeti vaḍḍheti.
atk-abh01a0:1581_9: Rūpāvacarajjhānampi hi rūpanti vuccati ‘rūpī rūpāni passatī’tiādīsu.
atk-abh01a0:1581_11: tasmā idha rūpe saññā rūpasaññāti evaṃ saññāsīsena vuttarūpāvacarajjhānassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1581_14: Evaṃ pathavīkasiṇādibhedassa tadārammaṇassa cetaṃ adhivacananti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1582_4: sabbākārena anavasesānaṃ vā virāgā ca nirodhā ca virāgahetu ceva nirodhahetu ca ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati.
atk-abh01a0:1582_5: Na hi sakkā sabbaso anatikkantarūpasaññena etaṃ upasampajja viharitunti.
atk-abh01a0:1583_0: Tattha yasmā ārammaṇe avirattassa saññāsamatikkamo na hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1583_1: samatikkantāsu ca saññāsu ārammaṇaṃ samatikkantameva hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1583_3: Rūpāvacarasamāpattiṃ samāpannassa vā upapannassa vā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārissa vā saññā sañjānanā sañjānitattaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1583_8: tena vuccati sabbaso rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamā”ti evaṃ vibhaṅge saññānaṃyeva samatikkamo vutto.
atk-abh01a0:1583_9: Yasmā pana ārammaṇasamatikkamena pattabbā etā samāpattiyo,
atk-abh01a0:1583_11: tasmā ayaṃ ārammaṇasamatikkamavasenāpi atthavaṇṇanā katāti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1584_0: Paṭighasaññānaṃ atthaṅgamāti cakkhādīnaṃ vatthūnaṃ rūpādīnaṃ ārammaṇānañca paṭighātena samuppannā saññā paṭighasaññā.
atk-abh01a0:1584_5: Tāsaṃ kusalavipākānaṃ pañcannaṃ akusalavipākānaṃ pañcannanti sabbaso dasannampi paṭighasaññānaṃ atthaṅgamā
atk-abh01a0:1584_6: pahānā asamuppādā appavattiṃ katvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1585_1: na hi tasmiṃ samaye pañcadvāravasena cittaṃ pavattati –
atk-abh01a0:1585_5: imasmiṃ jhāne ussāhajananatthaṃ imassa jhānassa pasaṃsāvasena etāsaṃ ettha vacanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1585_6: Atha vā kiñcāpi tā rūpāvacaraṃ samāpannassa na santi,
atk-abh01a0:1585_7: atha kho na pahīnattā na santi.
atk-abh01a0:1585_11: Tasmā tā ettha pahīnāti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-abh01a0:1585_14: Tāsañhi ito pubbe appahīnattāyeva paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpannassa “saddo kaṇṭako”ti vutto bhagavatā.
atk-abh01a0:1585_15: Idha ca pahīnattāyeva arūpasamāpattīnaṃ āneñjatā santavimokkhatā ca vuttā.
atk-abh01a0:1585_16: Āḷāro ca kāḷāmo āruppasamāpanno pañcamattāni sakaṭasatāni nissāya nissāya atikkantāni neva addasa,
atk-abh01a0:1586_0: Nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārāti nānatte gocare pavattānaṃ saññānaṃ nānattānaṃ vā saññānaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1586_2: Asamāpannassa manodhātusamaṅgissa vā manoviññāṇadhātusamaṅgissa vā saññā sañjānanā sañjānitattaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1586_3: imā vuccanti nānattasaññāyo”ti evaṃ vibhaṅge vibhajitvā vuttā idha adhippetā;
atk-abh01a0:1586_4: asamāpannassa manodhātumanoviññāṇadhātusaṅgahitā saññā rūpasaddādibhede nānatte nānāsabhāve gocare pavattanti;
atk-abh01a0:1586_9: ekādasa kāmāvacarakiriyasaññāti evaṃ catucattālīsampi saññā nānattā nānāsabhāvā aññamaññaṃ asadisā,
atk-abh01a0:1586_11: Tāsaṃ sabbaso nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārā anāvajjanā asamannāhārā apaccavekkhaṇā.
atk-abh01a0:1587_0: Yasmā cettha purimā rūpasaññā paṭighasaññā ca iminā jhānena nibbatte bhavepi na vijjanti,
atk-abh01a0:1587_1: pageva tasmiṃ bhave imaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharaṇakāle,
atk-abh01a0:1587_2: tasmā tāsaṃ ‘samatikkamā atthaṅgamā’ti dvedhāpi abhāvoyeva vutto.
atk-abh01a0:1587_5: dasa akusalasaññāti imā sattavīsati saññā iminā jhānena nibbatte bhave vijjanti,
atk-abh01a0:1587_7: Tatrāpi hi imaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharanto tāsaṃ amanasikārāyeva upasampajja viharati.
atk-abh01a0:1587_9: Saṅkhepato cettha ‘rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamā’ti iminā sabbarūpāvacaradhammānaṃ pahānaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1587_10: ‘Paṭighasaññānaṃ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārā’ti iminā sabbesaṃ kāmāvacaracittacetasikānañca pahānaṃ amanasikāro ca vuttoti veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1588_2: catucattālīsāya nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārenā’ti tīhi padehi ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiyā vaṇṇaṃ kathesi.
atk-abh01a0:1588_3: Kiṃ kāraṇāti ce sotūnaṃ ussāhajananatthañceva palobhanatthañca.
atk-abh01a0:1588_4: Sace hi keci apaṇḍitā vadeyyuṃ ‘satthā ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiṃ nibbattethāti vadati,
atk-abh01a0:1588_5: ko nu kho etāya nibbattitāya attho?
atk-abh01a0:1588_6: Ko ānisaṃso’ti te evaṃ vattuṃ mā labhantūti imehi ākārehi samāpattiyā vaṇṇaṃ kathesi.
atk-abh01a0:1589_3: So kira guḷaphāṇitakhaṇḍasakkarādīni sakaṭenādāya paccantagāmaṃ gantvā ‘visakaṇṭakaṃ gaṇhatha visakaṇṭakaṃ gaṇhathā’ti ugghosesi.
atk-abh01a0:1589_11: handa ne upāyena gaṇhāpemī’ti ‘atimadhuraṃ gaṇhatha atisāduṃ gaṇhatha,
atk-abh01a0:1589_14: Taṃ sutvā gāmikā haṭṭhapahaṭṭhā niggantvā bahumpi mūlaṃ datvā gahesuṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1590_0: Tattha vāṇijassa ‘visakaṇṭakaṃ gaṇhathā’ti ugghosanaṃ viya bhagavato ‘ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiṃ nibbattethā’ti vacanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1590_3: Gāmikānaṃ cintanaṃ viya ‘bhagavā ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ nibbattethāti āha,
atk-abh01a0:1590_6: Athassa vāṇijassa ‘atimadhuraṃ gaṇhathā’tiādivacanaṃ viya bhagavato rūpasaññāsamatikkamanādikaṃ ānisaṃsappakāsanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1590_7: Idañhi sutvā te bahumpi mūlaṃ datvā,
atk-abh01a0:1590_9: iminā ānisaṃsena palobhitacittā mahantampi ussāhaṃ katvā imaṃ samāpattiṃ nibbattessantīti ussāhajananatthaṃ palobhanatthañca kathesi.
atk-abh01a0:1591_3: Taṃ ākāsānañcaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena āyatanamassa sasampayuttadhammassa jhānassa,
atk-abh01a0:1591_5: Iti ākāsānañcaṃ ca taṃ āyatanañcātipi ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1591_7: Tasmiṃ ākāsānañcāyatane appanāppattāya saññāya sahagataṃ ākāsānañcāyatanasaññāsahagataṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1592_1: evamidha anantanti vā parittanti vā na gahitaṃ. Kasmā?
atk-abh01a0:1592_2: Anante hi gahite parittaṃ na gayhati,
atk-abh01a0:1592_6: Sammāsambuddhassa ca imasmiṃ ṭhāne desanaṃ soḷasakkhattukaṃ kātuṃ ajjhāsayo,
atk-abh01a0:1592_7: tasmā anantanti vā parittanti vā avatvā ‘ākāsānañcāyatanasaññāsahagata’nti āha.
atk-abh01a0:1592_14: Vipariyāyena sukhā paṭipadā khippābhiññā ca veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1592_15: Parittakasiṇugghāṭimākāse pana pavattaṃ jhānaṃ parittārammaṇaṃ vipulakasiṇugghāṭimākāse pavattaṃ appamāṇārammaṇanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1592_16: Upekkhābrahmavihāre viya ca idhāpi catutthajjhānavasena pañcavīsati ekakā honti.
atk-abh01a0:1594_2: ettha tāva pubbe vuttanayena ākāsānañcaṃ āyatanamassa adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhenāti jhānampi ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1594_4: Evametaṃ jhānañca ārammaṇañcāti ubhayampi appavattikaraṇena ca amanasikaraṇena ca samatikkamitvāva yasmā
atk-abh01a0:1594_6: tasmā ubhayampetaṃ ekajjhaṃ katvā ‘ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ samatikkammā’ti idaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1595_1: ettha pana anantanti manasikātabbavasena nāssa antoti anantaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1595_3: Viññāṇaṃ ānañcaṃ viññāṇānañcanti avatvā viññāṇañcanti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1595_5: Tadeva viññāṇañcaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena imāya saññāya āyatananti viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1595_6: Tasmiṃ viññāṇañcāyatane pavattāya saññāya sahagatanti viññāṇañcāyatanasaññāsahagataṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1597_1: Viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samatikkammāti etthāpi pubbe vuttanayeneva viññāṇañca āyatanamassa adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhenāti jhānampi viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1597_3: Evametaṃ jhānañca ārammaṇañcāti ubhayampi appavattikaraṇena ca amanasikaraṇena ca samatikkamitvāva yasmā
atk-abh01a0:1597_5: tasmā ubhayampetaṃ ekajjhaṃ katvā ‘viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samatikkammā’ti idaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1598_0: Ākiñcaññāyatanasaññāsahagatanti ettha pana nāssa kiñcananti akiñcanaṃ;
atk-abh01a0:1598_1: antamaso bhaṅgamattampi assa avasiṭṭhaṃ natthīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1598_4: Taṃ ākiñcaññaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena imissā saññāya āyatananti ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1598_5: Tasmiṃ ākiñcaññāyatane pavattāya saññāya sahagatanti ākiñcaññāyatanasaññāsahagataṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1600_0: Ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samatikkammāti etthāpi pubbe vuttanayeneva ākiñcaññaṃ āyatanamassa adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhenāti jhānampi ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1600_2: Evametaṃ jhānañca ārammaṇañcāti ubhayampi appavattikaraṇena ca amanasikaraṇe ca samatikkamitvāva yasmā
atk-abh01a0:1600_4: tasmā ubhayampetaṃ ekajjhaṃ katvā ‘ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samatikkammā’ti idaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1601_0: Nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasaññāsahagatanti ettha pana yāya saññāya bhāvato taṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatananti vuccati,
atk-abh01a0:1601_2: taṃ tāva dassetuṃ vibhaṅge “nevasaññīnāsaññī”ti uddharitvā “taññeva ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ santato manasikaroti saṅkhārāvasesasamāpattiṃ bhāveti,
atk-abh01a0:1601_5: yatra hi nāma natthibhāvampi ārammaṇaṃ karitvā ṭhassatī’ti evaṃ santārammaṇatāya naṃ ‘santā’ti manasikaroti.
atk-abh01a0:1601_9: So hi kiñcāpi naṃ santato manasikaroti,
atk-abh01a0:1601_10: atha khvassa ‘ahametaṃ āvajjissāmi samāpajjissāmi adhiṭṭhahissāmi vuṭṭhahissāmi paccavekkhissāmī’ti esa ābhogo samannāhāro manasikāro na hoti. Kasmā?
atk-abh01a0:1602_0: Yathā hi rājā mahaccarājānubhāvena hatthikkhandhagato nagaravīthiyaṃ vicaranto dantakārādayo sippike
atk-abh01a0:1602_1: ekaṃ vatthaṃ daḷhaṃ nivāsetvā ekena sīsaṃ veṭhetvā dantacuṇṇādīhi samokiṇṇagatte anekāni dantavikatiādīni
atk-abh01a0:1602_2: karonte disvā ‘aho vata re chekā ācariyā,
atk-abh01a0:1602_6: ‘aho vatāhaṃ rajjaṃ pahāya evarūpo sippiko bhaveyya’nti.
atk-abh01a0:1602_10: Evamevesa kiñcāpi taṃ samāpattiṃ santato manasikaroti,
atk-abh01a0:1602_11: atha khvassa ‘ahametaṃ samāpattiṃ āvajjissāmi samāpajjissāmi adhiṭṭhahissāmi vuṭṭhahissāmi paccavekkhissāmī’ti
atk-abh01a0:1602_12: neva esa ābhogo samannāhāro manasikāro hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1602_13: So taṃ santato manasi karonto taṃ paramasukhumaṃ appanāppattaṃ saññaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-abh01a0:1603_0: Idāni yaṃ taṃ evaṃ adhigatāya saññāya vasena nevasaññānāsaññāyatananti vuccati,
atk-abh01a0:1603_1: taṃ atthato dassetuṃ “nevasaññānāsaññāyatananti nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samāpannassa vā,
atk-abh01a0:1603_4: Tesu idha samāpannassa cittacetasikā dhammā adhippetā.
atk-abh01a0:1604_9: Nevasaññānāsaññā ca sā sesadhammānaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena āyatanañcāti nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1605_7: sāmaṇero kira telena pattaṃ makkhetvā ṭhapesi.
atk-abh01a0:1605_14: Tattha yathā antovutthattā yāguyā saddhiṃ akappiyaṭṭhena telaṃ atthīti hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1605_16: evaṃ sāpi saññā paṭusaññākiccaṃ kātuṃ asamatthatāya nevasaññā,
atk-abh01a0:1606_1: Ārammaṇasañjānanañceva vipassanāya ca visayabhāvaṃ upagantvā nibbidājananaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1606_4: Sesasamāpattīsu saññā viya vipassanāya visayabhāvaṃ upagantvā nibbidājananampi kātuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-abh01a0:1606_5: Aññesu hi khandhesu akatābhiniveso bhikkhu nevasaññānāsaññāyatanakkhandhe sammasitvā nibbidaṃ pattuṃ samattho nāma natthi.
atk-abh01a0:1607_0: Yathā ca pattamakkhanatelūpamāya evaṃ maggudakūpamāyapi ayamattho vibhāvetabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1607_1: Maggapaṭipannassa kira therassa purato gacchanto sāmaṇero thokamudakaṃ disvā ‘udakaṃ, bhante,
atk-abh01a0:1607_7: Tattha yathā upāhanatemanamattaṭṭhena udakaṃ atthīti hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1607_9: evampi sā paṭusaññākiccaṃ kātuṃ asamatthatāya neva saññā,
atk-abh01a0:1607_12: aññāhipi anurūpāhi upamāhi esa attho vibhāvetabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1607_13: Iti imāya nevasaññānāsaññāyatane pavattāya saññāya nevasaññānāsaññāyatanabhūtāya vā saññāya sahagatanti nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasaññāsahagataṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1608_3: Parittakasiṇugghāṭimākāse pavattitaviññāṇāpagamārammaṇaṃ samāpattiṃ ārabbha pavattitāya parittārammaṇatā,
atk-abh01a0:1609_0: Asadisarūpo nātho, āruppaṃ yaṃ catubbidhaṃ āha;
atk-abh01a0:1610_0: Taṃ iti ñatvā tasmiṃ, pakiṇṇakakathāpi viññeyyā.
atk-abh01a0:1614_3: ākāse pavattitaviññāṇassa apagamātikkamato catutthāti sabbathā ‘ārammaṇātikkamato catassopi bhavantimā’ arūpasamāpattiyoti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1614_4: Aṅgātikkamaṃ pana etāsaṃ na icchanti paṇḍitā.
atk-abh01a0:1614_5: Na hi rūpāvacarasamāpattīsu viya etāsu aṅgātikkamo atthi.
atk-abh01a0:1614_6: Sabbāsupi hi etāsu upekkhā cittekaggatāti dve eva jhānaṅgāni honti.
atk-abh01a0:1617_7: pañcakāmaguṇasamiddhivisesena pana heṭṭhimato heṭṭhimato uparimaṃ uparimaṃ paṇītataraṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1618_0: Yathā ca ekāya itthiyā kantitathūlasaṇhasaṇhatarasaṇhatamasuttānaṃ catupalatipaladvipalaekapalasāṭikā assu,
atk-abh01a0:1618_2: tattha kiñcāpi tā sāṭikā catassopi āyāmato ca vitthārato ca samappamāṇā,
atk-abh01a0:1618_4: sukhasamphassasukhumabhāvamahagghabhāvehi pana purimāya purimāya pacchimā pacchimā paṇītatarā honti,
atk-abh01a0:1618_5: evameva kiñcāpi catūsupi etāsu upekkhā cittekaggatāti etāni dveyeva aṅgāni honti,
atk-abh01a0:1618_6: atha kho bhāvanāvisesena tesaṃ aṅgānaṃ paṇītapaṇītatarabhāvena supaṇītatarā honti pacchimā pacchimā idhāti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1619_0: Asucimhi maṇḍape laggo, eko taṃ nissito paro;
atk-abh01a0:1620_0: Añño bahi anissāya, taṃ taṃ nissāya cāparo.
atk-abh01a0:1623_2: Atheko puriso āgantvā taṃ asuciṃ jigucchamāno taṃ maṇḍapaṃ hatthehi ālambitvā tattha laggo,
atk-abh01a0:1623_4: Athāparo āgantvā taṃ maṇḍapalaggaṃ purisaṃ nissito.
atk-abh01a0:1623_10: handāhaṃ bahiyeva tiṭṭhāmī’ti so tannissitaṃ anissāya bahiyeva aṭṭhāsi.
atk-abh01a0:1623_11: Athāparo āgantvā maṇḍapalaggassa tannissitassa ca akhemabhāvaṃ cintetvā bahiṭhitañca suṭṭhitoti mantvā taṃ nissāya aṭṭhāsi.
atk-abh01a0:1624_0: Tattha asucimhi dese maṇḍapo viya kasiṇugghāṭimākāsaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1624_1: Asucijigucchāya maṇḍapalaggo puriso viya rūpanimittajigucchāya ākāsārammaṇaṃ ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1624_2: Maṇḍapalaggaṃ purisaṃ nissito viya ākāsārammaṇaṃ ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ ārabbha pavattaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1624_3: Tesaṃ dvinnampi akhemabhāvaṃ cintetvā anissāya taṃ maṇḍapalaggaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1624_6: Maṇḍapalaggassa tannissitassa ca akhemataṃ cintetvā bahiṭhitañca ‘suṭṭhito’ti mantvā taṃ nissāya ṭhito
atk-abh01a0:1624_7: viya viññāṇābhāvasaṅkhāte bahipadese ṭhitaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ ārabbha pavattaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1627_0: Idañhi nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ ‘āsannaviññāṇañcāyatanapaccatthikā ayaṃ samāpattī’ti evaṃ diṭṭhadosampi
atk-abh01a0:1627_1: taṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ aññassa ārammaṇassa abhāvā ārammaṇaṃ karoteva.
atk-abh01a0:1627_4: Yathā hi asaṃyataṃ pharusakāyavacīmanosamācāraṃ kañci sabbadisampatiṃ rājānaṃ ‘pharusasamācāro aya’nti
atk-abh01a0:1627_5: evaṃ diṭṭhadosampi aññattha vuttiṃ alabhamāno jano vuttihetu nissāya vattati,
atk-abh01a0:1627_6: evaṃ diṭṭhadosampi taṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ aññaṃ ārammaṇaṃ alabhamānamidaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karoteva.
atk-abh01a0:1634_1: Idāni yasmā sabbānipetāni tebhūmakakusalāni hīnādinā pabhedena vattanti,
atk-abh01a0:1634_2: tasmā tesaṃ taṃ pabhedaṃ dassetuṃ puna katame dhammā kusalātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1634_9: Yassa hi āyūhanakkhaṇe chando vā hīno hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1634_14: Yassa te dhammā majjhimā ceva paṇītā,
atk-abh01a0:1634_16: Yaṃ pana kattukāmatāsaṅkhātaṃ chandaṃ dhuraṃ chandaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ chandaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā āyūhitaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1635_0: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne ṭhatvā nayā gaṇetabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1635_7: Evaṃ vīriyādhipateyyādīsupīti cattāro pañcakā vīsati honti.
atk-abh01a0:1635_11: chandādhipateyyaṃ hīnantiādayo dvādasāti evampi vīsati nayā honti.
atk-abh01a0:1636_2: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne hīnattikato majjhimarāsiṃ gahetvā hīnamajjhimapaṇītavasena tayo koṭṭhāsā kātabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1636_3: Tatopi majjhimarāsiṃ ṭhapetvā hīnapaṇīte gahetvā nava nava koṭṭhāsā kātabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1636_4: Hīnasmiṃyeva hi hīnaṃ atthi majjhimaṃ atthi paṇītaṃ atthi.
atk-abh01a0:1636_5: Paṇītasmimpi hīnaṃ atthi majjhimaṃ atthi paṇītaṃ atthi.
atk-abh01a0:1636_24: Ayaṃ dutiyo navakoti dve navakā aṭṭhārasa.
atk-abh01a0:1637_0: Imesu ca pana tebhūmakesu kusalesu kāmāvacarakusalaṃ tihetukampi duhetukampi hoti ñāṇasampayuttavippayuttavasena.
atk-abh01a0:1637_4: Kāmāvacarakusale cettha ārammaṇādhipati sahajātādhipatīti dvepi adhipatayo labbhanti.
atk-abh01a0:1637_7: Tattha cittassa cittādhipateyyabhāvo sampayuttadhammānaṃ vasena vutto.
atk-abh01a0:1637_8: Dvinnaṃ pana cittānaṃ ekato abhāvena sampayuttacittassa cittādhipati nāma natthi.
atk-abh01a0:1637_11: mayhaṃ bhavissatīti evaṃ yaṃ cittaṃ dhuraṃ katvā jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā aparaṃ kusalacittaṃ āyūhitaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1637_12: tassa taṃ purimacittaṃ cittādhipati nāma hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1637_13: tato āgatattā idaṃ cittādhipateyyaṃ nāmā’ti evaṃ āgamanavasenāpi adhipatiṃ nāma icchanti.
atk-abh01a0:1637_14: Ayaṃ pana nayo neva pāḷiyaṃ na aṭṭhakathāyaṃ dissati.
atk-abh01a0:1637_16: Imesu ca ekūnavīsatiyā mahānayesu purime suddhikanaye vuttaparimāṇāneva cittāni ca navakā ca pāṭhavārā ca honti.
atk-abh01a0:1637_17: Tasmā ñāṇasampayuttesu vuttaparimāṇato vīsatiguṇo cittanavakavārabhedo veditabbo,
atk-abh01a0:1640_1: Evaṃ bhavattayasampattinibbattakaṃ kusalaṃ dassetvā idāni sabbabhavasamatikkamanāya lokuttarakusalaṃ dassetuṃ puna katame dhammā kusalātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1640_6: Jhānaṃ bhāvetīti ekacittakkhaṇikaṃ appanājhānaṃ bhāveti janeti vaḍḍheti.
atk-abh01a0:1641_2: Taṃsamaṅgī hi puggalo dukkhaṃ parijānanto niyyāti,
atk-abh01a0:1641_6: Yathā ca pana tebhūmakakusalaṃ vaṭṭasmiṃ cutipaṭisandhiyo ācināti vaḍḍhetīti ācayagāmī nāma hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1641_8: Idaṃ pana yathā ekasmiṃ purise aṭṭhārasahatthaṃ pākāraṃ cinante aparo mahāmuggaraṃ gahetvā tena citacitaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1641_10: evameva tebhūmakakusalena citā cutipaṭisandhiyo paccayavekallakaraṇena apacinantaṃ viddhaṃsentaṃ gacchatīti apacayagāmi.
atk-abh01a0:1642_3: Dvāsaṭṭhiyā vā diṭṭhīnaṃ antogadhattā diṭṭhīsu gatānītipi diṭṭhigatāni.
atk-abh01a0:1642_8: Tāni hi yāva paṭhamamaggabhāvanā tāva pavattisabbhāvato diṭṭhisadisagamanānīti vuccanti.
atk-abh01a0:1642_9: Iti diṭṭhiyo ca diṭṭhigatāni ca diṭṭhigatāni.
atk-abh01a0:1642_13: Bhūmiyāti “anantarahitāya bhūmiyā”tiādīsu tāva ayaṃ mahāpathavī bhūmīti vuccati.
atk-abh01a0:1642_16: Tañhi sampayuttānaṃ nissayabhāvato te dhammā bhavanti etthāti bhūmi.
atk-abh01a0:1642_17: Yasmā vā samānepi lokuttarabhāve sayampi bhavati uppajjati,
atk-abh01a0:1642_21: Pattiyāti sotāpattiphalasaṅkhātassa paṭhamassa sāmaññaphalassa pattatthāya paṭilābhatthāyāti evamettha attho veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1643_0: Idāni kiñcāpi lokiyajjhānampi na vinā paṭipadāya ijjhati,
atk-abh01a0:1643_1: evaṃ santepi idha suddhikanayaṃ pahāya lokuttarajjhānaṃ paṭipadāya saddhiṃyeva garuṃ katvā desetukāmatāya dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññantiādimāha.
atk-abh01a0:1644_0: Tattha yo āditova kilese vikkhambhento dukkhena sasaṅkhārena sappayogena kilamanto vikkhambheti tassa dukkhā paṭipadā hoti;
atk-abh01a0:1644_1: yo pana vikkhambhita kileso vipassanāparivāsaṃ vasanto cirena maggapātubhāvaṃ pāpuṇāti tassa dandhābhiññā hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1644_2: Iti yo koci vāro dukkhapaṭipadadandhābhiñño nāma kato.
atk-abh01a0:1645_1: Yattha sakiṃ vikkhambhitā kilesā samudācaritvā dutiyampi vikkhambhitā puna samudācaranti,
atk-abh01a0:1645_2: tatiyaṃ vikkhambhite pana tathāvikkhambhiteva katvā maggena samugghātaṃ pāpeti,
atk-abh01a0:1645_4: Imassa vārassa dukkhāpaṭipadā dandhābhiññāti nāmaṃ kataṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1645_6: Tasmā evamettha ādito paṭṭhāya vibhāvanā veditabbā –
atk-abh01a0:1645_7: yo hi cattāri mahābhūtāni pariggahetvā upādārūpaṃ pariggaṇhāti,
atk-abh01a0:1645_9: ‘rūpārūpaṃ’ pana pariggaṇhanto dukkhena kasirena kilamanto pariggahetuṃ sakkoti,
atk-abh01a0:1645_11: Pariggahitarūpārūpassa pana vipassanāparivāse maggapātubhāvadandhatāya dandhābhiññā nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1646_0: Yopi rūpārūpaṃ pariggahetvā ‘nāmarūpaṃ’ vavatthapento dukkhena kasirena kilamanto vavatthapeti,
atk-abh01a0:1646_1: vavatthāpite ca nāmarūpe vipassanāparivāsaṃ vasanto cirena maggaṃ uppādetuṃ sakkoti,
atk-abh01a0:1646_2: tassāpi dukkhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1647_0: Aparo nāmarūpampi vavatthapetvā ‘paccaye’ pariggaṇhanto dukkhena kasirena kilamanto pariggaṇhāti,
atk-abh01a0:1647_1: paccaye ca pariggahetvā vipassanāparivāsaṃ vasanto cirena maggaṃ uppādeti,
atk-abh01a0:1647_2: evampi dukkhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1648_0: Aparo paccayepi pariggahetvā ‘lakkhaṇāni’ paṭivijjhanto dukkhena kasirena kilamanto paṭivijjhati,
atk-abh01a0:1648_1: paṭividdhalakkhaṇo ca vipassanāparivāsaṃ vasanto cirena maggaṃ uppādeti,
atk-abh01a0:1648_2: evampi dukkhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1649_0: Aparo lakkhaṇānipi paṭivijjhitvā vipassanāñāṇe tikkhe sūre pasanne vahante uppannaṃ ‘vipassanānikantiṃ’
atk-abh01a0:1649_2: nikantiñca pariyādiyitvā vipassanāparivāsaṃ vasanto cirena maggaṃ uppādeti,
atk-abh01a0:1649_3: evampi dukkhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1649_6: Imināva upāyena parato tisso paṭipadā veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1651_0: Tattha anaññātaññassāmītindriyanti ‘anamatagge saṃsāravaṭṭe anaññātaṃ amataṃ padaṃ catusaccadhammameva
atk-abh01a0:1651_1: vā jānissāmī’ti paṭipannassa iminā pubbābhogena uppannaṃ indriyaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1651_2: Lakkhaṇādīni panassa heṭṭhā paññindriye vuttanayeneva veditabbāni.
atk-abh01a0:1653_0: Apica heṭṭhā viratittaye vuttavasenapettha lakkhaṇādīni veditabbāni.
atk-abh01a0:1653_1: Iti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ vasena heṭṭhā vuttaṃ maggapañcakaṃ idha maggaṭṭhakaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1653_4: Ime hi tayo dhammā idha pāḷiyaṃ āgatattāva yevāpanakesu na gahitā.
atk-abh01a0:1653_6: ime dhammā nibbānārammaṇāti tāpettha na gahitā.
atk-abh01a0:1654_1: Niddesavāre pana maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannanti ettha tāva maggassa aṅganti maggaṅgaṃ;
atk-abh01a0:1654_3: Yathā pana araññe pariyāpannaṃ araññapariyāpannaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1655_1: Pītisambojjhaṅgoti ettha pīti eva sambojjhaṅgoti pītisambojjhaṅgo.
atk-abh01a0:1655_2: Tattha bodhiyā bodhissa vā aṅgoti bojjhaṅgo.
atk-abh01a0:1655_4: yā ayaṃ dhammasāmaggī yāya lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe uppajjamānāya līnuddhaccapatiṭṭhānāyūhanakāmasukhattakilamathānuyogaucchedasassatābhinivesādīnaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1655_12: Yopesa yathāvuttappakārāya etāya dhammasāmaggiyā bujjhatīti katvā ariyasāvako bodhīti vuccati,
atk-abh01a0:1656_5: sambujjhantīti bojjhaṅgā”ti iminā paṭisambhidānayenāpi bojjhaṅgattho veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1657_1: Tesaṃ dhammānanti ye tasmiṃ samaye paṭivedhaṃ gacchanti catusaccadhammā,
atk-abh01a0:1657_3: Anaññātānanti kiñcāpi paṭhamamaggena te dhammā ñātā nāma honti,
atk-abh01a0:1657_4: yathā pana pakatiyā anāgatapubbaṃ vihāraṃ āgantvā vihāramajjhe ṭhitopi puggalo pakatiyā anāgatabhāvaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1657_6: yathā ca pakatiyā apiḷandhapubbaṃ mālaṃ piḷandhitvā,
atk-abh01a0:1657_9: pakatiyā abhuttabhāvaṃ upādāya abhuttapubbaṃ bhojanaṃ bhuttomhīti vadati,
atk-abh01a0:1657_10: evamidhāpi yasmā pakatiyā iminā puggalena ime dhammā na ñātapubbā tasmā anaññātānanti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1657_12: Tattha adiṭṭhānanti ito pubbe paññācakkhunā adiṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1658_2: Tiṇṇaṃ dosānaṃ yena kenaci duṭṭhāni caritānīti duccaritāni.
atk-abh01a0:1658_8: Tato tato paṭinivattāva hutvā tehi vinā ramatīti paṭivirati.
atk-abh01a0:1658_14: Yāya pana cetanāya musāvādādīni bhāsamāno karoti nāma,
atk-abh01a0:1658_16: Uppajjitvā taṃ kiriyaṃ kātuṃ na deti,
atk-abh01a0:1658_18: Tathā taṃ karaṇaṃ kātuṃ na deti,
atk-abh01a0:1658_20: Yāya ca cetanāya catubbidhaṃ vacīduccaritaṃ bhāsamāno ajjhāpajjati nāma,
atk-abh01a0:1658_21: ayaṃ uppajjitvā tathā ajjhāpajjituṃ na detīti anajjhāpatti.
atk-abh01a0:1659_0: Velāanatikkamoti ettha “tāya velāyā”tiādīsu tāva kālo velāti āgato.
atk-abh01a0:1659_4: Anatikkamanīyaṭṭhena hi cattāri vacīsucaritāni velāti adhippetāni.
atk-abh01a0:1659_5: Iti yāya cetanāya cattāri vacīduccaritāni bhāsamāno velaṃ atikkamati nāma,
atk-abh01a0:1659_6: ayaṃ uppajjitvā taṃ velaṃ atikkamituṃ na detīti velāanatikkamoti vuttā.
atk-abh01a0:1660_4: rāgādiko catunnaṃ vacīduccaritānaṃ paccayo vaṭṭasmiṃ puggalaṃ sinoti bandhatīti setu.
atk-abh01a0:1660_7: Ayaṃ pana sammāvācāsaṅkhātā virati pubbabhāge nānācittesu labbhati.
atk-abh01a0:1660_11: Catubbidhāya hi vacīduccaritacetanāya padapacchedaṃ kurumānā maggaṅgaṃ pūrayamānā ekāva virati uppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:1661_1: Kāyaduccaritehīti kāyato pavattehi kāyena vā nipphāditehi pāṇātipātādīhi duccaritehi.
atk-abh01a0:1661_3: Ayampi sammākammantasaṅkhātā virati pubbabhāge nānācittesu labbhati.
atk-abh01a0:1661_7: Tividhāya hi kāyaduccaritacetanāya padapacchedaṃ kurumānā maggaṅgaṃ pūrayamānā ekāva virati uppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:1662_1: Sammāājīvaniddese akiriyātiādīsu yāya cetanāya micchājīvaṃ ājīvamāno kiriyaṃ karoti nāma,
atk-abh01a0:1662_2: ayaṃ uppajjitvā taṃ kiriyaṃ kātuṃ na detīti akiriyāti.
atk-abh01a0:1662_8: Evaṃ sante sammāājīvo sakiccako na hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1662_17: Kāyadvāre pana vītikkamo ājīvahetukopi atthi naājīvahetukopi.
atk-abh01a0:1663_0: Tattha yaṃ rājarājamahāmattā khiḍḍāpasutā sūrabhāvaṃ dassentā migavadhaṃ vā panthaduhanaṃ vā paradāravītikkamaṃ vā karonti,
atk-abh01a0:1663_3: Yaṃ pana naājīvahetukaṃ catubbidhaṃ vacīduccaritaṃ bhāsanti,
atk-abh01a0:1664_0: Yaṃ pana ājīvahetu nesādamacchabandhādayo pāṇaṃ hananti,
atk-abh01a0:1665_1: ‘kāyavacīdvāresupi vītikkamo ājīvahetuko vā hotu no vā ājīvahetuko,
atk-abh01a0:1665_4: ‘Ājīvo kuhi’nti vutte pana ‘tīṇi kuhanavatthūni nissāya cattāro paccaye uppādetvā tesaṃ paribhogo’ti āha.
atk-abh01a0:1666_4: Kāyavacīdvāresu hi sattakammapathavasena uppannāya micchājīvasaṅkhātāya dussīlyacetanāya padapacchedaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1666_5: kurumānā maggaṅgaṃ pūrayamānā ekāva virati uppajjatīti.
atk-abh01a0:1668_1: Ito paraṃ suddhikasuññatā suññatapaṭipadā suddhikaappaṇihitā appaṇihitapaṭipadāti ayaṃ desanābhedo hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1668_3: So hi āgamanato saguṇato ārammaṇatoti tīhi kāraṇehi nāmaṃ labhati. Kathaṃ?
atk-abh01a0:1668_4: Idha bhikkhu anattato abhinivisitvā anattato saṅkhāre passati.
atk-abh01a0:1668_5: Yasmā pana anattato diṭṭhamatteneva maggavuṭṭhānaṃ nāma na hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1668_7: tasmā ‘aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā’ti tividhaṃ anupassanaṃ āropetvā sammasanto carati.
atk-abh01a0:1668_8: Vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā panassa tebhūmakepi saṅkhāre suññatova passati.
atk-abh01a0:1668_10: Sā āgamanīyaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā attano maggassa ‘suññata’nti nāmaṃ deti.
atk-abh01a0:1668_12: Yasmā pana so rāgādīhi suñño tasmā ‘saguṇeneva’ suññatanāmaṃ labhati.
atk-abh01a0:1668_14: Taṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppannattā maggo ‘ārammaṇato’ suññatanāmaṃ labhati.
atk-abh01a0:1669_0: Tattha suttantikapariyāyena saguṇatopi ārammaṇatopi nāmaṃ labhati.
atk-abh01a0:1669_3: Tasmā idha saguṇato vā ārammaṇato vā nāmaṃ na labhati,
atk-abh01a0:1669_10: Idha maggassa āgatattā vipassanāgamanameva dhuraṃ jātaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1670_3: Idampi nāmaṃ maggo tīheva kāraṇehi labhati. Kathaṃ?
atk-abh01a0:1670_4: Idha bhikkhu āditova dukkhato abhinivisitvā dukkhatova saṅkhāre passati.
atk-abh01a0:1670_5: Yasmā pana dukkhato diṭṭhamatteneva maggavuṭṭhānaṃ nāma na hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1670_7: tasmā aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā’ti tividhaṃ anupassanaṃ āropetvā sammasanto carati.
atk-abh01a0:1670_8: Vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā panassa tebhūmakasaṅkhāresu paṇidhiṃ sosetvā pariyādiyitvā vissajjeti.
atk-abh01a0:1670_10: Sā āgamanīyaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā attano maggassa ‘appaṇihita’nti nāmaṃ deti.
atk-abh01a0:1670_14: Nibbānampi tesaṃ paṇidhīnaṃ abhāvā appaṇihitanti vuccati.
atk-abh01a0:1670_15: Taṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppannattā maggo appaṇihitanāmaṃ labhati.
atk-abh01a0:1671_0: Tattha suttantikapariyāyena saguṇatopi ārammaṇatopi nāmaṃ labhati.
atk-abh01a0:1671_3: Tasmā idha saguṇato vā ārammaṇato vā nāmaṃ na labhati,
atk-abh01a0:1671_10: Idha maggassa āgatattā vipassanāgamanameva dhuraṃ jātaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1672_0: Nanu ca suññato animitto appaṇihitoti tīṇi maggassa nāmāni? Yathāha – “tayome,
atk-abh01a0:1672_6: Tesu idha dve magge gahetvā animitto kasmā na gahitoti?
atk-abh01a0:1672_8: Animittavipassanā hi sayaṃ āgamanīyaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā attano maggassa nāmaṃ dātuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-abh01a0:1675_1: Vipassanā hi niccanimittaṃ dhuvanimittaṃ sukhanimittaṃ attanimittañca ugghāṭeti.
atk-abh01a0:1675_3: Sā ca kiñcāpi taṃ nimittaṃ ugghāṭeti,
atk-abh01a0:1675_4: sayaṃ pana nimittadhammesu caratīti sanimittāva hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1675_5: Tasmā sayaṃ āgamanīyaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā attano maggassa nāmaṃ dātuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-abh01a0:1676_2: Animittamaggassa ca paramatthato hetuvekallameva hoti. Kathaṃ?
atk-abh01a0:1676_4: Tena ca vimokkhena saddhindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1676_6: amaggaṅgattā attano maggassa paramatthato nāmaṃ dātuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-abh01a0:1676_7: Itaresu pana dvīsu anattānupassanāya tāva vasena suññatavimokkho,
atk-abh01a0:1676_11: Tāni ariyamaggassa aṅgattā attano maggassa paramatthato nāmaṃ dātuṃ sakkonti.
atk-abh01a0:1676_12: Maggārammaṇattikepi hi maggādhipatidhammavibhajane chandacittānaṃ adhipatikāle tesaṃ dhammānaṃ amaggaṅgattāva maggādhipatibhāvo na vutto.
atk-abh01a0:1677_0: Evaṃ sabbathāpi animittavipassanā sayaṃ āgamanīyaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā attano maggassa nāmaṃ dātuṃ na sakkotīti animittamaggo na gahito.
atk-abh01a0:1677_1: Keci pana ‘animittamaggo āgamanato nāmaṃ alabhantopi suttantapariyāyena saguṇato ca ārammaṇato ca nāmaṃ labhatī’ti āhaṃsu.
atk-abh01a0:1677_3: animittamagge saguṇato ca ārammaṇato ca nāmaṃ labhante suññataappaṇihitamaggāpi saguṇatoyeva ārammaṇatoyeva ca idha nāmaṃ labheyyuṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1677_6: Ayañhi maggo nāma dvīhi kāraṇehi nāmaṃ labhati –
atk-abh01a0:1677_9: Tattha suññataappaṇihitamaggā sarasatopi paccanīkatopi nāmaṃ labhanti.
atk-abh01a0:1677_11: rāgapaṇidhiādīhi ca appaṇihitāti evaṃ ‘sarasato’ nāmaṃ labhanti.
atk-abh01a0:1677_14: Animittamaggo pana rāgādinimittānaṃ niccanimittādīnañca abhāvena sarasatova nāmaṃ labhati,
atk-abh01a0:1677_16: Na hi so saṅkhāranimittārammaṇāya aniccānupassanāya paṭipakkho.
atk-abh01a0:1678_5: Ādito hi yattha katthaci abhiniveso hotu,
atk-abh01a0:1678_6: vuṭṭhānagāminī pana vipassanā yaṃ yaṃ sammasitvā vuṭṭhāti tassa tasseva vasena āgamanīyaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā attano maggassa nāmaṃ deti. Kathaṃ?
atk-abh01a0:1678_7: Aniccādīsu hi yattha katthaci abhinivisitvā itarampi lakkhaṇadvayaṃ daṭṭhuṃ vaṭṭati eva.
atk-abh01a0:1678_8: Ekalakkhaṇadassanamatteneva hi maggavuṭṭhānaṃ nāma na hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1678_9: tasmā aniccato abhiniviṭṭho bhikkhu na kevalaṃ aniccatova vuṭṭhāti,
atk-abh01a0:1678_12: Iti ādito yattha katthaci abhiniveso hotu,
atk-abh01a0:1678_13: vuṭṭhānagāminī pana vipassanā yaṃ yaṃ sammasitvā vuṭṭhāti tassa tasseva vasena āgamanīyaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā attano maggassa nāmaṃ deti.
atk-abh01a0:1678_14: Tattha aniccato vuṭṭhahantassa maggo animitto nāma hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1679_3: Yo pana aniccaṃ dukkhamanattāti tīṇi lakkhaṇāni sallakkheti,
atk-abh01a0:1679_4: tassa pañcakkhandhā kaṇṭhe baddhakuṇapaṃ viya honti.
atk-abh01a0:1679_6: Yathā hi eko bhikkhu pattaṃ kiṇitukāmo pattavāṇijena pattaṃ ābhataṃ disvā haṭṭhapahaṭṭho gaṇhissāmīti cintetvā vīmaṃsamāno tīṇi chiddāni passeyya,
atk-abh01a0:1679_9: evameva tīṇi lakkhaṇāni sallakkhetvā saṅkhāresu nirālayo hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1680_0: Iti bhagavā lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhājento suddhikapaṭipadāya catukkanayaṃ pañcakanayanti dvepi naye āhari.
atk-abh01a0:1680_5: Evaṃ lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāvetīti ettha suddhikapaṭipadāya catukkapañcakavasena dve nayā,
atk-abh01a0:1680_6: tathā sesesūti sabbesupi pañcasu koṭṭhāsesu dasa nayā bhājitā.
atk-abh01a0:1685_0: Lokuttaramaggo hi ajjhattaṃ abhinivisitvā ajjhattaṃ vuṭṭhāti,
atk-abh01a0:1686_0: ‘Sattaṭṭhaṅgapariṇāma’nti so panesa maggo aṭṭhaṅgikopi hoti sattaṅgikopi.
atk-abh01a0:1686_1: Bojjhaṅgāpi satta vā honti cha vā.
atk-abh01a0:1686_2: Jhānaṃ pana pañcaṅgikaṃ vā hoti caturaṅgikaṃ vā;
atk-abh01a0:1686_4: Evaṃ sattaaṭṭhādīnaṃ aṅgānaṃ pariṇāmo veditabboti attho.
atk-abh01a0:1687_1: ‘paṭipadāpatī’ti paṭipadāya ca adhipatino ca calanācalanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1688_0: Tattha ajjhattaṃ abhinivisitvā ajjhattaṃ vuṭṭhātītiādīsu tāva idhekacco āditova ajjhattaṃ pañcasu khandhesu abhinivisati,
atk-abh01a0:1688_2: yasmā pana na suddhaajjhattadassanamatteneva maggavuṭṭhānaṃ hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1688_4: tasmā parassa khandhepi anupādinnasaṅkhārepi aniccaṃ dukkhamanattāti passati.
atk-abh01a0:1688_5: So kālena ajjhattaṃ sammasati kālena bahiddhāti.
atk-abh01a0:1688_6: Tassevaṃ sammasato ajjhattaṃ sammasanakāle vipassanā maggena saddhiṃ ghaṭiyati.
atk-abh01a0:1688_7: Evaṃ ajjhattaṃ abhinivisitvā ajjhattaṃ vuṭṭhāti nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1688_8: Sace panassa bahiddhā sammasanakāle vipassanā maggena saddhiṃ ghaṭiyati,
atk-abh01a0:1688_9: evaṃ ajjhattaṃ abhinivisitvā bahiddhā vuṭṭhāti nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1688_10: Eseva nayo bahiddhā abhinivisitvā bahiddhā ca ajjhattañca vuṭṭhānepi.
atk-abh01a0:1689_0: Aparo āditova rūpe abhinivisati abhinivisitvā bhūtarūpañca upādārūpañca paricchinditvā aniccādito passati,
atk-abh01a0:1689_1: yasmā pana na suddharūpadassanamatteneva vuṭṭhānaṃ hoti arūpampi daṭṭhabbameva,
atk-abh01a0:1689_2: tasmā taṃ rūpaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppannaṃ vedanaṃ saññaṃ saṅkhāre viññāṇañca idaṃ arūpanti paricchinditvā aniccādito passati.
atk-abh01a0:1689_3: So kālena rūpaṃ sammasati kālena arūpaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1689_4: Tassevaṃ sammasato rūpasammasanakāle vipassanā maggena saddhiṃ ghaṭiyati.
atk-abh01a0:1689_5: Evaṃ rūpe abhinivisitvā rūpā vuṭṭhāti nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1689_6: Sace panassa arūpasammasanakāle vipassanā maggena saddhiṃ ghaṭiyati,
atk-abh01a0:1689_7: evaṃ rūpe abhinivisitvā arūpā vuṭṭhāti nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1689_8: Esa nayo arūpe abhinivisitvā arūpā ca rūpā ca vuṭṭhānepi.
atk-abh01a0:1690_0: “Yaṃkiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma”nti evaṃ abhinivisitvā evameva vuṭṭhānakāle pana ekappahārena pañcahi khandhehi vuṭṭhāti nāmāti.
atk-abh01a0:1691_0: Yathā hi chātajjhattassa purisassa majjhe gūthapiṇḍaṃ ṭhapetvā nānaggarasabhojanapuṇṇaṃ pātiṃ upaneyyuṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1691_1: so byañjanaṃ hatthena viyūhanto taṃ gūthapiṇḍaṃ disvā ‘kimida’nti pucchitvā gūthapiṇḍoti vutte ‘dhi dhi,
atk-abh01a0:1692_0: Bhojanapātidassanasmiñhi tassa attamanakālo viya imassa bhikkhuno bālaputhujjanakāle pañcakkhandhe ‘ahaṃ mamā’ti gahitakālo.
atk-abh01a0:1692_1: Gūthapiṇḍassa diṭṭhakālo viya tiṇṇaṃ lakkhaṇānaṃ sallakkhitakālo.
atk-abh01a0:1692_2: Bhattepi pātiyampi nirālayakālo viya tikkhavipassakassa mahāpaññassa bhikkhuno “yaṃkiñci samudayadhammaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1692_3: sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma”nti pañcahi khandhehi ekappahārena vuṭṭhitakālo veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1693_0: ‘Sattaṭṭhaṅgapariṇāma’nti ettha ayaṃ vuttappabhedo aṅgapariṇāmo yathā hoti tathā veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1693_2: Keci pana therā ‘bojjhaṅgamaggaṅgajhānaṅgavisesaṃ pādakajjhānaṃ niyametī’ti vadanti.
atk-abh01a0:1693_5: Tesampi vādesu ayaṃ saṅkhārupekkhāsaṅkhātā pubbabhāgā vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāva niyametīti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1694_1: vipassanāniyamena hi sukkhavipassakassa uppannamaggopi samāpattilābhino jhānaṃ pādakaṃ akatvā uppannamaggopi
atk-abh01a0:1694_2: paṭhamajjhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā pakiṇṇakasaṅkhāre sammasitvā uppāditamaggopi paṭhamajjhānikova hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1694_3: Sabbesu satta bojjhaṅgāni aṭṭha maggaṅgāni pañca jhānaṅgāni honti.
atk-abh01a0:1694_4: Tesañhi pubbabhāgavipassanā somanassasahagatāpi upekkhāsahagatāpi hutvā vuṭṭhānakāle saṅkhārupekkhābhāvaṃ pattā somanassasahagatāva hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1695_0: Pañcakanaye dutiyatatiyacatutthajjhānāni pādakāni katvā uppāditamaggesu yathākkameneva jhānaṃ caturaṅgikaṃ tivaṅgikaṃ duvaṅgikañca hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1695_3: Ayaṃ viseso pādakajjhānaniyamena ceva vipassanāniyamena ca hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1695_4: Tesampi hi pubbabhāgavipassanā somanassasahagatāpi upekkhāsahagatāpi hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1696_0: Pañcamajjhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā nibbattitamagge pana upekkhācittekaggatāvasena dve jhānaṅgāni bojjhaṅgamaggaṅgāni cha satta ceva.
atk-abh01a0:1696_2: Imasmiñhi naye pubbabhāgavipassanā somanassasahagatā vā upekkhāsahagatā vā hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1696_4: Arūpajjhānāni pādakāni katvā uppāditamaggepi eseva nayo.
atk-abh01a0:1696_5: Evaṃ pādakajjhānato vuṭṭhāya ye keci saṅkhāre sammasitvā nibbattitamaggassa āsannapadese vuṭṭhitā samāpatti attanā sadisabhāvaṃ karoti,
atk-abh01a0:1697_0: Dutiyattheravāde pana yato yato samāpattito vuṭṭhāya ye ye samāpattidhamme sammasitvā maggo nibbattito hoti taṃtaṃsamāpattisadisova hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1697_2: Sace pana kāmāvacaradhamme sammasati paṭhamajjhānikova hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1698_1: aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ pāpuṇeyya’nti attano ajjhāsayānurūpena yaṃ yaṃ jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā ye vā ye vā jhānadhamme
atk-abh01a0:1699_2: tadahuposathe pannarase na hoti bahuno janassa kaṅkhā vā vimati vā ‘ūno nu kho cando puṇṇo nu kho cando’ti,
atk-abh01a0:1699_6: tā bhikkhuniyo nandakassa dhammadesanāya attamanā ceva paripuṇṇasaṅkappā ca. Tāsaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1699_8: pañcannaṃ bhikkhunisatānaṃ yā pacchimikā bhikkhunī sā sotāpannā avinipātadhammā niyatā sambodhiparāyaṇā”ti.
atk-abh01a0:1700_0: Tāsu hi yassā bhikkhuniyā sotāpattiphalassa upanissayo,
atk-abh01a0:1700_3: Evameva attano ajjhāsayānurūpena yaṃ yaṃ jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā ye vā ye vā jhānadhamme sammasitvā maggo nibbattito taṃtaṃjhānasadisova so hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1701_0: Tattha ‘pādakajjhānameva niyametī’ti evaṃvādiṃ tipiṭakacūḷanāgattheraṃ antevāsikā āhaṃsu – ‘bhante,
atk-abh01a0:1701_1: yattha tāva pādakajjhānaṃ atthi tattha taṃ niyametu;
atk-abh01a0:1701_5: Yo hi bhikkhu aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī paṭhamajjhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā sotāpattimaggaphalāni nibbattetvā aparihīnajjhāno kālaṃ katvā arūpabhave nibbatto,
atk-abh01a0:1701_6: paṭhamajjhānikāya sotāpattiphalasamāpattiyā vuṭṭhāya vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā upari tīṇi maggaphalāni nibbatteti,
atk-abh01a0:1702_1: yaṃ yaṃ hi pañcakkhandhaṃ sammasitvā vuṭṭhāti taṃtaṃsadisova maggo hotī’ti vādiṃ moravāpivāsimahādattattherampi antevāsikā āhaṃsu ‘bhante,
atk-abh01a0:1702_3: rūpaṃ sammasitvā vuṭṭhitabhikkhuno hi rūpasadisena abyākatena maggena bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1702_4: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ nayato pariggahetvā vuṭṭhitassa taṃsadiseneva nevasaññānāsaññābhāvappattena maggena bhavitabba’nti. ‘Na, āvuso,
atk-abh01a0:1702_6: Lokuttaramaggo hi appanaṃ appatto nāma natthi,
atk-abh01a0:1702_7: tasmā rūpaṃ sammasitvā vuṭṭhitassa aṭṭhaṅgiko somanassasahagatamaggo hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1702_8: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ sammasitvā vuṭṭhitassapi na sabbākārena tādiso hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1703_0: ‘Puggalajjhāsayo niyametī’tivādino cūḷābhayattherassāpi vādaṃ āharitvā tipiṭakacūḷanāgattherassa kathayiṃsu. So āha –
atk-abh01a0:1703_1: ‘yassa tāva pādakajjhānaṃ atthi tassa puggalajjhāsayo niyametu,
atk-abh01a0:1703_2: yassa taṃ natthi tassa katarajjhāsayo niyamessati niddhanassa vuḍḍhigavesanakālo viya hotī’ti.
atk-abh01a0:1704_0: Taṃ kathaṃ āharitvā tipiṭakacūḷābhayattherassa puna kathayiṃsu.
atk-abh01a0:1704_4: Pañcamajjhānato vuṭṭhāya hi paṭhamādīni sammasato uppannamaggo paṭhamattheravādena pañcamajjhāniko.
atk-abh01a0:1704_5: Dutiyavādena paṭhamādijjhāniko āpajjatīti dvepi vādā virujjhanti.
atk-abh01a0:1704_6: Tatiyavādena panettha ‘yaṃ icchati tajjhāniko hotī’ti te ca vādā na virujjhanti,
atk-abh01a0:1704_8: Evaṃ tayopi therā paṇḍitā byattā buddhisampannāva.
atk-abh01a0:1704_9: Tena tesaṃ vādaṃ tantiṃ katvā ṭhapayiṃsu.
atk-abh01a0:1704_10: Idha pana atthameva uddharitvā tayopete vāde vipassanāva niyametīti dassitaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1705_0: Idāni ‘nimittaṃ paṭipadāpatī’ti ettha evaṃ aṅgapariṇāmavato maggassa uppādakāle gotrabhu kuto vuṭṭhāti?
atk-abh01a0:1705_13: Tadā hi javanaṃ patitaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1705_14: Tasmā neva ekaṃ hoti na pañcamaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1705_30: Tatra mahāpaññamandapaññānaṃ vasena akathetvā majjhimapaññassa vasena kathetabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1706_1: tasmiṃ kiriyāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātu upekkhāsahagatā manodvārāvajjanaṃ hutvā vipassanāgocare khandhe ārammaṇaṃ katvā bhavaṅgaṃ āvaṭṭeti.
atk-abh01a0:1706_2: Tadanantaraṃ teneva āvajjanena gahitakkhandhe gahetvā uppajjati paṭhamaṃ javanaṃ anulomañāṇaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1706_3: Taṃ tesu khandhesu aniccāti vā dukkhāti vā anattāti vā pavattitvā oḷārikaṃ oḷārikaṃ saccapaṭicchādakatamaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1706_4: vinodetvā tīṇi lakkhaṇāni bhiyyo bhiyyo pākaṭāni katvā nirujjhati.
atk-abh01a0:1706_8: Tampi laddhāsevanattā tikkhaṃ sūraṃ pasannaṃ hutvā tasmiṃyevārammaṇe tenevākārena pavattitvā majjhimappamāṇaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1706_9: saccapaṭicchādakatamaṃ vinodetvā tīṇi lakkhaṇāni bhiyyo bhiyyo pākaṭāni katvā nirujjhati.
atk-abh01a0:1706_12: Tampi laddhāsevanattā tikkhaṃ sūraṃ pasannaṃ hutvā tasmiṃyevārammaṇe tenevākārena pavattitvā tadavasesaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1706_13: aṇusahagataṃ saccapaṭicchādakatamaṃ vinodetvā niravasesaṃ katvā tīṇi lakkhaṇāni bhiyyo bhiyyo pākaṭāni
atk-abh01a0:1706_15: Evaṃ tīhi anulomehi saccapaṭicchādakatame vinodite tadanantaraṃ uppajjati gotrabhuññāṇaṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ kurumānaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1707_1: eko kira cakkhumā puriso nakkhattayogaṃ jānissāmīti rattibhāge nikkhamitvā candaṃ passituṃ uddhaṃ ullokesi.
atk-abh01a0:1707_2: Tassa valāhakehi paṭicchannattā cando na paññāyittha.
atk-abh01a0:1707_3: Atheko vāto uṭṭhahitvā thūlathūle valāhake viddhaṃsesi.
atk-abh01a0:1707_6: Tato so puriso vigatavalāhake nabhe candaṃ disvā nakkhattayogaṃ aññāsi.
atk-abh01a0:1708_4: Ekekassa vātassa yathākkamena valāhakattayaviddhaṃsanaṃ viya ekekassa anulomacittassa saccapaṭicchādakatamavinodanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1708_5: Vigatavalāhake nabhe tassa purisassa visuddhacandadassanaṃ viya vigate saccapaṭicchādake tame gotrabhuññāṇassa suvisuddhanibbānārammaṇakaraṇaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1709_0: Yatheva hi tayo vātā candapaṭicchādake valāhakeyeva viddhaṃsetuṃ sakkonti,
atk-abh01a0:1709_4: Yathā so puriso candameva daṭṭhuṃ sakkoti na valāhake viddhaṃsetuṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1709_5: evaṃ gotrabhuññāṇaṃ nibbānameva ārammaṇaṃ kātuṃ sakkoti na kilesatamaṃ vinodetuṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1710_0: Yadi hi gotrabhu anulomena gahitārammaṇaṃ gaṇheyya puna anulomaṃ taṃ anubandheyyāti maggavuṭṭhānameva na bhaveyya.
atk-abh01a0:1710_1: Gotrabhuññāṇaṃ pana anulomassa ārammaṇaṃ aggahetvā taṃ apacchatopavattikaṃ katvā sayaṃ anāvajjanampi
atk-abh01a0:1710_2: samānaṃ āvajjanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā evaṃ nibbattāhīti maggassa saññaṃ datvā viya nirujjhati.
atk-abh01a0:1710_3: Maggopi tena dinnasaññaṃ amuñcitvāva avīcisantativasena taṃ ñāṇaṃ anubandhamāno anibbiddhapubbaṃ apadālitapubbaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1710_4: lobhakkhandhaṃ dosakkhandhaṃ mohakkhandhaṃ nibbijjhamānova padālayamānova nibbattati.
atk-abh01a0:1711_1: eko kira issāso dhanusatamatthake phalakasataṃ ṭhapāpetvā vatthena mukhaṃ veṭhetvā saraṃ sannayhitvā cakkayante aṭṭhāsi.
atk-abh01a0:1711_2: Añño puriso cakkayantaṃ āvañchitvā yadā issāsassa phalakasataṃ abhimukhaṃ hoti tadā tattha daṇḍakena saññaṃ deti,
atk-abh01a0:1711_3: issāso daṇḍakasaññaṃ amuñcitvāva saraṃ khipitvā phalakasataṃ nibbijjhati.
atk-abh01a0:1711_6: Issāsassa daṇḍakasaññaṃ amuñcitvāva phalakasatanibbijjhanaṃ viya maggañāṇassa gotrabhuññāṇena dinnasaññaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1711_7: amuñcitvāva nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā anibbiddhapubbaapadālitapubbānaṃ lobhakkhandhādīnaṃ nibbijjhanapadālanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1711_10: Iti so anusaye pajahanto nimittā vuṭṭhāti nāma,
atk-abh01a0:1711_16: Tesu maggassa anupādinnakato vuṭṭhānacchāyā dissatīti vatvā anupādinnakato vuṭṭhātīti vadiṃsu.
atk-abh01a0:1712_0: Sotāpattimaggena hi cattāri diṭṭhigatasampayuttāni vicikicchāsahagatanti pañca cittāni pahīyanti.
atk-abh01a0:1712_4: Taṃsampayuttā vedanā saññā saṅkhārā tayo arūpakkhandhā.
atk-abh01a0:1712_5: Tattha sace sotāpannassa sotāpattimaggo abhāvito abhavissa tāni pañca cittāni chasu ārammaṇesu pariyuṭṭhānaṃ pāpuṇeyyuṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1712_6: Sotāpattimaggo pana tesaṃ pariyuṭṭhānenappattiṃ vārayamāno setusamugghātaṃ abhabbuppattikabhāvaṃ kurumāno anupādinnakato vuṭṭhāti nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1713_0: Sakadāgāmimaggena cattāri diṭṭhigatavippayuttāni dve domanassasahagatānīti oḷārikakāmarāgabyāpādavasena cha cittāni pahīyanti.
atk-abh01a0:1713_1: Anāgāmimaggena aṇusahagatakāmarāgabyāpādavasena tāni eva cha cittāni pahīyanti.
atk-abh01a0:1713_2: Arahattamaggena cattāri diṭṭhigatavippayuttāni uddhaccasahagatañcāti pañca akusalacittāni pahīyanti.
atk-abh01a0:1713_3: Tattha sace tesaṃ ariyānaṃ te maggā abhāvitā assu,
atk-abh01a0:1713_4: tāni cittāni chasu ārammaṇesu pariyuṭṭhānaṃ pāpuṇeyyuṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1713_5: Te pana tesaṃ maggā pariyuṭṭhānappattiṃ vārayamānā setusamugghātaṃ abhabbuppattikabhāvaṃ kurumānā anupādinnakato vuṭṭhahanti nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1714_0: Upādinnakato vuṭṭhānacchāyā dissatīti vatvā upādinnakato vuṭṭhātītipi vadiṃsu.
atk-abh01a0:1714_1: Sace hi sotāpannassa sotāpattimaggo abhāvito abhavissa,
atk-abh01a0:1714_2: ṭhapetvā satta bhave anamatagge saṃsāravaṭṭe upādinnakappavattaṃ pavatteyya. Kasmā?
atk-abh01a0:1714_4: Tīṇi saṃyojanāni diṭṭhānusayo vicikicchānusayoti ime pana pañca kilese sotāpattimaggo uppajjamānova samugghāteti.
atk-abh01a0:1714_5: Idāni kuto sotāpannassa satta bhave ṭhapetvā anamatagge saṃsāravaṭṭe upādinnakappavattaṃ pavattissati?
atk-abh01a0:1714_6: Evaṃ sotāpattimaggo upādinnakappavattaṃ appavattaṃ kurumāno upādinnakato vuṭṭhāti nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1715_1: ṭhapetvā dve bhave pañcasu bhavesu upādinnakapavattaṃ pavatteyya. Kasmā?
atk-abh01a0:1715_3: Oḷārikāni kāmarāgapaṭighasaṃyojanāni oḷāriko kāmarāgānusayo paṭighānusayoti ime pana cattāro kilese so maggo uppajjamānova samugghāteti.
atk-abh01a0:1715_4: Idāni kuto sakadāgāmissa dve bhave ṭhapetvā pañcasu bhavesu upādinnakappavattaṃ pavattissati?
atk-abh01a0:1715_5: Evaṃ sakadāgāmimaggo upādinnakappavattaṃ appavattaṃ kurumāno upādinnakato vuṭṭhāti nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1716_1: ṭhapetvā ekaṃ bhavaṃ dutiyabhave upādinnakappavattaṃ pavatteyya. Kasmā?
atk-abh01a0:1716_3: Aṇusahagatāni kāmarāgapaṭighasaṃyojanāni aṇusahagato kāmarāgānusayo paṭighānusayoti ime pana cattāro kilese so maggo uppajjamānova samugghāteti.
atk-abh01a0:1716_4: Idāni kuto anāgāmissa ekaṃ bhavaṃ ṭhapetvā dutiyabhave upādinnakappavattaṃ pavattissati?
atk-abh01a0:1716_5: Evaṃ anāgāmimaggo upādinnakappavattaṃ appavattaṃ kurumāno upādinnakato vuṭṭhāti nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1717_3: Rūparāgo arūparāgo māno uddhaccaṃ avijjā mānānusayo bhavarāgānusayo avijjānusayoti ime pana aṭṭha kilese so maggo uppajjamānova samugghāteti.
