atk-abh01a0:1717_4: Idāni kuto khīṇāsavassa punabbhave upādinnakappavattaṃ pavattissati?
atk-abh01a0:1717_5: Evaṃ arahattamaggo upādinnakappavattaṃ appavattaṃ kurumāno upādinnakato vuṭṭhāti nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1718_3: arahattamaggo rūpārūpabhavato sabbabhavehipi vuṭṭhāti evāti vadanti.
atk-abh01a0:1719_1: “sotāpattimaggañāṇena abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa nirodhena satta bhave ṭhapetvā anamatagge saṃsāravaṭṭe ye uppajjeyyuṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1719_2: nāmañca rūpañca etthete nirujjhanti vūpasamanti atthaṃ gacchanti paṭippassambhanti.
atk-abh01a0:1720_0: ‘Sakadāgāmimaggañāṇena abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa nirodhena dve bhave ṭhapetvā pañcasu bhavesu ye uppajjeyyuṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1720_1: nāmañca rūpañca etthete nirujjhanti vūpasamanti atthaṃ gacchanti paṭippassambhanti.
atk-abh01a0:1721_0: ‘Anāgāmimaggañāṇena abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa nirodhena ekaṃ bhavaṃ ṭhapetvā kāmadhātuyā dvīsu bhavesu ye uppajjeyyuṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1721_1: nāmañca rūpañca etthete nirujjhanti vūpasamanti atthaṃ gacchanti paṭippassambhanti.
atk-abh01a0:1722_0: ‘Arahattamaggañāṇena abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa nirodhena rūpadhātuyā vā arūpadhātuyā vā ye uppajjeyyuṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1722_1: nāmañca rūpañca etthete nirujjhanti vūpasamanti atthaṃ gacchanti paṭippassambhanti.
atk-abh01a0:1722_2: Arahato anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyantassa carimaviññāṇassa nirodhena paññā ca sati ca nāmañca
atk-abh01a0:1722_3: rūpañca etthete nirujjhanti vūpasamanti atthaṃ gacchanti paṭippassambhantī”ti.
atk-abh01a0:1723_1: ettha pana paṭipadā calati na calatīti? Calati.
atk-abh01a0:1723_2: Tathāgatassa hi sāriputtattherassa ca cattāropi maggā sukhapaṭipadā khippābhiññā ahesuṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1723_4: upari tayo maggā dukkhapaṭipadā khippābhiññā. Kasmā?
atk-abh01a0:1723_6: Sammāsambuddho kira sattāhaṃ daharakumārakaṃ viya theraṃ parihari.
atk-abh01a0:1723_14: Ekaccassa hi bhikkhuno cattāropi maggā dukkhapaṭipadā dandhābhiññā honti,
atk-abh01a0:1724_0: Yathā ca paṭipadā evaṃ adhipatipi calati eva.
atk-abh01a0:1724_1: Ekaccassa hi bhikkhuno cattāropi maggā chandādhipateyyā honti,
atk-abh01a0:1727_1: Idāni yasmā lokuttarakusalaṃ bhāvento na kevalaṃ upanijjhāyanaṭṭhena jhānaṃyeva bhāveti,
atk-abh01a0:1727_21: tasmā etesaṃ ekūnavīsatiyā padānaṃ dassanatthaṃ puna katame dhammā kusalātiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1727_23: idampi bhāvetī’ti puggalajjhāsayena ceva desanāvilāsena ca vīsati nayā desitā honti.
atk-abh01a0:1727_24: Dhammaṃ sotuṃ nisinnadevaparisāya hi ye upanijjhāyanaṭṭhena lokuttaraṃ ‘jhāna’nti kathite bujjhanti,
atk-abh01a0:1728_0: Sammāsambuddho pana attano buddhasubodhitāya dasabalacatuvesārajjacatupaṭisambhidatāya chaasādhāraṇañāṇayogena
atk-abh01a0:1728_6: Tattha yatheva lokuttaraṃ jhānanti vuttaṭṭhāne dasa nayā vibhattā,
atk-abh01a0:1728_8: Iti vīsatiyā ṭhānesu dasa dasa katvā dve nayasatāni vibhattāni honti.
atk-abh01a0:1729_1: Idāni adhipatibhedaṃ dassetuṃ puna katame dhammā kusalātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1729_2: Tattha chandaṃ dhuraṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā nibbattitaṃ lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ chandādhipateyyaṃ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1729_4: Iti purimasmiṃ suddhike dvenayasatāni chandādhipateyyādīsupi dve dveti nayasahassena bhājetvā paṭhamamaggaṃ dassesi dhammarājā.
atk-abh01a0:1732_1: Idāni dutiyamaggādīnaṃ dassanatthaṃ puna katame dhammā kusalātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1732_2: Tattha kāmarāgabyāpādānaṃ tanubhāvāyāti etesaṃ kilesānaṃ tanubhāvatthāya.
atk-abh01a0:1732_13: maddantā pharantā chādentā andhakāraṃ karontā nuppajjanti.
atk-abh01a0:1732_14: Dvīhi pana maggehi pahīnattā mandā mandā uppajjanti.
atk-abh01a0:1733_3: tathā hissa puttā ca dhītaro ca dissantī’ti.
atk-abh01a0:1733_6: Dvīhi pana maggehi pahīnattā natthi kilesānaṃ bahalatāti.
atk-abh01a0:1733_7: Dvīhi eva kāraṇehissa kilesānaṃ tanubhāvo veditabbo –
atk-abh01a0:1735_1: Paṭhamamaggena ñātamariyādaṃ anatikkamitvā tesaṃyeva tena maggena ñātānaṃ catusaccadhammānaṃ jānanakaṃ indriyanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1738_1: Tatiye anavasesappahānāyāti tesaṃyeva sakadāgāmimaggena tanubhūtānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ nissesapajahanatthāya.
atk-abh01a0:1739_0: Catutthe rūparāgaarūparāgamānauddhaccaavijjāya anavasesappahānāyāti etesaṃ pañcannaṃ uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanānaṃ nissesapajahanatthāya.
atk-abh01a0:1739_5: Imesupi dvīsu maggesu navamaṃ aññindriyameva hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1741_4: Yathā ca pana paṭhamamagge evaṃ dutiyādīsupi nayasahassamevāti cattāro magge catūhi nayasahassehi bhājetvā dassesi dhammarājā.
atk-abh01a0:1742_0: Saccavibhaṅge pana saṭṭhi nayasahassāni lokuttarāni imesaṃ eva vasena nikkhittāni.
atk-abh01a0:1742_5: maggaṅgavibhaṅge aṭṭhavīsati nayasahassāni lokuttarāni imesaṃ eva vasena nikkhittāni.
atk-abh01a0:1743_0: Idha pana catūsu maggesu cattāriyeva nayasahassāni.
atk-abh01a0:1743_3: Tattha paṭhamamagge sammādiṭṭhi micchādiṭṭhiṃ pajahatīti sammādiṭṭhi.
atk-abh01a0:1743_5: Evaṃ sante ‘paṭhamamaggeneva dvāsaṭṭhiyā diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahīnattā uparimaggattayena pahātabbā diṭṭhi nāma natthi.
atk-abh01a0:1744_3: tasmā sammādiṭṭhi sakiccakā kātabbā maggaṅgāni pūretabbānī’ti.
atk-abh01a0:1744_10: so diṭṭhiṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati sā taṃ mānaṃ pajahatīti sammādiṭṭhi.
atk-abh01a0:1744_20: Evaṃ sakadāgāmimagge aṭṭhaṅgāni sakiccakāni katvā āgatāni.
atk-abh01a0:1744_24: Tesaṃ pahānena anāgāmimagge aṭṭhannaṃ aṅgānaṃ sakiccakatā veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1744_29: Tesaṃ pahānena arahattamagge aṭṭhannaṃ aṅgānaṃ sakiccakatā veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1745_0: Imesu catūsu maggesu paṭhamamaggena cattāri saccāni diṭṭhāni.
atk-abh01a0:1745_2: adiṭṭhakaṃ passatī’ti diṭṭhakameva passatīti ayaṃ ācariyānaṃ samānatthakathā.
atk-abh01a0:1745_17: Saccānipi adiṭṭhāneva passatī’ti evaṃvādī puggalo pucchitabbo –
atk-abh01a0:1746_0: Tattha saccadassanassa apubbābhāve peḷopamaṃ nāma gahitaṃ –
atk-abh01a0:1746_1: ekassa kira cattāro ratanapeḷā sāragabbhe ṭhapitā.
atk-abh01a0:1746_2: So rattibhāge peḷāsu uppannakicco dvāraṃ vivaritvā,
atk-abh01a0:1746_6: tāsu kiccaṃ katvā dvāraṃ pidahitvā gato.
atk-abh01a0:1746_9: Catutthavāre dvāre vivaṭe andhakāre peḷā na paññāyantīti vīmaṃsantasseva sūriyo uggañchi,
atk-abh01a0:1746_10: sūriyobhāsena vihate andhakāre peḷāsu kiccaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-abh01a0:1747_0: Tattha cattāro peḷā viya cattāri saccāni.
atk-abh01a0:1747_1: Tāsu kicce uppanne dvāravivaraṇakālo viya sotāpattimaggassa vipassanābhinīharaṇakālo.
atk-abh01a0:1747_4: Vihate andhakāre tassa purisassa peḷānaṃ pākaṭabhāvo viya maggañāṇassa saccānaṃ pākaṭabhāvo.
atk-abh01a0:1747_5: Maggañāṇassa pākaṭāni pana maggasamaṅgissa puggalassa pākaṭāneva honti.
atk-abh01a0:1747_6: Peḷāsu kiccaṃ katvā gatakālo viya sotāpattimaggassa attanā pahātabbakilese pajahitvā niruddhakālo.
atk-abh01a0:1748_2: Peḷāsu kiccaṃ katvā gatakālo viya sakadāgāmimaggassa attanā pahātabbakilese pajahitvā niruddhakālo.
atk-abh01a0:1749_2: Peḷāsu kiccaṃ katvā gatakālo viya anāgāmimaggassa attanā pahātabbakilese pajahitvā niruddhakālo.
atk-abh01a0:1750_3: Vihate andhakāre tassa peḷānaṃ pākaṭabhāvo viya arahattamaggañāṇassa catunnaṃ saccānaṃ pākaṭabhāvo.
atk-abh01a0:1750_4: Ñāṇassa pākaṭāni pana puggalassa pākaṭāneva honti.
atk-abh01a0:1750_5: Peḷāsu kiccaṃ katvā gatakālo viya arahattamaggassa sabbakilesakhepanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1750_6: Sūriyuggamanato paṭṭhāya ālokasseva pavattikālo viya arahattamaggassa uppannakālato paṭṭhāya puna saccapaṭicchādakatamābhāvo.
atk-abh01a0:1751_1: ‘Kilese pana aññe añño pajahatī’ti ettha khāropamaṃ nāma gahitaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1751_2: Eko puriso kiliṭṭhaṃ vatthaṃ rajakassa adāsi.
atk-abh01a0:1751_3: Rajako ūsakhāraṃ chārikakhāraṃ gomayakhāranti tayo khāre datvā khārehi khāditabhāvaṃ ñatvā udake vikkhāletvā oḷārikoḷārikaṃ malaṃ pavāhesi.
atk-abh01a0:1751_4: Tato na tāva parisuddhanti dutiyampi tatheva khāre datvā,
atk-abh01a0:1751_7: Tato na tāva parisuddhanti tatiyampi te khāre datvā udake vikkhāletvā tato saṇhataraṃ malaṃ pavāhesi.
atk-abh01a0:1751_8: Tato na tāva parisuddhanti catutthampi te khāre datvā,
atk-abh01a0:1751_9: udake vikkhāletvā aṃsuabbhantaragatampi nissesaṃ malaṃ pavāhetvā sāmikassa adāsi.
atk-abh01a0:1752_1: Tividhakhāradānakālo viya tīsu anupassanāsu kammassa pavattanakālo.
atk-abh01a0:1752_2: Udake vikkhāletvā oḷārikoḷārikamalappavāhanaṃ viya sotāpattimaggena pañcakilesakhepanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1752_3: Dutiyampi tesaṃ khārānaṃ anuppadānaṃ viya ‘na tāva parisuddhaṃ idaṃ citta’nti tāsuyeva tīsu anupassanāsu kammappavattanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1752_5: Tato ‘na tāva parisuddhaṃ vattha’nti puna khārattayadānaṃ viya ‘na tāva parisuddhaṃ idaṃ citta’nti tāsuyeva tīsu anupassanāsu kammappavattanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1752_7: ‘Na tāva parisuddhaṃ vattha’nti puna khārattayadānaṃ viya ‘na tāva parisuddhaṃ idaṃ citta’nti tāsuyeva tīsu anupassanāsu kammappavattanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1752_8: Tato vikkhālanena aṃsuabbhantaragate male pavāhetvā parisuddhassa rajatapaṭṭasadisassa gandhakaraṇḍake
atk-abh01a0:1752_9: nikkhittassa vatthassa icchiticchitakkhaṇe paridahanaṃ viya arahattamaggena aṭṭhannaṃ kilesānaṃ khepitattā
atk-abh01a0:1752_11: Idaṃ ‘aññe añño kilese pajahatī’ti ettha opammaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1753_3: Tamenaṃ rajako ūse vā khāre vā gomaye vā sammadditvā acche udake vikkhāleti.
atk-abh01a0:1753_4: Kiñcāpi taṃ hoti vatthaṃ parisuddhaṃ pariyodātaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1753_5: atha khvassa hotiyeva ‘aṇusahagato ūsagandho vā khāragandho vā gomayagandho vā asamūhato’.
atk-abh01a0:1753_8: Yopissa hoti aṇusahagato ūsagandho vā khāragandho vā gomayagandho vā asamūhato,
atk-abh01a0:1753_11: kiñcāpi ariyasāvakassa pañcorambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni pahīnāni bhavanti,
atk-abh01a0:1753_12: atha khvassa hotiyeva pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu aṇusahagato ‘asmī’ti māno,
atk-abh01a0:1753_15: so aparena samayena pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu udayabbayānupassī viharati –
atk-abh01a0:1753_19: iti vedanā iti saññā iti saṅkhārā iti viññāṇaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1753_22: Tassimesu pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu udayabbayānupassino viharato yopissa hoti pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu aṇusahagato ‘asmī’ti māno,
atk-abh01a0:1754_0: Tattha sotāpattimaggena pañca akusalacittāni pahīyanti saddhiṃ cittaṅgavasena uppajjanakapāpadhammehi.
atk-abh01a0:1754_1: Sakadāgāmimaggena dve domanassasahagatacittāni tanukāni bhavanti saddhiṃ cittaṅgavasena uppajjanakapāpadhammehi.
atk-abh01a0:1754_3: Arahattamaggena pañca akusalacittāni pahīyanti saddhiṃ cittaṅgavasena uppajjanakapāpadhammehi.
atk-abh01a0:1754_4: Imesaṃ dvādasannaṃ akusalacittānaṃ pahīnakālato paṭṭhāya khīṇāsavassa cittaṅgavasena puna pacchatopavattanakakileso nāma na hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1755_1: eko kira mahārājā paccante ārakkhaṃ datvā mahānagare issariyaṃ anubhavanto vasati.
atk-abh01a0:1755_3: Tasmiṃ samaye dvādasa corajeṭṭhakā anekehi purisasahassehi saddhiṃ raṭṭhaṃ vilumpanti.
atk-abh01a0:1755_6: ahaṃ tumhākaṃ kattabbaṃ karissāmī’ti sāsanaṃ pahiṇi.
atk-abh01a0:1755_7: Te paṭhamasampahāreneva anekehi purisasahassehi saddhiṃ pañca corajeṭṭhake ghātayiṃsu.
atk-abh01a0:1755_8: Sesā satta janā attano attano parivāre gahetvā pabbataṃ pavisiṃsu.
atk-abh01a0:1757_1: Te tatiyasampahārena saddhiṃ sahāyapurisehi dve corajeṭṭhake ghātayitvā taṃ pavattiṃ rañño pesayiṃsu.
atk-abh01a0:1758_0: Puna rājā ‘avasese vissaṭṭhā gaṇhantū’ti dhanaṃ pahiṇi.
atk-abh01a0:1758_1: Te catutthasampahārena saparivāre pañca corajeṭṭhake ghātayiṃsu.
atk-abh01a0:1758_2: Dvādasannaṃ corajeṭṭhakānaṃ ghātitakālato paṭṭhāya koci coro nāma natthi.
atk-abh01a0:1758_3: Khemā janapadā ure putte naccentā maññe viharanti.
atk-abh01a0:1758_4: Rājā vijitasaṅgāmehi yodhehi parivuto varapāsādagato mahāsampattiṃ anubhavi.
atk-abh01a0:1759_3: Tesaṃ sahāyā anekasahassapurisā viya cittaṅgavasena uppajjanakapāpadhammā.
atk-abh01a0:1759_4: Rañño paccanto kupitoti pahitakālo viya ārammaṇe kilesesu uppannesu ‘bhante,
atk-abh01a0:1759_6: ‘Vissaṭṭhā gaṇhantū’ti dhanadānaṃ viya ‘kilese niggaṇha bhikkhū’ti dhammarañño kammaṭṭhānācikkhanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1759_7: Saparivārānaṃ pañcannaṃ corajeṭṭhakānaṃ ghātitakālo viya sotāpattimaggena sampayuttānaṃ pañcannaṃ akusalacittānaṃ pahānaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1760_0: Puna rañño pavattipesanaṃ viya sammāsambuddhassa paṭiladdhaguṇārocanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1760_1: ‘Sesake ca gaṇhantū’ti puna dhanadānaṃ viya bhagavato sakadāgāmimaggassa vipassanācikkhanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1760_2: Dutiyasampahārena saparivārānaṃ dvinnaṃ corajeṭṭhakānaṃ dubbalīkaraṇaṃ viya sakadāgāmimaggena sasampayuttānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1761_0: Puna rañño pavattipesanaṃ viya satthu paṭiladdhaguṇārocanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1761_1: ‘Vissaṭṭhā gaṇhantū’ti puna dhanadānaṃ viya bhagavato anāgāmimaggassa vipassanācikkhanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1761_2: Tatiyasampahārena saparivārānaṃ dvinnaṃ corajeṭṭhakānaṃ ghātanaṃ viya anāgāmimaggena sasampayuttānaṃ dvinnaṃ domanassacittānaṃ pahānaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1762_0: Puna rañño pavattipesanaṃ viya tathāgatassa paṭiladdhaguṇārocanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1762_1: ‘Vissaṭṭhā gaṇhantū’ti puna dhanadānaṃ viya bhagavato arahattamaggassa vipassanācikkhanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1762_2: Catutthasampahārena saparivārānaṃ pañcannaṃ corajeṭṭhakānaṃ ghātitakālato paṭṭhāya janapadassa khemakālo
atk-abh01a0:1762_3: viya arahattamaggena sasampayuttesu pañcasu akusalacittesu pahīnesu dvādasannaṃ akusalacittānaṃ pahīnakālato
atk-abh01a0:1762_4: paṭṭhāya puna cittaṅgavasena uppajjanakassa akusaladhammassa abhāvo.
atk-abh01a0:1762_5: Rañño vijitasaṅgāmassa amaccagaṇaparivutassa varapāsāde mahāsampattianubhavanaṃ viya khīṇāsavaparivutassa
atk-abh01a0:1767_1: Idāni akusaladhammapadaṃ bhājetvā dassetuṃ katame dhammā akusalātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1767_2: Tattha dhammavavatthānādivārappabhedo ca heṭṭhā āgatānaṃ padānaṃ atthavinicchayo ca heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1767_7: tasmā ekantaṃ kāmāvacarampi samānaṃ etaṃ ‘kāmāvacara’nti na vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1767_8: Diṭṭhigatasampayuttanti ettha diṭṭhi eva diṭṭhigataṃ ‘gūthagataṃ muttagata’ntiādīni viya.
atk-abh01a0:1768_2: ariyānaṃ adassanakāmatādīni ayoniso manasikāroti evamādīhi kāraṇehi imassa diṭṭhigatasaṅkhātassa micchādassanassa uppatti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1768_3: Ye hi ete diṭṭhivādapaṭisaṃyuttā asaddhammā tesaṃ bahumānapubbaṅgamena atikkantamajjhattena upaparikkhārahitena savanena,
atk-abh01a0:1768_4: ye ca diṭṭhivipannā akalyāṇamittā taṃsampavaṅkatāsaṅkhātāya akalyāṇamittatāya,
atk-abh01a0:1768_5: buddhādīnaṃ ariyānañceva sappurisānañca adassanakāmatāya catusatipaṭṭhānādibhede ariyadhamme akovidattena
atk-abh01a0:1768_7: ca saṃvarabhedasaṅkhātena avinayena teheva kāraṇehi paribhāvitena ayoniso manasikārena kotūhalamaṅgalādipasutatāya
atk-abh01a0:1768_9: Asaṅkhārabhāvo panassa cittassa heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1770_0: Cittassekaggatā hotīti pāṇātipātādīsupi avikkhittabhāvena cittassa ekaggatā hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1770_1: Manussā hi cittaṃ samādahitvā avikkhittā hutvā avirajjhamānāni satthāni pāṇasarīresu nipātenti,
atk-abh01a0:1771_1: virajjhitvā gahaṇato vā vitathā diṭṭhi micchādiṭṭhi.
atk-abh01a0:1772_0: Ahirikabalaṃ anottappabalanti ettha balattho niddesavāre āvi bhavissati.
atk-abh01a0:1776_0: Samatho hotītiādīsu aññesu kiccesu vikkhepasamanato samatho.
atk-abh01a0:1777_1: cha yugaḷakānīti ime dhammā na gahitā. Kasmā?
atk-abh01a0:1777_4: Kiṃ pana diṭṭhigatikā attano attano satthārānaṃ na saddahantīti?
atk-abh01a0:1777_6: Sā pana saddhā nāma na hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1777_10: Asatiyacitte pana sati natthīti na gahitā.
atk-abh01a0:1777_11: Kiṃ diṭṭhigatikā attanā katakammaṃ na sarantīti? Saranti.
atk-abh01a0:1777_12: Sā pana sati nāma na hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1777_16: Sā pana akusalakkhandhānaṃ sativirahitattā satipaṭipakkhattā ca micchāmaggamicchattānaṃ pūraṇatthaṃ tattha pariyāyena desanā katā.
atk-abh01a0:1777_19: Andhabālacitte pana paññā natthīti na gahitā.
atk-abh01a0:1777_24: Idaṃ pana cittaṃ sadarathaṃ garukaṃ bhāriyaṃ kakkhaḷaṃ thaddhaṃ akammaññaṃ gilānaṃ vaṅkaṃ kuṭilaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1777_25: Tasmā passaddhādīni cha yugaḷakāni na gahitāni.
atk-abh01a0:1778_0: Ettāvatā padapaṭipāṭiyā cittaṅgavasena pāḷiāruḷhāni dvattiṃsa padāni dassetvā idāni yevāpanakadhamme dassetuṃ ye vā pana tasmiṃ samayetiādimāha.
atk-abh01a0:1778_1: Tattha sabbesupi akusalacittesu chando adhimokkho manasikāro māno issā macchariyaṃ thinaṃ middhaṃ uddhaccaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1778_2: kukkuccanti ime daseva yevāpanakā honti dhammā,
atk-abh01a0:1778_5: Imasmiṃ pana citte chando adhimokkho manasikāro uddhaccanti ime apaṇṇakaṅgasaṅkhātā cattārova yevāpanakā honti.
atk-abh01a0:1780_1: yevāpanakavasena vuttāni cattārīti sabbānipi imasmiṃ dhammuddesavāre chattiṃsa dhammapadāni bhavanti.
atk-abh01a0:1780_2: Cattāri apaṇṇakaṅgāni hāpetvā pāḷiyaṃ āgatāni dvattiṃsameva.
atk-abh01a0:1780_4: vitakko vicāro pīti cittassekaggatā vīriyindriyaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ micchādiṭṭhi ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ lobho mohoti soḷasa dhammā honti.
atk-abh01a0:1781_0: Tesu soḷasasu satta dhammā avibhattikā nava savibhattikā honti.
atk-abh01a0:1781_2: Phasso saññā cetanā vicāro pīti jīvitindriyaṃ mohoti ime satta avibhattikā.
atk-abh01a0:1781_3: Vedanā cittaṃ vitakko cittassekaggatā vīriyindriyaṃ micchādiṭṭhi ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ lobhoti ime nava savibhattikā.
atk-abh01a0:1782_0: Tesu cha dhammā dvīsu ṭhānesu vibhattā, eko tīsu,
atk-abh01a0:1782_3: Cittaṃ vitakko micchādiṭṭhi ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ lobhoti ime cha dvīsu ṭhānesu vibhattā.
atk-abh01a0:1782_4: Tesu hi cittaṃ tāva phassapañcakaṃ patvā cittaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1782_6: Vitakko jhānaṅgāni patvā vitakko hotīti vutto,
atk-abh01a0:1782_9: Ahirikaṃ balāni patvā ahirikabalaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1782_12: Lobho mūlaṃ patvā lobho hotīti vutto.
atk-abh01a0:1783_0: Vedanā pana phassapañcakaṃ patvā vedanā hotīti vuttā,
atk-abh01a0:1783_3: Evaṃ ekova dhammo tīsu ṭhānesu vibhatto.
atk-abh01a0:1784_0: Vīriyaṃ pana indriyāni patvā vīriyindriyaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1784_4: Evaṃ ayaṃ eko dhammo catūsu ṭhānesu vibhatto.
atk-abh01a0:1785_0: Samādhi pana jhānaṅgāni patvā cittassekaggatā hotīti vutto,
atk-abh01a0:1785_6: Evamayaṃ eko dhammo chasu ṭhānesu vibhatto.
atk-abh01a0:1786_0: Sabbepi panete dhammā phassapañcakavasena jhānaṅgavasena indriyavasena maggaṅgavasena balavasena mūlavasena
atk-abh01a0:1786_1: kammapathavasena lokanāsakavasena piṭṭhidukavasenāti nava rāsayo honti.
atk-abh01a0:1786_2: Tattha yaṃ vattabbaṃ taṃ paṭhamakusalacittaniddese vuttamevāti.
atk-abh01a0:1789_3: Yaṃ pana kusalaniddese ‘ārammaṇaṃ ogāhetvā anupavisitvā tiṭṭhatīti avaṭṭhitī’ti vuttaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1790_1: Uddhaccavicikicchāvasena pavattassa visāhārassa paṭipakkhato avisāhāroti evarūpopi attho idha na labbhati.
atk-abh01a0:1791_1: Vīriyindriyaniddese yo heṭṭhā ‘nikkamo ceso kāmānaṃ panudanāyā’tiādi nayo vutto,
atk-abh01a0:1792_10: Micchādassanañhi uppajjamānaṃ sammādassanaṃ vinivijjhati ceva vilometi ca.
atk-abh01a0:1792_11: Kadāci sassatassa kadāci ucchedassa gahaṇato diṭṭhiyā virūpaṃ phanditanti diṭṭhivipphanditaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1792_12: Diṭṭhigatiko hi ekasmiṃ patiṭṭhātuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-abh01a0:1793_5: Dhammasabhāvaṃ atikkamitvā niccādivasena parato āmasatīti parāmāso.
atk-abh01a0:1793_9: Yathā hi disāmūḷhena ayaṃ asukagāmassa nāma pathoti gahitopi taṃ gāmaṃ na sampāpeti,
atk-abh01a0:1793_10: evaṃ diṭṭhigatikena sugatipathoti gahitāpi diṭṭhi sugatiṃ na pāpetīti ayāthāvapathato,
atk-abh01a0:1793_13: Tattheva paribbhamanato taranti ettha bālāti titthaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1793_15: Titthiyānaṃ vā sañjātidesaṭṭhena nivāsaṭhānaṭṭhena ca āyatanantipi titthāyatanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1794_2: Sahajātadhammesu pana akampanaṭṭheneva ahirikabalaṃ anottappabalañca veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1795_12: Akusalañca taṃ mūlañca akusalānaṃ vā mūlanti akusalamūlaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1796_6: Aniccādīhi saddhiṃ yojetvā na bujjhatīti asambodho.
atk-abh01a0:1796_9: Rūpādīsu ekadhammampi aniccādisāmaññato na saṅgaṇhātīti asaṃgāhanā.
atk-abh01a0:1796_12: Dhammānaṃ sabhāvaṃ pati na apekkhatīti apaccavekkhaṇā.
atk-abh01a0:1797_0: Kusalākusalakammesu viparītavuttiyā sabhāvaggahaṇābhāvena vā ekampi kammaṃ etassa paccakkhaṃ natthi,
atk-abh01a0:1797_1: sayaṃ vā kassaci kammassa paccakkhakaraṇaṃ nāma na hotīti appaccakkhakammaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1797_2: Yaṃ etasmiṃ anuppajjamāne cittasantānaṃ mejjhaṃ bhaveyya, suci, vodānaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1797_17: Yathā hi mahāpalighasaṅkhātā laṅgī durugghāṭā hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1799_3: Idaṃ pana cittaṃ kiñcāpi chasu ārammaṇesu somanassitassa lobhaṃ uppādetvā ‘satto satto’tiādinā nayena parāmasantassa uppajjati,
atk-abh01a0:1799_5: yadā kulaputto micchādiṭṭhikassa kulassa kumārikaṃ pattheti.
atk-abh01a0:1799_6: Te ca ‘aññadiṭṭhikā tumhe’ti kumārikaṃ na denti.
atk-abh01a0:1799_7: Athaññe ñātakā ‘yaṃ tumhe karotha tamevāyaṃ karissatī’ti dāpenti.
atk-abh01a0:1799_10: Gacchante gacchante kāle etesaṃ kiriyā manāpāti laddhiṃ roceti,
atk-abh01a0:1802_1: Tatiyaṃ chasu ārammaṇesu somanassitassa lobhaṃ uppādetvā ‘satto satto’tiādinā nayena aparāmasantassa
atk-abh01a0:1802_3: Idha mānena saddhiṃ pañca apaṇṇakaṅgāni honti.
atk-abh01a0:1804_1: Catutthaṃ vuttappakāresu eva ṭhānesu yadā sīse kheḷaṃ khipanti,
atk-abh01a0:1804_3: tadā tassa pariharaṇatthaṃ saussāhena antarantarā olokentānaṃ rājanāṭakesu nikkhantesu ussāraṇāya vattamānāya
atk-abh01a0:1804_4: tena tena chiddena olokentānañcāti evamādīsu ṭhānesu uppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:1804_5: Idha pana thinamiddhehi saddhiṃ satta yevāpanakā honti.
atk-abh01a0:1804_7: Taṃ ṭhapetvā sesānaṃ vasena dhammagaṇanā veditabbāti.
atk-abh01a0:1806_1: Pañcamaṃ chasu ārammaṇesu vedanāvasena majjhattassa lobhaṃ uppādetvā ‘satto satto’tiādinā nayena parāmasantassa uppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:1808_1: Chaṭṭhasattamaṭṭhamānipi vedanaṃ parivattetvā pītipadañca hāpetvā dutiyatatiyacatutthesu vuttanayeneva veditabbāni.
atk-abh01a0:1808_2: Imesu aṭṭhasu lobhasahagatacittesu sahajātādhipati ārammaṇādhipatīti dvepi adhipatayo labbhanti.
atk-abh01a0:1810_1: Navamaṃ chasu ārammaṇesu domanassitassa paṭighaṃ uppādayato uppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:1811_2: Tathā dukkhadomanassapadāni lakkhaṇādito pana aniṭṭhārammaṇānubhavanalakkhaṇaṃ domanassaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1812_6: dussanamattameva vā tanti doso so caṇḍikkalakkhaṇo pahaṭāsiviso viya,
atk-abh01a0:1814_1: Issāmacchariyakukkuccesu pana aññatarena saddhiṃ pañca pañca hutvāpi uppajjanti.
atk-abh01a0:1814_10: Taṃ laddhānaṃ vā labhitabbānaṃ vā attano sampattīnaṃ nigūhanalakkhaṇaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1816_16: Apare pana assujananaṭṭhena assuropanato assuropoti vadanti.
atk-abh01a0:1816_23: Sesamettha saṅgahasuññatavāresu ca heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
atk-abh01a0:1818_3: sayameva vā paresaṃ aparādhaṃ anussaritvā kujjhamānassa uppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:1819_3: Tasmā ettha vinā issāmacchariyakukkuccehi cattāri apaṇṇakaṅgāni thinamiddhanti ime cha issādīnaṃ uppattikāle
atk-abh01a0:1819_4: tesu aññatarena saddhiṃ satta yevāpanakā ekakkhaṇe uppajjanti.
atk-abh01a0:1819_6: Imesu pana dvīsu domanassacittesu sahajātādhipatiyeva labbhati,
atk-abh01a0:1819_8: Na hi kuddho kiñci garuṃ karotīti.
atk-abh01a0:1821_1: Ekādasamaṃ chasu ārammaṇesu vedanāvasena majjhattassa kaṅkhāpavattikāle uppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:1821_7: Sabhāvaṃ vā vicinanto etāya kicchati kilamatīti vicikicchā.
atk-abh01a0:1823_1: Niddesavārassa cittassekaggatāniddese yasmā idaṃ dubbalaṃ cittaṃ pavattiṭṭhitimattakamevettha hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1823_2: tasmā ‘saṇṭhitī’tiādīni avatvā cittassa ‘ṭhitī’ti ekameva padaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1823_3: Teneva ca kāraṇena uddesavārepi ‘samādhindriya’ntiādi na vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1824_12: aniccaṃ nu kho’tiādipavattiyā ekasmiṃ ākāre saṇṭhātuṃ asamatthatāya samantato setīti saṃsayo.
atk-abh01a0:1824_13: Ekaṃsaṃ gahetuṃ asamatthatāya na ekaṃsaggāhoti anekaṃsaggāho.
atk-abh01a0:1824_19: Vicikicchā hi uppajjitvā cittaṃ thaddhaṃ karoti.
atk-abh01a0:1824_20: Yasmā panesā uppajjamānā ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā manaṃ vilikhantī viya,
atk-abh01a0:1826_2: Idañhi cittaṃ chasu ārammaṇesu vedanāvasena majjhattaṃ hutvā uddhataṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1828_5: Yathā hi vaṭṭacaturassesu dvīsu maṇīsu pabbhāraṭṭhāne pavaṭṭetvā vissaṭṭhesu vaṭṭamaṇi ekanteneva pavaṭṭati,
atk-abh01a0:1829_0: Imehi pana dvādasahipi akusalacittehi kamme āyūhite,
atk-abh01a0:1829_3: Vicikicchāsahagate aladdhādhimokkhe dubbalepi paṭisandhiṃ ākaḍḍhamāne uddhaccasahagataṃ laddhādhimokkhaṃ balavaṃ kasmā nākaḍḍhatīti?
atk-abh01a0:1829_9: Tesu hi yena kenaci kamme āyūhite tāya cetanāya catūsu apāyesu paṭisandhi hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1833_1: Idāni abyākatapadaṃ bhājetvā dassetuṃ katame dhammā abyākatātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1833_11: asādhāraṇakammapaccayavaseneva uppattiṃ dīpetuṃ kāmāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattātiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1835_4: Tesu cittaṃ phassapañcakavasena ceva indriyavasena ca dvīsu ṭhānesu vibhattiṃ gacchati,
atk-abh01a0:1837_1: Cittassekaggatāniddese cittassa ṭhitīti ekameva padaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1837_2: Idampi hi dubbalaṃ cittaṃ pavattiṭṭhitimattamevettha labbhati,
atk-abh01a0:1838_4: Cakkhudvārādīsu hi catūsu upādārūpameva upādārūpaṃ ghaṭṭeti,
atk-abh01a0:1838_5: upādārūpeyeva upādārūpaṃ ghaṭṭente paṭighaṭṭanānighaṃso balavā na hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1838_6: Catunnaṃ adhikaraṇīnaṃ upari cattāro kappāsapicupiṇḍe ṭhapetvā picupiṇḍeheva pahatakālo viya phuṭṭhamattameva hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1838_8: Kāyadvāre pana bahiddhā mahābhūtārammaṇaṃ ajjhattikakāyapasādaṃ ghaṭṭetvā pasādapaccayesu mahābhūtesu paṭihaññati.
atk-abh01a0:1838_9: Yathā adhikaraṇīmatthake kappāsapicupiṇḍaṃ ṭhapetvā kūṭena paharantassa kappāsapicupiṇḍaṃ chinditvā kūṭaṃ adhikaraṇiṃ gaṇhatīti,
atk-abh01a0:1839_0: Imesaṃ pana pañcannaṃ cittānaṃ vatthudvārārammaṇāni nibaddhāneva honti,
atk-abh01a0:1839_2: Kusalavipākacakkhuviññāṇañhi cakkhupasādaṃ vatthuṃ katvā iṭṭhe ca iṭṭhamajjhatte ca catusamuṭṭhānikarūpārammaṇe
atk-abh01a0:1839_4: Sotaviññāṇādīni sotapasādādīni vatthuṃ katvā iṭṭhaiṭṭhamajjhattesu saddādīsu savanaghāyanasāyanaphusanakiccāni
atk-abh01a0:1840_11: Yasmā panetaṃ cittaṃ neva kusalaṃ nākusalaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1840_12: tasmā sammāsaṅkappoti vā micchāsaṅkappoti vā na vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1840_13: Saṅgahavāre labbhamānampi jhānaṅgaṃ pañcaviññāṇasote patitvā gatanti.
atk-abh01a0:1840_14: Maggaṅgaṃ pana na labbhatiyevāti na uddhaṭaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1840_16: Imassa cittassa vatthu nibaddhaṃ hadayavatthumeva hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1840_21: Idañhi pañcadvāre pañcasu ārammaṇesu sampaṭicchanaṃ hutvā vipaccati.
atk-abh01a0:1840_22: Kusalavipākesu cakkhuviññāṇādīsu niruddhesu taṃsamanantarā tāneva ṭhānappattāni rūpārammaṇādīni sampaṭicchati.
atk-abh01a0:1841_8: Ubhayatthāpi pañcaviññāṇasote patitvā gatattāyeva jhānaṅgāni na uddhaṭāni.
atk-abh01a0:1842_3: tasmiṃ yevārammaṇe santīraṇakiccaṃ sādhayamānā pañcasu dvāresu ṭhatvā vipaccati.
atk-abh01a0:1842_4: Chasu dvāresu pana balavārammaṇe tadārammaṇā hutvā vipaccati. Kathaṃ?
atk-abh01a0:1842_7: udakaṃ chijjitvā thokaṃ ṭhānaṃ nāvaṃ anubandhitvā yathāsotameva gacchati,
atk-abh01a0:1842_8: evameva chasu dvāresu balavārammaṇe palobhayamāne āpāthagate javanaṃ javati.
atk-abh01a0:1842_10: Idaṃ pana cittaṃ bhavaṅgassa vāraṃ adatvā javanena gahitārammaṇaṃ gahetvā ekaṃ dve cittavāre pavattitvā bhavaṅgameva otarati.
atk-abh01a0:1842_11: Gavakkhandhe nadiṃ tarantepi evameva upamā vitthāretabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1842_12: Evamesā yaṃ javanena gahitārammaṇaṃ tasseva gahitattā tadārammaṇaṃ nāma hutvā vipaccati.
atk-abh01a0:1843_0: Dutiyā pana pañcasu ṭhānesu vipaccati. Kathaṃ?
atk-abh01a0:1843_1: Manussaloke tāva jaccandhajaccabadhirajaccaeḷajaccummattakaubhatobyañjanakanapuṃsakānaṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇakāle paṭisandhi hutvā vipaccati.
atk-abh01a0:1843_2: Paṭisandhiyā vītivattāya yāvatāyukaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ hutvā vipaccati.
atk-abh01a0:1843_5: maraṇakāle cuti hutvāti imesu pañcasu ṭhānesu vipaccatīti.
atk-abh01a0:1846_1: Idāni aṭṭhamahāvipākacittāni dassetuṃ puna katame dhammā abyākatātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1846_2: Tattha pāḷiyaṃ nayamattaṃ dassetvā sabbavārā saṃkhittā.
atk-abh01a0:1846_4: Yo panettha viseso taṃ dassetuṃ alobho abyākatamūlantiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1846_5: Yampi na vuttaṃ taṃ evaṃ veditabbaṃ –
atk-abh01a0:1846_6: yo hi kāmāvacarakusalesu kammadvārakammapathapuññakiriyavatthubhedo vutto so idha natthi. Kasmā?
atk-abh01a0:1847_0: Asaṅkhārasasaṅkhāravidhānañcettha kusalato ceva paccayabhedato ca veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1847_5: Hīnādibhedepi imāni hīnamajjhimapaṇītehi chandādīhi anipphāditattā hīnamajjhimapaṇītāni nāma na honti.
atk-abh01a0:1848_0: Idāni imesaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ mahāvipākacittānaṃ vipaccanaṭṭhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1848_4: Manussesu tāva kāmāvacaradevesu ca puññavantānaṃ duhetukatihetukānaṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇakāle paṭisandhi hutvā vipaccanti.
atk-abh01a0:1848_5: Paṭisandhiyā vītivattāya pavatte saṭṭhipi asītipi vassāni asaṅkhyeyyampi āyukālaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ hutvā,
atk-abh01a0:1849_0: Tattha sabbepi sabbaññubodhisattā pacchimapaṭisandhiggahaṇe paṭhamena somanassasahagatatihetukaasaṅkhārikamahāvipākacittena paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhanti.
atk-abh01a0:1849_11: ‘ayaṃ therassa manoratho,’‘natthi eta’nti paṭikkhipitvā ‘sabbaññubodhisattānaṃ hitūpacāro balavā hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1852_1: Sākete kira upāsakā sālāyaṃ nisīditvā ‘kiṃ nu kho ekāya cetanāya kamme āyūhite ekā paṭisandhi hoti udāhu nānā’ti?
atk-abh01a0:1852_2: Pañhaṃ nāma samuṭṭhāpetvā nicchetuṃ asakkontā ābhidhammikatthere upasaṅkamitvā pucchiṃsu.
atk-abh01a0:1852_3: Therā ‘yathā ekasmā ambabījā ekova aṅkuro nikkhamati,
atk-abh01a0:1852_5: Athekadivasaṃ ‘kiṃ nu kho nānācetanāhi kamme āyūhite paṭisandhiyo nānā honti udāhu ekā’ti?
atk-abh01a0:1852_6: Pañhaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā nicchetuṃ asakkontā there pucchiṃsu.
atk-abh01a0:1852_7: Therā ‘yathā bahūsu ambabījesu ropitesu bahū aṅkurā nikkhamanti,
atk-abh01a0:1853_0: Aparampi imasmiṃ ṭhāne ussadakittanaṃ nāma gahitaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1853_7: “Yassa hi kammāyūhanakkhaṇe lobho balavā hoti alobho mando,
atk-abh01a0:1853_9: tassa mando alobho lobhaṃ pariyādātuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-abh01a0:1853_10: adosāmohā pana balavanto dosamohe pariyādātuṃ sakkonti.
atk-abh01a0:1853_11: Tasmā so tena kammena dinnapaṭisandhivasena nibbatto luddho hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1854_0: ‘Yassa pana kammāyūhanakkhaṇe lobhadosā balavanto honti alobhādosā mandā,
atk-abh01a0:1854_2: so purimanayeneva luddho ceva hoti duṭṭho ca,
atk-abh01a0:1854_3: paññavā pana hoti vajirūpamañāṇo dattābhayatthero viya.
atk-abh01a0:1855_0: ‘Yassa pana kammāyūhanakkhaṇe lobhādosamohā balavanto honti itare mandā,
atk-abh01a0:1855_1: so purimanayeneva luddho ceva hoti dandho ca,
atk-abh01a0:1856_0: ‘Tathā yassa kammāyūhanakkhaṇe tayopi lobhadosamohā balavanto honti alobhādayo mandā,
atk-abh01a0:1856_1: so purimanayeneva luddho ceva hoti duṭṭho ca mūḷho ca.
atk-abh01a0:1857_0: ‘Yassa pana kammāyūhanakkhaṇe alobhadosamohā balavanto honti itare mandā,
atk-abh01a0:1858_0: ‘Yassa pana kammāyūhanakkhaṇe alobhādosamohā balavanto honti itare mandā,
atk-abh01a0:1859_0: ‘Tathā yassa kammāyūhanakkhaṇe alobhadosāmohā balavanto honti itare mandā,
atk-abh01a0:1859_1: so purimanayeneva aluddho ceva hoti paññavā ca,
atk-abh01a0:1860_0: ‘Yassa pana kammāyūhanakkhaṇe tayopi alobhādayo balavanto honti lobhādayo mandā,
atk-abh01a0:1860_1: so mahāsaṅgharakkhitatthero viya aluddho aduṭṭho paññavā ca hotī’ti.
atk-abh01a0:1861_0: Aparampi imasmiṃ ṭhāne hetukittanaṃ nāma gahitaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1861_1: Tihetukakammañhi tihetukampi duhetukampi ahetukampi vipākaṃ deti.
atk-abh01a0:1861_9: Asaṅkhārikaṃ kusalaṃ asaṅkhārikampi sasaṅkhārikampi vipākaṃ deti.
atk-abh01a0:1862_0: Idāni tassa tassa therassa vāde soḷasamaggādayo veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1862_1: Paṭhamakāmāvacarakusalasadisena hi paṭhamamahāvipākacittena gahitapaṭisandhikassa gabbhāvāsato nikkhamitvā
atk-abh01a0:1862_2: saṃvarāsaṃvare paṭṭhapetuṃ samatthabhāvaṃ upagatassa cakkhudvārasmiṃ ‘iṭṭhārammaṇe’ āpāthamāgate kiriyamanodhātuyā
atk-abh01a0:1863_3: cakkhuviññāṇe vā sampaṭicchane vā santīraṇe vā ṭhatvā nivattissatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
atk-abh01a0:1863_4: Voṭṭhabbanavasena pana ṭhatvā ekaṃ vā dve vā cittāni pavattanti.
atk-abh01a0:1863_5: Tato āsevanaṃ labhitvā javanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā puna bhavaṅgaṃ otarati idampi ārammaṇadubbalatāya eva hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1864_0: Aparassa kiriyamanodhātuyā bhavaṅge āvaṭṭite vīthicittāni uppajjanti,
atk-abh01a0:1864_5: yathā hi nadiyā āvaraṇaṃ bandhitvā mahāmātikābhimukhe udake kate udakaṃ gantvā ubhosu tīresu kedāre pūretvā
atk-abh01a0:1864_6: atirekaṃ kakkaṭakamaggādīhi palāyitvā puna nadiṃyeva otarati,
atk-abh01a0:1864_8: Ettha hi nadiyaṃ udakappavattanakālo viya bhavaṅgavīthippavattanakālo.
atk-abh01a0:1864_12: Kakkaṭakamaggādīhi palāyitvā puna udakassa nadīotaraṇaṃ viya javanaṃ javitvā tadārammaṇe anuppanneyeva puna bhavaṅgotaraṇaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1865_0: Sace pana balavārammaṇaṃ āpāthagataṃ hoti kiriyamanodhātuyā bhavaṅge āvaṭṭite cakkhuviññāṇādīni uppajjanti.
atk-abh01a0:1865_1: Javanaṭṭhāne pana paṭhamakāmāvacarakusalacittaṃ javanaṃ hutvā chasattavāre javitvā tadārammaṇassa vāraṃ deti.
atk-abh01a0:1865_5: yaṃ javanena gahitaṃ ārammaṇaṃ tassa gahitattā ‘tadārammaṇa’nti ca.
atk-abh01a0:1865_6: Imasmiṃ ṭhāne cakkhuviññāṇaṃ sampaṭicchanaṃ santīraṇaṃ tadārammaṇanti cattāri vipākacittāni gaṇanūpagāni honti.
atk-abh01a0:1866_1: tadā taṃsadisaṃ dutiyavipākacittameva tadārammaṇaṃ hutvā patiṭṭhāti.
atk-abh01a0:1866_4: Iminā saddhiṃ purimāni cattāri pañca honti.
atk-abh01a0:1867_1: tadā taṃsadisaṃ tatiyavipākacittaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ hutvā patiṭṭhāti.
atk-abh01a0:1867_2: Idampi vuttanayeneva ‘āgantukabhavaṅgaṃ’‘tadārammaṇa’nti ca dve nāmāni labhati.
atk-abh01a0:1867_3: Iminā saddhiṃ purimāni pañca cha honti.
atk-abh01a0:1868_1: tadā taṃsadisaṃ catutthavipākacittaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ hutvā patiṭṭhāti.
atk-abh01a0:1868_2: Idampi vuttanayeneva ‘āgantukabhavaṅgaṃ’‘tadārammaṇa’nti ca dve nāmāni labhati.
atk-abh01a0:1868_3: Iminā saddhiṃ purimāni cha satta honti.
atk-abh01a0:1869_2: Yasmā pana ārammaṇena vedanā parivattati tasmā tattha upekkhāsahagatasantīraṇaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1869_3: Catunnañca upekkhāsahagatamahākusalajavanānaṃ pariyosāne cattāri upekkhāsahagatamahāvipākacittāneva tadārammaṇabhāvena patiṭṭhahanti.
atk-abh01a0:1869_4: Tānipi vuttanayeneva ‘āgantukabhavaṅgaṃ’‘tadārammaṇa’nti ca dve nāmāni labhanti.
atk-abh01a0:1869_6: Iti imāni pañca purimehi sattahi saddhiṃ dvādasa honti.
atk-abh01a0:1869_10: Evaṃ ekāya cetanāya kamme āyūhite samasaṭṭhi vipākacittāni uppajjanti.
atk-abh01a0:1870_1: eko kira puriso phalitambarukkhamūle sasīsaṃ pārupitvā nipanno niddāyati.
atk-abh01a0:1870_2: Athekaṃ ambapakkaṃ vaṇṭato muccitvā tassa kaṇṇasakkhaliṃ puñchamānaṃ viya ‘tha’nti bhūmiyaṃ pati.
atk-abh01a0:1870_3: So tassa saddena pabujjhitvā ummīletvā olokesi.
atk-abh01a0:1870_4: Tato hatthaṃ pasāretvā phalaṃ gahetvā madditvā upasiṅghitvā paribhuñji.
atk-abh01a0:1871_1: tassa purisassa ambarukkhamūle niddāyanakālo viya bhavaṅgasamaṅgikālo.
atk-abh01a0:1871_2: Ambapakkassa vaṇṭato muccitvā kaṇṇasakkhaliṃ puñchamānassa patanakālo viya ārammaṇassa pasādaghaṭṭanakālo.
atk-abh01a0:1871_3: Tena saddena pabuddhakālo viya kiriyamanodhātuyā bhavaṅgassa āvaṭṭitakālo.
atk-abh01a0:1871_5: Hatthaṃ pasāretvā gahitakālo viya vipākamanodhātuyā ārammaṇassa sampaṭicchitakālo.
atk-abh01a0:1871_6: Gahetvā madditakālo viya vipākamanoviññāṇadhātuyā ārammaṇassa santīraṇakālo.
atk-abh01a0:1871_16: Ekantena pana ārammaṇarasaṃ javanameva anubhavatīti dīpeti.
atk-abh01a0:1872_7: hohī’ti koci kattā vā kāretā vā natthi.
atk-abh01a0:1873_0: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne pañcavidhaṃ niyāmaṃ nāma gaṇhiṃsu –
atk-abh01a0:1873_6: nāḷikerassa matthake chiddasabbhāvoti tesaṃ tesaṃ bījānaṃ taṃtaṃsadisaphaladānaṃ bījaniyāmo nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1873_7: Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ samaye tesaṃ tesaṃ rukkhānaṃ ekappahāreneva pupphaphalapallavaggahaṇaṃ utuniyāmo nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1873_11: evaṃ tassa tassa kammassa taṃtaṃsadisavipākadānameva kammaniyāmo nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1874_3: Tato pajjalitaṃ tiṇakaraḷaṃ uṭṭhahitvā ākāsena gacchato kākassa gīvāya paṭimuñci.
atk-abh01a0:1874_6: Heṭṭhā kenaci niruddhabhāvaṃ apassantā kāḷakaṇṇisalākaṃ vicāresuṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1874_8: Tato ekissā kāraṇā mā sabbe nassantu,
atk-abh01a0:1874_10: Nāviko ‘na sakkhissāmi etaṃ udake uppilavamānaṃ passitu’nti vālikāghaṭaṃ gīvāyaṃ bandhāpetvā khipāpesi.
atk-abh01a0:1874_15: Sammāsambuddhassa jetavane nisīditvā dhammaṃ kathentassa imāni tīṇi vatthūni ekappahāreneva ārocesuṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1874_17: tehi katakammameva ta’nti atītaṃ āharitvā dassento āha –
atk-abh01a0:1875_0: Kāko purimattabhāve manusso hutvā ekaṃ duṭṭhagoṇaṃ dametuṃ asakkonto gīvāya palālaveṇiṃ bandhitvā aggiṃ adāsi.
atk-abh01a0:1875_2: Idāni taṃ kammaṃ etassa ākāsena gacchatopi na muccituṃ adāsi.
atk-abh01a0:1875_4: Eko kukkuro tāya paricito hutvā araññaṃ gacchantiyā saddhiṃ gacchati,
atk-abh01a0:1875_7: Sā tena aṭṭīyamānā kukkuraṃ nivāretuṃ asakkontī vālikāghaṭaṃ gīvāya bandhitvā udake khipi.
atk-abh01a0:1875_8: Taṃ kammaṃ tassā samuddamajjhe muccituṃ nādāsi.
atk-abh01a0:1875_9: Sopi bhikkhu purimattabhāve gopālako hutvā bilaṃ paviṭṭhāya godhāya sākhābhaṅgamuṭṭhiyā dvāraṃ thakesi.
atk-abh01a0:1875_10: Tato sattame divase sayaṃ āgantvā vivari.
atk-abh01a0:1875_13: Taṃ kammaṃ tassa pabbatantaraṃ pavisitvā nisinnassa muccituṃ nādāsīti.
atk-abh01a0:1875_14: Imāni tīṇi vatthūni samodhānetvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-abh01a0:1880_0: Ayampi kammaniyāmoyeva nāma. Aññānipi evarūpāni vatthūni kathetabbāni.
atk-abh01a0:1882_0: Ārammaṇena pana pasāde ghaṭṭite ‘tvaṃ āvajjanaṃ nāma hohi…pe…
atk-abh01a0:1882_1: tvaṃ javanaṃ nāma hohī’ti koci kattā vā kāretā vā natthi,
atk-abh01a0:1882_2: attano attano pana dhammatāya eva ārammaṇena pasādassa ghaṭṭitakālato paṭṭhāya kiriyamanodhātucittaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ āvaṭṭeti,
atk-abh01a0:1882_7: javanaṃ ārammaṇarasaṃ anubhavatīti ayaṃ cittaniyāmo nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1883_2: Upekkhāsahagatadvaye pana paṭhamaṃ ‘iṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇavasena’ pavattiṃ dassetvā pacchā ‘iṭṭhārammaṇavasena’ dassetabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1884_0: Evampi ekekasmiṃ dvāre dvādasa dvādasa hutvā samasaṭṭhi honti.
atk-abh01a0:1885_1: Ucchupīḷanasamaye kira ekasmā gāmā ekādasa yantavāhā nikkhamitvā ekaṃ ucchuvāṭaṃ disvā tassa paripakkabhāvaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1885_3: So ‘ahaṃ tumheyeva pariyesāmī’ti ucchusālaṃ te gahetvā agamāsi.
atk-abh01a0:1885_4: Te tattha nāḷiyantaṃ sajjetvā ‘mayaṃ ekādasa janā,
atk-abh01a0:1885_7: Ucchusāmiko ‘ahameva sahāyo bhavissāmī’ti ucchūnaṃ sālaṃ pūrāpetvā tesaṃ sahāyo ahosi.
atk-abh01a0:1885_12: attano attano bhāgaṃ ādāya ucchusālaṃ sāmikassa paṭicchāpetvā,
atk-abh01a0:1885_13: eteneva upāyena aparāsupi catūsu sālāsu kammaṃ katvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-abh01a0:1886_0: Tattha pañca yantasālā viya pañca pasādā daṭṭhabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1886_4: Paṭhamakasālāyaṃ sāmikena saddhiṃ dvādasannaṃ janānaṃ ekatova hutvā katakammānaṃ bhāgaggahaṇakālo viya
atk-abh01a0:1886_5: ekādasannaṃ vipākacittānaṃ cakkhuviññāṇena saddhiṃ ekato hutvā cakkhudvāre rūpārammaṇe sakasakakiccakaraṇakālo.
atk-abh01a0:1886_6: Sālāsāmikassa sālāya sampaṭicchanakālo viya cakkhuviññāṇassa dvārasaṅkantiakaraṇaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1886_7: Dutiya tatiya catuttha pañcamasālāya dvādasannaṃ ekato hutvā katakammānaṃ bhāgaggahaṇakālo viya ekādasannaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1886_8: vipākacittānaṃ kāyaviññāṇena saddhiṃ ekato hutvā kāyadvāre phoṭṭhabbārammaṇe sakasakakiccakaraṇakālo.
atk-abh01a0:1886_9: Sālāsāmikassa sālāya sampaṭicchanakālo viya kāyaviññāṇassa dvārasaṅkantiakaraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1886_10: Ettāvatā tihetukakammena paṭisandhi tihetukā hotīti vāro kathito.
atk-abh01a0:1887_0: Idāni duhetukakammena duhetukā paṭisandhi hotīti vāro kathetabbo.
atk-abh01a0:1887_1: Duhetukena hi somanassasahagataasaṅkhārikacittena kamme āyūhite taṃsadiseneva duhetukavipākacittena gahitapaṭisandhikassa
atk-abh01a0:1887_5: ‘Iṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇe’ dvinnaṃ upekkhāsahagatajavanānaṃ avasāne tādisāneva dve tadārammaṇāni uppajjanti.
atk-abh01a0:1887_6: Idha ekekasmiṃ dvāre aṭṭha aṭṭha katvā samacattālīsa cittāni.
atk-abh01a0:1887_9: Evaṃ ekāya cetanāya kamme āyūhite dvādasa vipākacittāni uppajjanti.
atk-abh01a0:1887_13: Tehi tattha yante nāma sajjite sālāsāmikaṃ aṭṭhamaṃ katvā vuttanayānusārena yojanā veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1887_14: Ettāvatā duhetukakammena duhetukapaṭisandhi hotīti vāro kathito.
atk-abh01a0:1888_4: Tassa vuḍḍhippattassa cakkhudvāre ‘iṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇe’ āpāthamāgate purimanayeneva tayo moghavārā veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1888_5: Catunnaṃ pana duhetukakusalacittānaṃ aññatarajavanassa pariyosāne ahetukacittaṃ tadārammaṇabhāvena patiṭṭhāti.
atk-abh01a0:1888_7: Evamettha cakkhuviññāṇaṃ sampaṭicchanaṃ upekkhāsahagatasantīraṇaṃ tadārammaṇampi upekkhāsahagatamevāti tesu ekaṃ gahetvā gaṇanūpagāni tīṇeva honti.
atk-abh01a0:1889_1: Tesu ekaṃ gahetvā purimāni tīṇi cattāri honti.
atk-abh01a0:1889_2: Evaṃ pañcasu dvāresu cattāri cattāri katvā ekāya cetanāya kamme āyūhite vīsati vipākacittāni uppajjantīti veditabbāni.
atk-abh01a0:1889_3: Aggahitaggahaṇena pana cakkhudvāre cattāri sotaghānajivhākāyaviññāṇāni cattārīti aṭṭha honti.
atk-abh01a0:1890_1: Yadā hi mahāmoggallānatthero niraye padumaṃ māpetvā padumakaṇṇikāya nisinno nerayikānaṃ dhammakathaṃ kathesi,
atk-abh01a0:1890_2: tadā tesaṃ theraṃ passantānaṃ kusalavipākaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ uppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:1890_4: candanavane divāvihāraṃ nisīditvā gatassa cīvaragandhaghāyanakāle ghānaviññāṇaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1890_5: nirayaggiṃ nibbāpetuṃ devaṃ vassāpetvā pānīyadānakāle jivhāviññāṇaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1891_0: ‘Iṭṭhārammaṇe’ pana catūsu somanassasahagatākusalacittesu javitesu kusalavipākaṃ somanassasahagatāhetukacittaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1891_1: ‘Iṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇe’ catūsu upekkhāsahagatalobhasampayuttesu javitesu kusalavipākaṃ upekkhāsahagatāhetukacittaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1891_2: Yaṃ pana ‘javanena tadārammaṇaṃ niyametabba’nti vuttaṃ taṃ kusalaṃ sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1892_0: Idaṃ pana javanaṃ kusalatthāya vā akusalatthāya vā ko niyāmetīti?
atk-abh01a0:1892_2: Āvajjanena hi yoniso āvaṭṭite voṭṭhabbanena yoniso vavatthāpite javanaṃ akusalaṃ bhavissatīti aṭṭhānametaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1892_3: Āvajjanena ayoniso āvaṭṭite voṭṭhabbanena ayoniso vavatthāpite javanaṃ kusalaṃ bhavissatītipi aṭṭhānametaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1892_4: Ubhayena pana yoniso āvaṭṭite vavatthāpite ca javanaṃ kusalaṃ hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1893_0: ‘Iṭṭhārammaṇe’ pana kaṅkhato uddhatassa ca tadārammaṇaṃ kiṃ hotīti?
atk-abh01a0:1893_5: ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepato atthadīpano mahādhammarakkhitattheravādo nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1893_6: Somanassasahagatasmiñhi javane javite pañca tadārammaṇāni gavesitabbānīti.
atk-abh01a0:1894_0: Atha yadā somanassasahagatapaṭisandhikassa pavatte jhānaṃ nibbattetvā pamādena parihīnajjhānassa ‘paṇītadhammo
atk-abh01a0:1894_1: me naṭṭho’ti paccavekkhato vippaṭisāravasena domanassaṃ uppajjati,
atk-abh01a0:1894_4: Mahaggatadhammaṃ ārabbha javane javite tadārammaṇampi tattheva paṭisiddhanti?
atk-abh01a0:1894_5: Kusalavipākā vā akusalavipākā vā upekkhāsahagatāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātu uppajjati,
atk-abh01a0:1894_8: ‘Etāni tāva attano ninnattā ca ciṇṇattā ca samudācārattā ca uppajjantu,
atk-abh01a0:1894_20: Etesu hi yadeva tasmiṃ samaye āpāthamāgataṃ hoti,
atk-abh01a0:1894_21: taṃ ārabbha etaṃ cittaṃ uppajjatī’ti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1895_0: Idāni sabbesampi etesaṃ cittānaṃ pākaṭabhāvatthaṃ ayaṃ pakiṇṇakanayo vutto –
atk-abh01a0:1896_0: Suttaṃ dovāriko ca, gāmillo ambo koliyakena ca;
atk-abh01a0:1897_0: Jaccandho pīṭhasappī ca, visayaggāho ca upanissayamatthasoti.
atk-abh01a0:1898_1: eko panthamakkaṭako pañcasu disāsu suttaṃ pasāretvā jālaṃ katvā majjhe nipajjati.
atk-abh01a0:1898_2: Paṭhamadisāya pasāritasutte pāṇakena vā paṭaṅgena vā makkhikāya vā pahaṭe nipannaṭṭhānato calitvā nikkhamitvā
atk-abh01a0:1898_3: suttānusārena gantvā tassa yūsaṃ pivitvā punaāgantvā tattheva nipajjati.
atk-abh01a0:1899_0: Tattha pañcasu disāsu pasāritasuttaṃ viya pañcapasādā.
atk-abh01a0:1899_2: Pāṇakādīhi suttaghaṭṭanakālo viya ārammaṇena pasādassa ghaṭṭitakālo.
atk-abh01a0:1899_3: Majjhe nipannamakkaṭakassa calanaṃ viya pasādaghaṭṭanakaṃ ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā kiriyamanodhātuyā bhavaṅgassa āvaṭṭitakālo.
atk-abh01a0:1899_5: Sīse vijjhitvā yūsapivanaṃ viya javanassa ārammaṇe javitakālo.
atk-abh01a0:1899_6: Punaāgantvā majjhe nipajjanaṃ viya cittassa hadayavatthumeva nissāya pavattanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1900_1: Ārammaṇena pasāde ghaṭṭite pasādavatthukacittato hadayarūpavatthukacittaṃ paṭhamataraṃ uppajjatīti dīpeti.
atk-abh01a0:1900_2: Ekekaṃ ārammaṇaṃ dvīsu dvīsu dvāresu āpāthamāgacchatītipi.
atk-abh01a0:1901_5: Atheko paccantavāsī manusso paṇṇākāraṃ ādāya āgantvā dvāraṃ ākoṭesi.
atk-abh01a0:1902_0: Tattha so rājā viya javanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1902_3: Tayo paṭihārā viya sampaṭicchanādīni tīṇi vīthicittāni.
atk-abh01a0:1902_4: Paccantavāsino paṇṇākāraṃ ādāya āgantvā dvārākoṭanaṃ viya ārammaṇassa pasādaghaṭṭanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1902_5: Pādaparimajjakena saññāya dinnakālo viya kiriyamanodhātuyā bhavaṅgassa āvaṭṭitakālo.
atk-abh01a0:1902_6: Tena dinnasaññāya badhiradovārikassa dvāravivaraṇakālo viya cakkhuviññāṇassa ārammaṇe dassanakiccasādhanakālo.
atk-abh01a0:1902_7: Paṭhamapaṭihārena paṇṇākārassa gahitakālo viya vipākamanodhātuyā ārammaṇassa sampaṭicchitakālo.
atk-abh01a0:1902_8: Paṭhamena dutiyassa dinnakālo viya vipākamanoviññāṇadhātuyā ārammaṇassa santīraṇakālo.
atk-abh01a0:1902_9: Dutiyena tatiyassa dinnakālo viya kiriyamanoviññāṇadhātuyā ārammaṇassa vavatthāpitakālo.
atk-abh01a0:1902_10: Tatiyena rañño dinnakālo viya voṭṭhabbanena javanassa niyyāditakālo.
atk-abh01a0:1903_4: Ekantena pana javanameva ārammaṇarasaṃ anubhotīti dīpeti.
atk-abh01a0:1905_0: Tattha sambahulānaṃ dārakānaṃ antaravīthiyaṃ kīḷantānaṃ nisinnakālo viya bhavaṅgacittappavatti daṭṭhabbā.
atk-abh01a0:1905_1: Kahāpaṇassa hatthe paṭihatakālo viya ārammaṇena pasādassa ghaṭṭitakālo.
atk-abh01a0:1905_2: ‘Kiṃ nu kho eta’nti vuttakālo viya taṃ ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā kiriyamanodhātuyā bhavaṅgassa āvaṭṭitakālo.
atk-abh01a0:1905_3: ‘Paṇḍaraṃ eta’nti vuttakālo viya cakkhuviññāṇena dassanakiccassa sādhitakālo.
atk-abh01a0:1905_4: Saha paṃsunā gāḷhaṃ gahitakālo viya vipākamanodhātuyā ārammaṇassa sampaṭicchitakālo.
atk-abh01a0:1905_5: ‘Puthulaṃ caturassaṃ eta’nti vuttakālo viya vipākamanoviññāṇadhātuyā ārammaṇassa santīraṇakālo.
atk-abh01a0:1905_6: ‘Eso kahāpaṇo’ti vuttakālo viya kiriyamanoviññāṇadhātuyā ārammaṇassa vavatthāpitakālo.
atk-abh01a0:1905_7: Mātarā kamme upanītakālo viya javanassa ārammaṇarasānubhavanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1906_6: Ekantena pana cakkhuviññāṇameva dassanakiccaṃ sādhetīti dīpeti.
atk-abh01a0:1907_0: ‘Ambo koliyakena cā’ti, idaṃ heṭṭhā vuttaṃ ambopamañca ucchusālāsāmikopamañca sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1908_1: ubhopi kira te nagaradvāre sālāyaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
atk-abh01a0:1908_6: kiṃ tattha gantvā sukhena jīvituṃ na vaṭṭatī’ti?
atk-abh01a0:1908_8: tuyhaṃ pana tattha gantvā sukhena jīvituṃ kiṃ na vaṭṭatī’ti?
atk-abh01a0:1908_13: mama cakkhūnī’ti ubhopi ‘sādhū’ti sampaṭicchitvā jaccandho pīṭhasappiṃ khandhaṃ āropesi.
atk-abh01a0:1908_14: So tassa khandhe nisīditvā vāmahatthenassa sīsaṃ parikkhipitvā dakkhiṇahatthena ‘imasmiṃ ṭhāne mūlaṃ āvaritvā ṭhitaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1908_17: dakkhiṇaṃ muñca vāmaṃ gaṇhā’ti maggaṃ niyametvā ācikkhati.
atk-abh01a0:1908_18: Evaṃ jaccandhassa pādā pīṭhasappissa cakkhūnīti ubhopi sampayogena icchitaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā sukhena jīviṃsu.
atk-abh01a0:1909_2: Pīṭhasappinā vinā jaccandhassa disaṃ gantuṃ gamanābhisaṅkhārassa anibbattitakālo viya rūpassa arūpena vinā ādānagahaṇacopanaṃ pāpetuṃ asamatthatā.
atk-abh01a0:1909_3: Jaccandhena vinā pīṭhasappissa disaṃ gantuṃ gamanābhisaṅkhārassa appavattanaṃ viya pañcavokāre rūpaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:1909_5: Dvinnampi sampayogena icchitaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā sukhena jīvitakālo viya rūpārūpadhammānaṃ aññamaññayogena sabbakiccesu pavattisambhāvoti.
atk-abh01a0:1910_0: ‘Visayaggāho’ cāti, cakkhu rūpavisayaṃ gaṇhāti. Sotādīni saddādivisaye.
atk-abh01a0:1911_9: pittena vā semhena vā ruhirena vā palibuddhampi,
atk-abh01a0:1911_10: cakkhuviññāṇassa paccayo bhavituṃ asakkontaṃ ‘sambhinnaṃ’ nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a0:1911_13: Cakkhusmiṃ pana asambhinnepi bahiddhā rūpārammaṇe āpāthaṃ anāgacchante cakkhuviññāṇaṃ nuppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:1911_14: Tasmiṃ pana āpāthaṃ āgacchantepi ālokasannissaye asati nuppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:1911_15: Tasmiṃ santepi kiriyamanodhātuyā bhavaṅge anāvaṭṭite nuppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:1911_18: Iti ime cattāro paccaye labhitvā uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:1914_7: Sukkhajivhānañhi sukkhakhādanīye jivhāya ṭhapitepi jivhāviññāṇaṃ nuppajjateva.
atk-abh01a0:1915_7: Kāyadvārasmiñhi bahiddhāmahābhūtārammaṇaṃ ajjhattikaṃ kāyapasādaṃ ghaṭṭetvā pasādapaccayesu mahābhūtesu paṭihaññati.
atk-abh01a0:1916_7: āvajjanacittassa paccayo bhavituṃ asamatthaṃ mandathāmagatameva pavattamānampi,
atk-abh01a0:1916_9: Āvajjanassa pana paccayo bhavituṃ samatthaṃ asambhinnaṃ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:1918_2: Ayaṃ pana thero asaṅkhārikasasaṅkhārikesu dosaṃ disvā ‘asaṅkhārikaṃ asaṅkhārikameva vipākaṃ deti,
atk-abh01a0:1919_1: somanassasahagatatihetukaasaṅkhārikacittena hi kamme āyūhite tādiseneva vipākacittena gahitapaṭisandhikassa
atk-abh01a0:1919_2: vuḍḍhippattassa cakkhudvāre ‘iṭṭhārammaṇe’ āpāthagate heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva tayo moghavārā honti.
atk-abh01a0:1919_5: kiriyato pañcāti imesaṃ terasannaṃ cittānaṃ aññatarena javitapariyosāne tadārammaṇaṃ patiṭṭhahamānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:1920_0: Ārammaṇena pana vedanaṃ parivattetvā kusalato catunnaṃ,

atk-abh01a0:2007_5: anodātāneva hutvā odātaṃ upādārūpaṃ dassentīti māyākāramahābhūtasāmaññato mahābhūtāni.
atk-abh01a0:2007_6: Yathā ca yakkhādīni mahābhūtāni yaṃ gaṇhanti neva tesaṃ tassa anto na bahiṭhānaṃ upalabbhati,
atk-abh01a0:2007_7: na ca taṃ nissāya na tiṭṭhanti,
atk-abh01a0:2007_8: evameva etānipi neva aññamaññassa anto na bahi ṭhitāni hutvā upalabbhanti,
atk-abh01a0:2007_9: na ca aññamaññaṃ nissāya na tiṭṭhantīti.
atk-abh01a0:2008_0: Yathā ca yakkhinīsaṅkhātāni mahābhūtāni manāpehi vaṇṇasaṇṭhānavikkhepehi attano bhayānakabhāvaṃ paṭicchādetvā satte vañcenti,
atk-abh01a0:2008_3: manāpena ca hatthapādaṅgulibhamukavikkhepena attano kakkhaḷatādibhedaṃ sarasalakkhaṇaṃ paṭicchādetvā bālajanaṃ vañcenti,
atk-abh01a0:2009_1: Etāni hi divase divase upanetabbattā mahantehi ghāsacchādanādīhi bhūtāni pavattānīti mahābhūtāni.
atk-abh01a0:2010_1: Etāni hi upādiṇṇānipi anupādiṇṇānipi mahāvikārāni honti.
atk-abh01a0:2010_2: Tattha anupādiṇṇānaṃ kappavuṭṭhāne vikāramahattaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti,
atk-abh01a0:2017_0: Patthaddho bhavati kāyo, daṭṭho kaṭṭhamukhena vā;
atk-abh01a0:2019_0: Pūtiyo bhavati kāyo, daṭṭho pūtimukhena vā;
atk-abh01a0:2021_0: Santatto bhavati kāyo, daṭṭho aggimukhena vā;
atk-abh01a0:2023_0: Sañchinno bhavati kāyo, daṭṭho satthamukhena vā;
atk-abh01a0:2026_0: ‘Mahantabhūtattā cā’ti etāni hi mahantāni mahatā vāyāmena pariggahetabbattā,
atk-abh01a0:2027_0: Catunnañca mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya rūpanti upayogatthe sāmivacanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2027_3: Idaṃ vuccati sabbaṃ rūpanti idaṃ cattāri mahābhūtāni,
atk-abh01a0:2029_0: Idāni taṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ ekavidhādīhi ekādasahi saṅgahehi mātikaṃ ṭhapento sabbaṃ rūpaṃ na hetūtiādimāha.
atk-abh01a0:2030_0: Tattha ‘sabbaṃ rūpa’nti idaṃ padaṃ ‘sabbaṃ rūpaṃ na hetu’ ‘sabbaṃ rūpaṃ ahetuka’nti evaṃ sabbapadehi saddhiṃ yojetabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2030_2: Tesu paṭipāṭiyā cattālīsapadāni mātikato gahetvā ṭhapitāni,
atk-abh01a0:2030_4: Evaṃ tāva paṭhame saṅgahe pāḷivavatthānameva veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2032_1: dutiyasaṅgahe tāva sataṃ cattāro ca dukā.
atk-abh01a0:2032_3: atthi rūpaṃ noupādātiādayo ādimhi cuddasa dukā aññamaññasambandhābhāvato pakiṇṇakadukā nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2032_4: Tato atthi rūpaṃ cakkhusamphassassa vatthūtiādayo pañcavīsati dukā vatthuavatthuupaparikkhaṇavasena pavattattā vatthudukā nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2032_5: Tato atthi rūpaṃ cakkhusamphassassa ārammaṇantiādayo pañcavīsati ārammaṇānārammaṇaupaparikkhaṇavasena pavattattā ārammaṇadukā nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2032_6: Tato atthi rūpaṃ cakkhāyatananti ādayo dasa āyatanānāyatanaupaparikkhaṇavasena pavattattā āyatanadukā nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2032_7: Tato atthi rūpaṃ cakkhudhātūtiādayo dasa dhātuadhātuupaparikkhaṇavasena pavattattā dhātudukā nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2032_8: Tato atthi rūpaṃ cakkhundriyantiādayo aṭṭha indriyānindriyaupaparikkhaṇavasena pavattattā indriyadukā nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2032_9: Tato atthi rūpaṃ kāyaviññattītiādayo dvādasa sukhumāsukhumarūpaupaparikkhaṇavasena pavattattā sukhumarūpadukā nāmāti.
atk-abh01a0:2034_2: Tattha dutiyasaṅgahe vuttesu cuddasasu pakiṇṇakadukesu ekaṃ ajjhattikadukaṃ sesehi terasahi yojetvā yaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ ajjhattikaṃ taṃ upādā;
atk-abh01a0:2034_3: yaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ bāhiraṃ taṃ atthi upādā,
atk-abh01a0:2034_4: atthi noupādātiādinā nayena ṭhapitā terasa pakiṇṇakatikā nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2034_5: Tato tameva dukaṃ sesadukehi saddhiṃ yojetvā yaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ bāhiraṃ taṃ cakkhusamphassassa na vatthu,
atk-abh01a0:2034_6: yaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ ajjhattikaṃ taṃ atthi cakkhusamphassassa vatthu,
atk-abh01a0:2034_7: atthi cakkhusamphassassa na vatthūtiādinā nayena sesatikā ṭhapitā.
atk-abh01a0:2034_8: Tesaṃ nāmañca gaṇanā ca tesaṃyeva vatthudukādīnaṃ vasena veditabbāti.
atk-abh01a0:2036_2: Tattha sabbapacchimo atthi rūpaṃ upādā atthi rūpaṃ noupādāti evaṃ idha vuttaṃ mātikaṃ anāmasitvā ṭhapito.
atk-abh01a0:2036_4: Ye tāva idha duvidhasaṅgahe pakiṇṇakesu ādito tayo dukā,
atk-abh01a0:2036_5: tesu ekekaṃ gahetvā yaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ upādā taṃ atthi upādiṇṇaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2036_6: atthi anupādiṇṇantiādinā nayena pañcahi pañcahi dukehi saddhiṃ yojetvā dukattayamūlakā ādimhi pañcadasa catukkā ṭhapitā.
atk-abh01a0:2037_0: Idāni yo yaṃ catukko sanidassanaduko so yasmā yaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ sanidassanaṃ taṃ atthi sappaṭighaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2037_2: atthi upādā atthi noupādātiādinā nayena purimehi vā,
atk-abh01a0:2037_3: dukehi saddhiṃ atthābhāvato kamābhāvato visesābhāvato ca yogaṃ na gacchati.
atk-abh01a0:2037_5: ‘no upādā’ vā natthīti atthābhāvato yogaṃ na gacchati.
atk-abh01a0:2037_6: ‘Upādiṇṇaṃ pana anupādiṇṇañca atthi taṃ kamābhāvā yogaṃ na gacchati.
atk-abh01a0:2037_11: Tasmā upādiṇṇapadādīhi saddhiṃ yojetabbo’ti ce – na,
atk-abh01a0:2037_15: sanidassanaṃ vā upādiṇṇa’nti vutte viseso natthīti visesābhāvāpi yogaṃ na gacchati.
atk-abh01a0:2037_17: tato parehi atthi rūpaṃ sappaṭighantiādīhi tīhi dukehi saddhiṃ ‘yaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ sappaṭighaṃ taṃ atthi indriyaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2037_19: yaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ appaṭighaṃ taṃ atthi indriyaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2037_20: atthi na indriya’ntiādinā nayena yujjamāne dve dve duke yojetvā cha catukkā ṭhapitā.
atk-abh01a0:2038_0: Yathā cāyaṃ catutthaduko yogaṃ na gacchati,
atk-abh01a0:2038_3: So hi yaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ noupādā taṃ atthi sanidassanaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2038_5: evaṃ catutthena dukena saddhiṃ yojiyamāno yogaṃ na gacchati.
atk-abh01a0:2038_6: Tasmā taṃ atikkamitvā pañcamena saha yojito.
atk-abh01a0:2038_7: Evaṃ yo yena saddhiṃ yogaṃ gacchati,
atk-abh01a0:2038_8: yo ca na gacchati so veditabboti.
atk-abh01a0:2038_10: Ito pare pana pañcavidhasaṅgahādayo satta saṅgahā asammissā eva.
atk-abh01a0:2040_1: Idāni tassā atthaṃ bhājetvā dassetuṃ sabbaṃ rūpaṃ na hetumevātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2040_2: Kasmā panettha ‘katamaṃ taṃ sabbaṃ rūpaṃ na hetū’ti pucchā na katāti?
atk-abh01a0:2040_5: evamidha hetu na hetūtipi sahetukamahetukantipi bhedo natthi,
atk-abh01a0:2041_0: Tattha hetuhetu paccayahetu uttamahetu sādhāraṇahetūti catubbidho hetu.
atk-abh01a0:2041_6: cattāro mahābhūtā paccayo rūpakkhandhassa paññāpanāyā”ti ayaṃ ‘paccayahetu’ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2041_9: uttamaṃ aniṭṭhārammaṇaṃ akusalavipākaṭṭhāne”ti ayaṃ ‘uttamahetu’ nāma. Yathāha –
atk-abh01a0:2041_10: ‘atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṃ kammasamādānānaṃ ṭhānaso hetuso vipākaṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī’ti,
atk-abh01a0:2041_11: “eseva hetu esa paccayo saṅkhārānaṃ yadidaṃ avijjā”ti avijjā saṅkhārānaṃ sādhāraṇahetu hutvā paccayaṭṭhaṃ pharatīti ayaṃ ‘sādhāraṇahetu’ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2041_12: Yathā hi pathavīraso āporaso ca madhurassāpi amadhurassāpi paccayo,
atk-abh01a0:2041_13: evaṃ avijjā kusalasaṅkhārānampi akusalasaṅkhārānampi sādhāraṇapaccayo hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2041_15: Iti ‘hetū dhammā na hetū dhammā’ti mātikāya āgataṃ hetubhāvaṃ rūpassa niyametvā paṭikkhipanto ‘na hetumevā’ti āha.
atk-abh01a0:2041_16: Iminā nayena sabbapadesu paṭikkhepaniddeso ca appaṭikkhepaniddeso ca veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:2042_0: Sappaccayamevāti ettha pana kammasamuṭṭhānaṃ kammapaccayameva hoti,
atk-abh01a0:2042_1: āhārasamuṭṭhānādīni āhārādipaccayānevāti evaṃ rūpasseva vuttacatupaccayavasena attho veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:2042_2: Rūpamevāti ‘rūpino dhammā arūpino dhammā’ti mātikāya vuttaṃ arūpībhāvaṃ paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh01a0:2042_3: Uppannaṃ chahi viññāṇehīti paccuppannarūpameva cakkhuviññāṇādīhi chahi veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2042_7: Taṃ imasmiṃ pañcaviññāṇasote patitattā sotapatitameva hutvā gataṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2042_10: Yasmā vā rūpakāye jarā pākaṭā hoti,
atk-abh01a0:2043_3: sadisohamasmīti vidhā”tiādīsu hi māno vidhā nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2043_7: “Ekavidhena ñāṇavatthuṃ duvidhena ñāṇavatthū”tiādīsu koṭṭhāso vidhā nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2044_2: sabbe brāhmaṇā sabbe vessā sabbe suddā āgacchantu”,
atk-abh01a0:2044_7: ime dhammā sīlakkhandhe saṅgahitā”ti ayaṃ ‘sajātisaṅgaho’ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2044_8: ‘Ekajātikā āgacchantū’ti vuttaṭṭhāne viya hi idha sabbe jātiyā ekasaṅgahaṃ gatā.
atk-abh01a0:2044_16: ime dhammā samādhikkhandhe saṅgahitā”ti ayaṃ ‘sañjātisaṅgaho’ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2044_17: Ekaṭṭhāne jātā saṃvuddhā āgacchantūti vuttaṭṭhāne viya hi idha sabbe sañjātiṭṭhānena nivutthokāsena ekasaṅgahaṃ gatā.
atk-abh01a0:2044_24: ime dhammā paññākkhandhe saṅgahitā”ti ayaṃ ‘kiriyāsaṅgaho’ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2044_25: Sabbeva hete attano kiriyākaraṇena ekasaṅgahaṃ gatā.
atk-abh01a0:2047_2: atthi rūpaṃ noupādā’ti evaṃ bhedasabbhāvato pucchāpubbaṅgamaṃ padabhājanaṃ dassento katamaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ upādātiādimāha.
atk-abh01a0:2048_1: Evaṃ tevīsatividhaṃ upādārūpaṃ saṅkhepato uddisitvā puna tadeva vitthārato niddisanto katamaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ cakkhāyatanantiādimāha.
atk-abh01a0:2048_4: Etesu ‘buddhacakkhu samantacakkhu ñāṇacakkhu dibbacakkhu dhammacakkhū’ti pañcavidhaṃ paññācakkhu.
atk-abh01a0:2048_10: “Cakkhuṃ udapādi ñāṇaṃ udapādī”ti idaṃ ñāṇacakkhu nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2048_13: dibbena cakkhunā visuddhenā”ti idaṃ dibbacakkhu nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2048_14: “Tasmiṃ yevāsane virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādī”ti idaṃ heṭṭhimamaggattayasaṅkhātaṃ ñāṇaṃ dhammacakkhu nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2049_1: Tattha yoyaṃ akkhikūpake patiṭṭhito heṭṭhā akkhikūpakaṭṭhikena,
atk-abh01a0:2049_11: taṃsannissitavaṇṇagandharasaojāsaṇṭhānasambhavā cā’ti imāni dasa catusamuṭṭhānikattā cattālīsaṃ honti.
atk-abh01a0:2049_12: Jīvitaṃ bhāvo kāyapasādo cakkhupasādoti cattāri ekantakammasamuṭṭhānānevāti imesaṃ catucattālīsāya rūpānaṃ vasena catucattālīsasambhāro.
atk-abh01a0:2049_13: Yaṃ loko setaṃ cakkhuṃ puthulaṃ visaṭaṃ vitthiṇṇaṃ ‘cakkhu’nti sañjānanto na cakkhuṃ sañjānāti,
atk-abh01a0:2050_0: Yo panettha sito ettha paṭibaddho catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya pasādo,
atk-abh01a0:2050_2: Tadetaṃ tassa sasambhāracakkhuno setamaṇḍalaparikkhittassa kaṇhamaṇḍalassa majjhe,
atk-abh01a0:2053_1: Yaṃ cakkhu catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya pasādoti idhāpi upayogattheyeva sāmivacanaṃ;
atk-abh01a0:2053_5: Yaṃ pana indriyagocarasutte “ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ upādāya pasādo pathavīdhātuyā tīhi mahābhūtehi saṅgahito
atk-abh01a0:2053_6: āpodhātuyā ca tejodhātuyā ca vāyodhātuyā ca,” catuparivattasutte “dvinnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya pasādo
atk-abh01a0:2053_7: pathavīdhātuyā ca āpodhātuyā ca dvīhi mahābhūtehi saṅgahito tejodhātuyā ca vāyodhātuyā cā”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2053_10: Yo ca catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya pasādo so tesu ekekassāpi dinnaṃ dvinnampi pasādoyevāti iminā pariyāyena tattha desanā āgatā.
atk-abh01a0:2053_12: Tasmā idha ‘catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya pasādo’ti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2054_0: ‘Ayaṃ me attā’ti bālajanena pariggahitattā attabhāvo vuccati sarīrampi khandhapañcakampi.
atk-abh01a0:2054_1: Tasmiṃ pariyāpanno tannissitoti attabhāvapariyāpanno cakkhuviññāṇena passituṃ na sakkāti anidassano.
atk-abh01a0:2055_1: yena karaṇabhūtena cakkhunā ayaṃ satto idaṃ vuttappakāraṃ rūpaṃ atīte passi vā,
atk-abh01a0:2055_6: atītaṃ vā rūpaṃ atītena cakkhunā passi,
atk-abh01a0:2055_9: sace taṃ rūpaṃ cakkhussa āpāthaṃ āgaccheyya cakkhunā taṃ rūpaṃ passeyyāti idamettha parikappavacanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2056_0: Ettāvatā ‘passi vā’tiādīhi catūhi padehi cakkhuṃpetantiādīni cuddasa nāmāni yojetvā cakkhāyatanassa cattāro vavatthāpananayā vuttāti veditabbā. Kathaṃ?
atk-abh01a0:2056_1: Ettha hi yena cakkhunā anidassanena sappaṭighena rūpaṃ sanidassanaṃ sappaṭighaṃ passi vā cakkhuṃpetaṃ…pe…
atk-abh01a0:2056_3: idaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ cakkhāyatananti ayameko nayo.
atk-abh01a0:2057_1: Idāni yasmā vijjuniccharaṇādikālesu anoloketukāmassāpi rūpaṃ cakkhupasādaṃ ghaṭṭeti,
atk-abh01a0:2057_2: tasmā taṃ ākāraṃ dassetuṃ dutiyo niddesavāro āraddho.
atk-abh01a0:2057_3: Tattha yamhi cakkhumhīti yamhi adhikaraṇabhūte cakkhumhi.
atk-abh01a0:2057_9: Atītañhi rūpaṃ atīte cakkhusmiṃ paṭihaññi nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2057_12: Sace taṃ rūpaṃ cakkhussa āpāthaṃ āgaccheyya,
atk-abh01a0:2057_13: cakkhumhi paṭihaññeyya taṃ rūpanti ayamettha parikappo.
atk-abh01a0:2057_14: Atthato pana pasādaṃ ghaṭṭayamānameva rūpaṃ paṭihaññati nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2058_1: Idāni yasmā attano icchāya oloketukāmassa rūpe cakkhuṃ upasaṃharato cakkhu rūpasmiṃ paṭihaññati,
atk-abh01a0:2058_2: tasmā taṃ ākāraṃ dassetuṃ tatiyo niddesavāro āraddho.
atk-abh01a0:2058_4: Ettha pana cakkhu ārammaṇaṃ sampaṭicchamānameva rūpamhi paṭihaññati nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2059_6: Rūpaṃ ārabbhāti rūpārammaṇaṃ āgamma, sandhāya, paṭicca.
atk-abh01a0:2059_7: Iminā cakkhupasādavatthukānaṃ phassādīnaṃ purejātapaccayena cakkhudvārajavanavīthipariyāpannānaṃ ārammaṇādhipatiārammaṇūpanissayapaccayehi
atk-abh01a0:2059_9: Itaresu pañcasu vāresu rūpaṃ ārammaṇamassāti rūpārammaṇoti evaṃ ārammaṇapaccayamatteneva paccayabhāvo dassito.
atk-abh01a0:2059_11: evaṃ imesupi dasasu vāresu cattāro cattāro vavatthāpananayā veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:2059_12: Evaṃ katamaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ cakkhāyatananti pucchāya uddhaṭaṃ cakkhuṃ ‘idaṃ ta’nti nānappakārato dassetuṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2059_16: Ekekasmiñcettha catunnaṃ catunnaṃ vavatthāpananayānaṃ āgatattā dvipaññāsāya nayehi paṭimaṇḍetvāva dassitāti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:2060_4: Taṃ sasambhārasotabilassa anto tanutambalomācite aṅgulivedhakasaṇṭhāne padese vuttappakārāhi dhātūhi katūpakāraṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2060_7: vaṇṇādīhi parivutaṃ sotaviññāṇādīnaṃ yathārahaṃ vatthudvārabhāvaṃ sādhayamānaṃ tiṭṭhati.
atk-abh01a0:2061_2: hutvā ghānaviññāṇādīnaṃ yathārahaṃ vatthudvārabhāvaṃ sādhayamānaṃ tiṭṭhati.
atk-abh01a0:2062_2: hutvā jivhāviññāṇādīnaṃ yathārahaṃ vatthudvārabhāvaṃ sādhayamānā tiṭṭhati.
atk-abh01a0:2063_0: Yāvatā pana imasmiṃ kāye upādiṇṇakarūpaṃ nāma atthi,
atk-abh01a0:2063_3: yathāvuttappakāraupakārupatthambhanānupālanaparivārameva hutvā kāyaviññāṇādīnaṃ yathārahaṃ vatthudvārabhāvaṃ sādhayamānaṃ tiṭṭhati.
atk-abh01a0:2063_5: Seso pāḷippabhedo ca attho ca cakkhuniddese vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:2063_8: passīti ādīnaṃ ṭhāne suṇītiādipadāni ca āgatāni.
atk-abh01a0:2063_10: nayanaṃpeta’nti imassa ca padadvayassa abhāvā dvādasa dvādasa nāmāni honti.
atk-abh01a0:2064_1: yadi yāvatā imasmiṃ kāye upādiṇṇakarūpaṃ nāma atthi,
atk-abh01a0:2064_10: Vinibbhujitvā panassa nānākaraṇaṃ paññāpetuṃ na sakkā,
atk-abh01a0:2064_15: na ca paramatthato rūpe raso atthi.
atk-abh01a0:2064_17: Evaṃ kāyāyatanampi paramatthato neva sabbattha atthi,
atk-abh01a0:2070_8: Keci panettha ‘tejādīnaṃ guṇehi rūpādīhi anuggayhabhāvato’ti kāraṇaṃ vadanti.
atk-abh01a0:2070_13: ayaṃ imassa guṇo’ti na labbhā vattuṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2070_15: ‘yathā tesu tesu sambhāresu tassa tassa bhūtassa adhikatāya pathavīādīnaṃ sandhāraṇādīni kiccāni icchatha,
atk-abh01a0:2070_16: evaṃ tejādiadhikesu sambhāresu rūpādīnaṃ adhikabhāvadassanato icchitabbametaṃ rūpādayo tesaṃ guṇā’ti.
atk-abh01a0:2070_19: yadi āpādhikassa āsavassa gandhato pathavīadhike kappāse gandho adhikataro siyā,
atk-abh01a0:2070_20: tejādhikassa ca uṇhodakassa vaṇṇatopi sītūdakassa vaṇṇo parihāyetha.
atk-abh01a0:2070_23: yathā avisesepi ekakalāpe bhūtānaṃ rūparasādayo aññamaññaṃ visadisā honti,
atk-abh01a0:2071_0: Kiṃ pana taṃ yaṃ aññamaññassa asādhāraṇaṃ?
atk-abh01a0:2071_7: Evaṃ kammevisasato visesavantesu ca etesu cakkhusotāni asampattavisayaggāhakāni attano nissayaṃ anallīnanissaye eva visaye viññāṇahetuttā.
atk-abh01a0:2071_9: nissayavasena ceva sayañca attano nissayaṃ allīneyeva visaye viññāṇahetuttā.
atk-abh01a0:2072_1: Candamaṇḍalasūriyamaṇḍalānañhi dvācattālīsayojanasahassamatthake ṭhitānaṃ vaṇṇo cakkhupasādaṃ ghaṭṭeti.
atk-abh01a0:2072_2: So dūre ṭhatvā paññāyamānopi sampattoyeva nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2072_5: rajakānañca vatthaṃ dhovantānaṃ dūratova kāyavikāro paññāyati.
atk-abh01a0:2072_6: Saddo pana dhātuparamparāya āgantvā sotaṃ ghaṭṭetvā saṇikaṃ vavatthānaṃ gacchatī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2073_0: Tattha kiñcāpi āpāthagatattā ārammaṇaṃ sampattanti vuttaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2073_1: candamaṇḍalādivaṇṇo pana cakkhuṃ asampatto dūre ṭhitova paññāyati.
atk-abh01a0:2073_4: paramparaghaṭṭanāya ca āgantvā sotaṃ ghaṭṭento asukadisāya nāmāti na paññāyeyya.
atk-abh01a0:2074_1: Yathā hi ahi nāma bahi sittasammaṭṭhaṭṭhāne nābhiramati,
atk-abh01a0:2074_4: evameva cakkhupetaṃ visamajjhāsayaṃ maṭṭhesu suvaṇṇabhittiādīsu nābhiramati,
atk-abh01a0:2074_7: Tādisesu hi ṭhānesu cakkhumhi appahonte mukhampi vivaritvā oloketukāmā honti.
atk-abh01a0:2075_0: Susumāropi bahi nikkhanto gahetabbaṃ na passati,
atk-abh01a0:2075_2: Yadā pana byāmasatamattaṃ udakaṃ ogāhitvā bilaṃ pavisitvā nipanno hoti,
atk-abh01a0:2075_3: tadā tassa cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti sukhaṃ supati,
atk-abh01a0:2075_4: evameva sotaṃ tampe bilajjhāsayaṃ ākāsasannissitaṃ kaṇṇacchiddakūpakeyeva ajjhāsayaṃ karoti.
atk-abh01a0:2075_7: Antoleṇasmiñhi sajjhāye kariyamāne na leṇacchadanaṃ bhinditvā saddo bahi nikkhamati,
atk-abh01a0:2075_8: dvāravātapānacchiddehi pana nikkhamitvā dhātuparamparāyeva ghaṭṭento gantvā sotapasādaṃ ghaṭṭeti.
atk-abh01a0:2075_9: Atha tasmiṃ kāle ‘asuko nāma sajjhāyatī’ti leṇapiṭṭhe nisinnā jānanti.
atk-abh01a0:2076_4: dūre bherīādīsu vajjamānesu dūre saddoti jānanaṃ na bhaveyyā’ti?
atk-abh01a0:2076_6: Sotapasādasmiñhi ghaṭṭite dūre saddo āsanne saddo,
atk-abh01a0:2076_7: paratīre orimatīreti tathā tathā jānanākāro hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2076_10: Yato yato chiddaṃ tato tato savanaṃ hoti,
atk-abh01a0:2077_0: Pakkhīpi rukkhe vā bhūmiyaṃ vā na ramati.
atk-abh01a0:2077_1: Yadā pana ekaṃ vā dve vā leḍḍupāte atikkamma ajaṭākāsaṃ pakkhando hoti,
atk-abh01a0:2077_4: Tathā hi gāvo navavuṭṭhe deve bhūmiyaṃ ghāyitvā ghāyitvā ākāsābhimukhā hutvā vātaṃ ākaḍḍhanti.
atk-abh01a0:2077_5: Aṅgulīhi gandhapiṇḍaṃ gahetvāpi ca upasiṅghanakāle vātaṃ anākaḍḍhanto neva tassa gandhaṃ jānāti.
atk-abh01a0:2078_0: Kukkuropi bahi vicaranto khemaṭṭhānaṃ na passati leḍḍupahārādīhi upadduto hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2078_1: Antogāmaṃ pavisitvā uddhanaṭṭhāne chārikaṃ byūhitvā nipannassa pana phāsukaṃ hoti,
atk-abh01a0:2078_3: Tathā hi tiyāmarattiṃ samaṇadhammaṃ katvāpi pātova pattacīvaramādāya gāmo pavisitabbo hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2078_4: Sukkhakhādanīyassa ca na sakkā kheḷena atemitassa rasaṃ jānituṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2079_0: Siṅgālopi bahi caranto ratiṃ na vindati,
atk-abh01a0:2079_1: āmakasusāne manussamaṃsaṃ khāditvā nipannasseva panassa phāsukaṃ hoti,
atk-abh01a0:2079_3: Tathā hi aññaṃ upādiṇṇakaṃ alabhamānā sattā attanova hatthatale sīsaṃ katvā nipajjanti.
atk-abh01a0:2079_4: Ajjhattikabāhirā cassa pathavī ārammaṇaggahaṇe paccayo hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2079_7: na sakkā anisīdantena vā anippīḷentena vā thaddhamudubhāvo jānitunti.
atk-abh01a0:2079_8: Ajjhattikabāhirāpathavī etassa kāyapasādassa phoṭṭhabbajānane paccayo hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2079_10: Aññeyeva hi cakkhupasādassa lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānagocarajjhāsayanissayā aññe sotapasādādīnanti asammissāneva cakkhāyatanādīni.
atk-abh01a0:2080_0: Apica nesaṃ asammissatāya ayaṃ upamāpi veditabbā –
atk-abh01a0:2080_1: yathā hi pañcavaṇṇānaṃ dhajānaṃ ussāpitānaṃ kiñcāpi chāyā ekābaddhā viya hoti,
atk-abh01a0:2080_2: tassa tassa pana aññamaññaṃ asammissāva yathā ca pañcavaṇṇena kappāsena vaṭṭiṃ katvā dīpe jālite kiñcāpi jālā ekābaddhā viya hoti,
atk-abh01a0:2080_3: tassa tassa pana aṃsuno pāṭiyekkā pāṭiyekkā jālā asammissā eva,
atk-abh01a0:2080_4: evameva kiñcāpi imāni pañcāyatanāni ekasmiṃ attabhāve samosaṭāni aññamaññaṃ pana asammissāneva.
atk-abh01a0:2080_7: Imasmiñhi sarīre heṭṭhimakāyo majjhimakāyo uparimakāyoti tayo koṭṭhāsā.
atk-abh01a0:2080_8: Tattha nābhito paṭṭhāya heṭṭhā heṭṭhimakāyo nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2080_14: Nābhito uddhaṃ yāva galavāṭakā majjhimakāyo nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2081_2: jīvitindriyaṃ cakkhupasādoti idaṃ ekantato avinibhuttānaṃ dasannaṃ nipphannarūpānaṃ vasena cakkhudasakaṃ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2081_4: Tesu heṭṭhimakāye rūpaṃ majjhimakāyauparimakāyarūpehi saddhiṃ asammissaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2081_6: Yathā hi sāyanhasamaye pabbatacchāyā ca rukkhacchāyā ca kiñcāpi ekābaddhā viya honti aññamaññaṃ pana
atk-abh01a0:2081_7: asammissāva evaṃ imesupi kāyesu catucattālīsa catupaññāsa caturāsīti rūpāni ca kiñcāpi ekābaddhāni viya honti,
atk-abh01a0:2082_16: parato panassa jātarūpaggahaṇena gahitattā idha sāmaṃ hari nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2082_17: Imāni satta vatthuṃ anāmasitvā sabhāveneva dassitāni.
atk-abh01a0:2083_4: So ca nesaṃ vohāro upanidhāyasiddho ceva sannivesasiddho ca.
atk-abh01a0:2083_7: Tattha rassaṃ upanidhāya tato uccataraṃ dīghaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2084_0: Tattha yasmā dīghādīni phusitvā sakkā jānituṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2084_4: Taṃ taṃ nissāya pana tathā tathā ṭhitaṃ dīghaṃ rassanti tena tena vohārena rūpāyatanamevettha bhāsitanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2084_11: Candamaṇḍalassa vaṇṇanibhātiādīhi tesaṃ tesaṃ pabhāvaṇṇā dassitā.
atk-abh01a0:2085_0: Tattha candamaṇḍalādīnaṃ vatthūnaṃ evaṃ viseso veditabbo –
atk-abh01a0:2085_1: maṇimayaṃ rajatapaṭicchannaṃ ekūnapaññāsayojanāyāmavitthāraṃ candassa devaputtassa vimānaṃ candamaṇḍalaṃ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2085_2: Sovaṇṇamayaṃ phalikapaṭicchannaṃ samapaṇṇāsayojanāyāmavitthāraṃ sūriyassa devaputtassa vimānaṃ sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2085_3: Sattaratanamayāni sattaṭṭhadasadvādasayojanāyāmavitthārāni tesaṃ tesaṃ devaputtānaṃ vimānāni tārakarūpāni nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2086_3: Candassa heṭṭhimantato sūriyassa uparimanto yojanasataṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2086_8: Kālena candimasūriyānaṃ purato honti kālena pacchā.
atk-abh01a0:2087_10: ye ‘vohāraṃ gacchantī’ti vuttaṃ taṃ sabbampi idha gahitaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2088_0: Yaṃ vā panaññampīti iminā pāḷiāgataṃ ṭhapetvā sesaṃ taṭṭikapilotikakaṇṇikavaṇṇādibhedaṃ rūpaṃ gahitaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2089_0: Evametaṃ nīlādinā bhedena bhinnampi rūpaṃ sabbaṃ lakkhaṇādīhi abhinnameva.
atk-abh01a0:2089_6: Yattha pana viseso atthi tattha vakkhāma.
atk-abh01a0:2089_8: Kevalañhi tattha cakkhupubbaṅgamo niddeso idha rūpapubbaṅgamo.
atk-abh01a0:2089_12: Yathā hi catūhi catūhi nayehi paṭimaṇḍetvā cakkhuṃ vavatthāpetuṃ terasa vārā vuttā,
atk-abh01a0:2090_10: Udakassa sandamānassa vā paṭihatassa vā saddo udakasaddo.
atk-abh01a0:2090_14: Evaṃ santepi vaṃsaphālanapilotikaphālanādīsu pavatto pāḷiyaṃ anāgatasaddo yevāpanakaṭṭhānaṃ paviṭṭhoti veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:2091_0: Evamayaṃ bherīsaddādinā bhedena bhinnopi saddo lakkhaṇādīhi abhinnoyeva.
atk-abh01a0:2091_1: Sabbopi hesa sotapaṭihananalakkhaṇo saddo sotaviññāṇassa visayabhāvaraso,
atk-abh01a0:2091_4: Idhāpi hi catūhi catūhi nayehi paṭimaṇḍitā terasa vārā vuttā.
atk-abh01a0:2091_5: Tesaṃ attho sakkā vuttanayeneva jānitunti na vitthārito.
atk-abh01a0:2092_1: Gandhāyatananiddese mūlagandhoti yaṃ kiñci mūlaṃ paṭicca nibbatto gandho.
atk-abh01a0:2092_8: Evaṃ santepi kaṇṇakagandhapilotikagandhādayo pāḷiyaṃ anāgatā sabbepi gandhā yevāpanakaṭṭhānaṃ paviṭṭhāti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:2093_0: Evamayaṃ mūlagandhādinā bhedena bhinnopi gandho lakkhaṇādīhi abhinnoyeva.
atk-abh01a0:2093_5: Idhāpi hi tatheva dvipaññāsanayapaṭimaṇḍitā terasa vārā vuttā.
atk-abh01a0:2094_1: Rasāyatananiddese mūlarasoti yaṃkiñci mūlaṃ paṭicca nibbattaraso.
atk-abh01a0:2094_5: Madhu pana kasāvayuttaṃ ciranikkhittaṃ kasāvaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2094_7: Sappi pana ciranikkhittaṃ vaṇṇagandhe jahantampi rasaṃ na jahatīti tadeva ekantamadhuraṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2094_15: Taṃtaṃvatthuto panettha rasova ambilādīhi nāmehi vuttoti veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:2094_19: Evaṃ santepi leḍḍurasabhittirasapilotikarasādayo pāḷiyaṃ anāgatā sabbepi rasā yevāpanakaṭṭhānaṃ paviṭṭhāti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:2095_0: Evamayaṃ mūlarasādinābhedena bhinnopi raso lakkhaṇādīhi abhinnoyeva.
atk-abh01a0:2095_5: Idhāpi hi tatheva dvipaññāsanayapaṭimaṇḍitā terasa vārā vuttā.
atk-abh01a0:2096_2: Yena kāraṇena itthiyā itthiliṅgādīni hontīti ayamettha attho.
atk-abh01a0:2096_4: Itthiyā hi hatthapādagīvāurādīnaṃ saṇṭhānaṃ na purisassa viya hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2096_19: tiṭṭhamānā nipajjamānā nisīdamānā khādamānā bhuñjamānā avisadā bhuñjanti.
atk-abh01a0:2096_20: Purisampi hi avisadaṃ disvā mātugāmo viya gacchati tiṭṭhati nipajjati nisīdati khādati bhuñjatīti vadanti.
atk-abh01a0:2097_3: Itthiliṅgādīni pana itthindriyaṃ paṭicca pavatte samuṭṭhitāni.
atk-abh01a0:2097_6: bījapaccayā rukkho vaḍḍhitvā sākhāviṭapasampanno hutvā ākāsaṃ pūretvā tiṭṭhati,
atk-abh01a0:2097_7: evameva itthibhāvasaṅkhāte itthindriye sati itthiliṅgādīni honti.
atk-abh01a0:2097_9: bījaṃ paṭicca vaḍḍhitvā ākāsaṃ pūretvā ṭhitarukkho viya itthindriyaṃ paṭicca itthiliṅgādīni pavatte samuṭṭhahanti.
atk-abh01a0:2098_0: Idaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ itthindriyanti idaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2098_1: yathā cakkhundriyādīni purisassāpi honti, na evaṃ;
atk-abh01a0:2099_3: Purisassa hi hatthapādagīvāurādīnaṃ saṇṭhānaṃ na itthiyā viya hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2099_4: Purisānañhi uparimakāyo visado hoti heṭṭhimakāyo avisado,
atk-abh01a0:2099_13: Itthimpi gamanādīni visadāni kurumānaṃ disvā ‘puriso viya gacchatī’tiādīni vadanti.
atk-abh01a0:2102_0: “Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno itthiliṅgaṃ pātubhūtaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2102_1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarissā bhikkhuniyā purisaliṅgaṃ pātubhūtaṃ hotī”ti.
atk-abh01a0:2104_0: Ubhatobyañjanakassa pana kiṃ ekaṃ indriyaṃ udāhu dveti? Ekaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2104_8: Itthiubhatobyañjanakassa hi yadā itthiyā rāgacittaṃ uppajjati,
atk-abh01a0:2105_0: Yadi ca tesaṃ indriyaṃ dutiyabyañjanakāraṇaṃ bhaveyya,
atk-abh01a0:2105_3: Tasmā veditabbametaṃ na tassa taṃ byañjanakāraṇaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2106_1: Jīvitindriyaniddese yaṃ vattabbaṃ taṃ heṭṭhā arūpajīvitindriye vuttameva.
atk-abh01a0:2106_2: Kevalañhi tattha yo tesaṃ arūpīnaṃ dhammānanti vuttaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2106_3: idha rūpajīvitindriyattā yo tesaṃ rūpīnaṃ dhammānanti ayameva viseso.
atk-abh01a0:2107_1: Kāyaviññattiniddese kāyaviññattīti ettha tāva kāyena attano bhāvaṃ viññāpentānaṃ tiracchānehipi purisānaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2107_2: purisehi vā tiracchānānampi kāyagahaṇānusārena gahitāya etāya bhāvo viññāyatīti ‘viññatti’.
atk-abh01a0:2107_4: “Kāyena saṃvaro sādhū”tiādīsu āgato copanasaṅkhāto kāyova viññatti ‘kāyaviññatti’.
atk-abh01a0:2108_0: Kusalacittassa vātiādīsu aṭṭhahi kāmāvacarehi abhiññācittena cāti navahi kusalacittehi kusalacittassa vā,
atk-abh01a0:2108_2: aṭṭhahi mahākiriyehi dvīhi ahetukakiriyehi abhiññāppattena ekena rūpāvacarakiriyenāti ekādasahi kiriyacittehi abyākatacittassa vā.
atk-abh01a0:2108_3: Ito aññāni hi cittāni viññattiṃ na janenti.
atk-abh01a0:2108_4: Sekkhāsekkhaputhujjanānaṃ pana ettakeheva cittehi viññatti hotīti etesaṃ kusalādīnaṃ vasena tīhi padehi ‘hetuto’ dassitā.
atk-abh01a0:2109_0: Idāni chahi padehi ‘phalato’ dassetuṃ abhikkamantassa vātiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2109_1: Abhikkamādayo hi viññattivasena pavattattā viññattiphalaṃ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2110_0: Idāni chahi padehi ‘sabhāvato’ dassetuṃ kāyassa thambhanāti ādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2110_9: Sesamettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ taṃ heṭṭhā dvārakathāyaṃ vuttameva.
atk-abh01a0:2111_1: Vacīviññattītipadassa pana niddesapadānañca attho tattha na vutto,
atk-abh01a0:2111_3: vācāya attano bhāvaṃ viññāpentānaṃ tiracchānehipi purisānaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2111_5: vacīgahaṇānusārena gahitāya etāya bhāvo viññāyatīti viññatti.
atk-abh01a0:2111_7: “Sādhu vācāya saṃvaro”tiādīsu āgatā copanasaṅkhātā vacī eva viññatti ‘vacīviññatti’.
atk-abh01a0:2111_8: Vacīghosena adhippāyaviññāpanahetuttā sayañca tathāviññeyyattā vācāya viññattītipi ‘vacīviññatti’.
atk-abh01a0:2111_12: Vākyañca taṃ patho ca atthaṃ ñātukāmānaṃ ñāpetukāmānañcātipi ‘byappatho’.
atk-abh01a0:2111_20: pabhedagatā vācā evā’ti ñāpanatthaṃ vācā vacībhedoti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2111_22: Idāni tāya vācāya saddhiṃ yojetvā heṭṭhā vuttatthānaṃ viññattiādīnaṃ padānaṃ vasena tīhākārehi sabhāvato
atk-abh01a0:2111_23: taṃ dassetuṃ yā tāya vācāya viññattītiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2112_0: Idāni viññattisamuṭṭhāpakacittesu asammohatthaṃ dvattiṃsa chabbīsa ekūnavīsati soḷasa pacchimānīti idaṃ pakiṇṇakaṃ veditabbaṃ –
atk-abh01a0:2112_8: Soḷasa imesu tīsu ekampi na karonti.
atk-abh01a0:2113_0: Tattha dvattiṃsāti heṭṭhā vuttāneva kāmāvacarato aṭṭha kusalāni,
atk-abh01a0:2113_19: Imāni soḷasa rūpiriyāpathaviññattīsu ekampi na karonti.
atk-abh01a0:2113_20: Aññānipi bahūni arūpe uppannāni anokāsagatattā rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpenti.
atk-abh01a0:2114_3: kasituṃ vā chindituṃ vā bhindituṃ vā na sakkāti ākāso.
atk-abh01a0:2114_12: Asamphuṭṭhaṃ catūhi mahābhūtehīti etehi asamphuṭṭhaṃ nijjaṭākāsaṃva kathitaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2114_17: yāya paricchinnesu rūpesu ‘idamito uddhaṃ adho tiriya’nti ca hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2115_1: Ito pare rūpassalahutādīnaṃ niddesā cittassalahutādīsu vuttanayeneva veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:2116_0: Etā pana tisso na aññamaññaṃ vijahanti.
atk-abh01a0:2116_1: Evaṃ santepi yo arogino viya rūpānaṃ lahubhāvo,
atk-abh01a0:2116_5: Yo suparimadditacammasseva rūpānaṃ mudubhāvo sabbakiriyāvisesesu sarasavattanabhāvo vasavattanabhāvamaddavappakāro
atk-abh01a0:2116_8: Yo pana sudhantasuvaṇṇasseva rūpānaṃ kammaññabhāvo sarīrakiriyānukūlabhāvappakāro sarīrakiriyānaṃ ananukūlakaradhātukkhobhapaṭipakkhapaccayasamuṭṭhāno,
atk-abh01a0:2117_0: Etā pana tissopi kammaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-abh01a0:2117_2: Tathā hi yogino ‘ajja amhehi bhojanasappāyaṃ laddhaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2117_3: kāyo no lahu mudu kammañño’ti vadanti.
atk-abh01a0:2117_6: kāyo no lahu mudu kammañño’ti vadantīti.
atk-abh01a0:2118_3: So rūpassa upacayoti yo āyatanānaṃ ācayo punappunaṃ nibbattamānānaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2118_6: Yo rūpassa upacayo sā rūpassa santatīti yā evaṃ upacitānaṃ rūpānaṃ vaḍḍhi,
atk-abh01a0:2118_7: tato uttaritaraṃ pavattikāle sā rūpassa santati nāma hoti;
atk-abh01a0:2118_9: Naditīre khatakūpasmiñhi udakuggamanakālo viya ācayo, nibbatti;
atk-abh01a0:2119_5: Catusantatirūpānaṃ ācayo upacayo nibbatti vaḍḍhi kathitā.
atk-abh01a0:2119_7: Ākāranānattena pana veneyyavasena ca upacayo santatīti uddesadesanaṃ katvā yasmā ettha atthato nānattaṃ natthi,
atk-abh01a0:2119_8: tasmā niddese “yo āyatanānaṃ ācayo so rūpassa upacayo,
atk-abh01a0:2119_9: yo rūpassa upacayo sā rūpassa santatī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2120_0: Yasmā ca ubhayampetaṃ jātirūpasseva adhivacanaṃ tasmā ettha ācayalakkhaṇo rūpassa upacayo,
atk-abh01a0:2121_12: Valittacatāti iminā maṃsaṃ milāpetvā tace valibhāvakaraṇakiccato dīpitā.
atk-abh01a0:2121_14: Tehi imesaṃ vikārānaṃ dassanavasena pākaṭībhūtā pākaṭajarā dassitā.
atk-abh01a0:2121_15: Yatheva hi udakassa vā aggino vā tiṇarukkhādīnaṃ saṃbhaggapalibhaggatāya vā jhāmatāya vā gatamaggo pākaṭo hoti,
atk-abh01a0:2121_16: na ca so gatamaggo tāneva udakādīni,
atk-abh01a0:2121_17: evameva jarāya dantādīsu khaṇḍiccādivasena gatamaggo pākaṭo,
atk-abh01a0:2122_0: Āyuno saṃhāni indriyānaṃ paripākoti imehi pana padehi kālātikkameyeva abhibyattāya āyukkhayacakkhādiindriyaparipākasaññitāya pakatiyā dīpitā.
atk-abh01a0:2122_2: Tattha yasmā jaraṃ pattassa āyu hāyati,
atk-abh01a0:2122_5: sukhumampi attano visayaṃ sukheneva gaṇhanasamatthāni cakkhādīni indriyāni jaraṃ pattassa paripakkāni āluḷitāni avisadāni,
atk-abh01a0:2122_6: oḷārikampi attano visayaṃ gahetuṃ asamatthāni honti,
atk-abh01a0:2123_0: Sā panāyaṃ evaṃ niddiṭṭhā sabbāpi jarā pākaṭā paṭicchannāti duvidhā hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2123_1: Tattha dantādīsu khaṇḍabhāvādidassanato rūpadhammesu jarā pākaṭajarā nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2123_2: Arūpadhammesu pana jarā tādisassa vikārassa adassanato paṭicchannajarā nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2123_3: Puna avīci savīcīti evampi duvidhā hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2123_7: antarantarā vaṇṇavisesādīnaṃ duviññeyyattā jarā avīcijarā nāma;
atk-abh01a0:2123_9: Tato aññesu pana yathāvuttesu antarantarā vaṇṇavisesādīnaṃ suviññeyyattā jarā savīcijarā nāmāti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:2125_4: yasmā taṃ patvā rūpaṃ khīyati, veti,
atk-abh01a0:2125_18: Tasmā pañcannampi khandhānaṃ aniccatāya idameva lakkhaṇanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2126_2: Ime tayo dhammā imesaṃ sattānaṃ ukkhittāsikapaccāmittasadisā.
atk-abh01a0:2126_3: Yathā hi purisassa tayo paccāmittā otāraṃ gavesamānā vicareyyuṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2126_6: Dutiyo ‘aṭavigatakāle pothetvā pathaviyaṃ pātanaṃ mayhaṃ bhāro’ti.
atk-abh01a0:2126_7: Tatiyo ‘pathavigatakālato paṭṭhāya asinā sīsacchedanaṃ mayhaṃ bhāro’ti.
atk-abh01a0:2127_5: Evaṃ vatthuvasena nāmaṃ uddharitvā puna vatthuvasenevetaṃ pabhedato dassetuṃ odano kummāsotiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2127_6: Odanādīni hi phāṇitapariyantāni dvādasa idhādhippetassa āhārassa vatthūni.
atk-abh01a0:2128_0: Idāni tāni mūlaphalādīni kattabbato dassetuṃ yamhi yamhi janapadetiādimāha.
atk-abh01a0:2128_4: Idāni taṃ kiccavasena dassetuṃ kucchivitthambhananti āha.
atk-abh01a0:2128_5: Tañhi mūlaphalādi odanakummāsādi vā ajjhohaṭaṃ kucchiṃ vitthambheti.
atk-abh01a0:2128_7: Yāya ojāya sattā yāpentīti heṭṭhā sabbapadehi savatthukaṃ āhāraṃ dassetvā idāni nibbaṭṭitaojameva dassetuṃ idaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2129_3: Vatthuhi parissayaṃ harati pāletuṃ na sakkoti,
