atk-abh01a0:2129_4: ojā pāleti parissayaṃ harituṃ na sakkoti.
atk-abh01a0:2129_5: Dvepi ekato hutvā pāletumpi sakkonti parissayampi harituṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2130_0: Yathā hi chāyārakkhaso chāyaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ gahetvā devasaṅkhalikāya bandhitvā attano bhavane modanto chātakāle āgantvā sīse ḍaṃsati.
atk-abh01a0:2130_2: Taṃ viravaṃ sutvā ‘dukkhappatto ettha atthī’ti tato tato manussā āgacchanti.
atk-abh01a0:2130_3: So āgatāgate gahetvā khāditvā bhavane modati.
atk-abh01a0:2130_8: otaritvā sīse ḍaṃsanaṃ viya kammajatejassa vatthuto muttassa udarapaṭalaggahaṇaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2130_10: tāya saññāya āgatāgate gahetvā khāditvā bhavane modanakālo viya kammajatejena udarapaṭalaṃ muñcitvā vatthusmiṃ gahite ekaggacittatā.
atk-abh01a0:2131_0: Tattha oḷārike vatthusmiṃ ojā mandā hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2131_2: Kudrūsakabhattādīni hi bhuñjitvā muhutteneva chāto hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2131_3: Sappiādīni pivitvā ṭhitassa divasampi bhattaṃ na ruccati.
atk-abh01a0:2131_5: Kumbhīlānañhi āhāraṃ upādāya morānaṃ āhāro sukhumo.
atk-abh01a0:2131_9: Morānaṃ pana āhāraṃ upādāya taracchānaṃ āhāro sukhumo.
atk-abh01a0:2131_10: Te kira tivassachaḍḍitāni visāṇāni ceva aṭṭhīni ca khādanti.
atk-abh01a0:2131_11: Tāni ca nesaṃ kheḷena temitamattāneva kandamūlaṃ viya mudukāni honti.
atk-abh01a0:2134_4: Āpo ca taṃ nissattasuññatasabhāvaṭṭhena dhātu cāti āpodhātu.
atk-abh01a0:2134_5: Idāni yasmā tīṇi rūpāni phusitvā jānitabbāni tasmā tāni bhājetvā dassetuṃ katamaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ?
atk-abh01a0:2135_9: Ettha ca ‘kakkhaḷaṃ mudukaṃ saṇhaṃ pharusaṃ garukaṃ lahuka’nti padehi pathavīdhātu eva bhājitā.
atk-abh01a0:2135_10: “Yadāyaṃ kāyo āyusahagato ca hoti usmāsahagato ca viññāṇasahagato ca tadā lahutaro ca hoti mudutaro ca
atk-abh01a0:2135_11: kammaññataro cā”ti suttepi lahumudubhūtaṃ pathavīdhātumeva sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2136_0: ‘Sukhasamphassaṃ dukkhasamphassa’nti padadvayena pana tīṇipi mahābhūtāni bhājitāni.
atk-abh01a0:2136_3: Tattha sukhasamphassā pathavīdhātu mudutaluṇahatthe dahare pāde sambāhante assādetvā assādetvā ‘sambāha tāta,
atk-abh01a0:2136_5: Sukhasamphassā tejodhātu sītasamaye aṅgārakapallaṃ āharitvā gattaṃ sedente assādetvā assādetvā ‘sedehi tāta,
atk-abh01a0:2136_7: Sukhasamphassā vāyodhātu uṇhasamaye vattasampanne dahare bījanena bījante assādetvā assādetvā ‘bīja tāta,
atk-abh01a0:2136_9: Thaddhahatthe pana dahare pāde sambāhante aṭṭhīnaṃ bhijjanakālo viya hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2136_11: Uṇhasamaye aṅgārakapalle ābhate ‘apanehi na’nti vattabbaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2137_0: Yaṃ phoṭṭhabbaṃ anidassanaṃ sappaṭighantiādinā nayena vuttā pana catūhi catūhi nayehi paṭimaṇḍitā terasa
atk-abh01a0:2138_0: Kiṃ panetāni tīṇi mahābhūtāni ekappahāreneva āpāthaṃ āgacchanti udāhu noti?
atk-abh01a0:2138_2: Evaṃ āgatāni kāyapasādaṃ ghaṭṭenti na ghaṭṭentīti?
atk-abh01a0:2138_4: Ekappahāreneva tāni ārammaṇaṃ katvā kāyaviññāṇaṃ uppajjati nuppajjatīti?
atk-abh01a0:2138_6: Ābhujitavasena vā hi ussadavasena vā ārammaṇakaraṇaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2139_1: pattasmiñhi odanena pūretvā ābhate ekaṃ sitthaṃ gahetvā thaddhaṃ vā mudukaṃ vāti vīmaṃsanto kiñcāpi tattha tejopi atthi vāyopi atthi,
atk-abh01a0:2139_3: Uṇhodake hatthaṃ otāretvā vīmaṃsanto kiñcāpi tattha pathavīpi atthi vāyopi atthi,
atk-abh01a0:2139_5: Uṇhasamaye vātapānaṃ vivaritvā vātena sarīraṃ paharāpento ṭhito mandamande vāte paharante kiñcāpi tattha pathavīpi atthi tejopi atthi,
atk-abh01a0:2140_0: Yo pana upakkhalati vā sīsena vā rukkhaṃ paharati bhuñjanto vā sakkharaṃ ḍaṃsati,
atk-abh01a0:2140_1: so kiñcāpi tattha tejopi atthi vāyopi atthi,
atk-abh01a0:2140_3: Aggiṃ akkamantopi kiñcāpi tattha pathavīpi atthi vāyopi atthi,
atk-abh01a0:2140_6: Kiñcāpi tattha pathavīpi atthi tejopi atthi,
atk-abh01a0:2141_0: Yaṃkiñci dhātuṃ ārammaṇaṃ karontassa kāyaviññāṇampi ekappahārena nuppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:2141_2: Yasmiṃ yasmiṃ pana ṭhāne kāyapasādo ussanno hoti,
atk-abh01a0:2141_4: Yattha yatthāpi paṭighaṭṭananighaṃso balavā hoti tattha tattha paṭhamaṃ uppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:2141_5: Kukkuṭapattena vaṇe dhoviyamāne aṃsuaṃsu kāyapasādaṃ ghaṭṭeti.
atk-abh01a0:2141_6: Yattha yattha pana pasādo ussanno hoti,
atk-abh01a0:2142_0: Kathaṃ pana cittassa ārammaṇato saṅkanti hotīti?
atk-abh01a0:2142_3: Vihārapūjādīsu hi ‘tāni tāni cetiyāni ceva paṭimāyo ca vandissāmi,
atk-abh01a0:2142_4: potthakammacittakammāni ca olokessāmī’ti ajjhāsayena gato ekaṃ vanditvā vā passitvā vā itarassa vandanatthāya
atk-abh01a0:2142_5: vā dassanatthāya vā manaṃ katvā vanditumpi passitumpi gacchatiyeva,
atk-abh01a0:2143_0: Kelāsakūṭapaṭibhāgaṃ pana mahācetiyaṃ olokento ṭhitopi aparabhāge sabbatūriyesu paggahitesu rūpārammaṇaṃ vissajjetvā saddārammaṇaṃ saṅkamati.
atk-abh01a0:2143_1: Manuññagandhesu pupphesu vā gandhesu vā ābhatesu saddārammaṇaṃ vissajjetvā gandhārammaṇaṃ saṅkamati.
atk-abh01a0:2144_6: Ayopiṇḍiādīni hi āpodhātu ābandhitvā baddhāni karoti.
atk-abh01a0:2144_7: Tāya ābaddhattā tāni baddhāni nāma honti.
atk-abh01a0:2144_9: Sabbāni hetāni āpodhātu eva ābandhitvā baddhāni karoti.
atk-abh01a0:2145_0: Kiṃ pana pathavīdhātu sesadhātūnaṃ patiṭṭhā hoti na hotīti hoti phusitvā hoti udāhu aphusitvā?
atk-abh01a0:2145_1: Āpodhātu vā sesā ābandhamānā phusitvā ābandhati udāhu aphusitvāti?
atk-abh01a0:2145_2: Pathavīdhātu tāva āpodhātuyā aphusitvāva patiṭṭhā hoti,
atk-abh01a0:2145_4: Āpodhātu pana pathavīdhātumpi tejovāyodhātuyopi aphusitvāva ābandhati.
atk-abh01a0:2145_5: Yadi phusitvā ābandheyya phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ nāma bhaveyya.
atk-abh01a0:2146_2: Sā pana na uṇhā hutvā jhāyati.
atk-abh01a0:2146_3: Yadi uṇhā hutvā jhāyeyya uṇhattalakkhaṇā nāma bhaveyya.
atk-abh01a0:2146_5: Sāpi tapamānā na uṇhā hutvā tapati.
atk-abh01a0:2146_6: Yadi uṇhā hutvā tapeyya uṇhattalakkhaṇā nāma bhaveyya.
atk-abh01a0:2146_8: Sāpi tapamānā na uṇhā hutvā tapati.
atk-abh01a0:2146_9: Yadi uṇhā hutvā tapeyya uṇhattalakkhaṇā nāma bhaveyya.
atk-abh01a0:2146_11: tathā tejodhātuṃ āpodhātuṃ pana aphusitvāva vitthambheti.
atk-abh01a0:2147_0: Ucchurasaṃ pacitvā phāṇitapiṇḍe kariyamāne āpodhātu thaddhā hoti na hotīti? Na hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2148_4: na tveva buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgatassa ariyasāvakassa siyā aññathatta”nti.
atk-abh01a0:2149_1: kakkhaḷattalakkhaṇā pathavīdhātu parivattitvā paggharaṇalakkhaṇā āpodhātu nāma bhaveyya,
atk-abh01a0:2150_1: Ito paresu upādiṇṇarūpādiniddesesu upādiṇṇapadādīnaṃ attho mātikākathāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:2151_1: Yasmā pana rūpāyatanādīni upādiṇṇānipi atthi anupādiṇṇānipi,
atk-abh01a0:2151_2: tasmā tāni yaṃ vā panāti saṅkhepato dassetvā puna kammassa katattā rūpāyatanantiādinā nayena vitthāritāni.
atk-abh01a0:2152_0: Kasmā pana ‘kammassa katattā’ti ca ‘na kammassa katattā’ti ca ubhinnampi niddese ‘jaratā ca aniccatā ca’ na gahitā,
atk-abh01a0:2152_2: Na kammassa katattāti ettha tāva kammato aññapaccayasamuṭṭhānaṃ saṅgahitaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2152_4: Imāni ca dve rūpāni neva kammato na aññasmā rūpajanakapaccayā uppajjanti,
atk-abh01a0:2152_6: Sā ca nesaṃ anuppatti parato āvi bhavissati.
atk-abh01a0:2152_7: Anupādiṇṇantiādīsu pana kevalaṃ anupādiṇṇādiggahaṇena kammādisamuṭṭhānatā paṭikkhittā,
atk-abh01a0:2153_1: Cittasamuṭṭhānaniddese kāyaviññatti vacīviññattīti idaṃ dvayaṃ yasmā ekantacittasamuṭṭhānāni bhūtāni upādāya paññāyati,
atk-abh01a0:2153_3: Paramatthato pana tassa nissayabhūtāni bhūtāneva cittasamuṭṭhānāni,
atk-abh01a0:2153_5: Yathā aniccassa rūpassa jarāmaraṇaṃ aniccaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-abh01a0:2154_2: Yāva cittaṃ tāva paññāyanato idameva dvayaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2154_3: Na panetaṃ cittena saha bhūtāni viya,
atk-abh01a0:2155_2: Yāva cittaṃ tāva paññāyanato eva hetaṃ dvayaṃ cittānuparivattīti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2157_1: Dūreti ghaṭṭanavasena aggahetabbattā dubbiññeyyabhāvena samīpe ṭhitampi dūre.
atk-abh01a0:2157_2: Itaraṃ pana ghaṭṭanavasena gahetabbattā suviññeyyabhāvena dūre ṭhitampi santike.
atk-abh01a0:2159_1: Catubbidhasaṅgahāvasāne diṭṭhādīnaṃ pacchimapadassa bhedābhāvena ādito paṭṭhāya pucchaṃ akatvāva rūpāyatanaṃ diṭṭhaṃ saddāyatanaṃ sutantiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2159_2: Tattha rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhunā oloketvā dakkhituṃ sakkāti ‘diṭṭhaṃ’ nāma jātaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2159_3: Saddāyatanaṃ sotena sutvā jānituṃ sakkāti ‘sutaṃ’ nāma jātaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2159_4: Gandhāyatanādittayaṃ ghānajivhākāyehi patvā gahetabbato munitvā jānitabbaṭṭhena mutaṃ nāma jātaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2159_6: Sabbameva pana rūpaṃ manoviññāṇena jānitabbanti manasā viññātaṃ nāma jātaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2161_9: Sarīraṭṭhakañhi upādiṇṇaṃ vā hotu anupādiṇṇaṃ vā,
atk-abh01a0:2163_3: Thambhitattanti uppalanāḷatacādīnaṃ viya vātapuṇṇānaṃ thambhitabhāvo rūpassa.
atk-abh01a0:2165_1: Chabbidhādisaṅgahānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ osānapadassa bhedābhāvato ādito paṭṭhāya apucchitvāva niddeso kato.
atk-abh01a0:2165_4: Tividhāya manodhātuyā jānituṃ sakkāti manodhātuviññeyyaṃ sabbaṃ rūpanti ettha yasmā ekaṃ rūpampi manoviññāṇadhātuyā ajānitabbaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-abh01a0:2165_6: Sammāsambuddhena hi abhidhammaṃ patvā nayaṃ kātuṃ yuttaṭṭhāne nayo akato nāma natthi.
atk-abh01a0:2165_7: Idañca ekarūpassāpi manoviññāṇadhātuyā ajānitabbassa abhāvena nayaṃ kātuṃ yuttaṭṭhānaṃ nāma,
atk-abh01a0:2166_3: Idhāpi phoṭṭhabbārammaṇassa sukhadukkhassa sabbhāvato ayaṃ nayo dinno.
atk-abh01a0:2168_1: Navake pana indriyarūpassa nāma atthitāya nayo dinno.
atk-abh01a0:2168_4: Tesaṃ niddesavārā heṭṭhā vuttanayena vitthārato veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:2170_0: Imesu pana rūpesu asammohatthaṃ samodhānaṃ samuṭṭhānaṃ parinipphannañca saṅkhatanti idaṃ ‘pakiṇṇakaṃ’ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2171_0: Tattha ‘samodhāna’nti sabbameva hidaṃ rūpaṃ samodhānato cakkhāyatanaṃ…pe…
atk-abh01a0:2171_7: natthi nīvaraṇā tavā”tiādīni vatvā middharūpaṃ nāma natthīti paṭisedhetabbā.
atk-abh01a0:2171_12: Tepi tesaṃ visuṃ abhāvaṃ dassetvā paṭikkhipitabbā.
atk-abh01a0:2171_20: Na añño tattha rogo nāma atthīti samodhānato chabbīsatimeva rūpāni.
atk-abh01a0:2173_1: jīvitindriyanti imāni aṭṭha ekantaṃ kammatova samuṭṭhahanti.
atk-abh01a0:2173_2: Kāyaviññattivacīviññattidvayaṃ ekantena cittato samuṭṭhātīti dasa ‘ekasamuṭṭhānāni’ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2173_3: Saddo ututo ca cittato ca samuṭṭhātīti eko ‘dvisamuṭṭhāno’ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2173_6: Lahutādittayaṃ pana utucittāhārehi samuṭṭhātīti tīṇi ‘tisamuṭṭhānāni’ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2173_7: Avasesāni nava rūpāni tehi kammena cāti catūhi samuṭṭhahantīti nava ‘catusamuṭṭhānāni’ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2173_8: Jaratā aniccatā pana etesu ekatopi na samuṭṭhahantīti dve ‘na kenaci samuṭṭhahanti’ nāma. Kasmā?
atk-abh01a0:2173_12: Uppannañhi rūpaṃ jīrati bhijjatīti avassaṃ panetaṃ sampaṭicchitabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2173_13: Na hi uppannaṃ rūpaṃ arūpaṃ vā akkhayaṃ nāma dissati.
atk-abh01a0:2173_14: Yāva pana na bhijjati tāvassa paripākoti siddhametaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2173_15: ‘Jātassa pākabhedattā’ti yadi ca tāni jāyeyyuṃ tesampi pākabhedā bhaveyyuṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2173_17: bhedo vā bhijjatīti jātassa pākabhedattā netaṃ dvayaṃ jāyati.
atk-abh01a0:2174_1: yathā ‘kammassa katattā’ti ādiniddesesu ‘rūpassa upacayo rūpassa santatī’ti vacanena ‘jāti’ jāyatīti sampaṭicchitaṃ hoti,
atk-abh01a0:2174_4: Ye pana dhammā kammādīhi nibbattanti tesaṃ abhinibbattibhāvato jātiyā tappaccayabhāvavohāro anumato.
atk-abh01a0:2175_1: ‘yatheva jāti yesaṃ dhammānaṃ abhinibbatti tappaccayabhāvavohāraṃ abhinibbattivohārañca labhati,
atk-abh01a0:2175_2: tathā pākabhedāpi yesaṃ dhammānaṃ pākabhedā tappaccayabhāvavohāraṃ abhinibbattivohārañca labhantu.
atk-abh01a0:2175_3: Evaṃ idampi dvayaṃ kammādisamuṭṭhānamevāti vattabbaṃ bhavissatī’ti.
atk-abh01a0:2175_8: Tehi abhinibbattitadhammakkhaṇasmiñca jāti paññāyamānā tappaccayabhāvavohāraṃ abhinibbattivohārañca labhati,
atk-abh01a0:2175_11: tasmiṃ khaṇe abhāvatoti nevetaṃ jāyatī’ti vattabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2175_14: aniccaṃ saṅkhataṃ paṭiccasamuppanna”nti āgatattā idampi dvayaṃ jāyatīti ce – ‘na,
atk-abh01a0:2175_16: Tattha hi paṭiccasamuppannānaṃ dhammānaṃ jarāmaraṇattā pariyāyena taṃ paṭiccasamuppanna’nti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2176_2: nibbānaṃ viya vā nicca’nti ce – na,
atk-abh01a0:2176_8: Etampi ca abhinivesaṃ paṭisedhetuṃ eva idaṃ vuttaṃ –
atk-abh01a0:2176_12: Evamādīhi nayehi tāni dve rūpāni na kehici samuṭṭhahantīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2178_0: Tattha cakkhupasādādi aṭṭhavidhaṃ rūpaṃ saddhiṃ hadayavatthunā ‘kammajaṃ’ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2178_1: Kesamassu hatthidantā assavālā camaravālāti evamādi ‘kammapaccayaṃ’ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2179_1: Kabaḷīkāro āhāro dvinnampi rūpasantatīnaṃ paccayo hoti āhārasamuṭṭhānassa ca upādinnassa ca.
atk-abh01a0:2179_3: kammajassa anupālako hutvāti idaṃ āhārānupālitaṃ kammajarūpaṃ ‘āhārapaccayaṃ’ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2179_4: Visabhāgāhāraṃ sevitvā ātape gacchantassa tilakakāḷakuṭṭhādīni uppajjanti,
atk-abh01a0:2181_1: “Pacchājātā cittacetasikā dhammā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo”ti idaṃ ‘cittapaccayaṃ’ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2187_1: Ettāvatā kusalattiko sabbesaṃ kusalādidhammānaṃ padabhājananayena vitthārito hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2187_2: Yasmā pana yvāyaṃ kusalattikassa vibhajananayo vutto,
atk-abh01a0:2187_6: Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ vā…pe…
atk-abh01a0:2187_7: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā ṭhapetvā vedanākhandhaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2187_8: ime dhammā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā’tiādinā anukkamena sabbatikadukesu sakkā paṇḍitehi vibhājananayaṃ sallakkhetuṃ –
atk-abh01a0:2187_10: aññena nātisaṅkhepanātivitthāranayena sabbatikadukadhammavibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ katame dhammā kusalāti nikkhepakaṇḍaṃ āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2187_13: Idaṃ pana nikkhepakaṇḍaṃ cittuppādakaṇḍaṃ upādāya saṅkhepo,
atk-abh01a0:2187_14: aṭṭhakathākaṇḍaṃ upādāya vitthāroti saṅkhittavitthāradhātukaṃ hoti. Tayidaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2188_0: Mūlato khandhato cāpi, dvārato cāpi bhūmito;
atk-abh01a0:2189_0: Atthato dhammato cāpi, nāmato cāpi liṅgato;
atk-abh01a0:2191_0: Idañhi tīṇi kusalamūlānītiādinā nayena mūlato nikkhipitvā desitaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2191_6: Tattha tattha atthadhammanāmaliṅgānaṃ vasena desitattā atthādīhi nikkhipitvā desitaṃ nāmāti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2192_3: Evaṃ atthavasena dassetvā idāni nāmavasena dassetuṃ alobho adoso amohoti āha.
atk-abh01a0:2192_4: Ettāvatā yasmā mūlena muttaṃ kusalaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-abh01a0:2192_5: tasmā catubhūmakakusalaṃ tīhi mūlehi pariyādiyitvā dassesi dhammarājā.
atk-abh01a0:2192_10: Iti catubhūmakakusalaṃ puna taṃsampayuttakacatukkhandhavasena pariyādiyitvā dassesi dhammarājā.
atk-abh01a0:2192_12: Imināpi nayena tadeva catubhūmikakusalaṃ tiṇṇaṃ kammadvārānaṃ vasena pariyādiyitvā dassesi dhammarājā.
atk-abh01a0:2192_13: Evaṃ tāva kusalaṃ tīsu ṭhānesu pariyādiyitvā dassitaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2193_2: Dvādasannañhi akusalacittānaṃ ekampi mūlena muttaṃ nāma natthīti mūlena pariyādiyitvā dassesi dhammarājā.
atk-abh01a0:2193_3: Taṃsampayuttacatukkhandhato ca uddhaṃ akusalaṃ nāma natthīti tāneva dvādasa akusalacittāni catukkhandhavasena pariyādiyitvā dassesi.
atk-abh01a0:2193_4: Dhammarājā kāyakammādivasena pana nesaṃ pavattisabbhāvato kammadvāravasena pariyādiyitvā dassesi dhammarājā.
atk-abh01a0:2193_5: Yaṃ panettha tadekaṭṭhā ca kilesātiādi vuttaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2193_6: tattha ekasmiṃ citte puggale vā ṭhitanti ‘ekaṭṭhaṃ’.
atk-abh01a0:2193_7: Tattha ekasmiṃ citte ṭhitaṃ sahajekaṭṭhaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2193_9: Tena lobhādinā aññena vā tattha tattha niddiṭṭhena saha ekasmiṃ ṭhitanti tadekaṭṭhaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2193_17: tadekaṭṭhā ca kilesā’ti hīnattike ‘katame dhammā akusalā?
atk-abh01a0:2193_24: tadekaṭṭhā ca kilesā’ti kilesagocchake ‘katame dhammā saraṇā?
atk-abh01a0:2194_17: imesu pana ettakesu ṭhānesu ‘pahānekaṭṭhaṃ’ āgatanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2195_2: Imasmiṃ tike tīṇi lakkhaṇāni tisso paññattiyo kasiṇugghāṭimākāsaṃ ajaṭākāsaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanassa ārammaṇaṃ nirodhasamāpatti ca na labbhatīti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2196_1: Vedanāttikaniddese sukhabhūmiyanti ettha yathā tambabhūmi kaṇhabhūmīti tambakaṇhabhūmiyova vuccanti,
atk-abh01a0:2196_3: Yathā ucchubhūmi sālibhūmīti ucchusālīnaṃ uppajjanaṭṭhānāni vuccanti,
atk-abh01a0:2196_4: evaṃ sukhassa uppajjanaṭṭhānaṃ cittampi sukhabhūmi nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2196_6: Yasmā pana sā kāmāvacare vā hoti,
atk-abh01a0:2196_8: tasmāssā taṃ pabhedaṃ dassetuṃ kāmāvacaretiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2196_9: Sukhavedanaṃ ṭhapetvāti yā sā sukhabhūmiyaṃ sukhavedanā,
atk-abh01a0:2197_3: Ayañhi tiko kusalattike ca alabbhamānehi imehi ca tīhi koṭṭhāsehi muttako nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2197_4: Ito paresu pana tikadukesu pāḷito ca atthato ca yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā taṃ sabbaṃ padānukkamena mātikākathāyañceva kusalādīnaṃ niddese ca vuttameva.
atk-abh01a0:2197_5: Yaṃ pana yattha visesamattaṃ tadeva vakkhāma.
atk-abh01a0:2198_1: Tattha vipākattike tāva kiñcāpi arūpadhammā viya rūpadhammāpi kammasamuṭṭhānā atthi,
atk-abh01a0:2198_2: anārammaṇattā pana te kammasarikkhakā na hontīti sārammaṇā arūpadhammāva kammasarikkhakattā vipākāti vuttā,
atk-abh01a0:2198_4: Sālibījasmiñhi vapite aṅkurapattādīsu nikkhantesupi sāliphalanti na vuccati.
atk-abh01a0:2198_5: Yadā pana sālisīsaṃ pakkaṃ hoti pariṇataṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2198_6: tadā bījasarikkhako sāli eva sāliphalanti vuccati.
atk-abh01a0:2198_7: Aṅkurapattādīni pana bījajātāni bījato nibbattānīti vuccanti,
atk-abh01a0:2198_8: evameva rūpampi kammajanti vā upādiṇṇanti vā vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-abh01a0:2199_1: Upādiṇṇattike kiñcāpi khīṇāsavassa khandhā ‘amhākaṃ mātulatthero amhākaṃ cūḷapitutthero’ti vadantānaṃ paresaṃ upādānassa paccayā honti,
atk-abh01a0:2199_2: maggaphalanibbānāni pana aggahitāni aparāmaṭṭhāni anupādiṇṇāneva. Tāni hi,
atk-abh01a0:2199_3: yathā divasaṃ santatto ayoguḷo makkhikānaṃ abhinisīdanassa paccayo na hoti,
atk-abh01a0:2199_4: evameva tejussadattā taṇhāmānadiṭṭhivasena gahaṇassa paccayā na honti.
atk-abh01a0:2201_0: 1000. Vitakkattike vitakkasahajātena vicārena saddhiṃ kusalattike alabbhamānāva na labbhanti.
atk-abh01a0:2202_1: Pītisahagatattike pītiādayo attanā sahajātadhammānaṃ pītisahagatādibhāvaṃ datvā sayaṃ piṭṭhivaṭṭakā jātā.
atk-abh01a0:2202_2: Imasmiñhi tike dve domanassasahagatacittuppādā dukkhasahagataṃ kāyaviññāṇaṃ upekkhāvedanā rūpaṃ nibbānanti –
atk-abh01a0:2202_4: Ayañhi tiko kusalattike ca alabbhamānehi imehi ca pañcahi koṭṭhāsehi muttako nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2203_3: sayaṃ vā satī tasmiṃ kāye diṭṭhīti ‘sakkāyadiṭṭhi’.
atk-abh01a0:2203_6: sīlavatehi sujjhituṃ sakkāti gahitasamādānaṃ pana sīlabbataparāmāso nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2204_2: Svāyaṃ katthaci lokaṃ upādāya vuccati. Yathāha –
atk-abh01a0:2206_0: Punarāyu ca me laddho, evaṃ jānāhi mārisā”ti. ;
atk-abh01a0:2207_3: Idha pana lokaṃ upādāya vuttoti veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:2208_0: Assutavā puthujjanoti ettha pana ‘āgamādhigamābhāvā ñeyyo assutavā iti’.
atk-abh01a0:2211_0: So hi puthūnaṃ nānappakārānaṃ kilesādīnaṃ jananādīhi kāraṇehi puthujjano. Yathāha –
atk-abh01a0:2211_9: Puthu pañcasu kāmaguṇesu rattā giddhā gadhitā mucchitā ajjhosannā laggā laggitā palibuddhāti puthujjanā.
atk-abh01a0:2211_10: Puthu pañcahi nīvaraṇehi āvutā nivutā ovutā pihitā paṭicchannā paṭikujjitāti puthujjanā”ti.
atk-abh01a0:2211_11: Puthūnaṃ vā gaṇanapathamatītānaṃ ariyadhammaparammukhānaṃ nīcadhammasamācārānaṃ janānaṃ antogadhattāpi puthujjanā.
atk-abh01a0:2211_16: Evametehi ‘assutavā puthujjano’ti dvīhi padehi ye te –
atk-abh01a0:2214_0: Dve puthujjanā vuttā, tesu andhaputhujjano vutto hotīti veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:2215_3: sadevakena lokena ca araṇīyato buddhā ca paccekabuddhā ca buddhasāvakā ca vuccanti.
atk-abh01a0:2215_4: Buddhā eva vā idha ariyā. Yathāha –
atk-abh01a0:2216_0: Sappurisāti ettha pana paccekabuddhā tathāgatasāvakā ca sappurisāti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:2216_1: Te hi lokuttaraguṇayogena sobhanā purisāti sappurisā.
atk-abh01a0:2216_3: Buddhāpi hi ariyā ca sappurisā ca paccekabuddhā buddhasāvakāpi. Yathāha –
atk-abh01a0:2221_0: ‘Kalyāṇamitto daḷhabhatti ca hotī’ti ettāvatā hi buddhasāvako vutto.
atk-abh01a0:2221_5: So cakkhunā adassāvī ñāṇena adassāvīti duvidho.
atk-abh01a0:2221_7: Maṃsacakkhunā hi dibbacakkhunā vā ariyā diṭṭhāpi adiṭṭhāva honti,
atk-abh01a0:2222_1: cittalapabbatavāsino kira khīṇāsavattherassa upaṭṭhāko vuḍḍhapabbajito ekadivasaṃ therena saddhiṃ piṇḍāya
atk-abh01a0:2222_2: caritvā therassa pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā piṭṭhito āgacchanto theraṃ pucchi –
atk-abh01a0:2222_5: ‘idhekacco mahallako ariyānaṃ pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā vattapaṭipattiṃ katvā saha carantopi neva ariye jānāti,
atk-abh01a0:2222_10: “kiṃ te vakkali iminā pūtikāyena diṭṭhena? Yo kho, vakkali,
atk-abh01a0:2223_0: Ariyadhammassa akovidoti satipaṭṭhānādibhede ariyadhamme akusalo. Ariyadhamme avinītoti, ettha pana
atk-abh01a0:2226_1: Ettha ca duvidhepi vinaye ekameko vinayo pañcadhā bhijjati.
atk-abh01a0:2226_2: Saṃvaravinayopi hi sīlasaṃvaro satisaṃvaro ñāṇasaṃvaro khantisaṃvaro vīriyasaṃvaroti pañcavidho.
atk-abh01a0:2226_3: Pahānavinayopi tadaṅgapahānaṃ vikkhambhanapahānaṃ samucchedapahānaṃ paṭippassaddhipahānaṃ nissaraṇapahānanti pañcavidho.
atk-abh01a0:2227_0: Tattha “iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarena upeto hoti samupeto”ti ayaṃ sīlasaṃvaro.
atk-abh01a0:2232_3: Sabbopi cāyaṃ saṃvaro yathāsakaṃ saṃvaritabbānaṃ vinetabbānañca kāyaduccaritādīnaṃ saṃvaraṇato saṃvaro,
atk-abh01a0:2233_2: tena tena vipassanāñāṇena tassa tassa anatthassa pahānaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2234_4: “Yaṃ catunnaṃ ariyamaggānaṃ bhāvitattā taṃtaṃmaggavato attano attano santāne diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāyā”tiādinā
atk-abh01a0:2234_5: nayena vuttassa samudayapakkhikassa kilesagaṇassa accantaṃ appavattibhāvena pahānaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2234_11: Sabbampi cetaṃ pahānaṃ yasmā cāgaṭṭhena pahānaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2234_14: Taṃtaṃpahānavato vā tassa tassa vinayassa sambhavatopetaṃ pahānavinayoti vuccati.
atk-abh01a0:2235_7: Esa nayo sappurisānaṃ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinītoti etthāpi.
atk-abh01a0:2235_10: yeva te sappurisā teva te ariyā.
atk-abh01a0:2235_11: Yo eva so ariyānaṃ dhammo so eva so sappurisānaṃ dhammo,
atk-abh01a0:2235_12: yo eva so sappurisānaṃ dhammo so eva so ariyānaṃ dhammo.
atk-abh01a0:2235_13: Yeva te ariyavinayā teva te sappurisavinayā,
atk-abh01a0:2235_14: yeva te sappurisavinayā teva te ariyavinayā.
atk-abh01a0:2235_18: esese eke ekaṭṭhe same samabhāge tajjāte taññevā”ti.
atk-abh01a0:2236_0: Rūpaṃ attato samanupassatīti idhekacco rūpaṃ attato samanupassati –
atk-abh01a0:2236_2: yo ahaṃ taṃ rūpa’nti rūpañca attānañca advayaṃ samanupassati.
atk-abh01a0:2236_3: “Seyyathāpi nāma telappadīpassa jhāyato yā acci so vaṇṇo,
atk-abh01a0:2236_4: yo vaṇṇo sā accīti acciñca vaṇṇañca advayaṃ samanupassati,” evameva idhekacco rūpaṃ attato samanupassatīti evaṃ rūpaṃ attāti diṭṭhipassanāya passati.
atk-abh01a0:2237_0: Tattha ‘rūpaṃ attato samanupassatī’ti suddharūpameva attāti kathitaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2237_5: viññāṇaṃ attato samanupassatī’ti imesu sattasu ṭhānesu ‘arūpaṃ attā’ti kathitaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2237_8: vedanāya vā attānanti evaṃ catūsu khandhesu tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vasena dvādasasu ṭhānesu ‘rūpārūpamissako attā’ kathito.
atk-abh01a0:2237_9: Tattha ‘rūpaṃ attato samanupassati vedanaṃ… saññaṃ… saṅkhāre…
atk-abh01a0:2237_10: viññāṇaṃ attato samanupassatī’ti imesu pañcasu ṭhānesu ucchedadiṭṭhi kathitā.
atk-abh01a0:2237_12: Evamettha pannarasa bhavadiṭṭhiyo pañca vibhavadiṭṭhiyo honti.
atk-abh01a0:2238_1: Satthari kaṅkhatīti satthu sarīre vā guṇe vā ubhayattha vā kaṅkhati.
atk-abh01a0:2238_2: Sarīre kaṅkhamāno ‘dvattiṃsavaralakkhaṇapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ nāma sarīraṃ atthi nu kho natthī’ti kaṅkhati.
atk-abh01a0:2238_3: Guṇe kaṅkhamāno ‘atītānāgatapaccuppannajānanasamatthaṃ sabbaññutañāṇaṃ atthi nu kho natthī’ti kaṅkhati.
atk-abh01a0:2238_5: sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭivijjhitvā ṭhito lokatārako buddho nāma atthi nu kho natthī’ti kaṅkhati.
atk-abh01a0:2238_6: Ayañhissa attabhāve guṇe vā kaṅkhanato ubhayattha kaṅkhati nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2238_7: Vicikicchatīti ārammaṇaṃ nicchetuṃ asakkonto kicchati kilamati.
atk-abh01a0:2238_9: Na sampasīdatīti cittaṃ anāvilaṃ katvā pasīdituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-abh01a0:2239_0: Dhamme kaṅkhatītiādīsu pana ‘kilese pajahantā cattāro ariyamaggā,
atk-abh01a0:2239_2: maggaphalānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayabhūtaṃ amataṃ mahānibbānaṃ nāma atthi nu kho natthī’ti kaṅkhantopi ‘ayaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2239_3: dhammo niyyāniko nu kho aniyyāniko’ti kaṅkhantopi dhamme kaṅkhati nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2239_4: ‘Cattāro maggaṭṭhakā cattāro phalaṭṭhakāti idaṃ saṅgharatanaṃ atthi nu kho natthī’ti kaṅkhantopi,
atk-abh01a0:2239_5: ‘ayaṃ saṅgho suppaṭipanno nu kho duppaṭipanno’ti kaṅkhantopi,
atk-abh01a0:2239_6: ‘etasmiṃ saṅgharatane dinnassa vipākaphalaṃ atthi nu kho natthī’ti kaṅkhantopi saṅghe kaṅkhati nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2239_7: ‘Tisso pana sikkhā atthi nu kho natthī’ti kaṅkhantopi,
atk-abh01a0:2239_8: ‘tisso sikkhā sikkhitapaccayena ānisaṃso atthi nu kho natthī’ti kaṅkhantopi sikkhāya kaṅkhati nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2240_3: na nu kho’ti kaṅkhanto pubbante kaṅkhati nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2240_5: na nu kho’ti kaṅkhanto aparante kaṅkhati nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2240_7: ‘Dvādasapadikaṃ paccayavaṭṭaṃ atthi nu kho natthī’ti kaṅkhanto idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu kaṅkhati nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2240_13: Jātiādīsu taṃ taṃ paṭicca āgamma samuppannāti ‘paṭiccasamuppannā’.
atk-abh01a0:2240_15: idappaccayatāya ca paṭiccasamuppannesu ca dhammesu kaṅkhatīti.
atk-abh01a0:2241_7: Imissā ca pāḷiyā diṭṭhikileso vicikicchākilesoti dveyeva āgatā.
atk-abh01a0:2241_8: Lobho doso moho māno thinaṃ uddhaccaṃ ahirikaṃ anottappanti ime pana aṭṭha anāgatā.
atk-abh01a0:2241_10: Ettha hi diṭṭhivicikicchāsu pahīyamānāsu apāyagamanīyo lobho doso moho māno thinaṃ uddhaccaṃ ahirikaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2241_13: Sotāpattimaggena hi cattāri diṭṭhisahagatāni vicikicchāsahagatañcāti pañca cittāni pahīyanti.
atk-abh01a0:2241_14: Tattha dvīsu asaṅkhārikadiṭṭhicittesu pahīyantesu tehi sahajāto lobho moho uddhaccaṃ ahirikaṃ anottappanti ime kilesā sahajekaṭṭhavasena pahīyanti.
atk-abh01a0:2241_15: Sesadiṭṭhikileso ca vicikicchākileso ca pahānekaṭṭhavasena pahīyanti.
atk-abh01a0:2241_16: Diṭṭhigatasampayuttasasaṅkhārikacittesupi pahīyantesu tehi sahajāto lobho moho thinaṃ uddhaccaṃ ahirikaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2241_18: Sesadiṭṭhikileso ca vicikicchākileso ca pahānekaṭṭhavasena pahīyanti.
atk-abh01a0:2241_19: Evaṃ pahānekaṭṭhasmiṃyeva sahajekaṭṭhaṃ labbhatīti idaṃ sahajekaṭṭhaṃ āharitvā dīpayiṃsu.
atk-abh01a0:2242_0: Taṃsampayuttoti tehi tadekaṭṭhehi aṭṭhahi kilesehi sampayutto.
atk-abh01a0:2242_1: Vinibbhogaṃ vā katvā tena lobhena tena dosenāti evaṃ ekekena sampayuttatā dīpetabbā.
atk-abh01a0:2242_3: moho māno thinaṃ uddhaccaṃ ahirikaṃ anottappanti ayaṃ saṅkhārakkhandhe kilesagaṇo lobhasampayutto nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2242_5: moho thinaṃ uddhaccaṃ ahirikaṃ anottappanti ayaṃ kilesagaṇo dosasampayutto nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2242_7: lobho doso māno thinaṃ uddhaccaṃ ahirikaṃ anottappanti ayaṃ kilesagaṇo mohasampayutto nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2242_9: tena sahuppanno lobho moho thinaṃ uddhaccaṃ ahirikaṃ anottappanti ayaṃ kilesagaṇo mānasampayutto nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2242_10: Iminā upāyena tena thinena tena uddhaccena tena ahirikena tena anottappena sampayutto taṃsampayuttoti yojanā kātabbā.
atk-abh01a0:2243_0: Ime dhammā dassanena pahātabbāti ettha dassanaṃ nāma sotāpattimaggo;
atk-abh01a0:2243_9: Yattha katthaci rājānaṃ disvāpi paṇṇākāraṃ datvā kiccanipphattiyā adiṭṭhattā ‘ajjāpi rājānaṃ na passāmī’ti vadanto cettha jānapadapuriso nidassanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2244_4: Tehi pana aññe dassetuṃ idaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2244_5: ‘Tadekaṭṭhā’ti tehi pāḷiyaṃ āgatehi tīhi kilesehi sampayogatopi pahānatopi ekaṭṭhā pañca kilesā.
atk-abh01a0:2244_6: Neva dassanena na bhāvanāyāti idaṃ saṃyojanādīnaṃ viya tehi maggehi appahātabbataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2244_7: Yaṃ pana “sotāpattimaggañāṇena abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa nirodhena satta bhave ṭhapetvā anamatagge saṃsāravaṭṭe ye uppajjeyyuṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2244_8: nāmañca rūpañca etthete nirujjhantī”tiādinā nayena kusalādīnampi pahānaṃ anuññātaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2244_9: taṃ tesaṃ maggānaṃ abhāvitattā ye uppajjeyyuṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2244_10: te upanissayapaccayānaṃ kilesānaṃ pahīnattā pahīnāti imaṃ pariyāyaṃ sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2245_1: Dassanenapahātabbahetukattike ime dhammā dassanena pahātabbahetukāti niṭṭhapetvā,
atk-abh01a0:2245_3: tadekaṭṭhabhāvena hetū ceva sahetuke ca dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2245_4: Tattha ‘kiñcāpi dassanena pahātabbesu hetūsu lobhasahagato moho lobhena sahetuko hoti,
atk-abh01a0:2245_6: lobhadosā ca mohenāti pahātabbahetukapadepete saṅgahaṃ gacchanti,
atk-abh01a0:2245_7: vicikicchāsahagato pana moho aññassa sampayuttahetuno abhāvena hetuyeva,
atk-abh01a0:2245_8: na sahetukoti tassa pahānaṃ dassetuṃ ime dhammā dassanena pahātabbahetū’ti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2246_1: Dutiyapade uddhaccasahagatassa mohassa pahānaṃ dassetuṃ ime dhammā bhāvanāya pahātabbahetūti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2246_2: So hi attanā sampayuttadhamme sahetuke katvā piṭṭhivaṭṭako jāto,
atk-abh01a0:2246_3: vicikicchāsahagato viya aññassa sampayuttahetuno abhāvā pahātabbahetukapadaṃ na bhajati.
atk-abh01a0:2246_4: Tatiyapade avasesā akusalāti puna akusalaggahaṇaṃ vicikicchuddhaccasahagatānaṃ mohānaṃ saṅgahatthaṃ kataṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2246_5: Te hi sampayuttahetuno abhāvā pahātabbahetukā nāma na honti.
atk-abh01a0:2247_2: Sayañhi parittā vā hontu mahaggatā vā,
atk-abh01a0:2247_6: Te pana parittāpi honti mahaggatāpi appamāṇāpi.
atk-abh01a0:2248_3: Tesu hi ekasmimpi kamme kate taṃ paṭibāhitvā aññaṃ kammaṃ attano vipākassa okāsaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-abh01a0:2248_4: Sineruppamāṇepi hi suvaṇṇathūpe katvā cakkavāḷamattaṃ vā ratanamayapākāraṃ vihāraṃ kāretvā taṃ pūretvā
atk-abh01a0:2248_5: nisinnassa buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa yāvajīvaṃ cattāro paccaye dadatopi taṃ kammaṃ etesaṃ kammānaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2248_7: Yā ca micchādiṭṭhi niyatāti ahetukavādaakiriyavādanatthikavādesu aññatarā.
atk-abh01a0:2248_8: Tañhi gahetvā ṭhitaṃ puggalaṃ buddhasatampi buddhasahassampi bodhetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-abh01a0:2249_1: Maggārammaṇattike ariyamaggaṃ ārabbhāti lokuttaramaggaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā.
atk-abh01a0:2250_1: Maggahetukaniddese paṭhamanayena paccayaṭṭhena hetunā maggasampayuttānaṃ khandhānaṃ sahetukabhāvo dassito.
atk-abh01a0:2250_2: Dutiyanayena maggabhūtena sammādiṭṭhisaṅkhātena hetunā sesamaggaṅgānaṃ sahetukabhāvo dassito.
atk-abh01a0:2250_3: Tatiyanayena magge uppannahetūhi sammādiṭṭhiyā sahetukabhāvo dassitoti veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:2251_3: Ariyasāvakānañhi attano maggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhaṇakāle ārammaṇādhipati labbhati.
atk-abh01a0:2251_4: Cetopariyañāṇena pana ariyasāvako parassa maggaṃ paccavekkhamāno garuṃ karontopi attanā paṭividdhamaggaṃ viya garuṃ na karoti.
atk-abh01a0:2251_5: ‘Yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ karontaṃ tathāgataṃ disvā tassa maggaṃ garuṃ karoti na karotī’ti? Karoti,
atk-abh01a0:2251_7: Arahā na kiñci dhammaṃ garuṃ karoti ṭhapetvā maggaṃ phalaṃ nibbānanti.
atk-abh01a0:2251_10: Chandañhi jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā maggaṃ bhāventassa chando adhipati nāma hoti, na maggo.
atk-abh01a0:2251_14: Vīmaṃsaṃ pana jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā maggaṃ bhāventassa vīmaṃsādhipati ceva hoti maggo cāti.
atk-abh01a0:2252_7: Upasaggena pana padaṃ vaḍḍhetvā abhinibbattāti vuttā.
atk-abh01a0:2252_13: Puna uppannātivacane kāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2252_15: Rūpaṃ vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇanti idaṃ nesaṃ sabhāvadassanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2253_0: Ayaṃ pana tiko dvinnaṃ addhānaṃ vasena pūretvā dassito.
atk-abh01a0:2253_13: Atha imassa purisassa aññā ca saññā uppajjanti aññā ca saññā nirujjhantī”ti.
atk-abh01a0:2253_14: Ettha āruppe kāmāvacarasaññāpavattikāle kiñcāpi mūlabhavaṅgasaññā niruddhā kāmāvacarasaññāya pana niruddhakāle
atk-abh01a0:2253_15: avassaṃ sā uppajjissatīti arūpasaṅkhāto attā natthīti saṅkhyaṃ agantvā ‘tiṭṭhateva’ nāmāti jāto.
atk-abh01a0:2254_0: Yadi pana āyūhitaṃ kusalākusalakammaṃ sabbaṃ vipākaṃ dadeyya,
atk-abh01a0:2254_12: Tassa vipāko cittānantare vā uppajjatu kappasatasahassātikkame vā.
atk-abh01a0:2256_1: Atītārammaṇattikaniddese atīte dhamme ārabbhātiādīsu parittamahaggatāva dhammā veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:2257_1: Ajjhattattikaniddese tesaṃ tesanti padadvayena sabbasatte pariyādiyati.
atk-abh01a0:2257_6: Te hi kammanibbattā vā hontu mā vā,
atk-abh01a0:2259_4: Appamāṇā pana kālena bahiddhā kālena ajjhattaṃ ārammaṇaṃ na karonti.
atk-abh01a0:2261_3: Mettāya ayitassa mettāsamaṅgino cittassa bhāvo mettāyitattaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2261_10: Sabbehipi imehi padehi upacārappanāppattā mettāva vuttā.
atk-abh01a0:2262_3: Ettha ca dukkhe ñāṇaṃ savanasammasanapaṭivedhapaccavekkhaṇāsu vattati.
atk-abh01a0:2262_13: evaṃ paccayesu ca paccayuppannadhammesu ca ñāṇaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2263_7: Yattha katthaci bhave sattā etāya nandanti,
atk-abh01a0:2263_9: Nandī ca sā rañjanaṭṭhena rāgo cāti nandīrāgo.
atk-abh01a0:2263_10: Tattha ekasmiṃ ārammaṇe sakiṃ uppannā taṇhā ‘nandī’.
atk-abh01a0:2263_12: Cittassa sārāgoti yo heṭṭhā balavarañjanaṭṭhena sārāgoti vutto,
atk-abh01a0:2264_13: “Ejā imaṃ purisaṃ parikaḍḍhati tassa tasseva bhavassa abhinibbattiyā”ti hi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2264_16: “Taṇhā janeti purisaṃ cittamassa vidhāvatī”ti hi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2264_17: Vaṭṭasmiṃ satte dukkhena saṃyojayamānā janetīti sañjananī.
atk-abh01a0:2264_19: Ayañhi vaṭṭasmiṃ satte cutipaṭisandhivasena sibbati ghaṭeti,
atk-abh01a0:2264_22: Anekappakāraṃ visayajālaṃ taṇhāvipphanditanivesasaṅkhātaṃ vā jālamassā atthīti jālinī.
atk-abh01a0:2265_4: Allāni ceva siniddhāni cāti ayañhettha attho.
atk-abh01a0:2265_14: Visatā vā pana sā taṇhā rūpe sadde gandhe rase phoṭṭhabbe dhamme kule gaṇe vitthatāti visattikā.
atk-abh01a0:2265_21: Tassa tassa paṭilābhatthāya satte āyūhāpetīti āyūhinī.
atk-abh01a0:2265_23: Ayañhi sattānaṃ vaṭṭasmiṃ ukkaṇṭhituṃ na deti,
atk-abh01a0:2268_5: Taṃ taṃ ārammaṇaṃ vanati bhajati allīyatīti vanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2268_8: Anatthadukkhānaṃ vā samuṭṭhāpanaṭṭhena gahanaṭṭhena ca vanaṃ viyāti ‘vanaṃ’;
atk-abh01a0:2269_0: “Vanaṃ chindatha mā rukkhaṃ, vanato jāyate bhayaṃ;
atk-abh01a0:2270_0: Chetvā vanañca vanathañca, nibbanā hotha bhikkhavo”ti. ;
atk-abh01a0:2271_14: Niccasannissitaṭṭhena hi sattānaṃ taṇhāsamo bandhu nāma natthi.
atk-abh01a0:2272_1: Ajjhottharaṇato ceva tittiṃ anupagantvāva paribhuñjanato cāti attho.
atk-abh01a0:2272_4: Idāni tassā pavattiṭṭhānaṃ dassetuṃ rūpāsātiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2272_5: Tattha āsisanavasena āsāti āsāya atthaṃ gahetvā rūpe āsā rūpāsāti evaṃ navapi padāni veditabbāni.
atk-abh01a0:2272_6: Ettha ca purimāni pañca pañcakāmaguṇavasena vuttāni.
atk-abh01a0:2272_10: Na hi tesaṃ dhanaputtajīvitehi aññaṃ piyataraṃ atthi.
atk-abh01a0:2272_11: ‘Etaṃ mayhaṃ etaṃ mayha’nti vā ‘asukena me idaṃ dinnaṃ idaṃ dinna’nti vā evaṃ satte jappāpetīti jappā.
atk-abh01a0:2272_13: Tato paraṃ aññenākārena vibhajituṃ āraddhattā puna jappāti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2273_8: “Rāgo visama”ntiādivacanato vā yuttaṭṭhāne vā ayuttaṭṭhāne vā uppanno chandarāgo adhammaṭṭhena ‘adhammarāgo’,
atk-abh01a0:2275_3: Cittaṃ upagantvā kilissati saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ karotīti upakkileso.
atk-abh01a0:2275_7: “Corā magge pariyuṭṭhiṃsu dhuttā magge pariyuṭṭhiṃsū”tiādīsu hi maggaṃ gaṇhiṃsūti attho.
atk-abh01a0:2275_10: “Latā ubbhijja tiṭṭhatī”ti āgataṭṭhānepi ayaṃ taṇhā latāti vuttā.
atk-abh01a0:2275_20: tesaṃ upari māro vasaṃ vattetīti iminā pariyāyena mārassa visayoti māravisayo.
atk-abh01a0:2275_24: evaṃ taṇhābaddhā sattāpīti daḷhabandhanaṭṭhena gaddulaṃ viyāti gaddulaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2276_1: Dosaniddese anatthaṃ me acarīti avuḍḍhiṃ me akāsi.
atk-abh01a0:2276_3: Aṭṭhāne vā pana āghātoti akāraṇe kopo –
atk-abh01a0:2276_12: upakkhalitvā khāṇukassa kuppati idaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ –
atk-abh01a0:2276_14: Tattha heṭṭhā navasu ṭhānesu satte ārabbha uppannattā kammapathabhedo hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2276_15: Aṭṭhānāghāto pana saṅkhāresu uppanno kammapathabhedaṃ na karoti.
atk-abh01a0:2277_0: Idāni akusalaniddese vuttanayaṃ dassetuṃ doso dussanātiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2278_1: Tehi dhammehi ye dhammā sahetukāti tehi hetudhammehi ye aññe hetudhammā vā nahetudhammā vā te sahetukā.
atk-abh01a0:2278_3: Ettha ca hetu hetuyeva ca hoti,
atk-abh01a0:2278_4: tiṇṇaṃ vā dvinnaṃ vā ekato uppattiyaṃ sahetuko ca.
atk-abh01a0:2279_1: Saṅkhatadukaniddese purimaduke vuttaṃ asaṅkhatadhātuṃ sandhāya yo eva so dhammoti ekavacananiddeso kato.
atk-abh01a0:2279_2: Purimaduke pana bahuvacanavasena pucchāya uddhaṭattā ime dhammā appaccayāti pucchānusandhinayena bahuvacanaṃ kataṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2280_3: Ettha ca kenaci viññeyyāti cakkhuviññāṇādīsu kenaci ekena cakkhuviññāṇena vā sotaviññāṇena vā vijānitabbā.
atk-abh01a0:2280_4: Kenaci na viññeyyāti teneva cakkhuviññāṇena vā sotaviññāṇena vā na vijānitabbā.
atk-abh01a0:2280_5: ‘Evaṃ sante dvinnampi padānaṃ atthanānattato duko hotī’ti heṭṭhā vuttattā ‘ye te dhammā cakkhuviññeyyā na te dhammā sotaviññeyyā’ti ayaṃ duko na hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2280_6: Rūpaṃ pana cakkhuviññeyyaṃ saddo na cakkhuviññeyyoti imamatthaṃ gahetvā ‘ye te dhammā cakkhuviññeyyā na te dhammā sotaviññeyyā,
atk-abh01a0:2280_7: ye vā pana te dhammā sotaviññeyyā na te dhammā cakkhuviññeyyā’ti ayameko dukoti veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:2280_8: Evaṃ ekekaindriyamūlake cattāro cattāro katvā vīsati dukā vibhattāti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:2281_0: Kiṃ pana ‘manoviññāṇena kenaci viññeyyā kenaci na viññeyyā’ natthi?
atk-abh01a0:2281_3: vavatthānābhāvato pana na vuttā. Na hi,
atk-abh01a0:2281_4: yathā cakkhuviññāṇena aviññeyyā evāti vavatthānaṃ atthi,
atk-abh01a0:2281_5: evaṃ manoviññāṇenāpīti vavatthānābhāvato ettha dukā na vuttā.
atk-abh01a0:2281_6: Manoviññāṇena pana kenaci viññeyyā ceva aviññeyyā cāti ayamattho atthi.
atk-abh01a0:2281_8: Manoviññāṇanti hi saṅkhyaṃ gatehi kāmāvacaradhammehi kāmāvacaradhammā eva tāva kehici viññeyyā kehici aviññeyyā.
atk-abh01a0:2281_9: Tehiyeva rūpāvacarādidhammāpi kehici viññeyyā kehici aviññeyyā.
atk-abh01a0:2281_10: Rūpāvacarehipi kāmāvacarā kehici viññeyyā kehici aviññeyyā.
atk-abh01a0:2281_11: Teheva rūpāvacarādayopi kehici viññeyyā kehici aviññeyyā.
atk-abh01a0:2281_12: Arūpāvacarehi pana kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarā apariyāpannā ca neva viññeyyā.
atk-abh01a0:2281_13: Arūpāvacarā pana kehici viññeyyā kehici aviññeyyā.
atk-abh01a0:2281_14: Tepi ca kecideva viññeyyā keci aviññeyyā.
atk-abh01a0:2281_16: Apariyāpannā pana nibbānena aviññeyyattā kehici viññeyyā kehici aviññeyyā.
atk-abh01a0:2281_17: Tepi ca maggaphalānaṃ aviññeyyattā kecideva viññeyyā keci aviññeyyāti.
atk-abh01a0:2282_2: Rūpārūpabhavesu chandarāgo jhānanikanti sassatadiṭṭhisahajāto rāgo bhavavasena patthanā bhavāsavo nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2282_5: Tattha tattha āgatesu pana āsavesu asammohatthaṃ ekavidhādibhedo veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:2282_6: Atthato hete cirapārivāsiyaṭṭhena āsavāti evaṃ ekavidhāva honti.
atk-abh01a0:2282_7: Vinaye pana “diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāyā”ti duvidhena āgatā.
atk-abh01a0:2282_23: atthi āsavā bhāvanā pahātabbā”ti chabbidhena āgatā.
atk-abh01a0:2282_28: Rūpārūpasaṅkhāte kammato ca upapattito ca duvidhepi bhave āsavo ‘bhavāsavo’.
atk-abh01a0:2283_5: Kāmanavasena rajjanavasena ca kāmoyeva rāgo kāmarāgo.
atk-abh01a0:2283_6: Kāmanavasena nandanavasena ca kāmova nandīti kāmanandī.
atk-abh01a0:2283_7: Evaṃ sabbattha kāmatthaṃ viditvā taṇhāyanaṭṭhena kāmataṇhā,
atk-abh01a0:2283_12: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ aṭṭhahi padehi vibhatto kāmāsavo nāma vuccati.
atk-abh01a0:2284_1: Bhavesu bhavachandoti rūpārūpabhavesu bhavapatthanāvaseneva pavatto chando ‘bhavachando’.
atk-abh01a0:2285_1: Sassato lokoti vātiādīhi dasahākārehi diṭṭhippabhedova vutto.
atk-abh01a0:2285_2: Tattha sassato lokoti ettha khandhapañcakaṃ lokoti gahetvā ‘ayaṃ loko nicco dhuvo sabbakāliko’ti gaṇhantassa ‘sassata’nti gahaṇākārappavattā diṭṭhi.
atk-abh01a0:2285_3: Asassatoti tameva lokaṃ ‘ucchijjati vinassatī’ti gaṇhantassa ucchedagahaṇākārappavattā diṭṭhi.
atk-abh01a0:2285_4: Antavāti parittakasiṇalābhino ‘suppamatte vā sarāvamatte vā’ kasiṇe samāpannassa antosamāpattiyaṃ pavattitarūpārūpadhamme
atk-abh01a0:2285_5: lokoti ca kasiṇaparicchedantena ca ‘antavā’ti gaṇhantassa ‘antavā loko’ti gahaṇākārappavattā diṭṭhi.
atk-abh01a0:2285_7: Vipulakasiṇalābhino pana tasmiṃ kasiṇe samāpannassa antosamāpattiyaṃ pavattitarūpārūpadhamme lokoti ca
atk-abh01a0:2285_8: kasiṇaparicchedantena ca ‘ananto’ti gaṇhantassa ‘anantavā loko’ti gahaṇākārappavattā diṭṭhi.
atk-abh01a0:2286_0: Taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīranti bhedanadhammassa sarīrasseva ‘jīva’nti gahitattā sarīre ucchijjamāne ‘jīvampi ucchijjatī’ti ucchedagahaṇākārappavattā diṭṭhi.
atk-abh01a0:2286_1: Dutiyapade sarīrato aññassa jīvassa gahitattā sarīre ucchijjamānepi ‘jīvaṃ na ucchijjatī’ti sassatagahaṇākārappavattā diṭṭhi.
atk-abh01a0:2286_2: Hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇātiādīsu satto tathāgato nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2286_3: So paraṃ maraṇā hotīti gaṇhato paṭhamā sassatadiṭṭhi.
atk-abh01a0:2286_5: Hoti ca na ca hotīti gaṇhato tatiyā ekaccasassatadiṭṭhi.
atk-abh01a0:2286_6: Neva hoti na nahotīti gaṇhato catutthā amarāvikkhepadiṭṭhi.
atk-abh01a0:2286_7: Ime dhammā āsavāti ime kāmāsavañca bhavāsavañca rāgavasena ekato katvā,
atk-abh01a0:2287_0: Yo pana brahmānaṃ vimānakapparukkhaābharaṇesu chandarāgo uppajjati,
atk-abh01a0:2287_1: so kāmāsavo hoti na hotīti? Na hoti. Kasmā?
atk-abh01a0:2287_3: Hetugocchakaṃ pana patvā lobho hetu nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2287_5: Kilesagocchakaṃ patvā lobho kileso nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2287_6: Diṭṭhisahajāto pana rāgo kāmāsavo hoti na hotīti? Na hoti;
atk-abh01a0:2287_8: Vuttañhetaṃ “diṭṭhirāgaratte purisapuggale dinnadānaṃ na mahapphalaṃ hoti,
atk-abh01a0:2288_0: Ime pana āsave kilesapaṭipāṭiyāpi āharituṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-abh01a0:2289_1: Saṃyojanesu mānaniddese seyyohamasmīti mānoti uttamaṭṭhena ‘ahaṃ seyyo’ti evaṃ uppannamāno.
atk-abh01a0:2289_2: Sadisohamasmīti mānoti samasamaṭṭhena ‘ahaṃ sadiso’ti evaṃ uppannamāno.
atk-abh01a0:2289_3: Hīnohamasmīti mānoti lāmakaṭṭhena ‘ahaṃ hīno’ti evaṃ uppannamāno.
atk-abh01a0:2289_4: Evaṃ seyyamāno sadisamāno hīnamānoti ime tayo mānā tiṇṇaṃ janānaṃ uppajjanti.
atk-abh01a0:2289_5: Seyyassāpi hi ‘ahaṃ seyyo sadiso hīno’ti tayo mānā uppajjanti.
atk-abh01a0:2289_15: Khuddakavatthuke pana paṭhamakamānabhājanīye eko māno tiṇṇaṃ janānaṃ uppajjatīti kathito.
atk-abh01a0:2290_8: Mānopi punappunaṃ uppajjamāno aparāpare upādāya accuggataṭṭhena ketu viyāti ‘ketu’.
atk-abh01a0:2291_1: Issāniddese yā paralābhasakkāragarukāramānanavandanapūjanāsu issāti yā etesu paresaṃ lābhādīsu ‘kiṃ iminā imesa’nti parasampattikhiyyanalakkhaṇā issā.
atk-abh01a0:2291_2: Tattha lābhoti cīvarādīnaṃ catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ paṭilābho.
atk-abh01a0:2291_3: Issukī hi puggalo parassa taṃ lābhaṃ khiyyati,
atk-abh01a0:2291_5: Sakkāroti tesaṃyeva paccayānaṃ sukatānaṃ sundarānaṃ paṭilābho.
atk-abh01a0:2292_0: Imissā pana issāya khiyyanalakkhaṇaṃ āgārikenāpi anāgārikenāpi dīpetabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2292_1: Āgāriko hi ekacco kasivaṇijjādīsu aññatarena ājīvena attano purisakāraṃ nissāya bhaddakaṃ yānaṃ vā vāhanaṃ vā ratanaṃ vā labhati.
atk-abh01a0:2292_2: Aparo tassa alābhatthiko tena lābhena na tussati.
atk-abh01a0:2292_3: ‘Kadā nu kho esa imāya sampattiyā parihāyitvā kapaṇo hutvā carissatī’ti cintetvā ekena kāraṇena tasmiṃ tāya sampattiyā parihīne attamano hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2292_4: Anāgārikopi eko issāmanako aññaṃ attano sutapariyattiādīni nissāya uppannalābhādisampattiṃ disvā ‘kadā
atk-abh01a0:2292_5: nu kho eso imehi lābhādīhi parihāyissatī’ti cintetvā,
atk-abh01a0:2292_6: yadā taṃ ekena kāraṇena parihīnaṃ passati,
atk-abh01a0:2293_1: Macchariyaniddese vatthuto macchariyadassanatthaṃ ‘pañca macchariyāni āvāsamacchariya’ntiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2294_0: Āvāso nāma sakalārāmopi pariveṇampi ekovarakopi rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānādīnipi.
atk-abh01a0:2294_1: Tesu vasantā sukhaṃ vasanti paccaye labhanti.
atk-abh01a0:2294_2: Eko bhikkhu vattasampannasseva pesalassa bhikkhuno tattha āgamanaṃ na icchati.
atk-abh01a0:2294_5: Bhaṇḍanakārakādīnaṃ pana tattha vāsaṃ anicchato āvāsamacchariyaṃ nāma na hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2295_1: Tattha aññassa upasaṅkamanaṃ anicchato kulamacchariyaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2295_2: Pāpapuggalassa pana upasaṅkamanaṃ anicchantopi maccharī nāma na hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2295_4: Pasādaṃ rakkhituṃ samatthasseva pana bhikkhuno tattha upasaṅkamanaṃ anicchanto maccharī nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2296_1: Taṃ aññasmiṃ sīlavanteyeva labhante ‘mā labhatū’ti cintentassa lābhamacchariyaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2296_5: taṃ disvā ‘sace imaṃ esa na labheyya,
atk-abh01a0:2296_7: paribhogaṃ gaccheyyā’ti cintentassa macchariyaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-abh01a0:2297_1: Tattha sarīravaṇṇe maccharipuggalo ‘paro pāsādiko rūpavā’ti vutte taṃ na kathetukāmo hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2297_2: Guṇavaṇṇamaccharī sīlena dhutaṅgena paṭipadāya ācārena vaṇṇaṃ na kathetukāmo hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2298_2: attanā paṭividdhadhamme sadevakassa lokassa paṭivedhaṃ icchanti.
atk-abh01a0:2298_5: Tena samannāgato puggalo yaṃ guḷhaṃ ganthaṃ vā kathāmaggaṃ vā jānāti taṃ aññaṃ na jānāpetukāmo hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2298_7: dhammaṃ vā upaparikkhitvā puggalānuggahena na deti,
atk-abh01a0:2299_4: Yo hi bhikkhu ‘ayaṃ puggalo paveṇiāgataṃ tantiṃ saṇhaṃ sukhumaṃ dhammantaraṃ bhinditvā āluḷissatī’ti na deti,
atk-abh01a0:2299_5: ayaṃ puggalaṃ upaparikkhitvā dhammānuggahena na deti nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2299_7: sacāyaṃ puggalo gaṇhissati aññaṃ byākaritvā attānaṃ āvikatvā nassissatī’ti na deti,
atk-abh01a0:2299_8: ayaṃ dhammaṃ upaparikkhitvā puggalānuggahena na deti nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2299_10: amhākaṃ samayaṃ bhindituṃ samattho bhavissatī’ti na deti,
atk-abh01a0:2300_0: Imesu pañcasu macchariyesu āvāsamacchariyena tāva yakkho vā peto vā hutvā tasseva āvāsassa saṅkāraṃ sīsena ukkhipitvā vicarati.
atk-abh01a0:2300_1: Kulamacchariyena tasmiṃ kule aññesaṃ dānamānanādīni karonte disvā ‘bhinnaṃ vatidaṃ kulaṃ mamā’ti cintayato lohitampi mukhato uggacchati,
atk-abh01a0:2300_4: Lābhamacchariyena saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā santake lābhe maccharāyitvā puggalikaparibhogaṃ viya paribhuñjitvā
atk-abh01a0:2300_5: yakkho vā peto vā mahāajagaro vā hutvā nibbattati.
atk-abh01a0:2300_6: Sarīravaṇṇaguṇavaṇṇamaccharena pariyattidhammamacchariyena ca attanova vaṇṇaṃ vaṇṇeti,
atk-abh01a0:2300_7: paresaṃ vaṇṇe ‘kiṃ vaṇṇo eso’ti taṃ taṃ dosaṃ vadanto pariyattidhammañca kassaci kiñci adento dubbaṇṇo ceva eḷamūgo ca hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2301_3: Vaṇṇamacchariyena bhave bhave nibbattassa vaṇṇo nāma na hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2302_3: ‘Mayhameva hontu mā aññassā’ti sabbāpi attano sampattiyo byāpetuṃ na icchatīti viviccho.
atk-abh01a0:2302_9: Tena hi samannāgato puggalo parampi paresaṃ dadamānaṃ nivāreti.
atk-abh01a0:2305_0: Yācake disvā kaṭukabhāvena cittaṃ añcati saṅkocetīti kaṭukañcuko.
atk-abh01a0:2305_4: Samatittikapuṇṇāya hi ukkhaliyā bhattaṃ gaṇhanto sabbatobhāgena saṅkuṭitena aggakaṭacchunā gaṇhāti,
atk-abh01a0:2306_0: Aggahitattaṃ cittassāti paresaṃ upakārakaraṇe dānādinā ākārena yathā na sampasāriyati,
atk-abh01a0:2306_2: Yasmā pana maccharipuggalo attano santakaṃ paresaṃ adātukāmo hoti parasantakaṃ gaṇhitukāmo,
atk-abh01a0:2306_4: mā aññassā’ti pavattivasenassa attasampattinigūhanalakkhaṇatā attasampattiggahaṇalakkhaṇatā vā veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:2307_0: Imāni pana saṃyojanāni kilesapaṭipāṭiyāpi āharituṃ vaṭṭati maggapaṭipāṭiyāpi.
atk-abh01a0:2308_3: Sabbaññubhāsitampi paṭikkhipitvā sassato loko idameva saccaṃ moghamaññanti iminā ākārena abhinivisatīti idaṃsaccābhiniveso.
atk-abh01a0:2308_5: tasmā abhijjhākāyaganthassa padabhājane “yo kāmesu kāmacchando kāmarāgo”ti avatvā yo rāgo sārāgotiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2308_6: Iminā yaṃ heṭṭhā vuttaṃ ‘brahmānaṃ vimānādīsu chandarāgo kāmāsavo na hoti,
atk-abh01a0:2308_7: ganthagocchakaṃ patvā abhijjhākāyagantho hotī’ti taṃ suvuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2308_9: Ṭhapetvā sīlabbataparāmāsanti idaṃ yasmā sīlabbataparāmāso ‘idameva sacca’ntiādinā ākārena nābhinivisati,
atk-abh01a0:2309_1: Nīvaraṇagocchakassa thinamiddhaniddese cittassa akallatāti cittassa gilānabhāvo.
atk-abh01a0:2309_10: Tassa taṃ ākāraṃ sandhāya olīyanāti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2309_14: Thinanti sappipiṇḍo viya avipphārikatāya ghanabhāvena ṭhitaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2310_3: Megho viya ākāsaṃ kāyaṃ onayhatīti onāho.
atk-abh01a0:2310_6: Yathā hi nagare rundhitvā gahite manussā bahi nikkhamituṃ na labhanti,
atk-abh01a0:2310_7: evampi middhena samoruddhā dhammā vipphāravasena nikkhamituṃ na labhanti.
atk-abh01a0:2310_14: Yaṃ pana tesaṃ purato soppapadaṃ tassa punavacane kāraṇaṃ vuttameva.
atk-abh01a0:2310_15: Idaṃ vuccati thinamiddhanīvaraṇanti idaṃ thinañca middhañca ekato katvā āvaraṇaṭṭhena thinamiddhanīvaraṇanti vuccati.
atk-abh01a0:2310_16: Yaṃ yebhuyyena sekkhaputhujjanānaṃ niddāya pubbabhāgaaparabhāgesu uppajjati taṃ arahattamaggena samucchijjati.
atk-abh01a0:2310_17: Khīṇāsavānaṃ pana karajakāyassa dubbalabhāvena bhavaṅgotaraṇaṃ hoti,
atk-abh01a0:2310_23: gimhānaṃ pacchime māse catugguṇaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ paññapetvā dakkhiṇena passena sato sampajāno niddaṃ okkamitā”ti.
atk-abh01a0:2310_24: Evarūpo panāyaṃ karajakāyassa dubbalabhāvo na maggavajjho,
atk-abh01a0:2310_26: Upādinnake labbhamāno yadā khīṇāsavo dīghamaggaṃ gato hoti,
atk-abh01a0:2310_27: aññataraṃ vā pana kammaṃ katvā kilanto,
atk-abh01a0:2310_30: Ekaccānañhi rukkhānaṃ paṇṇāni sūriyātapena pasāriyanti rattiṃ paṭikuṭanti,
atk-abh01a0:2310_33: Idaṃ pana middhaṃ akusalattā khīṇāsavānaṃ na hotīti.
atk-abh01a0:2311_7: ‘Sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedeti’ ‘kāyena ceva paramasaccaṃ sacchikarotī’ti sukhapaṭisaṃvedanaparamatthasaccasacchikaraṇānipi rūpakāyeneva siyuṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2311_16: Yathā hi ‘itthiliṅgaṃ itthinimittaṃ itthikuttaṃ itthākappo’ti imāni liṅgādīni itthindriyassa phalattā vuttāni,
atk-abh01a0:2311_17: evaṃ imassāpi nāmakāyagelaññasaṅkhātassa middhassa phalattā soppādīni vuttāni.
atk-abh01a0:2311_20: middhaṃ arūpampi samānaṃ ‘soppaṃ pacalāyikā supanā supitatta’nti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2312_0: ‘Akkhidalādīnaṃ pacalabhāvaṃ karotīti pacalāyikā’ti vacanatthenāpi cāyamattho sādhitoyevāti na rūpaṃ middhaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2312_2: Na hi rūpaṃ nāmakāyassa ‘onāho pariyonāho antosamorodho’ hotīti.
atk-abh01a0:2312_11: Apica “pañca nīvaraṇe pahāya cetaso upakkilese paññāya dubbalīkaraṇe”ti vacanatopetaṃ arūpaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2315_13: tasmā majjaṃ viya middhampi cittasaṃkileso ceva paññāya dubbalīkaraṇañca siyāti. Na,
atk-abh01a0:2315_16: so “ime pañca nīvaraṇe pahāya cetaso upakkilese”ti vā,
atk-abh01a0:2315_20: yehi upakkilesehi upakkiliṭṭhaṃ cittaṃ na ceva mudu hoti,
atk-abh01a0:2315_24: na ca sammā samādhiyati āsavānaṃ khayāya.
atk-abh01a0:2315_34: Yasmā pana tasmiṃ pīte upakkilesā uppajjanti ye cittasaṃkilesā ceva paññāya ca dubbalīkaraṇā honti,
atk-abh01a0:2315_35: tasmā taṃ tesaṃ paccayattā paccayaniddesato evaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2315_36: Middhaṃ pana sayameva cittassa saṃkileso ceva paññāya dubbalīkaraṇañcāti arūpameva middhaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2316_7: Yathā hi “sippisambukampi sakkharakathalampi macchagumbampi carantampi tiṭṭhantampī”ti evaṃ ekato katvā yathālābhavasena vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2316_12: thinaṃ nīvaraṇampi sampayuttampīti sabbaṃ ekato katvā yathālābhavasena “nīvaraṇañceva nīvaraṇasampayuttañcā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2316_13: Middhaṃ pana yathā sakkharakathalaṃ tiṭṭhateva na carati,
atk-abh01a0:2316_18: Sakkharakathalañhi na caratīti vināpi suttena siddhaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2316_21: Na sakkā tassa iminā suttena rūpabhāvo sādhetunti middhassa rūpabhāvāsiddhito na idaṃ yathālābhavasena vuttanti arūpameva middhaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2317_2: Vibhaṅgasmiñhi “vigatathinamiddhoti tassa thinamiddhassa cattattā vantattā muttattā pahīnattā paṭinissaṭṭhattā,
atk-abh01a0:2317_4: “idaṃ cittaṃ imamhā thinamiddhā sodheti visodheti parisodheti moceti vimoceti parimoceti,
atk-abh01a0:2317_5: tena vuccati thinamiddhā cittaṃ parisodheti” cāti –
atk-abh01a0:2317_12: Tasmā yaṃ tattha cittajaṃ tassa vibhaṅge jhānacittehi asambhavo vutto,
atk-abh01a0:2317_13: na arūpabhāvo sādhitoti rūpameva middhanti. Na,
atk-abh01a0:2317_15: Middhassa hi rūpabhāve siddhe sakkā etaṃ laddhuṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2317_17: So eva ca na sijjhatīti arūpameva middhaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2318_4: dhamme pahāya bhabbo paṭhamajjhānaṃ upasampajja viharituṃ;
atk-abh01a0:2318_11: kāmesu kho panassa ādīnavo sammapaññāya sudiṭṭho hotī”ti ca,
atk-abh01a0:2318_12: “ime pañca nīvaraṇe pahāya balavatiyā paññāya attatthaṃ vā paratthaṃ vā ñassatī”ti ca ādīsu middhassāpi pahānaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2318_17: na bhāvetabbo na sacchikātabbo”ti imassāpi pahānavacanato arūpameva middhanti. Na,
atk-abh01a0:2318_27: rūpe chandarāgavinayo taṃ tattha pahāna”nti evaṃ chandarāgappahānavasena rūpassa pahānaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2318_28: na yathā “cha dhamme pahāya pañca nīvaraṇe pahāyā”ti evaṃ pahātabbameva vuttanti,
atk-abh01a0:2318_31: Tasmā yānetāni “so ime pañca nīvaraṇe pahāya cetaso upakkilese”tiādīni suttāni vuttāni,
atk-abh01a0:2318_32: etehi ceva aññehi ca suttehi arūpameva middhanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2319_2: āvaraṇā nīvaraṇā cetaso ajjhāruhā paññāya dubbalīkaraṇā.
atk-abh01a0:2319_9: āvaraṇaṃ nīvaraṇaṃ cetaso ajjhāruhaṃ paññāya dubbalīkaraṇa”nti ca,
atk-abh01a0:2319_12: andhakaraṇaṃ acakkhukaraṇaṃ aññāṇakaraṇaṃ paññānirodhikaṃ vighātapakkhikaṃ anibbānasaṃvattanika”nti ca,
atk-abh01a0:2319_14: yasmiṃ samaye thinamiddhapariyuṭṭhitena cetasā viharati thinamiddhaparetenā”ti ca, “ayoniso,
atk-abh01a0:2320_0: Evamādīni ca anekāni etassa arūpabhāvajotakāneva suttāni vuttāni.
atk-abh01a0:2320_1: Yasmā cetaṃ arūpaṃ tasmā āruppepi uppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:2320_4: na purejātapaccayā”ti etassa vibhaṅge “āruppe kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ paṭicca thinamiddhaṃ…
atk-abh01a0:2321_1: Kukkuccaniddese akappiye kappiyasaññitātiādīni mūlato kukkuccadassanatthaṃ vuttāni.
atk-abh01a0:2321_4: puna sañjātasatinopi ‘duṭṭhu mayā kata’nti evaṃ anutappamānassa pacchānutāpavasenetaṃ uppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:2321_5: Tena taṃ mūlato dassetuṃ ‘akappiye kappiyasaññitā’tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2321_15: kāle ca vikālasaññāya bhuñjamāno ‘kappiye akappiyasaññitāya’ vītikkamaṃ karoti nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2321_17: vajjañca anavajjasaññitāya karonto ‘anavajje vajjasaññāya vajje ca anavajjasaññāya’ vītikkamaṃ karoti nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2321_23: kataṃ kibbisa”nti evaṃ anavajje vajjasaññitāyapi kate vītikkame uppajjati,
atk-abh01a0:2321_24: tasmāssa aññampi vatthuṃ anujānanto yaṃ evarūpantiādimāha.
atk-abh01a0:2322_3: Cetaso vippaṭisāroti ettha katākatassa sāvajjānavajjassa vā abhimukhagamanaṃ ‘vippaṭisāro’ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2322_4: Yasmā pana so kataṃ vā pāpaṃ akataṃ na karoti,
atk-abh01a0:2322_5: akataṃ vā kalyāṇaṃ kataṃ na karoti,
atk-abh01a0:2322_10: Uppajjamānaṃ pana kukkuccaṃ āraggamiva kaṃsapattaṃ manaṃ vilikhamānameva uppajjati,
atk-abh01a0:2322_13: Yaṃ pana vinaye “atha kho āyasmā sāriputto bhagavatā paṭikkhittaṃ anuvasitvā anuvasitvā āvasathapiṇḍaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2322_14: paribhuñjitu”nti kukkuccāyanto na paṭiggahesīti kukkuccaṃ āgataṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2322_16: Na hi arahato ‘duṭṭhu mayā idaṃ kata’nti evaṃ anutāpo atthi.
atk-abh01a0:2322_17: Nīvaraṇapatirūpakaṃ panetaṃ ‘kappati na kappatī’ti vīmaṃsanasaṅkhātaṃ vinayakukkuccaṃ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2323_1: “Katame dhammā nīvaraṇā ceva nīvaraṇasampayuttā cā”ti padassa niddese yasmā thinamiddhaṃ aññamaññaṃ na vijahati,
atk-abh01a0:2323_2: tasmā thinamiddhanīvaraṇaṃ avijjānīvaraṇena nīvaraṇañceva nīvaraṇasampayuttañcāti abhinditvā vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2323_3: Yasmā pana uddhacce satipi kukkuccassa abhāvā kukkuccena vināpi uddhaccaṃ uppajjati,
atk-abh01a0:2324_0: Ime pana nīvaraṇe kilesapaṭipāṭiyāpi āharituṃ vaṭṭati maggapaṭipāṭiyāpi.
atk-abh01a0:2325_0: 1182. Parāmāsagocchake te dhamme ṭhapetvāti pucchāsabhāgena bahuvacanaṃ kataṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2326_1: Upādānaniddese vatthusaṅkhātaṃ kāmaṃ upādiyatīti kāmupādānaṃ kāmo ca so upādānañcātipi kāmupādānaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2326_3: Daḷhattho hi ettha upasaddo upāyāsaupakaṭṭhādīsu viya.
atk-abh01a0:2326_4: Tathā diṭṭhi ca sā upādānañcāti diṭṭhupādānaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2326_6: ‘Sassato attā ca loko cā’tiādīsu hi purimadiṭṭhiṃ uttaradiṭṭhi upādiyahi.
atk-abh01a0:2326_9: Gosīlagovatādīni hi ‘evaṃ suddhī’ti abhinivesato sayameva upādānāni. Tathā,
atk-abh01a0:2327_1: Yo kāmesu kāmacchandoti etthāpi vatthukāmāva anavasesato kāmāti adhippetā.
atk-abh01a0:2327_2: Tasmā vatthukāmesu kāmacchando idha kāmupādānanti anāgāminopi taṃ siddhaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2328_4: dinnassa pana phalaṃ vipāko natthīti gaṇhāti.
atk-abh01a0:2328_8: yiṭṭhassa pana phalaṃ vipāko natthīti gaṇhāti.
atk-abh01a0:2328_11: tassa pana phalaṃ vipāko natthīti gaṇhāti. Natthi,
atk-abh01a0:2328_12: sukatadukkaṭānanti ettha dasa kusalakammapathā sukatakammāni nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2328_14: Tesaṃ atthibhāvaṃ jānāti phalaṃ vipāko pana natthīti gaṇhāti.
atk-abh01a0:2328_15: Natthi ayaṃ lokoti paraloke ṭhito imaṃ lokaṃ natthīti gaṇhāti.
atk-abh01a0:2328_16: Natthi paralokoti idha loke ṭhito paralokaṃ natthīti gaṇhāti.
atk-abh01a0:2328_17: Natthi mātā natthi pitāti mātāpitūnaṃ atthibhāvaṃ jānāti,
atk-abh01a0:2328_18: tesu katapaccayena koci phalaṃ vipāko natthīti gaṇhāti.
atk-abh01a0:2328_19: Natthi sattā opapātikāti cavanakaupapajjanakā sattā natthīti gaṇhāti.
atk-abh01a0:2328_20: Sammaggatā sammā paṭipannāti anulomapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannā dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇā lokasmiṃ natthīti gaṇhāti.
atk-abh01a0:2328_21: Ye imañca lokaṃ parañca lokaṃ sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedentīti imañca lokaṃ parañca lokaṃ attanāva
atk-abh01a0:2328_22: abhivisiṭṭhena ñāṇena ñatvā pavedanasamattho sabbaññū buddho nāma natthīti gaṇhāti.
atk-abh01a0:2329_0: Imāni pana upādānāni kilesapaṭipāṭiyāpi āharituṃ vaṭṭati maggapaṭipāṭiyāpi.
atk-abh01a0:2330_2: Vasanti vā ettha akhīṇāsavā sattā lobhādīsu patiṭṭhitattāti ‘vatthūni’.
atk-abh01a0:2330_3: Kilesā ca te tappatiṭṭhānaṃ sattānaṃ vatthūni cāti ‘kilesavatthūni’.
atk-abh01a0:2330_4: Yasmā cettha anantarapaccayādibhāvena uppajjamānā kilesāpi vasanti eva nāma,
atk-abh01a0:2331_2: Yo rāgo sārāgoti ayaṃ pana lobho hetugocchake ganthagocchake imasmiṃ kilesagocchaketi tīsu ṭhānesu atirekapadasatena niddiṭṭho.
atk-abh01a0:2331_4: Svāyaṃ atirekapadasatena niddiṭṭhaṭṭhānepi aṭṭhahi aṭṭhahi padehi niddiṭṭhaṭṭhānepi nippadesatova gahitoti veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:2331_5: Tesu hetuganthanīvaraṇaupādānakilesagocchakesu catumaggavajjhā taṇhā ekeneva koṭṭhāsena ṭhitā.
atk-abh01a0:2331_6: Āsavasaṃyojanaoghayogesu catumaggavajjhāpi dve koṭṭhāsā hutvā ṭhitā. Kathaṃ?
atk-abh01a0:2332_0: Imāni pana kilesavatthūni kilesapaṭipāṭiyāpi āharituṃ vaṭṭati maggapaṭipāṭiyāpi.
atk-abh01a0:2333_2: Avīcinirayanti vā aggijālānaṃ vā sattānaṃ vā dukkhavedanāya vīci, antaraṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2333_6: Pariyantaṃ karitvāti taṃ avīcisaṅkhātaṃ nirayaṃ antaṃ katvā.
atk-abh01a0:2333_8: Paranimmitavasavattideveti paranimmitesu kāmesu vasaṃ vattanato evaṃladdhavohāre deve.
atk-abh01a0:2333_10: Yaṃ etasmiṃ antareti ye etasmiṃ okāse.
atk-abh01a0:2333_11: Etthāvacarāti iminā yasmā etasmiṃ antare aññepi caranti kadāci katthaci sambhavato,
atk-abh01a0:2333_13: Tena ye etasmiṃ antare ogāḷhā hutvā caranti sabbattha sadā ca sambhavato,
atk-abh01a0:2333_18: Ettha pariyāpannāti iminā pana yasmā ete etthāvacarā aññatthāpi avacaranti,
atk-abh01a0:2333_20: tasmā tesaṃ aññatthāpi avacarantānaṃ pariggaho kato hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2333_21: Idāni te ettha pariyāpannadhamme rāsisuññatapaccayabhāvato ceva sabhāvato ca dassento khandhātiādimāha.
atk-abh01a0:2336_4: Vicikicchuddhaccasampayutto pana moho diṭṭhisampayuttena ceva rūparāgaarūparāgasaṅkhātena ca rāgaraṇena pahānekaṭṭhabhāvato saraṇo sarajoti veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:2338_1: Suttantikadukesu mātikākathāyaṃ atthato vivecitattā yāni ca nesaṃ niddesapadāni tesampi heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva
atk-abh01a0:2338_4: vijjūpamaduke tāva cakkhumā kira puriso meghandhakāre rattiṃ maggaṃ paṭipajji.
atk-abh01a0:2339_0: Tattha cakkhumato purisassa andhakāre maggapaṭipajjanaṃ viya ariyasāvakassa sotāpattimaggatthāya vipassanārambho.
atk-abh01a0:2339_2: Vijjuyā niccharitvā andhakārassa viddhaṃsitakālo viya sotāpattimaggobhāsena uppajjitvā saccacchādakatamassa vinoditakālo.
atk-abh01a0:2339_3: Vigate andhakāre maggassa pākaṭakālo viya sotāpattimaggassa catunnaṃ saccānaṃ pākaṭakālo.
atk-abh01a0:2339_7: Dutiyaṃ vijjuyā niccharitvā andhakārassa viddhaṃsitakālo viya sakadāgāmimaggobhāsena uppajjitvā saccacchādakatamassa vinoditakālo.
atk-abh01a0:2339_8: Vigate andhakāre maggassa pākaṭakālo viya sakadāgāmimaggassa catunnaṃ saccānaṃ pākaṭakālo.
atk-abh01a0:2339_12: Tatiyaṃ vijjuyā niccharitvā andhakārassa viddhaṃsitakālo viya anāgāmimaggobhāsena uppajjitvā saccacchādakatamassa vinoditakālo.
