atk-abh01a0:2340_0: Vajirassa pana pāsāṇo vā maṇi vā abhejjo nāma natthi.
atk-abh01a0:2340_3: Vajirena gatamaggo nāma puna pākatiko na hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2340_7: Vajirena gatamaggassa puna pākatikattābhāvo viya arahattamaggena pahīnakilesānaṃ puna paccudāvattanaṃ nāma natthīti.
atk-abh01a0:2341_3: Ahiriko hi anottappī ca na kiñci akusalaṃ na karoti nāmāti.
atk-abh01a0:2342_1: Tapanīyadukaniddese katattā ca akatattā ca tapanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2342_4: Tathā hi puggalo ‘kataṃ me kāyaduccarita’nti tappati,
atk-abh01a0:2342_9: Kalyāṇakārī hi puggalo ‘kataṃ me kāyasucarita’nti na tappati,
atk-abh01a0:2343_1: Adhivacanadukaniddese yā tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānanti sabbadhammaggahaṇaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2343_5: Ahanti mamanti paroti parassāti sattoti bhāvoti posoti puggaloti naroti māṇavoti tissoti dattoti,
atk-abh01a0:2343_6: ‘mañco pīṭhaṃ bhisi bimbohanaṃ’ ‘vihāro pariveṇaṃ dvāraṃ vātapāna’nti evaṃ anekehi ākārehi saṃkathiyatīti ‘saṅkhā’.
atk-abh01a0:2344_2: Tattha paṭhamakappikesu mahājanena sammannitvā ṭhapitattā mahāsammatoti rañño nāmaṃ ‘sāmaññanāmaṃ’ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2344_6: Dhammakathiko paṃsukūliko vinayadharo tepiṭako saddho pasannoti evarūpaṃ guṇato āgatanāmaṃ ‘guṇanāmaṃ’ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2344_7: Bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddhotiādīnipi tathāgatassa anekāni nāmasatāni guṇanāmāneva.
atk-abh01a0:2347_0: Yaṃ pana jātassa kumārakassa nāmaggahaṇadivase dakkhiṇeyyānaṃ sakkāraṃ katvā samīpe ṭhitā ñātakā kappetvā
atk-abh01a0:2347_11: Idaṃ catubbidhampi nāmaṃ ettha nāmameva hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2348_4: Yasmā panetaṃ atthaṃ byañjeti tasmā evaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2348_6: Sabbeva dhammā adhivacanapathāti adhivacanassa nopathadhammo nāma natthi.
atk-abh01a0:2348_11: Sattopi saṅkhāropi nāmato muttako nāma natthi.
atk-abh01a0:2349_1: Te hi ‘ayaṃ kiṃ rukkho nāmā’ti puṭṭhā ‘khadiro’ ‘palāso’ti attanā jānanakanāmaṃ kathenti.
atk-abh01a0:2349_2: Yassa nāmaṃ na jānanti tampi ‘anāmako’ nāmāti vadanti.
atk-abh01a0:2349_5: Itare dve dukā iminā samānatthā eva.
atk-abh01a0:2350_1: Nāmarūpaduke nāmakaraṇaṭṭhena ca namanaṭṭhena ca nāmanaṭṭhena ca nāmaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2350_3: Yathā hi mahājanasammatattā mahāsammatassa mahāsammatoti nāmaṃ ahosi,
atk-abh01a0:2350_4: yathā vā mātāpitaro ‘ayaṃ tisso nāma hotu,
atk-abh01a0:2350_5: phusso nāma hotū’ti evaṃ puttassa kittimanāmaṃ karonti,
atk-abh01a0:2350_8: Vedanādayo hi mahāpathavīādayo viya attano nāmaṃ karontāva uppajjanti.
atk-abh01a0:2350_9: Tesu uppannesu tesaṃ nāmaṃ uppannameva hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2350_10: Na hi vedanaṃ uppannaṃ ‘tvaṃ vedanā nāma hohī’ti koci bhaṇati.
atk-abh01a0:2350_12: Yathā pathaviyā uppannāya ‘tvaṃ pathavī nāma hohī’ti nāmaggahaṇakiccaṃ natthi,
atk-abh01a0:2350_13: cakkavāḷasinerucandimasūriyanakkhattesu uppannesu ‘tvaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ nāma hohi tvaṃ nakkhattaṃ nāma hohī’ti nāmaggahaṇakiccaṃ natthi,
atk-abh01a0:2350_16: evaṃ vedanāya uppannāya ‘tvaṃ vedanā nāma hohī’ti nāmaggahaṇakiccaṃ natthi.
atk-abh01a0:2350_17: Tāya uppannāya vedanāti nāmaṃ uppannameva hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2350_20: Atītepi hi vedanā vedanāyeva, saññā… saṅkhārā…
atk-abh01a0:2351_3: Cattāro hi khandhā ārammaṇe aññamaññaṃ nāmenti.
atk-abh01a0:2353_1: Bhavissati attā ca loko cāti khandhapañcakaṃ attā ca loko cāti gahetvā ‘taṃ bhavissatī’ti gahaṇākārena niviṭṭhā sassatadiṭṭhi.
atk-abh01a0:2354_2: Iminā brahmajāle āgatā aṭṭhārasa pubbantānudiṭṭhiyo gahitā.
atk-abh01a0:2354_4: Iminā tattheva āgatā catucattālīsa aparantānudiṭṭhiyo gahitā.
atk-abh01a0:2355_1: Dovacassatāniddese sahadhammike vuccamāneti sahadhammikaṃ nāma yaṃ bhagavatā paññattaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2355_2: tasmiṃ vatthuṃ dassetvā āpattiṃ āropetvā ‘idaṃ nāma tvaṃ āpattiṃ āpanno,
atk-abh01a0:2355_4: Dovacassāyantiādīsu evaṃ codiyamānassa paṭicodanāya vā appadakkhiṇagāhitāya vā dubbacassa kammaṃ dovacassāyaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2355_10: ‘Paṭāṇikagahaṇaṃ gahetvā ekapadeneva taṃ nissaddamakāsi’nti sukhaṃ paṭilabhantassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2355_17: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpā dovacassatā nāma vuccati.
atk-abh01a0:2355_18: Atthato panesā tenākārena pavattā cattāro khandhā,
atk-abh01a0:2355_21: Dovacassatā pāpamittatādayo hi visuṃ cetasikadhammā nāma natthi.
atk-abh01a0:2356_20: Taṃsampavaṅkatāti tesu puggalesu kāyena ceva cittena ca sampavaṅkabhāvo;
atk-abh01a0:2358_1: Pañcapi āpattikkhandhāti mātikāniddesena ‘pārājikaṃ saṅghādisesaṃ pācittiyaṃ pāṭidesanīyaṃ dukkaṭa’nti imā pañca āpattiyo.
atk-abh01a0:2358_2: Sattapi āpattikkhandhāti vinayaniddesena ‘pārājikaṃ saṅghādisesaṃ thullaccayaṃ pācittiyaṃ pāṭidesanīyaṃ dukkaṭaṃ dubbhāsita’nti imā satta āpattiyo.
atk-abh01a0:2358_3: Tattha saha vatthunā tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ paricchedajānanakapaññā āpattikusalatā nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2358_4: Saha kammavācāya āpattivuṭṭhānaparicchedajānanakapaññā pana āpattivuṭṭhānakusalatā nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2359_2: Saha parikammena appanāparicchedajānanakapaññā pana samāpattikusalatā nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2359_3: ‘Cande vā sūriye vā nakkhatte vā ettakaṃ ṭhānaṃ gate vuṭṭhahissāmī’ti avirajjhitvā tasmiṃyeva samaye
atk-abh01a0:2361_2: Tīsupi vā etāsu kusalatāsu uggaho manasikāro savanaṃ sammasanaṃ paṭivedho paccavekkhaṇāti sabbaṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-abh01a0:2361_7: ‘Iminā pana paccayena idaṃ hotī’ti jānanakapaññā paṭiccasamuppādakusalatā nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2362_2: Cakkhupasādo hi rūpaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppajjanakassa cakkhuviññāṇassa hetu ceva paccayo ca.
atk-abh01a0:2362_5: Dutiyanaye ye ye dhammāti visabhāgapaccayadhammānaṃ nidassanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2362_7: Na hetū na paccayāti cakkhupasādo saddaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppajjanakassa sotaviññāṇassa na hetu na paccayo.
atk-abh01a0:2362_9: Ambādayo ca tālādīnaṃ uppattiyāti evamattho veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:2364_8: Anasuropoti asuropo vuccati na sammāropitattā duruttavacanaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2365_4: Idaṃ vuccati soraccanti idaṃ pāpato suṭṭhu oratattā soraccaṃ nāma vuccati.
atk-abh01a0:2365_5: Sabbopi sīlasaṃvaroti idaṃ yasmā na kevalaṃ kāyavācāheva anācāraṃ ācarati manasāpi ācarati eva,
atk-abh01a0:2366_1: Sākhalyaniddese aṇḍakāti yathā sadose rukkhe aṇḍakāni uṭṭhahanti,
atk-abh01a0:2366_3: Kakkasāti pūtikā sā yathā nāma pūtirukkho kakkaso hoti paggharitacuṇṇo evaṃ kakkasā hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2366_7: Parābhisajjanīti kuṭilakaṇṭakasākhā viya cammesu vijjhitvā paresaṃ abhisajjanī,
atk-abh01a0:2366_10: Asamādhisaṃvattanikāti appanāsamādhissa vā upacārasamādhissa vā asaṃvattanikā.
atk-abh01a0:2366_12: Tathārūpiṃ vācaṃ pahāyāti idaṃ pharusavācaṃ appajahitvā ṭhitassa antarantare pavattāpi saṇhavācā asaṇhavācā eva nāmāti dīpanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2367_6: Atthamadhuratāya sarīre kopaṃ ajanetvā pemaṃ janetīti pemanīyā.
atk-abh01a0:2367_15: Evarūpī kathā bahuno janassa kantā hotīti bahujanakantā.
atk-abh01a0:2367_16: Kantabhāveneva bahuno janassa manāpā cittavuḍḍhikarāti bahujanamanāpā.
atk-abh01a0:2368_1: Paṭisanthāraniddese āmisapaṭisanthāroti āmisaalābhena attanā saha paresaṃ chiddaṃ yathā pihitaṃ hoti paṭicchannaṃ evaṃ āmisena paṭisantharaṇaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2368_2: Dhammapaṭisanthāroti dhammassa appaṭilābhena attanā saha paresaṃ chiddaṃ yathā pihitaṃ hoti paṭicchannaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2368_4: Paṭisanthārako hotīti dveyeva hi lokasannivāsassa chiddāni,
atk-abh01a0:2368_6: Āmisapaṭisanthārena vā dhammapaṭisanthārena vāti iminā duvidhena paṭisanthārena paṭisanthārako hoti,
atk-abh01a0:2369_1: paṭisanthārakena hi bhikkhunā āgantukaṃ āgacchantaṃ disvāva paccuggantvā pattacīvaraṃ gahetabbaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2369_8: Evaṃ ekadesena āmisapaṭisanthāro kato nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2370_0: Sāyaṃ pana navakatarepi attano upaṭṭhānaṃ anāgateyeva,
atk-abh01a0:2370_1: tassa santikaṃ gantvā nisīditvā avisaye apucchitvā tassa visaye pañho pucchitabbo.
atk-abh01a0:2370_2: ‘Tumhe katarabhāṇakā’ti apucchitvā tumhākaṃ ‘ācariyupajjhāyā kataraṃ ganthaṃ vaḷañjentī’ti pucchitvā pahonakaṭṭhāne pañho pucchitabbo.
atk-abh01a0:2370_4: No ce sakkoti sayaṃ kathetvā dātabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2370_5: Evaṃ ekadesena dhammapaṭisanthāro kato nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2371_0: Sace attano santike vasati taṃ ādāya nibaddhaṃ piṇḍāya caritabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2371_1: Sace gantukāmo hoti punadivase gamanasabhāgena taṃ ādāya ekasmiṃ gāme piṇḍāya caritvā uyyojetabbo.
atk-abh01a0:2371_2: Sace aññasmiṃ disābhāge bhikkhū nimantitā honti taṃ bhikkhuṃ icchamānaṃ ādāya gantabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2371_3: ‘Na mayhaṃ esā disā sabhāgā’ti gantuṃ anicchante sesabhikkhū pesetvā taṃ ādāya piṇḍāya caritabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2372_0: Āmisapaṭisanthārakena pana attanā laddhaṃ kassa dātabbanti?
atk-abh01a0:2372_2: Sace gilāno vā avassiko vā atthi,
atk-abh01a0:2372_6: Sārāṇīyadhammapūrakena pana satavārampi sahassavārampi āgatāgatānaṃ therāsanato paṭṭhāya dātabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2372_7: Paṭisanthārakena pana yena yena na laddhaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2372_9: Bahigāmaṃ nikkhamitvā jiṇṇakaṃ vā anāthaṃ bhikkhuṃ vā bhikkhuniṃ vā disvā tesampi dātabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2373_1: corehi kira guttasālagāme pahate taṅkhaṇaññeva ekā nirodhato vuṭṭhitā khīṇāsavattherī daharabhikkhuniyā
atk-abh01a0:2373_2: bhaṇḍakaṃ gāhāpetvā mahājanena saddhiṃ maggaṃ paṭipajjitvā ṭhitamajjhanhike nakulanagaragāmadvāraṃ patvā
atk-abh01a0:2373_4: Tasmiṃ samaye kāḷavallimaṇḍapavāsī mahānāgatthero nakulanagaragāme piṇḍāya caritvā nikkhanto theriṃ disvā bhattena āpucchi.
atk-abh01a0:2373_7: Therī bhattakiccaṃ katvā pattaṃ dhovitvā therassa datvā āha –
atk-abh01a0:2373_9: ito paṭṭhāya pana vo bhikkhācāraparittāso nāma na bhavissati, tātā’ti.
atk-abh01a0:2373_10: Tato paṭṭhāya therassa ūnakahāpaṇagghanako piṇḍapāto nāma na uppannapubbo.
atk-abh01a0:2374_0: Imaṃ paṭisanthāraṃ katvā bhikkhunā saṅgahapakkhe ṭhatvā tassa bhikkhuno kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathetabbaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2374_6: Bhikkhuniyāpi attano santike upasampadaṃ ākaṅkhamānāya kammavācaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-abh01a0:2375_0: Imehi dvīhi paṭisanthārehi paṭisanthārako bhikkhu anuppannaṃ lābhaṃ uppādeti,
atk-abh01a0:2375_2: sabhayaṭṭhāne attano jīvitaṃ rakkhati coranāgarañño pattaggahaṇahattheneva aggaṃ gahetvā patteneva bhattaṃ ākiranto thero viya.
atk-abh01a0:2375_3: Aladdhalābhuppādane pana ito palāyitvā paratīraṃ gatena mahānāgaraññā ekassa therassa santike saṅgahaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2375_4: labhitvā puna āgantvā rajje patiṭṭhitena setambaṅgaṇe yāvajīvaṃ pavattitaṃ mahābhesajjadānavatthu kathetabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2375_5: Uppannalābhathāvarakaraṇe dīghabhāṇakaabhayattherassa hatthato paṭisanthāraṃ labhitvā cetiyapabbate corehi
atk-abh01a0:2376_1: Indriyesu aguttadvāratāniddese cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvāti kāraṇavasena cakkhūti laddhavohārena rūpadassanasamatthena cakkhuviññāṇena rūpaṃ disvā.
atk-abh01a0:2376_8: Īdisī panesā ‘dhanunā vijjatī’tiādīsu viya sasambhārakathā nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2376_9: Tasmā cakkhuviññāṇena rūpaṃ disvā”ti ayamevettha atthoti.
atk-abh01a0:2376_10: Nimittaggāhīti itthipurisanimittaṃ vā subhanimittādikaṃ vā kilesavatthubhūtaṃ nimittaṃ chandarāgavasena gaṇhāti,
atk-abh01a0:2376_12: Anubyañjanaggāhīti kilesānaṃ anubyañjanato pākaṭabhāvakaraṇato anubyañjananti laddhavohāraṃ hatthapādasitahasitakathitaālokitavilokitādibhedaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2376_15: etaṃ puggalaṃ satikavāṭena cakkhundriyaṃ asaṃvutaṃ apihitacakkhudvāraṃ hutvā viharantaṃ ete abhijjhādayo
atk-abh01a0:2376_17: Tassa saṃvarāya na paṭipajjatīti tassa cakkhundriyassa satikavāṭena pidahanatthāya na paṭipajjati.
atk-abh01a0:2377_0: Tattha kiñcāpi cakkhundriye saṃvaro vā asaṃvaro vā natthi,
atk-abh01a0:2377_1: na hi cakkhupasādaṃ nissāya sati vā muṭṭhassaccaṃ vā uppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:2377_2: Apica yadā rūpārammaṇaṃ cakkhussa āpāthamāgacchati tadā bhavaṅge dvikkhattuṃ uppajjitvā niruddhe kiriyamanodhātu
atk-abh01a0:2377_7: tato kiriyāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātu voṭṭhabbanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā uppajjitvā nirujjhati.
atk-abh01a0:2377_9: Tatrāpi neva bhavaṅgasamaye na āvajjanādīnaṃ aññatarasamaye saṃvaro vā asaṃvaro vā atthi.
atk-abh01a0:2377_10: Javanakkhaṇe pana dussīlyaṃ vā muṭṭhassaccaṃ vā aññāṇaṃ vā akkhanti vā kosajjaṃ vā uppajjati,
atk-abh01a0:2378_0: Evaṃ honto pana so ‘cakkhundriye asaṃvaro’ti vuccati. Kasmā?
atk-abh01a0:2378_1: Yasmā tasmiṃ asaṃvare sati dvārampi aguttaṃ hoti,
atk-abh01a0:2378_5: Yathā nagare catūsu dvāresu asaṃvutesu kiñcāpi antogharadvārakoṭṭhakagabbhādayo susaṃvutā,
atk-abh01a0:2378_6: tathāpi antonagare sabbaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ arakkhitaṃ agopitameva hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2378_7: Nagaradvārena hi pavisitvā corā yadicchakaṃ kareyyuṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2378_8: Evameva javane dussīlyādīsu uppannesu tasmiṃ asaṃvare sati dvārampi aguttaṃ hoti,
atk-abh01a0:2379_1: Yā imesanti evaṃ saṃvaraṃ anāpajjantassa imesaṃ channaṃ indriyānaṃ yā agutti yā agopanā yo anārakkho yo asaṃvaro,
atk-abh01a0:2380_1: Bhojane amattaññutāniddese idhekaccoti imasmiṃ sattaloke ekacco.
atk-abh01a0:2380_7: Anupāyena hi āhārento davatthāya madatthāya maṇḍanatthāya vibhūsanatthāya vā āhāreti,
atk-abh01a0:2380_9: Yā tattha asantuṭṭhitāti yā tasmiṃ ayoniso āhāraparibhoge asantussanā asantuṭṭhibhāvo.
atk-abh01a0:2380_12: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ apaccavekkhitaparibhogavasena pavattā bhojane amattaññutā nāma vuccati.
atk-abh01a0:2381_2: Na nimittaggāhī hotīti chandarāgavasena vuttappakāraṃ nimittaṃ na gaṇhāti.
atk-abh01a0:2381_4: Yathā ca heṭṭhā ‘javane dussīlyādīsu uppannesu tasmiṃ asaṃvare sati,
atk-abh01a0:2381_8: evamidha tasmiṃ sīlādīsu uppannesu dvārampi guttaṃ hoti,
atk-abh01a0:2381_14: tathāpi antonagare sabbaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ surakkhitaṃ sugopitameva hoti –
atk-abh01a0:2381_16: evameva javane sīlādīsu uppannesu dvārampi guttaṃ hoti,
atk-abh01a0:2382_1: Bhojane mattaññutāniddese paṭisaṅkhā yoniso āhāraṃ āhāretīti paṭisaṅkhānapaññāya jānitvā upāyena āhāraṃ paribhuñjati.
atk-abh01a0:2382_2: Idāni taṃ upāyaṃ dassetuṃ neva davāyātiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2383_2: Yañhi bhojanaṃ bhuttassa naccagītakabyasilokasaṅkhāto davo atirekatarena paṭibhāti,
atk-abh01a0:2383_3: taṃ bhojanaṃ adhammena visamena pariyesitvā te āhārenti.
atk-abh01a0:2383_4: Ayaṃ pana bhikkhu evaṃ na āhāreti.
atk-abh01a0:2384_0: Na madāyāti mānamadapurisamadānaṃ vaḍḍhanatthāya na āhāreti.
atk-abh01a0:2384_2: Te hi attano mānamadapurisamadānaṃ vaḍḍhanatthāya piṇḍarasabhojanādīni paṇītabhojanāni bhuñjanti.
atk-abh01a0:2384_3: Ayaṃ pana bhikkhu evaṃ na āhāreti.
atk-abh01a0:2385_1: Tattha rūpūpajīviniyo mātugāmā antepurikādayo ca sappiphāṇitaṃ nāma pivanti,
atk-abh01a0:2385_2: te hi siniddhaṃ muduṃ mandaṃ bhojanaṃ āhārenti ‘evaṃ no aṅgalaṭṭhi susaṇṭhitā bhavissati,
atk-abh01a0:2385_4: Ayaṃ pana bhikkhu evaṃ na āhāreti.
atk-abh01a0:2386_0: Na vibhūsanāyāti sarīre maṃsavibhūsanatthāya na āhāreti.
atk-abh01a0:2386_1: Tattha nibbuddhamallamuṭṭhikamallādayo susiniddhehi macchamaṃsādīhi sarīramaṃsaṃ pīṇenti ‘evaṃ no maṃsaṃ ussadaṃ bhavissati pahārasahanatthāyā’ti.
atk-abh01a0:2386_2: Ayaṃ pana bhikkhu evaṃ sarīre maṃsavibhūsanatthāya na āhāreti.
atk-abh01a0:2387_1: Imassa kāyassa ṭhitiyāti imassa catumahābhūtikakarajakāyassa ṭhapanatthāya āhāreti.
atk-abh01a0:2387_4: Vihiṃsūparatiyāti vihiṃsā nāma abhuttapaccayā uppajjanakā khuddā.
atk-abh01a0:2388_2: Purāṇañca vedanaṃ paṭihaṅkhāmīti purāṇavedanā nāma abhuttappaccayā uppajjanakavedanā.
atk-abh01a0:2388_4: Navañca vedanaṃ na uppādessāmīti navavedanā nāma atibhuttappaccayena uppajjanakavedanā.
atk-abh01a0:2388_5: Taṃ na uppādessāmīti āhāreti. Atha vā,
atk-abh01a0:2388_8: Yātrā ca me bhavissatīti yāpanā ca me bhavissati.
atk-abh01a0:2388_9: Anavajjatā cāti ettha atthi sāvajjaṃ atthi anavajjaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2388_10: Tattha adhammikapariyesanā adhammikapaṭiggahaṇaṃ adhammena paribhogoti idaṃ ‘sāvajjaṃ’ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2388_11: Dhammena pariyesitvā dhammena paṭiggahetvā paccavekkhitvā paribhuñjanaṃ ‘anavajjaṃ’ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2388_15: Sakalavihāre bhikkhū tassa sarīrapaṭijagganabhesajjapariyesanādīsu ussukkaṃ āpajjanti.
atk-abh01a0:2388_16: ‘Kiṃ ida’nti vutte ‘asukassa nāma udaraṃ uddhumāta’ntiādīni vadanti.
atk-abh01a0:2388_18: attano kucchipamāṇaṃ nāma na jānātī’ti nindanti garahanti.
atk-abh01a0:2389_0: Phāsuvihāro cāti etthāpi atthi phāsuvihāro atthi na phāsuvihāro.
atk-abh01a0:2389_1: Tattha ‘āharahatthako alaṃsāṭako tatthavaṭṭako kākamāsako bhuttavamitako’ti imesaṃ pañcannaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ bhojanaṃ na phāsuvihāro nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2389_2: Etesu hi ‘āharahatthako’ nāma bahuṃ bhuñjitvā attano dhammatāya uṭṭhātuṃ asakkonto ‘āhara hattha’nti vadati.
atk-abh01a0:2389_3: ‘Alaṃsāṭako’ nāma accuddhumātakucchitāya uṭṭhitopi sāṭakaṃ nivāsetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-abh01a0:2389_5: ‘Kākamāsako’ nāma yathā kākehi āmasituṃ sakkā hoti,
atk-abh01a0:2389_7: ‘Bhuttavamitako’ nāma mukhena sandhāretuṃ asakkonto tattheva vamati.
atk-abh01a0:2389_8: Evaṃ akatvā ‘phāsuvihāro ca me bhavissatī’ti āhāreti.
atk-abh01a0:2389_9: Phāsuvihāro nāma catūhi pañcahi ālopehi ūnūdaratā.
atk-abh01a0:2389_10: Ettakañhi bhuñjitvā pānīyaṃ pivato cattāro iriyāpathā sukhena pavattanti.
atk-abh01a0:2392_7: ‘iti purāṇañca vedanaṃ paṭihaṅkhāmi navañca vedanaṃ na uppādessāmī’ti ekaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2392_9: Anavajjatā ca phāsuvihāro cāti ayamettha bhojanānisaṃso.
atk-abh01a0:2392_13: tattha ‘yāvadeva imassa kāyassa ṭhitiyā’ti ekaṃ aṅgaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2392_22: Evaṃ aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ āhāraṃ āhārento bhojane mattaññū nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2392_23: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ pariyesanapaṭiggahaṇaparibhogesu yuttappamāṇajānanavasena pavatto paccavekkhitaparibhogo bhojane mattaññutā nāma vuccati.
atk-abh01a0:2393_5: Tāya hi samannāgato puggalo ādhānappatto nidhānakkhamo na hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2393_6: Udake alābukaṭāhaṃ viya ārammaṇe pilavatīti pilāpanatā.
atk-abh01a0:2393_8: Tāya hi samannāgato puggalo nikkhittabhatto viya kāko,
atk-abh01a0:2394_1: Bhāvanābalaniddese kusalānaṃ dhammānanti bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ āsevanāti ādisevanā.
atk-abh01a0:2395_2: Diṭṭhivipattiniddeso ca diṭṭhisampadāniddesapaṭipakkhato diṭṭhisampadāniddeso ca diṭṭhupādānaniddesapaṭipakkhato.
atk-abh01a0:2395_11: sīlasampadā ca diṭṭhisampadā cāti imehi pana chahi dukehi catubhūmakāpi lokiyalokuttaradhammāva kathitā.
atk-abh01a0:2396_3: Tattha attanā vā kataṃ hotu parena vā sabbampi akusalakammaṃ no sakaṃ. Kasmā?
atk-abh01a0:2396_5: Kusalakammaṃ pana anatthabhañjanato atthajananato ca ‘sakaṃ’ nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2396_6: Tattha yathā nāma sadhano sabhogo puriso addhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjitvā antarāmagge gāmanigamādīsu nakkhatte saṅghuṭṭhe ‘ahaṃ āgantuko,
atk-abh01a0:2396_7: kaṃ nu kho nissāya nakkhattaṃ kīḷeyya’nti acintetvā yathā yathā icchati tena tena nīhārena nakkhattaṃ kīḷanto sukhena kantāraṃ atikkamati,
atk-abh01a0:2396_8: evameva imasmiṃ kammassakataññāṇe ṭhatvā ime sattā bahuṃ vaṭṭagāmikammaṃ āyūhitvā sukhena sukhaṃ anubhavantā arahattaṃ pattā gaṇanapathaṃ vītivattā.
atk-abh01a0:2397_1: ‘Diṭṭhivisuddhi kho panā’tipadassa niddese yā paññā pajānanātiādīhi padehi heṭṭhā vuttāni kammassakataññāṇādīneva cattāri ñāṇāni vibhattāni.
atk-abh01a0:2398_1: ‘Yathādiṭṭhissa ca padhāna’nti padassa niddese yo cetasiko vīriyārambhotiādīhi padehi niddiṭṭhaṃ vīriyaṃ paññāgatikameva;
atk-abh01a0:2398_2: paññāya hi lokiyaṭṭhāne lokiyaṃ lokuttaraṭṭhāne lokuttaranti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2399_1: Saṃvegadukaniddese jātibhayanti jātiṃ bhayato disvā ṭhitañāṇaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2400_1: Anuppannānaṃ pāpakānantiādīhi jātiādīni bhayato disvā jātijarābyādhimaraṇehi muccitukāmassa upāyapadhānaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2401_1: ‘Asantuṭṭhitā ca kusalesu dhammesū’ti padaniddese bhiyyokamyatāti visesakāmatā.
atk-abh01a0:2401_2: Idhekacco hi āditova pakkhikabhattaṃ vā salākabhattaṃ vā uposathikaṃ vā pāṭipadikaṃ vā deti,
atk-abh01a0:2401_3: so tena asantuṭṭho hutvā puna dhurabhattaṃ saṅghabhattaṃ vassāvāsikaṃ deti,
atk-abh01a0:2401_9: Pabbajitvā ekaṃ nikāyaṃ dve nikāyeti tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-abh01a0:2402_1: ‘Appaṭivānitā ca padhānasmi’nti padassa niddese yasmā pantasenāsanesu adhikusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ bhāvanāya ukkaṇṭhamāno padhānaṃ paṭivāseti nāma,
atk-abh01a0:2402_3: tasmā taṃ nayaṃ dassetuṃ yā kusalānaṃ dhammānantiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2403_1: ‘Pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṃ vijjā’ti ettha pubbenivāsoti pubbe nivutthakkhandhā ca khandhapaṭibaddhañca.
atk-abh01a0:2403_4: Tayidaṃ pubbe nivutthakkhandhapaṭicchādakaṃ tamaṃ vijjhatīti vijjā.
atk-abh01a0:2403_5: Taṃ tamaṃ vijjhitvā te khandhe vidite pākaṭe karotīti viditakaraṇaṭṭhenāpi vijjā.
atk-abh01a0:2404_0: Cutūpapāte ñāṇanti cutiyañca upapāte ca ñāṇaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2404_1: Idampi sattānaṃ cutipaṭisandhicchādakaṃ tamaṃ vijjhatīti vijjā.
atk-abh01a0:2404_2: Taṃ tamaṃ vijjhitvā sattānaṃ cutipaṭisandhiyo viditā pākaṭā karotīti viditakaraṇaṭṭhenāpi vijjā.
atk-abh01a0:2404_3: Āsavānaṃ khaye ñāṇanti sabbakilesānaṃ khayasamaye ñāṇaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2404_5: Taṃ tamaṃ vijjhitvā cattāri saccāni viditāni pākaṭāni karotīti viditakaraṇaṭṭhenāpi vijjā.
atk-abh01a0:2405_1: ‘Cittassa ca adhimutti nibbānañcā’ti ettha ārammaṇe adhimuccanaṭṭhena,
atk-abh01a0:2405_2: paccanīkadhammehi ca suṭṭhumuttaṭṭhena aṭṭha samāpattiyo cittassa adhimutti nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2405_5: Tattha aṭṭha samāpattiyo sayaṃ vikkhambhitakilesehi vimuttattā vimuttīti vuttā,
atk-abh01a0:2405_6: nibbānaṃ pana sabbakilesehi accantaṃ vimuttattā vimuttīti.
atk-abh01a0:2406_3: Tattha paṭhamamaggañāṇaṃ pañca kilese khepentaṃ nirodhentaṃ vūpasamentaṃ paṭippassambhentaṃ uppajjatīti khaye ñāṇaṃ nāma jātaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2406_6: Catutthamaggañāṇaṃ pana aṭṭha kilese khepentaṃ nirodhentaṃ vūpasamentaṃ paṭippassambhentaṃ uppajjatīti ‘khaye ñāṇaṃ’ nāma jātaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2406_7: Taṃ taṃ maggaphalañāṇaṃ pana tesaṃ tesaṃ kilesānaṃ khīṇante niruddhante vūpasamante paṭippassambhante
atk-abh01a0:2406_8: anuppādante appavattante uppannanti anuppāde ñāṇaṃ nāma jātanti.
atk-abh01a0:2411_1: Idāni nikkhepakaṇḍānantaraṃ ṭhapitassa aṭṭhakathākaṇḍassa vaṇṇanākkamo anuppatto.
atk-abh01a0:2411_4: Tīsupi hi piṭakesu dhammantaraṃ āgataṃ aṭṭhakathākaṇḍeneva paricchinditvā vinicchitaṃ suvinicchitaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2411_5: Sakale abhidhammapiṭake nayamaggaṃ mahāpakaraṇe pañhuddhāraṃ gaṇanacāraṃ asallakkhentenāpi aṭṭhakathākaṇḍatoyeva samānetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-abh01a0:2412_2: Sāriputtatthero hi ekassa attano saddhivihārikassa nikkhepakaṇḍe atthuddhāraṃ sallakkhetuṃ asakkontassa aṭṭhakathākaṇḍaṃ kathetvā adāsi.
atk-abh01a0:2412_3: Idaṃ pana mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ paṭikkhipitvā idaṃ vuttaṃ –
atk-abh01a0:2412_8: Dhammasenāpati pana saddhivihārikena pucchito taṃ ādāya satthu santikaṃ gantvā sammāsambuddhassa kathesi.
atk-abh01a0:2412_9: Sammāsambuddho tassa bhikkhuno aṭṭhakathākaṇḍaṃ kathetvā adāsi. Kathaṃ?
atk-abh01a0:2412_12: Athassa tuṇhībhūtassa ‘nanu yaṃ mayā katame dhammā kusalā?
atk-abh01a0:2412_13: Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hotītiādinā nayena bhūmibhedato kusalaṃ dassitaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2412_15: ime dhammā kusalā’ti iminā nayena kaṇṇikaṃ kaṇṇikaṃ ghaṭaṃ ghaṭaṃ gocchakaṃ gocchakaṃ katvā atthuddhāravasena kusalādidhamme dassento kathetvā adāsi.
atk-abh01a0:2413_2: Ime dhammā kusalāti ime sabbepi tāsu tāsu bhūmīsu vuttā phassādayo dhammā kusalā nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2414_1: Akusalānaṃ pana bhūmivasena bhedābhāvato dvādasa akusalacittuppādāti āha.
atk-abh01a0:2414_5: Yathā pana ‘rājā āgato’ti vutte amaccādīnampi āgamanaṃ vuttameva hoti,
atk-abh01a0:2414_6: evaṃ ‘cittuppādā’ti vutte tehi sampayuttadhammāpi vuttāva hontīti.
atk-abh01a0:2414_7: Sabbattha cittuppādaggahaṇena sasampayuttadhammaṃ cittaṃ gahitanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2414_8: Ito paraṃ catūsu bhūmīsu vipākotiādīnaṃ sabbesampi tikadukabhājanīyapadānaṃ attho,
atk-abh01a0:2414_9: vedanāttikādīsu ca sukhādīnaṃ navattabbatā heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva pāḷiyatthaṃ vīmaṃsitvā veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:2415_1: Tattha parittārammaṇattike tāva sabbo kāmāvacarassa vipākoti ettha dvipañcaviññāṇāni cakkhupasādādayo
atk-abh01a0:2415_2: nissāya niyameneva iṭṭhāniṭṭhādibhede rūpasaddagandharasaphoṭṭhabbadhamme ārabbha pavattantīti parittārammaṇāni.
atk-abh01a0:2415_3: Kusalākusalavipākā pana dve manodhātuyo hadayavatthuṃ nissāya cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ anantarā niyamato rūpādīneva ārabbha pavattantīti parittārammaṇā.
atk-abh01a0:2415_4: Kusalavipākāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātu somanassasahagatā pañcadvāre santīraṇavasena chasu dvāresu tadārammaṇavasenāti
atk-abh01a0:2415_5: niyamato rūpādīni cha parittārammaṇāneva ārabbha pavattatīti parittārammaṇā.
atk-abh01a0:2415_7: niyamato rūpādīni cha parittārammaṇāneva ārabbha pavattati.
atk-abh01a0:2415_8: Paṭisandhivasena pavattamānampi parittaṃ kammaṃ kammanimittaṃ gatinimittaṃ vā ārammaṇaṃ karoti,
atk-abh01a0:2415_10: pariyosāne cutivasena pavattamānampi tadeva ārammaṇaṃ karotīti parittārammaṇaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2415_11: Aṭṭha pana sahetukavipākacittuppādā ettha vuttanayeneva tadārammaṇavasena paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutivasena ca parittadhammeyeva ārabbha pavattanti.
atk-abh01a0:2415_13: Somanassasahagatāhetukakiriyamanoviññāṇadhātu chasu dvāresu paccuppanne manodvāre atītānāgatepi paritte
atk-abh01a0:2415_14: rūpādidhammeyeva ārabbha khīṇāsavānaṃ pahaṭṭhākāraṃ kurumānā pavattatīti parittārammaṇā.
atk-abh01a0:2415_15: Evamime pañcavīsati cittuppādā ekanteneva parittārammaṇāti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:2416_1: Viññāṇañcāyatananevasaññānāsaññāyatanadhammā attano attano heṭṭhimaṃ samāpattiṃ ārabbha pavattanato mahaggatārammaṇā.
atk-abh01a0:2417_0: Kusalato cattāro kiriyato cattāroti aṭṭha ñāṇavippayuttacittuppādā sekkhaputhujjanakhīṇāsavānaṃ asakkaccadānapaccavekkhaṇadhammasavanādīsu
atk-abh01a0:2417_4: Akusalato cattāro diṭṭhigatasampayuttacittuppādā pañcapaṇṇāsāya kāmāvacaradhammānaṃ ‘satto satto’ti parāmasanaassādanābhinandanakāle parittārammaṇā.
atk-abh01a0:2417_5: Tenevākārena sattavīsati mahaggatadhamme ārabbha pavattikāle mahaggatārammaṇā.
atk-abh01a0:2417_7: Diṭṭhivippayuttānaṃ teyeva dhamme ārabbha kevalaṃ assādanābhinandanavasena,
atk-abh01a0:2417_10: uddhaccasahagatassa vikkhepavasena avūpasamavasena ca pavattiyaṃ parittamahaggatanavattabbārammaṇatā veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:2417_11: Etesu pana ekadhammopi appamāṇe ārabbha pavattituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-abh01a0:2418_0: Kusalato cattāro kiriyato cattāroti aṭṭha ñāṇasampayuttacittuppādā sekkhaputhujjanakhīṇāsavānaṃ sakkaccadānapaccavekkhaṇadhammasavanādīsu
atk-abh01a0:2418_1: yathāvuttappakāre dhamme ārabbha pavattikāle parittamahaggatanavattabbārammaṇā honti.
atk-abh01a0:2418_2: Gotrabhukāle lokuttaradhamme paccavekkhaṇakāle ca nesaṃ appamāṇārammaṇatā veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:2419_0: Yaṃ panetaṃ rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānaṃ taṃ sabbatthapādakacatutthaṃ ākāsakasiṇacatutthaṃ ālokakasiṇacatutthaṃ
atk-abh01a0:2420_5: ‘Ākāsakasiṇaālokakasiṇacatutthāni’ pana vipassanāyapi abhiññānampi vaṭṭassāpi pādakāni honti,
atk-abh01a0:2420_7: ‘Brahmavihāraānāpānacatutthāni’ vipassanāya ceva vaṭṭassa ca pādakāni honti,
atk-abh01a0:2420_8: abhiññānaṃ pana nirodhassa ca pādakāni na honti.
atk-abh01a0:2420_9: Tattha dasavidhampi kasiṇajjhānaṃ kasiṇapaṇṇattiṃ ārabbha pavattattā,
atk-abh01a0:2420_11: ānāpānacatutthaṃ nimittaṃ ārabbha pavattattā parittādivasena navattabbadhammārammaṇato navattabbārammaṇaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2421_1: Tañhi yadā kāyaṃ cittasannissitaṃ katvā adissamānena kāyena gantukāmo cittavasena kāyaṃ pariṇāmeti,
atk-abh01a0:2421_4: tadā upayogaladdhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hotīti katvā rūpakāyārammaṇato parittārammaṇaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2421_5: Yadā cittaṃ kāyasannissitaṃ katvā dissamānena kāyena gantukāmo kāyavasena cittaṃ pariṇāmeti,
atk-abh01a0:2421_8: tadā upayogaladdhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hotīti katvā mahaggatacittārammaṇato mahaggatārammaṇaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2422_5: Ettha ca puthujjano sotāpannassa cittaṃ na jānāti,
atk-abh01a0:2422_6: sotāpanno vā sakadāgāmissāti evaṃ yāva arahato netabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2422_8: Aññopi ca uparimo heṭṭhimassāti ayaṃ viseso veditabbo.
atk-abh01a0:2423_4: Atīte attanā vā parehi vā bhāvitamaggaṃ sacchikataphalañca anussaraṇakāle appamāṇārammaṇaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2423_11: bandhumatī nāma mātā’tiādinā nayena nāmagottapathavīnimittādianussaraṇakāle navattabbārammaṇaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2424_1: Tampi ayaṃ anāgate ‘kāmāvacare nibbattissatī’ti jānanakāle parittārammaṇaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2424_2: ‘Rūpāvacare vā arūpāvacare vā nibbattissatī’ti jānanakāle mahaggatārammaṇaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2424_3: ‘Maggaṃ bhāvessati phalaṃ sacchikarissati’ ‘nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyissatī’ti jānanakāle appamāṇārammaṇaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2424_6: brahmavatī nāma brāhmaṇī mātā bhavissatī”tiādinā nayena nāmagottajānanakāle navattabbārammaṇaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2425_0: Arūpāvacaracatutthaṃ pana āsavānaṃ khayacatutthañca pāḷiyaṃ āgataṭṭhāneyeva kathessāmi.
atk-abh01a0:2425_1: Kiriyāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātu upekkhāsahagatā sabbesampi etesaṃ kusalākusalakiriyacittānaṃ purecārikā.
atk-abh01a0:2425_3: Pañcadvāre pana voṭṭhabbanavasena pavattiyaṃ ekantaparittārammaṇāva hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2425_4: Rūpāvacaratikacatukkajjhānādīni parittādibhāvena navattabbadhammaṃ ārabbha pavattito navattabbārammaṇāni.
atk-abh01a0:2426_1: Maggārammaṇattike ādimhi vuttā aṭṭha ñāṇasampayuttacittuppādā sekkhāsekkhānaṃ attanā paṭividdhamaggānaṃ paccavekkhaṇakāle maggārammaṇā,
atk-abh01a0:2426_3: attanā paṭividdhamaggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhaṇakāle ārammaṇādhipativasena maggādhipatino,
atk-abh01a0:2426_5: Cattāro ariyamaggā maggasaṅkhātassa maggasampayuttassa vā hetuno atthitāya ekantato maggahetukāva.
atk-abh01a0:2426_6: Vīriyaṃ pana vīmaṃsaṃ vā jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā maggabhāvanākāle sahajātādhipatinā siyā maggādhipatino,
atk-abh01a0:2426_7: chandacittānaṃ aññatarajeṭṭhakakāle siyā na vattabbā maggādhipatinoti.
atk-abh01a0:2427_0: Dvādasavidhe rūpāvacaracatutthajjhāne sabbatthapādakacatutthādīni nava jhānāni neva maggārammaṇāni na maggahetukāni na maggādhipatīni.
atk-abh01a0:2427_3: maggaṃ garuṃ katvā appavattito na maggādhipatīni.
atk-abh01a0:2427_4: Kasmā panetāni na maggaṃ garuṃ karontīti?
atk-abh01a0:2427_6: Yathā hi rājānaṃ sabbo loko garuṃ karoti,
atk-abh01a0:2427_8: Na hi te rājānaṃ disvā āsanā vuṭṭhahanti,
atk-abh01a0:2427_11: Evametānipi attano mahaggatatāya na maggaṃ garuṃ karonti.
atk-abh01a0:2428_0: Kiriyāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātupi ariyānaṃ maggapaccavekkhaṇakāle paccavekkhaṇapurecārikattā maggārammaṇā hoti,
atk-abh01a0:2428_2: maggaṃ garuṃ katvā appavattito na maggādhipati.
atk-abh01a0:2428_5: Yathā hi rājānaṃ sabbo loko garuṃ karoti,
atk-abh01a0:2428_6: attano parijanā pana khujjavāmanakaceṭakādayo attano aññāṇatāya paṇḍitamanussā viya nātigaruṃ karonti,
atk-abh01a0:2428_7: evameva idampi cittaṃ attano ahetukatāya hīnatāya jaḷatāya maggaṃ garuṃ na karoti.
atk-abh01a0:2429_0: Ñāṇavippayuttakusalādīni ñāṇābhāvena ceva lokiyadhammārammaṇatāya ca maggārammaṇādibhāvaṃ na labhanti,
atk-abh01a0:2430_1: Atītārammaṇattike viññāṇañcāyatananevasaññānāsaññāyatanadhammā heṭṭhā atītasamāpattiṃ ārabbha pavattitā ekantena atītārammaṇāva.
atk-abh01a0:2431_1: Niyogā anāgatārammaṇā natthīti niyamena pāṭiyekkaṃ cittaṃ anāgatārammaṇaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-abh01a0:2431_5: Pāṭiyekkaṃ pana etaṃ ekaṃ cittaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-abh01a0:2431_6: Rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānena saṅgahitattā aññehi mahaggatacittehi missakaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2432_2: tisso manodhātuyo ca paccuppannesu rūpādīsu pavattito paccuppannārammaṇā nāma.
atk-abh01a0:2432_3: Dasa cittuppādāti ettha aṭṭha tāva sahetukā devamanussānaṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇakāle kammaṃ vā kammanimittaṃ vā ārabbha pavattiyaṃ atītārammaṇā.
atk-abh01a0:2432_5: Gatinimittaṃ pana ārabbha paṭisandhiggahaṇakāle tato paraṃ bhavaṅgakāle ca paccuppannārammaṇā.
atk-abh01a0:2432_7: Manodvāre pana atītānāgatapaccuppannārammaṇānaṃ javanānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā pavattito atītānāgatapaccuppannārammaṇā.
atk-abh01a0:2432_9: Kevalañhi sā manussesu jaccandhādīnaṃ paṭisandhi hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2432_10: Pañcadvāre ca santīraṇavasenāpi paccuppannārammaṇā hotīti ayamettha viseso.
atk-abh01a0:2432_11: ‘Somanassasahagatā’ pana pañcadvāre santīraṇavasena tadārammaṇavasena ca paccuppannārammaṇā hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2432_12: Manodvāre tadārammaṇavasena sahetukavipākā viya atītānāgatapaccuppannārammaṇāti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:2433_1: Kevalañhi sā āpāyikānaṃ paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutivasena pavattatīti ayamettha viseso.
atk-abh01a0:2433_2: ‘Kiriyāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātu’ somanassasahagatā khīṇāsavānaṃ pañcadvāre pahaṭṭhākāraṃ kurumānā paccuppannārammaṇā hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2433_3: Manodvāre atītādibhede dhamme ārabbha hasituppādavasena pavattiyaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannārammaṇā hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2434_1: Sekkhaputhujjanānaṃ atītādibhedāni khandhadhātuāyatanāni sammasantānaṃ paccavekkhantānaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannārammaṇā honti.
atk-abh01a0:2435_0: Akusalato cattāro diṭṭhisampayuttacittuppādā atītādibhedānaṃ khandhadhātuāyatanānaṃ assādanābhinandanaparāmāsakāle atītādiārammaṇā honti.
atk-abh01a0:2435_1: Paṇṇattiṃ ārabbha assādentassa abhinandantassa ‘satto satto’ti parāmasitvā gaṇhantassa navattabbārammaṇā honti.
atk-abh01a0:2435_4: Dve paṭighasampayuttacittuppādā atītādibhede dhamme ārabbha domanassitānaṃ atītādiārammaṇā,
atk-abh01a0:2435_6: Vicikicchuddhaccasampayuttā tesu eva dhammesu aniṭṭhaṅgatabhāvena ceva uddhatabhāvena ca pavattiyaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannanavattabbārammaṇā.
atk-abh01a0:2435_8: Kiriyāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātu upekkhāsahagatā pañcadvāre voṭṭhabbanavasena pavattiyaṃ paccuppannārammaṇāva.
atk-abh01a0:2435_9: Manodvāre atītānāgatapaccuppannārammaṇānañceva paṇṇattinibbānārammaṇānañca javanānaṃ purecārikakāle atītānāgatapaccuppannanavattabbārammaṇā.
atk-abh01a0:2436_2: ‘Iddhividhacatutthaṃ’ kāyavasena cittaṃ pariṇāmentassa atītapādakajjhānacittaṃ ārabbha pavattanato atītārammaṇaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2436_3: Mahādhātunidhāne mahākassapattherādīnaṃ viya anāgataṃ adhiṭṭhahantānaṃ anāgatārammaṇaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2436_4: Mahākassapatthero kira mahādhātunidhānaṃ karonto anāgate aṭṭhārasavassādhikāni dve vassasatāni ime gandhā mā sussiṃsu,
atk-abh01a0:2436_8: Assaguttatthero vattaniyasenāsane bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sukkhabhattaṃ bhuñjamānaṃ disvā ‘udakasoṇḍi divase divase,
atk-abh01a0:2436_10: Purebhattaṃ gahitaṃ dadhirasaṃ hoti pacchābhatte pākatikameva.
atk-abh01a0:2436_11: Kāyaṃ pana cittasannissitaṃ katvā adissamānena kāyena gamanakāle,
atk-abh01a0:2437_1: Cetopariyañāṇacatutthaṃ atīte sattadivasabbhantare anāgate sattadivasabbhantare paresaṃ cittaṃ jānantassa atītārammaṇaṃ anāgatārammaṇañca hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2437_2: Sattadivasātikkame pana taṃ jānituṃ na sakkoti.
atk-abh01a0:2437_4: Na etassa paccuppannajānanakāle pana paccuppannārammaṇaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2438_4: Tattha andhakāre nisīditvā ālokaṭṭhānaṃ gatassa na tāva ārammaṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti;
atk-abh01a0:2438_7: Ālokaṭṭhāne vicaritvā ovarakaṃ paviṭṭhassāpi na tāva sahasā rūpaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti;
atk-abh01a0:2438_10: Dūre ṭhatvā pana rajakānaṃ hatthavikāraṃ ghaṇḍibherīādiākoṭanavikārañca disvāpi na tāva saddaṃ suṇāti;
atk-abh01a0:2438_14: Saṃyuttabhāṇakā pana ‘rūpasantati arūpasantatī’ti dve santatiyo vatvā,
atk-abh01a0:2438_15: ‘udakaṃ akkamitvā gatassa yāva tīre akkantaudakalekhā na vippasīdati,
atk-abh01a0:2438_16: addhānato āgatassa yāva kāye usumabhāvo na vūpasammati,
atk-abh01a0:2438_17: ātapā āgantvā gabbhaṃ paviṭṭhassa yāva andhakārabhāvo na vigacchati,
atk-abh01a0:2438_18: antogabbhe kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikaritvā divā vātapānaṃ vivaritvā olokentassa yāva akkhīnaṃ phandanabhāvo na vūpasammati,
atk-abh01a0:2438_20: dve tayo javanavārā arūpasantati nāmā’ti vatvā ‘tadubhayampi santatipaccuppannaṃ nāmā’ti vadanti.
atk-abh01a0:2439_2: mano ye ca dhammā ubhayametaṃ paccuppannaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2439_3: Tasmiṃ ce paccuppanne chandarāgapaṭibaddhaṃ hoti viññāṇaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2440_0: Tattha keci ‘khaṇapaccuppannaṃ cittaṃ cetopariyañāṇassa ārammaṇaṃ hotī’ti vadanti.
atk-abh01a0:2440_2: Yasmā iddhimassa ca parassa ca ekakkhaṇe cittaṃ uppajjatīti.
atk-abh01a0:2440_4: yathā ākāse khitte pupphamuṭṭhimhi avassaṃ ekaṃ pupphaṃ ekassa vaṇṭaṃ paṭivijjhati vaṇṭena vaṇṭaṃ paṭivijjhati,
atk-abh01a0:2440_5: evaṃ parassa cittaṃ jānissāmīti rāsivasena mahājanassa citte āvajjite avassaṃ ekassa cittaṃ ekena cittena
atk-abh01a0:2440_6: uppādakkhaṇe vā ṭhitikkhaṇe vā bhaṅgakkhaṇe vā paṭivijjhatīti.
atk-abh01a0:2440_7: Taṃ pana vassasatampi vassasahassampi āvajjanto yena cittena āvajjeti,
atk-abh01a0:2440_8: yena ca jānāti tesaṃ dvinnaṃ sahaṭṭhānābhāvato āvajjanajavanānañca aniṭṭhe ṭhāne nānārammaṇabhāvappattidosato ayuttanti aṭṭhakathāsu paṭikkhittaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2440_9: Santatipaccuppannaṃ pana addhāpaccuppannañca ārammaṇaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2441_0: Tattha yaṃ vattamānajavanavīthito atītānāgatavasena dvitijavanavīthiparimāṇakāle parassa cittaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2441_2: Addhāpaccuppannaṃ pana javanavārena dīpetabbanti yaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ taṃ suvuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2441_5: Āvajjanaṃ khaṇapaccuppannaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā teneva saha nirujjhati.
atk-abh01a0:2441_6: Tato cattāri pañca javanāni yesaṃ pacchimaṃ iddhicittaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2441_8: Tesaṃ sabbesampi tadeva niruddhaṃ cittamārammaṇaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2441_11: Ekārammaṇattepi ca iddhicittameva parassa cittaṃ pajānāti,
atk-abh01a0:2441_15: Iti idaṃ santatipaccuppannassa ceva addhāpaccuppannassa ca vasena paccuppannārammaṇaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2442_4: atha kho tesaṃ pubbenivāsañāṇassa atītakkhandhā khandhapaṭibaddhañca kiñci anārammaṇaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-abh01a0:2442_7: Tañhi aññaṃ khandhaṃ vā khandhapaṭibaddhaṃ vā na jānāti,
atk-abh01a0:2442_12: Yasmā pana “kusalā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa cetopariyañāṇassa pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa yathākammupagañāṇassa
atk-abh01a0:2442_14: tasmā cattāropi khandhā cetopariyañāṇayathākammupagañāṇānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ honti.
atk-abh01a0:2443_2: Tañhi anāgatakkhandhakhandhapaṭibaddhesu dhammesu pubbenivāsañāṇaṃ viya sabbaññutaññāṇasamagatikaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2443_4: taṃ pana sattadivasabbhantare uppajjanakacittameva ārammaṇaṃ karoti.
atk-abh01a0:2443_5: Idaṃ anāgate kappasatasahasse uppajjanakacittampi khandhepi khandhapaṭibaddhampi.
atk-abh01a0:2443_6: Rūpāvacaratikacatukkajjhānādīni atītānāgatapaccuppannesu ekadhammampi ārabbha appavattito ekantanavattabbārammaṇānevāti veditabbāni.
atk-abh01a0:2444_1: Ajjhattattike anindriyabaddharūpañca nibbānañca bahiddhāti idaṃ yathā indriyabaddhaṃ parapuggalasantāne
atk-abh01a0:2444_2: bahiddhāti vuccamānampi tassa attano santānapariyāpannattā niyakajjhattaṃ hoti,
atk-abh01a0:2444_3: evaṃ na kenaci pariyāyena ajjhattaṃ hotīti niyakajjhattapariyāyassa abhāvena bahiddhāti vuttaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2444_5: Niyakajjhattamattassa pana asambhavamattaṃ sandhāya ajjhattārammaṇattike bahiddhārammaṇatā vuttā.
atk-abh01a0:2444_7: ananujānitvā ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ na vattabbaṃ ajjhattārammaṇantipītiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2445_5: Tāni pana tasmiṃ vutte vuttāneva hontīti visuṃ na vuttāni.
atk-abh01a0:2445_12: rūpāvacaracatutthajjhāna’nti evaṃ vuttānaṃ etesaṃ cittuppādānaṃ ‘siyā na vattabbā atītārammaṇātipī’tiādinā
atk-abh01a0:2445_17: ime dhammā na vattabbā atītārammaṇātipī’ti evaṃ ekantena navattabbārammaṇattavacanato navattabbārammaṇanti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2445_18: Idāni taṃ ajjhattārammaṇattike ekampi vuccamānaṃ yasmā heṭṭhā tena saha ekārammaṇabhāvampi sandhāya kāmāvacarakusalādīnaṃ navattabbārammaṇatā vuttā,
atk-abh01a0:2445_20: Ko hi tena saha ekārammaṇānaṃ navattabbārammaṇabhāve antarāyoti?
atk-abh01a0:2446_0: Ārammaṇavibhāge pana viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatananti imesaṃ tāva kusalavipākakiriyavasena
atk-abh01a0:2446_1: channaṃ cittuppādānaṃ attano santānasambandhaṃ heṭṭhimasamāpattiṃ ārabbha pavattito ajjhattārammaṇatā
atk-abh01a0:2446_3: Ettha ca kiriyaākāsānañcāyatanaṃ kiriyaviññāṇañcāyatanasseva ārammaṇaṃ hoti,
atk-abh01a0:2446_5: Ākāsānañcāyatanakiriyasamaṅgino kusalassa vā vipākassa vā viññāṇañcāyatanassa abhāvato.
atk-abh01a0:2446_6: Kusalaṃ pana kusalavipākakiriyānaṃ tiṇṇampi ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Kasmā?
atk-abh01a0:2446_7: Ākāsānañcāyatanakusalaṃ nibbattetvā ṭhitassa tato uddhaṃ tividhassapi viññāṇañcāyatanassa uppattisambhavato.
atk-abh01a0:2446_8: Vipākaṃ pana na kassaci ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Kasmā?
atk-abh01a0:2446_11: Rūpāvacarattikacatukkajjhānādīnaṃ sabbesampi niyakajjhattato bahiddhābhāvena bahiddhābhūtāni pathavīkasiṇādīni
atk-abh01a0:2447_1: rūpāvacaraṃ catutthaṃ jhānanti ettha kusalato tāva cattāro ñāṇasampayuttacittuppādā attano khandhādīni paccavekkhantassa ajjhattārammaṇā.
atk-abh01a0:2447_6: Akusalato cattāro diṭṭhisampayuttacittuppādā attano khandhādīnaṃ assādanābhinandanaparāmāsagahaṇakāle ajjhattārammaṇā,
atk-abh01a0:2447_7: parassa khandhādīsu ceva anindriyabaddharūpakasiṇādīsu ca tatheva pavattikāle bahiddhārammaṇā,
atk-abh01a0:2447_11: Dvepi paṭighasampayuttā attano khandhādīsu domanassitassa ajjhattārammaṇā,
atk-abh01a0:2447_12: parassa khandhādīsu ceva anindriyabaddharūpapaṇṇattīsu ca bahiddhārammaṇā,
atk-abh01a0:2447_14: Vicikicchuddhaccasampayuttānampi vuttapakāresu dhammesu vicikicchanaphandanabhāvavasena pavattiyaṃ ajjhattādiārammaṇatā veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:2448_2: ime terasa cittuppādā attano rūpādīni ārabbha pavattiyaṃ ajjhattārammaṇā,
atk-abh01a0:2448_6: manodvāre tadārammaṇavaseneva aññepi ajjhattike kāmāvacaradhamme ārabbha pavattiyaṃ ajjhattārammaṇā,
atk-abh01a0:2448_10: Kevalaṃ panetā sugatiyaṃ duggatiyañca paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutivasenāpi ajjhattādibhedesu kammādīsu pavattanti.
atk-abh01a0:2449_3: Somanassasahagatāhetukakiriyā pañcadvāre attano rūpādīni ārabbha pahaṭṭhākārakaraṇavasena pavattiyaṃ ajjhattārammaṇā,
atk-abh01a0:2449_5: Manodvāre tathāgatassa jotipālamāṇavamaghadevarājakaṇhatāpasādikālesu attanā katakiriyaṃ paccavekkhantassa hasituppādavasena pavattā ajjhattārammaṇā.
atk-abh01a0:2450_0: Mallikāya deviyā santatimahāmattassa sumanamālākārassāti evamādīnaṃ kiriyākaraṇaṃ ārabbha pavattikāle bahiddhārammaṇā.
atk-abh01a0:2450_2: Upekkhāsahagatakiriyāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātu pañcadvāre voṭṭhabbanavasena manodvāre ca āvajjanavasena pavattiyaṃ ajjhattādiārammaṇā.
atk-abh01a0:2451_0: Vuttappakāre rūpāvacaracatutthajjhāne sabbatthapādakacatutthādīni pañca jhānāni imasmiṃ tike okāsaṃ labhanti.
atk-abh01a0:2452_1: cittavasena vā kāyaṃ pariṇāmanakāle attano kumārakavaṇṇādinimmānakāle ca sakāyacittānaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇato ajjhattārammaṇaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2453_4: Attano cittajānane pana tena payojanaṃ natthi.
atk-abh01a0:2454_4: parassa anāgatakkhandhānaṃ vā anindriyabaddhassa vā rūpassa anussaraṇakāle bahiddhārammaṇaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2456_1: Hetugocchakaniddese tayo kusalahetūtiādinā nayena hetū dassetvā puna teyeva uppattiṭṭhānato dassetuṃ catūsu bhūmīsu kusalesu uppajjantītiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a0:2457_1: Yattha dve tayo āsavā ekato uppajjantīti ettha tividhena āsavānaṃ ekato uppatti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:2457_3: diṭṭhisampayuttesu diṭṭhāsavaavijjāsavehi saddhinti kāmāsavo duvidhena ekato uppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:2457_4: Bhavāsavo catūsu diṭṭhivippayuttesu avijjāsavena saddhinti ekadhāva ekato uppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:2457_5: Yathā cettha evaṃ yattha dve tīṇi saṃyojanāni ekato uppajjantīti etthāpi saṃyojanānaṃ uppatti ekato dasadhā bhave.
atk-abh01a0:2457_9: Tathā vicikicchā ceva bhavarāgo ca. Kathaṃ?
atk-abh01a0:2457_13: avijjāsaṃyojanamatteneva ca saddhinti evaṃ catudhā ekato uppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:2457_16: avijjāsaṃyojanamatteneva ca saddhinti evaṃ tidhā ekato uppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:2457_17: Māno bhavarāgāvijjāsaṃyojanehi saddhiṃ ekadhāva ekato uppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:2457_19: Sā hi avijjāsaṃyojanena saddhiṃ ekadhā uppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:2457_21: Evamettha dve tīṇi saṃyojanāni ekato uppajjanti.
atk-abh01a0:2458_1: Yaṃ panetaṃ nīvaraṇagocchake yattha dve tīṇi nīvaraṇāni ekato uppajjantīti vuttaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2458_2: tatthāpi aṭṭhadhā nīvaraṇānaṃ ekato uppatti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a0:2458_3: Etesu hi kāmacchando duvidhā ekato uppajjati,
atk-abh01a0:2458_8: sasaṅkhārikesu thinamiddhauddhaccaavijjānīvaraṇehi saddhiṃ duvidhā ekato uppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:2458_11: Tasmā catunnampi ekato uppajjatīti vacanaṃ yujjati eva.
atk-abh01a0:2458_16: Uddhaccaṃ pana avijjānīvaraṇamattena saddhiṃ ekadhāva ekato uppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:2459_1: Yampidaṃ kilesagocchake yattha dve tayo kilesā ekato uppajjantīti vuttaṃ,
atk-abh01a0:2459_3: tayo vā kilesā aññehi kilesehi saddhiṃ uppajjantī’ti evamattho veditabbo. Kasmā?
atk-abh01a0:2459_4: Dvinnaṃ tiṇṇaṃyeva vā ekato uppattiyā asambhavato.
atk-abh01a0:2460_0: Tattha dasadhā kilesānaṃ ekato uppatti hoti.
atk-abh01a0:2460_1: Ettha hi lobho chadhā ekato uppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:2460_9: sasaṅkhārike mohadiṭṭhithinauddhaccaahirikānottappehi saddhinti chadhā ekato uppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:2461_1: sasaṅkhārike mohathinauddhaccaahirikānottappehi saddhinti evaṃ dvidhā ekato uppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:2461_3: uddhaccasampayutte uddhaccaahirikānottappehi saddhinti evaṃ dvidhā ekato uppajjati.
atk-abh01a0:2469_0: Ṭhitāya tassā āraddhā, yā mayā atthavaṇṇanā.
atk-abh01a0:2474_0: Yaṃ pattaṃ kusalaṃ tassa, ānubhāvena pāṇino;
atk-abh01a0:2478_0: Ciraṃ tiṭṭhatu saddhammo, dhamme hontu sagāravā;
atk-abh01a0:2479_0: Sabbepi sattā kālena, sammā devo pavassatu.
atk-abh01a0:2481_0: Rājā rakkhatu dhammena, attanova pajaṃ pajanti.
atk-abh01a0:2482_4: suppatiṭṭhitabuddhīnaṃ theravaṃsappadīpānaṃ therānaṃ mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ vaṃsālaṅkārabhūtena vipulavisuddhabuddhinā
atk-abh01a0:2482_5: buddhaghosoti garūhi gahitanāmadheyyena therena katā ayaṃ aṭṭhasālinī nāma dhammasaṅgahaṭṭhakathā.
